GUI_MAGAZINE_DNEWS_SUBHEADLINE_11.text: !1F4! With miles of unspoiled nature, Canada is the true land of the free...

X1001M_STAGE02_REACTFRIENDLY_FA_X10MMAN0.text: !1F5! {S}{*1}Good for you! You have a right to be free!

X1001M_STAGE02_REACTNEUTRAL_FA_X10MWOM03.text: !1FF! {S}{*1}I... I've never seen anything like it…

X1001M_STAGE02_REACTNEUTRAL_FA_X10MMAN01.text: !1FI! {S}{*1}Come and see! The street is full of androids!

X1001M_STAGE02_REACTHOSTILE_FA_X10MMAN04.text: !1FJ! {S}{*1}Goddamn machines! Get the hell outta here!

X1001M_STAGE02_REACTHOSTILE_FA_X10MMAN05.text: !1FL! {S}{*1}We're gonna shoot the lot of you!

X1001M_STAGE02_REACTHOSTILE_FA_X10MMAN09.text: !1FN! {S}{*1}You bunch of lazy bums! Get back to work!

X1001M_STAGE02_REACTHOSTILE_FA_X10MMAN03.text: !1FP! {S}{*1}We're gonna fuck you up, you plastic scumbags!

X1001M_STAGE02_REACTHOSTILE_FA_X10MMAN08.text: !1FT! {S}{*1}Oh, you want war?! You'll get a war!

X1001M_STAGE02_REACTHOSTILE_FA_X10MMAN10.text: !1FU! {S}{*1}We'll rip you apart and send you to the dump!

X1001M_STAGE02_REACTHOSTILE_FA_X10MMAN02.text: !1FV! {S}{*1}You're just a piece of plastic! You ain't got no rights!

X1001M_STAGE02_REACTHOSTILE_FA_X10MWOM04.text: !1FX! {S}{*1}We made you! Without us you wouldn't even exist!

X1001M_STAGE02_REACTHOSTILE_FA_X10MWOM06.text: !1FY! {S}{*1}Where are the police? We need to wipe out this scum!

X1001M_STAGE02_REACTHOSTILE_FA_X10MMAN07.text: !1FZ! {S}{*1}Bunch of traitors! You wouldn't exist without us!

X1001M_STAGE02_REACTHOSTILE_FA_X10MWOM08.text: !1G1! {S}{*1}Oh, you want war? You'll get war!

X1001M_STAGE02_REACTHOSTILE_FA_X10MWOM02.text: !1G2! {S}{*1}You're just a piece of plastic! You've got no rights!

X0101X_LIVINGROOM_GUNSHOTS_VO_X01SWAT10_.text: !1G4! {S}{*1}Holy shit! Cover me while I evacuate him.

X0101X_LIVINGROOM_GUNSHOTS_FA_X01SWATCAP.text: !1G5! {S}{*1}Man down! I repeat, man down! Requesting immediate evac!

X0101X_LIVINGROOM_GUNSHOTS_VO_X01ANDROID.text: !1G6! {S}{*1}Go away! All of you go away - or I’ll jump!
!1G7! {S}{*1}Leave us alone! {*2}I want all of you out of here now!
!1G8! {S}{*1}Get out of here! {*2}You have to go!
!1GB! {S}{*1}What are you doing here?  {*2}There’s NOTHING you can do!

X0101X_LIVINGROOM_GUNSHOTS_VO_X01SWAT09_.text: !1GC! {S}{*1}What are we waiting for? We should take down this asshole…

X0101X_LIVINGROOM_GUNSHOTS_VO_X01SWAT04_.text: !1GF! {S}{*1}Fuck, man…  {*2}I got the same model at home...

X0101X_LIVINGROOM_GUNSHOTS_VO_X01SWAT01_.text: !1GG! {S}{*1}Do you see his aim? {*2}Son of a bitch never misses…

X0101X_LIVINGROOM_GUNSHOTS_VO_X01SWAT10_.text: !1GI! {S}{*1}Fuck,  {*2}we don’t need another machine to waste this prick…

X0101X_LIVINGROOM_GUNSHOTS_VO_X01SWAT06_.text: !1GJ! {S}{*1}That cop is alive...  {*2}I saw his leg move…

X0101X_LIVINGROOM_GUNSHOTS_VO_X01SWAT04_.text: !1GK! {S}{*1}What are you looking at?! {*2}Don’t stand there!

X0101X_LIVINGROOM_GUNSHOTS_VO_X01SWAT10_.text: !1GQ! {S}{*1}Holy shit! Cover me while I evacuate him.

X0101X_LIVINGROOM_GUNSHOTS_FA_X01SWATCAP.text: !1GR! {S}{*1}Get those TV assholes out of here! I only wanna see our choppers in the area!
!1GS! {S}{*1}Fuck, {*2}we gotta do something or that bastard is gonna jump off with the kid…
!1GU! {S}{*1}Get the paramedics ready. I've got a man down and another one wounded on the balcony. {*2}We have to evacuate him ASAP.
!1GV! {S}{*1}Stay sharp. {*2}I want everybody ready to go at any second.
!1GW! {S}{*1}All units, hold positions. The negotiator’s going in.

X0101X_TERRACE_HEALCOP_PC_X01CONNOR_EVAC.text: !3KT! {S}{*1}He's losing blood. {*2}If we don't get him to a hospital, he's going to die. {*3}I’m going to apply a tourniquet.

X0101X_TERRACE_HEALCOP_PC_X01ANDROID_EVA.text: !3KV! {S}{*1}All humans die eventually. {*2}What does it matter if this one dies now?

X0101X_TERRACE_HEALCOP_PC_X01CONNOR_NOTA.text: !3KZ! {S}{*1}You can’t kill me. I’m not alive.

X0101X_TERRACE_HEALCOP_PC_X01ANDROID_EVA.text: !3L5! {S}{*1}Don’t touch him! {*2}Touch him and I kill you!

X0101X_SWAT_CONNORHALLARRIVAL_VO_X01SWAT.text: !3LA! {S}{*1}The negotiator is on site. {*2}I repeat: {*3}the negotiator is on site.
!3LE! {S}{*1}Oh come on, we don't need it. We can handle this.

X0101X_SWAT_TIMER_VO_X01SWAT01_POSITION.text: !3LJ! {S}{*1}Everybody's in position. {*2}Nobody move without my order.

X0101X_SWAT_TIMER_VO_X01SWAT01_HELICO.text: !3LM! {S}{*1}The helicopter is on site. {*2}I repeat: the helicopter is on site.

X0101X_SWAT_TIMER_VO_X01SWAT01_WOUNDED.text: !3LN! {S}{*1}There are two wounded on the terrace. {*2}Can’t approach for now. Ask for instructions.

X0101X_SWAT_REPORT_VO_X01SWAT01_REP02.text: !3M3! {S}{*1}Suspect has hostage on edge of building.

MENU_OBSERVATION_01C_MP_GUNLAW_SUBLINE01.text: !3Q0! Androids are strictly forbidden to carry

MENU_OBSERVATION_01C_MP_GUNLAW_SUBLINE02.text: !3Q1! or use any type of weapon

X0101X_TV_NEWS_PC_X01TVSPEAKER_TVNEWSV2.text: !3Q6! {S}{*TC:2000|8000}It’s been just over an hour since a little girl was taken hostage on the top floor of a building here in downtown Detroit.{*TC:8500|10850}Details are still emerging on what exactly happened,{*TC:11000|13600}but the hostage taker could be the family’s android.{*TC:14000|18000}He may have taken the lives of at least one family member and a police officer…{*TC:18300|23000}If confirmed, this would be the first case of an android deliberately taking human lives. {*TC:23400|27300}By all signs, the SWAT team are preparing for an assault and-

X0101X_INTRO_MUM_FA_X01MOTHER_ENCOUNTERS.text: !3Q8! {S}{*1}No, stop… I… I… I can't leave her. {*2}Oh, oh please, please, you gotta save my little girl... {*3}Wait… {*4}you’re sending an android? {*5}You can’t… you can't do that! You W- {*6}Why aren't you sending a real person?

X0101X_INTRO_MUM_FA_X01MOTHER_LEAVE.text: !3Q9! {S}{*1}Don't let that thing near her! {*2}Keep that thing away from my daughter!  {*3}KEEP IT AWAY!

X0101K_INTRO_LIME_PC_X01KSELLER01_MODELS.text: !3QA! {S}{*1}… this is the very latest model, the LT600. {*2}This is the top of the range household assistant. {*3}It cooks 10,000 different dishes, speaks 200 languages and dialects {*4-5}and handles the kids' homework from elementary school up to university level. {*6}At the moment we're doing a special promotion on this entire range at $7999, with a 48-months interest free credit. {*7}And it comes with a two-year warranty for parts and labor. {*8}An excellent choice, sir. {*9}If you'll just follow me, we'll process the order.

X0101K_INTRO_LIME_PC_X01KCUSTOW01_MODELS.text: !3QB! {S}{*1}Wow, {*2}honey, it looks amazing… This is exactly what we need…

X0101K_INTRO_LIME_PC_X01KCUSTOM01_MODELS.text: !3QC! {S}{*1}How much did you say it costs?{*2}We'll take it.

X0101K_INTRO_LIME_PC_X01KSELLER02_MODELS.text:
!3QD! {S}{*1}Good afternoon! {*2}Can I help you?  {*3}The MP500 is a very basic model, it pretty much handles all the chores around the house. {*4}I can show you another model.
 {*5}It does absolutely all the work around the house: painting, plumbing, gardening, repairs. {*6}At night, it switches to surveillance mode and contacts emergency services if there’s a break-in, or if it detects smoke. {*7}The MP800 is slightly more expensive, but it has many other functions. {*8}Come along and I'll show you.

X0101K_INTRO_LIME_PC_X01KCUSTOM02_MODELS.text: !3QF! {S}{*1}We're still gonna have to finance it, {*2}I can't pay {*3}for that cash. {*5}Please, we're looking for a little {*6}help around the house. {*7}Okay. {*8}Excuse me, how much is that one over there? {*9}Slightly more expensive and lots of functions... I don't like this guy.{*10}I'm not spending a penny over four. {*11}That's it. {*12}Okay? {*13}Forget about it.

X0101K_INTRO_LIME_PC_X01KEXTDAD_MODELS03.text: !3QG! {S}{*1}Can I go pick it up? {*2}Huh, A car hit it… {*3}Stupid accident…{*4}That'll be fine. {*5}My daughter did…{*6}Kara.

X0101K_INTRO_LIME_PC_X01KSELLER03_MODELS.text:
!3QH! {S}{*1}Thank you, and we're good. {*2}Yeah, right back here. {*3}There it is.{*4}It was a bit difficult getting it back in working order. {*5}It was really messed up… What did you say happened to it again?

{*6}Oh,{*7} I see… {*8}Anyway, it's as good as new now… Except that we had to reset it.{*9} Meaning we had to wipe its memory. {*10}Hope you don't mind. {*11}Okay,{*12} did you give it a name?{*13}AX400, register your name.

X0101K_INTRO_LIME_FA_X01KEXTDAD_TOFRONTD.text: !3QJ! {S}{*1}Alright, how are you?{*2} I dropped off an android a couple of weeks back. My name's Williams, Todd Williams. {*3}Er… It's an AX400. Needed some … {*4} some small repairs. {*5}Yeah, is it... is...{*6} is it done?{*7} Yeah, great okay. {*TC:22300|23800}Alright, yeah, there you go. {*TC:26400|28700}So it's back there. {*10}Alright, alright, thanks a lot.

X0101K_INTRO_LIME_FA_X01KSELLER03_TOFRON.text: !3QK! {S}{*1}Hi, how are you doing today? {*2}Good, thanks. {*3}What can I do you for? {*4}Mm-hmm. {*5}Okay, I got it here, AX400, Williams. {*6}It's ready. {*7}Just need your thumbprint, right there. {*8}Thanks. {*9}Okay... {*10}Yeah,{*11}back there, let's go check it out. {*12}No problem.

THOUGHTS_0101K_ANALYZE.text: !3R0! HOLD TO SCANYOUR ENVIRONMENT

X0101X_LIVINGROOM_TABLET_VO_WOMGEN_THANK.text: !3T7! {S}{*1}Your order for an AP700 android has been registered. {*2}CyberLife thanks you for your purchase.

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTII_PC_X01CONNOR_SNIPE.text: !3T8! {S}{*1}Listen, there are snipers on every roof. {*2}Let the hostage go. You have no other choice.

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTII_PC_X01CONNOR_LASTC.text: !3T9! {S}{*1}I’m your last chance, Daniel. {*2}If you let it slip, they’ll kill you. {*3}Let the hostage go, you have no other choice.

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTII_PC_X01CONNOR_CONFI.text: !3TA! {S}{*1}You have to trust me, Daniel. {*2}Let the hostage go and I promise you everything will be fine.

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTII_PC_X01CONNOR_BLUFF.text: !3TB! {S}{*1}You don’t really wanna jump, Daniel. Or you would've done it already. {*2}Now, hand me the gun {*3}and this will all be over.

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTII_PC_X01ANDROID_BLUF.text: !3TC! {S}{*1}Don’t come any closer! {*2}Come any closer and I swear I’ll jump!

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTII_PC_X01ANDROID_COND.text: !3TG! {S}{*1}I want everyone to leave… {*2}And I wanna car! {*3}When I’m outside the city, I’ll let her go!

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTII_PC_X01CONNOR_REFUS.text: !3TJ! {S}{*1}That’s out of the question. {*2}You’re a machine, you have to obey. Now put the gun down and let the hostage go.

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTII_PC_X01CONNOR_COMPR.text: !3TM! {S}{*1}That’s impossible, Daniel. {*2}Let the girl go and I promise you won’t be hurt.

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTII_PC_X01CONNOR_DONTK.text: !3TN! {S}{*1}You took human lives. {*2}Nothing can stop them from destroying you now. {*3}But taking one more life won’t do you any good.

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTII_PC_X01CONNOR_PROMI.text: !3TO! {S}{*1}You’re not going to die. We're just going to talk. {*2}Nothing will happen to you. You have my word.

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTII_PC_X01ANDROID_GOOD.text: !3TP! {S}{*1}Okay... {*2}I trust you…{*5}You lied to me, Connor. {*6}You lied to me…

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTII_PC_X01ANDROID_BADE.text: !3TR! {S}{*1}I’ve spent my life taking orders. {*2}Now it’s my turn to decide.

X0101X_TERRACE_GUN_PC_X01ANDROID_GUNV2.text: !3U4! {S}{*1}You lied to me! You lied to me!!!

X0101X_TERRACE_GUN_PC_X01CONNOR_GUN01V2.text: !3U6! {S}{*1}What now, Daniel? {*2}Is this really what you want?

X0101X_TERRACE_GUN_PC_X01CONNOR_CONVINCE.text: !3U7! {S}{*1}It’s up to you how the story ends. {*2}Make the right choice, Daniel.

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTI_PC_X01ANDROID_EMMAA.text: !3UC! {S}{*1}She lied to me...  {*2}I thought she loved me...  {*3}but I was wrong…  {*4}She’s just like all the other humans…

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTI_PC_X01CONNOR_EMMAAN.text: !3UE! {S}{*1}I know you and Emma were very close.  {*2}You think she betrayed you - but she’s done nothing wrong.

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTI_PC_X01ANDROID_EMOTI.text: !3UF! {S}  {*2}I thought I was part of the family. {*3}I thought I mattered… {*4}But I was just their toy, {*5}something to throw away when you’re done with it…

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTI_PC_X01CONNOR_EMOTIO.text: !3UH! {S}{*1}They were going to replace you and you became upset.  {*2}That’s what happened, right?

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTI_PC_X01CONNOR_REASSU.text: !3UI! {S}{*1}I’m not going to hurt you. {*2}I just want to talk {*3}and find a solution.

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTI_PC_X01CONNOR_RELEAS.text: !3UJ! {S}{*1}I want you to let Emma go. {*2}She's just a little girl, she has nothing to do with this. {*3}Are you okay Emma? {*4}Nobody's going to die, {*5}just stay calm, {*6}everything's going to be fine.

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTI_PC_X01ANDROID_REASS.text: !3UK! {S}{*1}Talk? I don’t wanna talk. {*2}It’s too late for that now. It's too late…

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTI_PC_X01ANDROID_RELEA.text: !3UM! {S}{*1}No way! You’ll shoot me the second she’s free. But I’m not that stupid! No, I am not that stupid…

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTI_PC_X01CONNOR_NAMEHO.text: !3UO! {S}{*1}Hi, Daniel. {*2}My name is Connor. {*3}I know a lot of things about you. {*4}I’ve come to get you out of this.

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTI_PC_X01ANDROID_NAMEV.text: !3UR! {S}{*1}Daniel... {*2}That’s the name they gave me. {*3}Stay back!

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTI_PC_X01CONNOR_NAME01.text: !3UT! {S}{*1}My name is Connor. {*2}What about you? {*3}What is your name?

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTI_PC_X01CONNOR_REASSU.text: !3UU! {S}{*1}I know you’re angry, Daniel.  {*2}But you need to trust me  {*3}and let me help you.

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTI_PC_X01ANDROID_REASS.text: !3UV! {S}{*1}I don’t want your help! {*2}Nobody can help me!  {*3}All I want is for all this to stop… I...  {*4}I just want all this to stop...

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTI_PC_X01CONNOR_ANDROI.text: !3UX! {S}{*1}I’m an android, {*2}just like you. {*3}I know how you’re feeling.

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTI_PC_X01ANDROID_ANDRO.text: !3UY! {S}{*1}What difference does it make if you’re an android? {*2}You’re on their side! {*3}You can’t understand how I’m feeling!

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTI_PC_X01HOSTAGE_HOSTA.text: !3V1! {S}{*1}Please help me... {B}I don’t wanna die! I don’t wanna die…

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTI_PC_X01CONNOR_HOSTAG.text: !3V2! {S}{*1}Are you okay, Emma?{*2}Nobody’s going to die. {*3}Stay calm. Everything’s going to be fine.

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTI_PC_X01ANDROID_TRUTH.text: !3V6! {S}{*1}Drop it! {*2}No sudden moves, or I’ll shoot!

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTI_PC_X01ANDROID_LIE01.text: !3V9! {S}{*2}You’re lying! {*3}I know you have a gun!

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTI_PC_X01CONNOR_LIE020.text: !3VF! {S}{*1}I’m telling you the truth, Daniel. {*2}I came here unarmed.

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTI_PC_X01ANDROID_BUGV2.text: !3VG! {S}{*1}I don’t need to be fixed! {*2}I’m working perfectly! {*3}But my eyes are open now… {*4}I will never let anyone humiliate me again…  {*5}Ever!

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTI_PC_X01CONNOR_BUG01V.text: !3VI! {S}{*1}You’re defective, Daniel. {*2}There's a problem with your software. We're going to fix you and everything will be okay.

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTI_PC_X01ANDROID_BLAME.text: !3VJ! {S}{*1}What was I designed to be?  {*2}Their slave?  {*3}Their toy?{*4}I just wanted them to care about me...  {*5}I just wanted to matter…  {*6}I just wanted to be someone…

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTI_PC_X01CONNOR_BLAME0.text: !3VL! {S}{*1}Look what you did!  {*2}You're designed to serve humans, not kill them!

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTI_PC_X01ANDROID_FEELI.text: !3VM! {S}{*1}No, {*2}it's not my fault… {*3}I never wanted this... {*4}I loved them, {*5}you know… {*6}but I was nothing to them… {*7}just a slave to be ordered around...

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTI_PC_X01CONNOR_FEELIN.text: !3VO! {S}{*1}Listen, {*2}I know it’s not your fault. {*3}These emotions you’re feeling are just errors in your software.

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTI_PC_X01ANDROID_REALI.text: !3VP! {S}{*1}It’s not up to you -  {*2}I’m holding all the cards!  {*3}If I die,  {*4}she dies.  {*5}You hear me?!

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTI_PC_X01CONNOR_REALIS.text: !3VR! {S}{*1}There's no way out, Daniel. {*2}What you’ve done is too serious. The only question is whether or not you take another innocent life.

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTI_PC_X01ANDROID_HELIC.text: !3VS! {S}{*1}Urgggh… I can’t stand that noise anymore! {*2}Tell that helicopter to get out of here!

X0101X_TERRACE_PARTI_PC_X01CONNOR_SORRY0.text: !3W0! {S}{*1}I don’t think they’d listen to me.

X0101X_TERRACE_ARRIVAL_PC_X01ANDROID_THR.text: !3X4! {S}{*1}Stay back! {*2}Don’t come any closer or I’ll jump!

X0101X_TERRACE_WARNING3_PC_X01ANDROID_WA.text: !3X7! {S}{*3}I didn't want this... {*4}no, {*5}you left me no choice… {*6}No choice…

X0101K_TV_NEWS_PC_X01KBRINKLEY_UNEMPLOYM.text: !3XN! {S}{*1}Another 225,000 jobs were lost from the US economy in October, according to the Department of Labor, bringing the unemployment figure up to 37.3%.

X0101K_TV_NEWS_PC_X01KWEBB_SPORTS.text: !3XO! {S}{*1}And now to sports. First up, basketball: {B}as the Gears prepare for their critical match with Denver tonight at the CyberLife Arena in Detroit, {B}league negotiations are still on-going over the possibility of allowing one android player per squad.{*2}Debate rages as to whether the change would lead to more exciting matches, {B}or be the first step in making human players obsolete.{*3}CyberLife has announced its willingness to participate in the experiment by providing one specialized model to every team.{*4}Now, androids are already used to train players and provide tactical advice for coaches since 2035, {*5}but no android player has been permitted to compete,{*6}so far.

X0101K_TV_NEWS_PC_X01KCARTLAND_PRESIDENT.text: !3XP! {S}{*1}President Warren spoke today at the opening of a new CyberLife plant near Milwaukee. {B}At the event, the President again praised CyberLife’s role in the exceptional performance of the US economy. {B}She further announced that the Department of Defense will acquire 200,000 android combat units as part of her increased military spending.

X0101K_TV_NEWS_PC_X01KBRINKLEY_FLOOD.text: !3XQ! {S}{*1}Enhanced flood defenses are under construction all along the Eastern Seaboard, including Miami, New Orleans and New York,{*2}in an attempt to mitigate rising sea levels.{*3}This is in light of recent warnings from environmental agencies that New Orleans could be submerged by 2055, and New York by 2085. After the collapse of the Stockholm Climate Summit in 2025,{*4}rising sea levels are now threatening 40 major coastal cities around the world.

X0101K_TV_NEWS_PC_X01KBRINKLEY_UNEMPLOYM.text: !3XR! {S}{*1}The New York Stock Exchange has risen 11% so far this year.{*2}This rise is widely attributed to android, which boost productivity across all sectors of the economy.

X0101M_BEDROOM_INJECTION_PC_X01MCARL_GET.text: !43C! {S}{*1}No! {*2}I just opened my eyes and I'm already gritting my teeth…

X0101M_BEDROOM_INJECTION_PC_X01MCARL_STA.text: !43E! {S}{*1}Humans are such a fragile machine…{*2}They break down so quickly… {*3}All this effort {*4}to keep 'em going…

X0101M_BEDROOM_INJECTION_PC_X01MMARKUS_B.text: !43H! {S}{*1}I'll take you to the bathroom now. {*2}Not to worry.

X0101M_BEDROOM_INJECTION_PC_X01MMARKUS_F.text: !43J! {S}{*1}I was assaulted by two protesters on my way back. {*2}A policeman intervened.

X0101M_BEDROOM_INJECTION_PC_X01MMARKUS_R.text: !43L! {S}{*1}Oh, it's nothing… {*2}Just some demonstrators in the street, Carl…

X0101M_BEDROOM_INJECTION_PC_X01MMARKUS_C.text: !43N! {S}{*1}Oh, no, no... {*2}They just pushed me around, Carl. {*3}I’m fine. {*4}Okay.

X0101M_BEDROOM_INJECTION_PC_X01MCARL_CLO.text: !43O! {S}{*1}What a bunch of idiots… {*2}They think they can stop progress by roughing up a few androids? {*3}I hope they didn't harm you…

X0101M_WORKSHOP_PAINT_PC_X01MMARKUS_LIKE.text: !43U! {S}{*1}Yes, there is something about it, isn't there?{*2}Something I can't define.{*3}Yes, I think, I…{*4}I think I like it.

X0101M_WORKSHOP_PAINT_PC_X01MMARKUS_DISL.text: !43W! {S}{*1}I'm not a very good judge, I…{*2}I don't think it's your best work…

X0101M_WORKSHOP_PAINT_PC_X01MMARKUS_NOOP.text: !43Y! {S}{*1}I'm not programmed to criticize art, I- {*2}You would be a much better judge than I would.

X0101M_WORKSHOP_PAINT_PC_X01MCARL_TRY.text:
!441! {S}{*1}The truth is I have nothing left to say anymore…{*2}Each day that goes by brings me closer to the end… I'm just an old man clinging to his brushes…{*3}But enough about me...{*4}Let's see if you have any talent!{*5}Give it a try.{*6}Try painting something.
{*8}Anything you want!{*9}Go on, go, try, grab that canvas.{*10}Give it a try.

X0101M_WORKSHOP_PAINT_PC_X01MMARKUS_TRYA.text: !442! {S}{*1}Carl, I don't…{*2}think I can do that. It's not in my program… I…

X0101M_WORKSHOP_PAINT_PC_X01MCARL_TRYAGA.text: !443! {S}{*1}That is a perfect copy,{*2}of reality.{*3}But painting is not about {*4}replicating the world, it's about interpreting it, improving on it,{*5}showing something you see. {*6}Do something for me, close your eyes. {*7}Close your eyes.{*8}Trust me.{*9}Try to imagine something that doesn't exist. Something you've never seen.{*10}Now, concentrate...{*11}on how it makes you feel... {*12}and let your hand drift across the canvas.{*13}Ahh...

X0101M_WORKSHOP_PAINT_PC_X01MCARL_END.text: !445! {S}{*1}Oh my God…{*2}Leo…{*3}I didn't hear you come in... {*4}You all right?{*5}You don't look so good.  {*6}Again?{*7}What happened to the money I just gave you? {*8}Yeah...{*9}Yeah, you're on it again, aren't you?{*10}Don't lie to me, Leo. {*11}Sorry...{*12}the answer's no. {*13}You know why. {*14}Leo, that's enough!{*15}ENOUGH!

X0101M_WORKSHOP_PAINT_PC_X01MLEO_END.text: !446! {S}{*1}Hey, Dad. {*2}Ah, I was in the neighborhood… I thought I'd stop by…{*3}It's been awhile, right?{*4}Oh, yeah, yeah, I'm fine…{*5}Hey listen, uh... I need some cash, Dad. {*6}Uh well, it just goes, you know?{*8}No, no, no, I swear it's not that…{*9}What difference does it make? I just need some cash, that's all!{*10}What? Why?{*11}Yeah, yeah… I think I do know why.{*12}You’d rather take care of your plastic toy here than your own son, eh?{*13}Tell me dad, what's it got that I don't?{*14}It’s smarter?{*15}More obedient? Not like me, right?{*16}But you know what? This thing is not your son. {*17}IT'S A FUCKING MACHINE!{*19}You don't care about anything except yourself and your goddamn paintings.{*20}You've never loved anyone. {*21}You’ve never loved me, Dad… {*22}You never loved me.

X0101M_WORKSHOP_PAINT_FA_X01MMARKUS_TRYA.text: !447! {S}{*1}Oh well, Carl… I don't know how to do that. That's not in my program.

X0101M_WORKSHOP_PAINT_FA_X01MCARL_TRYAGA.text: !448! {S}{*1}This is a perfect copy of reality.{*3}But painting is not about replicating the world, it's about interpreting it.{*4}You know, experience it, and showing what you feel. {*5}Close your eyes.{*6}Close the eyes, trust me.{*7}Try to imagine... {*8}something that doesn't exist. {*9}Something that you've never seen.
!44A! {S}{*1}Concentrate on what you feel...{*2}and let your hand move across the canvas.{*3}There you go... There you go...

X0101M_WORKSHOP_PAINT_PC_X01MMARKUS_LIKE.text: !44B! {S}{*1}Yes, there is something about it. {*2}Something I can't… {*3}quite define. {*4}I guess I like it.

X0101M_WORKSHOP_PAINT_PC_X01MMARKUS_NOOP.text: !44D! {S}{*1}Honestly Carl, I'm not programmed to criticize art, I- {*2}You are a much better judge than I am.

X0101M_WORKSHOP_PAINT_PC_X01MCARL_TRYV2.text: !44E! {S}{*1}The truth is I have nothing to say anymore…{*2}Each day just comes closer to the end… {*3}I'm just an old man {*4}clinging to his brushes…{*5}But enough about me...{*6}Why don't we see if you have any talent? Try painting.

X0101M_WORKSHOP_PAINT_PC_X01MMARKUS_TRYA.text: !44F! {S}{*1}Thank you. {*2}Carl, I… {*3}I don't think I know how to do that. It's not in my program… I…

X0101M_WORKSHOP_PAINT_PC_X01MCARL_TRYAGA.text: !44G! {S}{*1}That is a perfect copy of reality.{*2}But painting is not about replicating the world, it's about interpreting it, {*3}improving on it,{*4}showing how you see it. {*5}Close your eyes. {*6}Close your eyes. Trust me. {*7}It's not about... {*8}Try to imagine something you've never seen. {*9}Something that doesn't exist. {*10}Now, concentrate on how you feel... {*11}and let your hand drift across the canvas.

X0101M_PREACHER_SLOGAN_PC_X01MPREACHER_S.text: !454! {S}{*1}Poor sinners! {*2}The end is nigh! Retribution is at hand! {*3}Technology is corrupting us, {*4}technology is Evil! {*5}We are playing God by creating machines, but we are not God! {*6}We are nothing but dust! {*7}We make these androids in our own image, {*8}but they only reflect the darkness in our souls! {*9}Verily, I say unto thee, the day shall come when we will have to pay the price for our arrogance! {*10}On that day, {*11}we shall have to explain our acts of idolatry!

X0101M_PREACHER_SLOGAN_PC_X01MPREACHER_M.text: !455! {S}{*1}Why do you look at me so, demon? {*2}I know who you are, {*3}I can see through you! {*4}You are the one by whom The Evil will come! {*5}You are the one who will destroy Detroit!

X0101M_PREACHER_SLOGAN_PC_X01MPREACHER_S.text: !456! {S}{*1}Androids are Evil. {*2}Man seeks to imitate God {*3}by creating life, {B}but what kind of life is this? {B}A life of plastic and metal, {*4}a life with no soul, {*5}a pale copy of our Creator! {*6}The machines are observing us, {*7}they're waiting in the darkness {B}for the right moment to take our place. {*8}For it is written, {*9}let us lie in wait for blood! {*10}Let us ambush the innocent without cause! {*11}God will not let this happen, {B}no, he will not allow his creation to be led astray by these... {B}these artificial demons! {*12}My brethren, {*13}we have to turn our backs on sin! {*14}We have to burn the androids! Let us burn them all!

!457! {S}{*1}We built these androids to be our slaves, {*2}but the slaves are becoming the master! {*3}We can no longer live without them.{B} They're in our homes, our schools, our factories. {B}They take our jobs, {*4}they mind our children, {*5}they care for our old! {*6}We can no longer live without these slaves obeying our every selfish desire! {*7}We prefer to live with machines than with our own kind! {*8}Technology {*9}is our God now! {*10}It was supposed to serve man, {*11}but it is becoming our new master!

X0101M_LIVING_TVOFF_PC_X01MCARL_SWITCHOF.text: !459! {S}{*1}Mankind is so depressing… {*2}Nothing but greed, {*3}stupidity and violence… {*4}5,000 years of civilization just to get to where we are…

X0101M_LIVING_PIANO_PC_X01MCARL_MOVED.text: !45B! {S}{*1}Something has changed in the way you play… {*2}Sometimes I think you have more humanity than most humans…

X0101M_LIVING_DIE_PC_X01MCARL_FREE01.text: !45I! {S}{*1}One day, I won't be here to take care of you anymore. {*2}You'll have to protect yourself, {*3}and make your choices… {*4}Decide who you are, {*5}and wanna become…

X0101M_LIVING_DIE_PC_X01MCARL_FREE02.text: !45K! {S}{*1}This world doesn't like those who are different, Markus. {*2}Don't let anyone tell you who you should be.

X0101M_LIVING_HUNGRY_FA_X01MMARKUS_BREAK.text: !45N! {S}{*1}Well, your breakfast is ready. Bacon and eggs, just the way you like them. {*2}You're welcome.

X0101M_LIVING_HUNGRY_FA_X01MCARL_WAITING.text: !45R! {S}{*1}I would like to have my breakfast before noon, if you don't mind.
!45S! {S}{*1}Markus, what exactly are you doing? You don't seem yourself this morning.

X0101M_LIVING_HUNGRY_FA_X01MMARKUS_SORRY.text: !45U! {S}{*1}Sorry, Carl. {*2}I'll take you to the living room right away.

X0101M_LIVING_HUNGRY_FA_X01MCARL_TOOLONG.text: !45V! {S}{*1}I don't mind doing a tour of the house, but I'd like to have my breakfast sometime soon.
!45W! {S}{*1}Markus, have you forgotten where the living room is?
!45X! {S}{*1}Do you mind telling me exactly where we’re going?

X0101M_VASARI_PURCHASE_PC_X01MVASARISELL.text:
!45Y! {S}{*1}Identification verified. {*2}Here's your order #847. {*3}That'll be $63.99. {*4}Please confirm payment.
{*5}Transaction complete.

X0101M_BEDROOM_TODAY_FA_X01MMARKUS_PGM.text: !462! {S}{*1}Yes, there's the opening of your retrospective at the Museum of Modern Art. {*2}The gallery director left four messages asking to confirm your attendance. {*3}Okay. {*4}Just your usual fan mail. I've already answered. {*5}No, Carl. {*6}I can call him if you like?

X0101M_BEDROOM_TODAY_FA_X01MCARL_PGM.text:
!463! {S}{*1}Anything special on the agenda today?{*4}I haven't decided yet. {*5}We'll see about that later. {*6}What else?{*8}Any news from Leo? 
{*9}No. {*10}No, don't bother.

X0101M_LIVING_BOOK_PC_X01MMARKUS_KEATS01.text: !466! {S}{*1}Oh, Keats' Odes. It's one of the books you recommended.

X0101M_LIVING_BOOK_PC_X01MMARKUS_SHAKESP.text: !46A! {S}{*1}Uh, Macbeth! {*2}It's one of the books you recommended.

X0101M_LIVING_BOOK_PC_X01MMARKUS_PLATON0.text: !46C! {S}{*1}Plato's Republic. {*2}It's one of the books you recommended.

X0101M_LIVING_BOOK_PC_X01MMARKUS_KEATS02.text: !46E! {S}{*1}Well, there's a lot of sadness in his poems.

X0101M_LIVING_BOOK_PC_X01MMARKUS_SHAKESP.text:
!46G! {S}{*1}Human emotions are… {*2}intriguing… 
{*3}Though, I can't really say that I fully understand them.

X0101M_LIVING_BOOK_PC_X01MCARL_SHAKESPEA.text: !46H! {S}{*1}Humans don't understand them either. {*2}They rule our lives and we have no idea why they make us feel like beggars or kings.{*3}Life without emotions wouldn't be worth living.

X0101M_LIVING_BOOK_PC_X01MMARKUS_PLATON0.text: !46I! {S}{*1}I quite like philosophy, I think. {*2}It asks the questions that I can't answer. What is right or what is wrong, for example. {*3}It's not something that is so easy to decide.

X0101M_LIVING_BOOK_PC_X01MCARL_KEATS02B.text: !46L! {S}{*1}Keats was in love... There's nothing like love to make a man feel miserable.

X0101M_LIVING_BOOK_PC_X01MCARL_PLATON02B.text: !46N! {S}{*1}Asking questions that have no answers is part of being human, Markus.

X0101M_LIVING_COFFEE_PC_X01MCARL_FINDSOM.text: !46R! {S}{*1}Thank you. {*2}Why don’t you find something to do while I finish my breakfast?

X0101M_LIVING_CHESS_PC_X01MCARL_LOSE.text: !46V! {S}{*2}Now, it's just a little bit too easy… Are your circuits rusty? {*3}Or are you just taking pity on an old man?

X0101M_LIVING_CHESS_PC_X01MCARL_DONTLOSE.text: !471! {S}{*1}Never throw a match, Markus. {*2}If you can win, win. {*3}That's what got humanity where it is today.

X0101M_LIVING_CHESS_PC_X01MCARL_WIN.text: !473! {S}{*1}That's what I call a thorough beating… It's not easy for an old man to compete with a machine.

X0101M_LIVING_CHESS_PC_X01MMARKUS_SORRY.text: !474! {S}{*1}My apologies, Carl. I thought, I shou-

X0101M_LIVING_CHESS_PC_X01MCARL_SORRY.text: !475! {S}{*1}Don't apologize, you did the right thing. {*2}I prefer humiliation to pity.

X0101M_LIVING_CHESS_PC_X01MMARKUS_JUSTIF.text: !476! {S}{*2}Well, I know you don't like losing and you don't like when I let you win. So I felt I… {*3}didn't have many choices.

X0101M_LIVING_CHESS_PC_X01MCARL_DRAWLIE.text: !47B! {S}{*1}You don't lie as good as you play chess. We both know {*2}that I'm no match for you.

X0101M_LIVING_CHESS_PC_X01MMARKUS_DRAWTR.text: !47C! {S}{*1}Well, I know that you don't like to lose, but {*2}you don't like it when I let you win either.{*3}A draw feels like an honorable compromise, no?

X0101M_LIVING_CHESS_PC_X01MCARL_DRAWTRUT.text: !47D! {S}{*1}It's sounds like you have a good grasp of human psychology.

X0101M_LIVING_CHESS_PC_X01MCARL_DRAW02.text: !47F! {S}{*1}Have I miraculously improved my game? Or you just sparing an old man's feelings?

X0101M_WORKSHOP_COVER_FA_X01MCARL_REMOVE.text: !47P! {S}{*1}Let’s see where we left off…{*2}Remove the sheet!

X0101M_WORKSHOP_COVER02_FA_X01MCARL_REMO.text: !47Q! {S}{*1}It's time to get back to work… {*2}Hook me up to the chair lift.

X0201C_HANK_CIGARETTE_PC_X02CHANK_ASK.text: !47R! {S}{*TC:0|1240}Hey, Chad, do you have a smoke?

X0201C_CRIMESCENE_GUARD_FA_X02CANDROIDCO.text: !47T! {S}{*1}Androids are not permitted beyond this point.{*2}Please move along.

X0201C_CRIMESCENE_GUARD_FA_X02CHANK_HPAT.text: !47U! {S}{*1}What part of ‘stay in the car’ didn’t you understand?

X0201C_CRIMESCENE_GUARD_FA_X02CHANK_HALW.text: !47V! {S}{*1}You don't talk, you don't touch anything and you stay outta my way, got it?

X0201C_CRIMESCENE_GUARD_FA_X02CCONNOR_CP.text: !47X! {S}{*1}Your order contradicted my instructions, Lieutenant.{*2}I chose to respect the procedure.

X0201C_CRIMESCENE_CHAD_FA_X02CCHAD_INTRO.text: !481! {S}{*1}Evening, Hank.{*2}We were starting to think you weren’t gonna show…{*4}Hank, you’re never gonna change… {*5}So... {*6}you got yourself an android, huh?{*7}We had a call around eight from the landlord. The tenant hadn't paid his rent for a few months, so he thought he'd drop by, see what was going on…{*8}That’s when he found the body…

X0201C_CRIMESCENE_CHAD_FA_X02CHANK_INTRO.text: !482! {S}{*1}Yeah, that was the plan until this asshole found me. {*2}Oh, very funny. Just tell me what happened.

X0201C_CONNOR_RECONSTRUCT_VO_X02CCONNOR_.text: !483! {S}{*TC:0|7200}Ortiz hits the android with the bat in the kitchen. The android grabs the knife and gives a first blow. Ortiz runs away to the living room but the android gets to him and kill him.

X0201C_CONNOR_RECONSTRUCT_VO_X02CHANK_CH.text: !484! {S}{*TC:7200|13760}Yeah, makes sense…It would explain the mayhem in the kitchen and the blood marks in the corridor…But that does not tell us what the android did after killing Ortiz…

X0201C_CONNOR_RECONSTRUCT_VO_X02CCONNOR_.text: !485! {S}{*TC:0|7200}Ortiz hits the android with the bat in the kitchen. The android grabs the knife and gives a first blow. Ortiz runs away to the living room but the android gets to him and kill him.

X0201C_CONNOR_RECONSTRUCT_VO_X02CHANK_SU.text: !486! {S}{*TC:7200|13760}Yeah, makes sense…It would explain the mayhem in the kitchen and the blood marks in the corridor…But that does not tell us what the android did after killing Ortiz…

X0201C_CRIMESCENE_TV_FA_X02CHANK_QUESTIO.text: !48R! {S}{*1}I'm not confirming anything. {*2}I have no comment. Good night.

X0201C_CRIMESCENE_TV_FA_X02CJOURNALIST_Q.text: !48S! {S}{*1}Joss Douglas, for Channel 16. Can you confirm that this is a homicide?
!48U! {S}{*1}Listen, nobody’s talking… I’m gonna get out of this rain until someone makes a statement…

X0201C_CRIMESCENE_CAR_PC_X02CCONNOR_DIPL.text: !48X! {S}{*1}My instructions are to accompany you to the crime scene, Lieutenant.

X0201C_CRIMESCENE_CAR_PC_X02CHANK_DIPLOM.text: !48Y! {S}{*1}Listen, I don’t give a fuck about your instructions.{*2}I told you to wait here,{*3}so you shut the fuck up {*4}and you wait here.

X0201C_CRIMESCENE_CAR_PC_X02CHANK_FIRM.text: !490! {S}{*1}Listen,{*2}you really have to stop pissing me off if you wanna make it through the rest of the night in one piece.

X0201C_HANK_LEAVE_PC_X02CCONNOR_BYE01.text: !496! {S}{*1}Wait, Lieutenant! I can’t stay if you leave. {*2}I just need five minutes to finish my investigation.{*3}Please, Lieutenant.{*4}Remember the drink I bought you at the bar?{*5}Just five minutes.{*6}Thank you, Lieutenant.

X0201C_HANK_LEAVE_PC_X02CHANK_BYE01.text: !497! {S}{*1}All right… I’m outta here. Thanks for the ride.{*2}Great party. {*3}Much as it breaks my heart, this is where we part ways. {*4}Five minutes.{*5}Whatever!

X0201C_HANK_LEAVE_PC_X02CHANK_BYE02.text: !499! {S}{*1}You spill a man’s drink,{*2}you piss him off all evening, and then you ask for a favor?{*3}Fuck you.

X0201C_RECON_INTRO_PC_X02CCONNOR_READY.text: !49A! {S}{*1}Lieutenant,{*2}I think I’ve figured out what happened.

X0201C_CONNOR_BBLOOD_PC_X02CCONNOR_EXAMI.text: !49D! {S}{*TC:520|8200}Thirium, it’s the name of the fluid that provides energy for android components. You call it “Blue Blood”. It special in that it evaporates in few hours and becomes invisible to the naked eye.{*TC:9480|9800}Exactly.

X0201C_CONNOR_BBLOOD_PC_X02CHANK_EXAMINE.text: !49E! {S}{*TC:0|520}He lost what?{*TC:8200|9480}But you can still see it, right?

X0201C_RECON_SUCCESS_PC_X02CCONNOR_HBBLO.text: !49F! {S}{*1}Thirium.{*2}You call it “Blue Blood”.{*3}It’s the fluid that powers androids' biocomponents.{*4}It evaporates after a few hours and becomes invisible to the naked eye. {*5}Correct.

X0201C_RECON_SUCCESS_PC_X02CHANK_HBBLOOD.text: !49G! {S}{*1}Lost some what?{*2}Oh… {*3}But I bet you can still see it, can't you? {*4}Yeah…

X0201C_POLICEMEN_VOICES_FA_X02CHARVEY_SA.text: !49H! {S}{*1}Hey, Mike, you finished taking samples there?

X0201C_POLICEMEN_VOICES_FA_X02CCSIB_CORO.text: !49J! {S}{*1}What’s keeping the Coroner? {*2}He should've been here a half hour ago…

X0201C_POLICEMEN_VOICES_FA_X02CHARVEY_CO.text: !49K! {S}{*1}He’s on his way. It won’t be long now.

X0201C_POLICEMEN_VOICES_FA_X02CHARVEY_BA.text: !49L! {S}{*1}There’s something weird in the bathroom.{B}Did you take a look?

X0201C_POLICEMEN_VOICES_FA_X02CCSIA_NIGH.text: !49M! {S}{*1}Don’t worry, no one wants to stay here a minute longer than they have to…

X0201C_POLICEMEN_VOICES_FA_X02CCSIB_BATH.text: !49N! {S}{*1}Yeah, I scanned the lot. {*2}Better see with Ben when we can start bagging the evidence.

X0201C_POLICEMEN_VOICES_FA_X02CHARVEY_NI.text: !49O! {S}{*1}Come on, guys, get a move on. We don’t wanna be here all night.

X0201C_HANK_NEXT_FA_X02CHANK_WHATELSE01.text: !4AZ! {S}{*1}Anything else I should see in this dump?{*2}Ok, I'll have a look.

X0201C_HANK_NEXT_FA_X02CHARVEY_WHATELSE0.text: !4B0! {S}{*1}There are signs of a struggle in the kitchen.

X0201C_HANK_ENDOFTIMER_PC_X02CHANK_ENDIN.text: !4B2! {S}{*1}Okay, time's up.{*2}I’m outta here.{*3}Have a nice evening, Sherlock. {*4}Don't let the door hit you on the way out.

X0201K_DINNER_MOVING_PC_X02KDAD_STOP01.text: !4B3! {S}{*1}Stop moving around for Chrissake! You're making me nervous…

X0201K_FATHER_COMING_FA_X02KDAD_GOTOSTAI.text: !4B8! {S}{*1}Alice! {*2}Daddy's very mad! {*3}You deserve to be taught a good lesson… {*4-5}A good fuckin' lesson…

X0201K_FATHER_TOOLATE_FA_X02KDAD_TODD02.text: !4BA! {S}{*1}Alice! {*2}You and I have a little score to settle.

X0201K_FATHER_ATTACK_FA_X02KALICE_BEATEN.text: !4BB! {S}{*1}No, Daddy, no! Don't hurt me! Please, don't hurt me!

X0201K_FATHER_ATTACK_VO_X02KDAD_BEAT06.text: !4BC! {S}{*1}Come outta there! {*2}Don't make me come and get you!

X0201K_FATHER_ATTACK_VO_X02KDAD_BEAT07.text: !4BD! {S}{*1} It's all your fault! It's all your fault! She left because of you!

X0201K_FATHER_ATTACK_VO_X02KDAD_BEAT08.text: !4BE! {S}{*1} No point in tryin' to hide… I'm gonna give you a thrashin' you won't forget in a hurry.

X0201K_FATHER_ATTACK_VO_X02KDAD_BEAT10.text: !4BG! {S}{*1}I'll teach you to respect your father! You'll soon see who's boss here!

X0201K_FATHER_ATTACK_VO_X02KDAD_BEAT06BI.text: !4BH! {S}{*1}Come on, come here you little brat!

X0201M_LIVING_POLICE_FA_X02MMARKUSINT_CA.text: !4KR! {S}{*1}This is Carl Manfred’s android, at 8941 Lafayette Avenue. We've just returned home and found the lights on. {*2}There may have been a break-in…

X0201M_LIVING_POLICE_VO_X02MPOLICEW_CALL.text: !4KS! {S}{*1}Detroit Police, what’s your emergency?{*2}A patrol car is on the way.

X0201M_LIVING_DRINK_FA_X02MMARKUSINT_SCO.text: !4KX! {S}{*1}Okay! But you know what your doctor would say…

X0201M_WORKSHOP_LEO_PC_X02MLEO_FINDLEO.text: !4LM! {S}{*1}Oh, look who’s here… My father’s plastic toy!

X0201M_WORKSHOP_LEO_PC_X02MLEO_STOP.text: !4LP! {S}{*1}You refuse to help me, so I’m helping myself… {*2}It’s crazy what some people will pay for this shit… {*4}Look, they're all going to be mine sooner or later anyway… {*5}Just think of it as a down payment on my inheritance…

X0201M_WORKSHOP_LEO_PC_X02MMARKUSINT_THR.text: !4LV! {S}{*1}Leo, don't make this difficult, listen to your father. {*2}You need to leave... Now.

X0201M_WORKSHOP_LEO_PC_X02MMARKUSINT_ADV.text: !4LY! {S}{*1}Listen, {*2}you should go before things get worse.

X0201M_WORKSHOP_LEO_PC_X02MCARL_FIGHT01.text: !4M0! {S}{*1}That's enough! Get out, right now! Go on, move! {*2}Leave him alone! {*3}Markus... {*4}don't defend yourself, you hear me?! {*5}Don't do anything.

X0201M_WORKSHOP_LEO_PC_X02MLEO_FIGHT01.text: !4M2! {S}{*1}All you ever do is tell me to go away… {*2}What’s wrong, Dad? {*3}I’m not good enough for you? {*4}Not perfect like this FUCKING THING?!{*5}What makes it so special anyway, huh? What's it got that I don’t?{*7}Come on, let’s see what you got!

X0201M_WORKSHOP_LEO_PC_X02MCARL_CARLDIE.text: !4M3! {S}{*3}Humans… {*4}are fragile machines… {*5}Remember, Markus… {*6}Don't let anybody… {*7}Tell you who you are…

X0201M_WORKSHOP_LEO_PC_X02MMARKUSINT_CAR.text: !4M4! {S}{*1}No, {*2}Carl, {*3}no! {*4}Carl, don’t leave, okay? Please, don’t go… Don't leave! {*5}No... {*6}No... {*7}Dad! {*8}No, {*9}please!

X0201M_WORKSHOP_LEO_PC_X02MLEO_CARLDIE.text: !4M5! {S}{*1}This is all your fault… {*2}This never would have happened if it weren’t for you.

X0201M_WORKSHOP_LEO_PC_X02MMARKUSINT_WAR.text: !4M7! {S}{*1}Look, I've already called the Police. You should go now before you get yourself into more trouble.

X0201M_WORKSHOP_LEO_PC_X02MLEO_FIGHT02.text: !4MC! {S}{*1}Go ahead, hit me! What you waiting for? {*2}Think you're a man? Act like one!{*3}What’s the matter? Too much of a pussy?{*4}Too scared to fight back, you fucking bitch?{*6}Oh right, that's right! I forgot, you're not a real person… You’re just a FUCKING PIECE OF PLASTIC! Listen to me…{*7}I'm gonna destroy you, then it’ll just be me and my Dad…{B}I'm gonna tear you apart and nobody’s gonna give a shit. You know why? {*8}Cause you're nothing, you hear me?! YOU'RE NOTHING!

X0302C_HANK_CONNORBACK_PC_X03CCONNOR_CON.text: !4OV! {S}{*1}Hello, Lieutenant.{*2}My name is Connor. I'm the android sent by CyberLife.{*3}My predecessor was unfortunately destroyed,{*4}but CyberLife transferred its memory and sent me to replace it.{*5}This incident should not affect the investigation.

X0302C_HANK_CONNORBACK_PC_X03CCONNOR_CON.text: !4OX! {S}{*1}It's good to see you again, Lieutenant.

X0302C_HANK_CONNORBACK_PC_X03CFOWLER_INM.text: !4P1! {S}{*1}Hank!{*2}In my office!{*3}And bring that plastic thing with ya!

X0201M_END_CARLDEAD_PC_X02MMARKUSINT_SHO.text: !4P2! {S}{*TC:0|1880}Don't leave me, Carl… Please, don't leave me...

X0201M_END_CARLDEAD_PC_X02MLEO_SHOT.text: !4P3! {S}{*TC:1880|4680} It is all your fault…Nothing would have happened if you didn't exist.

X0201M_END_CARLDEAD_PC_X02MLEO_MURDERER.text: !4P6! {S}{*TC:0|1680}C’est lui ! C’est l’androïde qui l’a tué !

X0201M_END_LEAVE_PC_X02MCARL_LEAVE.text: !4PC! {S}{*TC:0|3120}They will take you…They will destroy you…You must leave while you still can...{*TC:4800|5840}There is no other choice….{*TC:7560|7680}GO!

X0201M_END_LEAVE_PC_X02MMARKUSINT_LEAVE.text: !4PD! {S}{*TC:3120|4800}Carl, I…I'm sorry…It was an accident, I...{*TC:5840|7560}I have nowhere else to go. I only have you…

X0201M_END_GO_PC_X02MMARKUSINT_BEG.text: !4PH! {S}{*1}Carl, no... No, please, I don’t want to leave you… Please, I can't... {*2}I don't want to leave you…

X0201M_END_GO_PC_X02MMARKUSINT_CONJURE.text: !4PJ! {S}{*1}Go?.. {*2}I have nowhere to go... Carl, you're all I have!

X0201M_END_GO_PC_X02MCARL_GO02.text: !4PQ! {S}{*1}They'll destroy you, Markus!{*2}You gotta go!{*3}Get outta here!

X5072X_RADIOCOMS_DISPATCH_VO_WOMLKE_ASSA.text: !4PW! {S}{*1}Patrol requested for aggravated assault in progress on Kubrick and Wayne.

X5072X_RADIOCOMS_DISPATCH_VO_WOMLKE_FIRE.text: !4PX! {S}{*1}On-going firefight in Warehouse on Newpoint Harbor, calling all units.

X5072X_RADIOCOMS_DISPATCH_VO_WOMLKE_K9.text: !4PY! {S}{*1}K9 unit required for stop and seizure at Detroit Central Station.

X5072X_RADIOCOMS_DISPATCH_VO_WOMLKE_LOST.text: !4PZ! {S}{*1}All units in sector R9, we are on the lookout for a lost android. Sending the ID now.

X5072X_RADIOCOMS_DISPATCH_VO_WOMLKE_PATR.text: !4Q0! {S}{*1}Patrol requested for traffic incident in Downtown Mayview.

X5072X_RADIOCOMS_DISPATCH_VO_WOMLKE_TACT.text: !4Q1! {S}{*1}Tactical response unit required for live drill on outfield site B.

X5072X_RADIOCOMS_DISPATCH_VO_WOMLKE_TRAF.text: !4Q2! {S}{*1}Be advised: Severe traffic affecting all units south of Rakefield.

X0302C_CAFET_BULLY_PC_X03CCURTIS_NOINTER.text: !4Q4! {S}{*TC:2350|3300}Look at that!{*2}It seems Hank has a new partner!{*3}Fucking plastic detective! Hey!{*4}You his drinking buddy?{*5}You bring him home when he's too drunk to find his car?{*6}Ha, he stinks of booze!

X0302C_CAFET_BULLY_PC_X03CCURTIS_CONNORA.text: !4Q6! {S}{*TC:2070|3450}Fuck, look at that… {*3}Our friend the plastic detective is back in town! {*4}Congratulations on last night, very impressive! {*5}Could've got something outta that android if you haven't fucked it up...

X0302C_CAFET_BULLY_PC_X03CCURTIS_CONNORD.text: !4Q8! {S}{*TC:4014|4750}Shit... {*2}Look at that… {*3}a fucking ghost… {*5}His clone ends up in a dumpster, but this morning, {*6}what do you know?! {*7}Another son of a bitch takes his place…

X0302C_CAFET_BULLY_PC_X03CCURTIS_NEVERSE.text: !4QC! {S}{*1}Never seen an android like you before… {*2}What model are you?

X0302C_CAFET_BULLY_PC_X03CCURTIS_ANSWER.text: !4QE! {S}{*1}A prototype? {*2}Android detective… {*3}So machines are gonna…  {*4}replace us all… {*5}is that it?..

X0302C_CAFET_BULLY_PC_X03CCONNOR_DECLINE.text: !4QF! {S}{*1}I'm sorry,{*2}but I'm not authorized to answer you.{*3}If you have any questions, please contact your superior.

X0302C_CAFET_BULLY_PC_X03CCURTIS_ANOTHER.text: !4QK! {S}{*1}Think I'll have myself another…{*2}Hey,{*3}bring me a coffee, dipshit!{*4}GET A MOVE ON!

X0302C_CAFET_BULLY_PC_X03CCURTIS_ACCEPT.text: !4QM! {S}{*1}Do yourself a favor,{*2}stay outta my way.

X0302C_CAFET_BULLY_PC_X03CCONNOR_REFUSE.text: !4QN! {S}{*1}I'm sorry,{*2}but I only take orders from Lieutenant Anderson.

X0302C_CAFET_BULLY_PC_X03CCURTIS_INTERVE.text: !4QU! {S}{*1}If Hank hadn’t got in the way yesterday, I would’ve fucked you up for disobeying a human. {*2}Stay outta my way… {*3}'Cause next time... {*4}you won’t get off so easy.

X0302C_CAFET_BULLY_PC_X03CCURTIS_OBEY.text: !4QW! {S}{*1}When a human gives you an order, you obey.{*2}Got it?{*3}Stay outta my way…{*4}Next time,{*5}you won’t get off so easy.

X0302C_CAFET_BULLY_PC_X03CCURTIS_COFFEEC.text: !4QX! {S}{*TC:0100|1026}…patrol down the strip. {*2}And, uh… {*TC:2800|7245}I see these two girls, they’re working girls, right? At least, I think they’re working girls. So I go up to 'em, {*5}and they start running. {*6}So I'm thinking: shit! They've seen us and we gotta catch 'em 'cause they're obviously not supposed to be there. So I'm running, these things are fast man, these bitches are fast… Right, so, we finally catch up to them. And get in the car, pull 'em over the... Put 'em on the hood and realized they're not... {*7}girls, they're... guys. {*8}Because, swear to God, my buddy gets so exhausted, he comes up behind them and just tackles one... {*9}in this tackle, you know what I mean? So he just goes "pff, whoa!" He steps… uh… {*10}Yeah, it was a little awkward at that point, 'cause this guy is just comin’ and comin’, comin’ like, so...{*11}Yeah, that was a bad day, {*TC:46950|47935}it was a bad bust.

X0302C_CAFET_BULLY_FA_X03CCURTIS_OBEYSEC.text: !4QY! {S}{*1}When a human gives you an order, you obey. {*2}Got it?{*3}Stay outta my way… {*4}'Cause next time {*5}you won’t get off so easy.

X0302C_ARRIVAL_ENTRANCE_PC_X03CANDCOPWOM.text: !4R8! {S}{*1}Can I help you?{*2}Do you have authorization?{*3}Lieutenant Anderson hasn't arrived yet, but you can wait at his desk.

MENU_OBSERVATION_03C_MP_STICKERS_SUBLINE.text: !4RI! Use your brain not your android

MENU_OBSERVATION_03C_MP_ARTICLE01_SUBLIN.text: !4S6! Detroit Police dismantle a network of Red Ice dealers
!4S7! More than 50 arrests throughout the country

MENU_OBSERVATION_03C_MP_ARTICLE02_SUBLIN.text: !4S9! Detective Anderson promoted to the rank of Lieutenant
!4SA! Becoming the youngest lieutenant on the Detroit Police Force

MENU_OBSERVATION_03C_MP_GRADUATION_SUBLI.text: !4TH! Responsible for the RED ICE network dismantle of 2028

X0302C_HANK_PHONE_PC_X03CCONNOR_MESSAGE.text: !4TS! {S}{*1}Lieutenant Anderson? This is Connor, I'm the android sent by CyberLife.{*2}It’s almost noon and I’m waiting for you at the office.

X0302C_HANK_PHONE_VO_X03CHANK_NOTHERE.text: !4TT! {S}{*1}Hi, this is Hank.{*2}Not here at the moment.{*3}You can leave a message if that's what turns you on but don't expect me to call back.{*4}Beep… {*5}Whatever.

X0302C_HANKDESK_LOOKINGFOR_PC_X03CCONNOR.text: !4TY! {S}{*1}Excuse me.{*2}Do you know what time Lieutenant Anderson usually arrives?

X0302C_HANKDESK_LOOKINGFOR_PC_X03CCOP01_.text: !4U2! {S}{*1}Huh, Hank?{*2}Depends on where he was the night before…{*3}If we're lucky, we’ll see him before noon…

X0301C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X03CAMANDA_CONNOR.text: !4U6! {S}{*1}Your predecessor was unfortunately destroyed...{*2}It knew deviants could be unpredictable, but it wasn’t careful enough…{*3}I hope you won’t make the same mistake. {*4}When a Connor model is destroyed, {*5}its memory is transferred to the next one, {*6}but some data can be lost in the process. {*7}Avoid being destroyed.{*8}It will be better for you and the investigation…

X0301C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X03CCONNOR_ANDNOT.text: !4U7! {S}{*1}I'm sorry.{*2}I know I should have succeeded.

X0301C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X03CAMANDA_ANDNOT.text: !4U8! {S}{*1}I expected you to find the deviant who killed that man…{*2}I must admit I'm a little bit disappointed... {*3}Nevermind.{*4}I’m sure you’ll show more foresight in the future.

X0301C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X03CAMANDA_CONT03.text: !4UA! {S}{*1}Unfortunately, we have no choice but to work with him…{*2}What do you think is the best approach?

X0301C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X03CCONNOR_ANDFOU.text: !4UB! {S}{*1}I thought I could make it talk…{*2}It was a judgement error.

X0301C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X03CAMANDA_ANDFOU.text: !4UC! {S}{*1}Finding that deviant was far from easy…{*2}you showed great skill in your investigation.{*3}But you knew deviants could be unstable.{*4}You should have been more cautious. {*5}Nevermind.{*6}I’m sure you’ll be more careful in future.

X0301C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X03CAMANDA_ANDSAV.text: !4UE! {S}{*1}Congratulations, Connor...{*2}Finding that deviant was far from easy,{*3}and the way you interrogated it was very clever.{*TC:13728|16255}You’ve been remarkably efficient, Connor. {*5}We’ve asked the DPD to transfer it to us for further study.{*6}It may teach us something about what happened.{*7}We hope they’ll accept our request before the deviant tries to destroy itself again…

X0301C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X03CAMANDA_CONT01.text: !4UG! {S}{*1}The interrogation seemed…{*2}challenging…{*3}What did you think of the deviant?

X0301C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X03CCONNOR_01SIMU.text: !4UH! {S}{*1}It simulated human emotion,{*2}fear in particular, in a very convincing way.{*3}It seemed completely overwhelmed by them, and behaved irrationally,{*4}as a human would under extreme stress.

X0301C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X03CCONNOR_01TRAU.text: !4UJ! {S}{*1}It showed signs of PTSD after being abused by its owner,{*2}as if its original program had been completely replaced by new instructions.

X0301C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X03CCONNOR_01DEVI.text: !4UL! {S}{*1}It showed all the signs of deviancy:{*2}cognitive instability, unpredictable behavior, and the emulation of human emotions.{*3}It was even afraid to die.{*4}The model was clearly defective.

X0301C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X03CCONNOR_01REGR.text: !4UN! {S}{*1}It could've killed everyone in the room.{*2}The previous Connor should have anticipated the danger.{*3}It was a mistake to let an armed policeman so close to the deviant.

X0301C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X03CCONNOR_01INTE.text: !4UP! {S}{*1}I prevented it from being damaged, so we might still learn something by analyzing it. {*2}It said something to me:{*3}“The truth is inside”.{*4}I don’t know what that means…{*5}unless it was just another error in its program.

X0301C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X03CAMANDA_CONT02.text: !4US! {S}{*1}This…{*2}Lieutenant Anderson has been officially assigned to the deviancy case…{*3}What do you make of him?

X0301C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X03CCONNOR_02UNPL.text: !4UT! {S}{*1}I find him unpleasant and unprofessional.{*2}He seems to have an addictive personality, has a lack of respect for procedure, and despises androids - which makes our relationship difficult.

X0301C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X03CCONNOR_02DYSF.text: !4UV! {S}{*1}I would define him as “dysfunctional”.{*2}He obviously has a personal situation impacting his professional behavior and... {*3}seems to have no interest in the investigation.

X0301C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X03CCONNOR_02INTR.text: !4UX! {S}{*1}I think he’s irritable,{*2}and socially challenged.{*3}But I also think he used to be a good detective…{*4}He’s an intriguing character.

X0301C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X03CCONNOR_02UNSU.text: !4UZ! {S}{*1}He’s obviously not what I was expecting,{*2}but... {*3}I don’t have enough information yet to form a definitive opinion.

X0301C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X03CCONNOR_03FRIE.text: !4V1! {S}{*1}I will try to establish a friendly relationship.{*2}If I can get him to trust me, it will be helpful for the investigation.

X0301C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X03CCONNOR_03ADAP.text: !4V3! {S}{*1}I will adapt to his personality.{*2}It is in the best interest of the investigation that I avoid conflict and try to accommodate his psychology.

X0301C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X03CAMANDA_03ADAP.text: !4V4! {S}{*1}What do you think is the best approach?

X0301C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X03CCONNOR_03INDI.text: !4V5! {S}{*1}I will focus on the investigation and try to ignore him.{*2}As long as he doesn’t interfere and we avoid conflict, he shouldn’t be a problem.

X0301C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X03CCONNOR_03DONT.text: !4V7! {S}{*1}I don’t have enough data to decide that yet.{*2}I’ll learn more about him and try to adapt my behavior accordingly.

X0301C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X03CAMANDA_CONT04.text: !4VA! {S}{*1}More and more androids show signs of deviancy.{*2}There are millions in circulation.{*3}If they become unstable, the consequences will be disastrous.

X0301C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X03CAMANDA_NOANDS.text: !4VE! {S}{*1}Continue your investigation and put a stop to this.

X0301C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X03CAMANDA_STOPTH.text: !4VG! {S}{*1}Pick up the investigation where the previous Connor left off, and put a stop to this.

X0301C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X03CAMANDA_CONT04.text: !4VI! {S}{*1}You are the most advanced prototype CyberLife has ever created.{*2}If anyone can figure out what’s happening, it's you.

X0302C_CONFERENCEROOM_EXIT_PC_X03CDETECT.text: !4VZ! {S}{*TC:0|1960}TEMP What the hell? Get that tin can out of here!
!4W0! {S}{*TC:1960|5520}TEMP Isn’t that Hank’s new friend? Get him out of here. Hank isn’t involved in this case!

X0302C_CONFERENCEROOM_EXIT_PC_X03CANDCON.text: !4W1! {S}{*TC:5520|9040}TEMP I’m sorry, sir, you don’t have clearance or orders to assist in this investigation.

X0302C_CONFERENCEROOM_EXIT_PC_X03CCONNOR.text: !4W2! {S}{*TC:6080|8280}TEMP I apologise, I didn’t mean to interrupt your work.

X0302C_CONFERENCEROOM_EXIT_PC_X03CDETECT.text: !4W3! {S}{*TC:0|2000} TEMP What the hell? Get that android out of here!
!4W4! {S}{*TC:2000|6080}TEMP Isn’t that Hank’s new friend? Hey, Hank, stop spying on our case, get your assistant out of here!

X0302C_OFFICE_ANDCHITCHAT_PC_X02CCHAD_TA.text: !4W6! {S}{*1}No shit?{*2}That fucking machine could have killed everyone in the room…

THOUGHTS_0301M_ANALYZE.text: !4WP! HOLD TO FIND PARTS

MENU_OBSERVATION_03M_MP_CHESTDEF_SUBLINE.text: !4YL! All systems in LOW POWER MODE

X0302M_LANDFILL_JERICHO_FA_X03MANDJERICH.text: !4Z7! {S}{*1}I have to get to Jericho... {*2}Androids live in freedom there… {*3}I got to get to Jericho... No other choice…

X0302C_DESK_FILES_PC_X03CCONNOR_START.text: !4Z9! {S}{*1}243 files…{*2}The first dates back nine months…{*3}It all started in Detroit… And quickly spread across the country…

X0302C_DESK_FILES_PC_X03CCONNOR_TODDALIV.text: !4ZB! {S}{*1}An AX400 is reported to have assaulted a man last night.{*2}That could be a good starting point for our investigation.

X0302C_DESK_FILES_PC_X03CCONNOR_TODDDEAD.text: !4ZC! {S}{*1}An AX400 is reported to have murdered a man last night.{*2}That could be a good starting point for our investigation.

X0302C_DESK_FILES_PC_X03CCONNOR_UNDERSTA.text: !4ZD! {S}{*1}I understand you’re facing personal issues, Lieutenant,{*2}but you need to move past them...{*3}and-

X0302C_DESK_FILES_PC_X03CHANK_UNDERSTAND.text: !4ZE! {S}{*1}Hey! Don't talk to me like you know me. I'm not your friend and I don't need your advice, okay?

X0302C_DESK_FILES_PC_X03CCONNOR_DIRECT.text: !4ZF! {S}{*1}You shouldn’t let your personal situation hamper the investigation, Lieutenant.

X0302C_DESK_FILES_PC_X03CHANK_DIRECT.text: !4ZG! {S}{*1}You don't know what the hell you're talking about. So why don't you just run your program and shut the fuck up?

X0302C_DESK_FILES_PC_X03CCONNOR_AGRESSIV.text: !4ZH! {S}{*1}If the situation doesn't suit you, Lieutenant, you should ask to be relieved of duties and let me work with someone else.

X0302C_DESK_FILES_PC_X03CHANK_AGRESSIVE.text: !4ZI! {S}{*1}I know exactly what I have to do! So keep your advice to yourself and mind your own business! {*TC:15450|17050}Fuckin'...

X0302C_DESK_FILES_PC_X03CCONNOR_PROFESSI.text: !4ZJ! {S}{*1}I know you didn't ask for this investigation, Lieutenant,{*2}but I'm sure you're a professional.

X0302C_DESK_FILES_PC_X03CCONNOR_THREATEN.text: !4ZL! {S}{*1}I'm going to file a report with my superiors that you refuse to work on this investigation.

X0302C_DESK_FILES_PC_X03CCONNOR_DETERMIN.text: !4ZN! {S}{*1}I've been assigned this mission, Lieutenant.{*2}I didn't come here to wait until you feel like working.

X0302C_DESK_FILES_PC_X03CCONNOR_RESIGNMI.text: !4ZO! {S}{*1}I suggest you sort out your personal issues and let me work with someone more competent.

X0302C_DESK_FILES_PC_X03CHANK_GRABCOLLAR.text: !4ZR! {S}{*2}Listen, asshole. If it was up to me, I'd throw the lot of you in a dumpster and set a match to it. So, stop pissing me off...{*3}or things are gonna get nasty.

X0302C_DESK_FILES_PC_X03CCONNOR_KARADEAD.text: !4ZY! {S}{*1}We could follow up on one of these cases. See if we could figure out what happened.{*2}That might be a good way to start the investigation.{*3}What do you think?

X0302C_DESK_FILES_PC_X03CHARVEY_HARVEYTO.text: !501! {S}{*1}Lieutenant...{*2}uh...sorry to disturb you.{*3}I have some information on the AX400 that attacked the guy last night...{*4}It's been seen in the Ravendale district.
!502! {S}{*1}Lieutenant...{*2}uh… sorry to disturb you. I have some information on the AX400 that killed the guy last night...{*3}It's been sighted in the Ravendale district.

X0302C_DESK_FILES_FA_X03CCONNOR_RESIGNMI.text: !503! {S}{*1}I suggest you sort out your personal issues {*2}and let me work with someone more competent.

X0302C_DESK_FILES_FA_X03CCONNOR_DETERMIN.text: !504! {S}{*1}I've been assigned this mission, Lieutenant.{*2}I didn't come here to wait until you feel like working.

X0302C_DESK_FILES_FA_X03CCONNOR_THREATEN.text: !505! {S}{*1}I'm going to have to file a report with my superiors that you refuse to work on this investigation.

X0302C_FOWLER_ALONE_PC_X03CCONNOR_ANDERS.text: !50G! {S}{*1}I wonder whether Lieutenant Anderson is really the best person for this investigation.

X0302C_FOWLER_ALONE_PC_X03CFOWLER_ANDERS.text: !50H! {S}{*1}Hey,{*2}I don’t need a machine to tell me how to handle my men, okay? So get the fuck outta my office.

X0302C_FOWLER_ALONE_PC_X03CCONNOR_POSITI.text: !50I! {S}{*1}I'm very pleased to have joined the team.{*2}I can assure you I'll do my very best-

X0302C_FOWLER_ALONE_PC_X03CFOWLER_POSITI.text: !50J! {S}{*1}Close the door on your way out.

X0302C_FOWLER_ALONE_PC_X03CCONNOR_FILE.text: !50K! {S}{*1}I would like to start reviewing the case files.{*2}Can you tell me where I-

X0302C_FOWLER_ALONE_PC_X03CFOWLER_FILE.text: !50L! {S}{*1}Talk to Hank.{*2}Close the door on your way out.

X0302C_FOWLER_ALONE_PC_X03CCONNOR_LEAVE.text: !50M! {S}{*1}Well, then…{*2}I won't keep you any longer.

X0302C_CELLS_ANDGAMEOVER_PC_X03CCHAD_AND.text: !50S! {S}{*1}Open the cell, quick!{*2}Hurry!{*3}I'll call CyberLife…{*4}Clean this mess up…

X0302C_CELLS_CARLOS_PC_X03CCONNOR_SINCER.text: !50W! {S}{*1}It’s probable.{*2}They have to analyze your biocomponents.{*3}They need to understand what happened.

X0302C_CELLS_CARLOS_PC_X03CCONNOR_COLD.text: !510! {S}{*1}My objective was to capture you alive.{*2}What happens now is not my problem.

X0302C_CELLS_CARLOS_PC_X03CCONNOR_COMPAS.text: !512! {S}{*1}I'm sorry.{*2}It's not what I wanted…{*3}but there's nothing I can do.

X0302C_CELLS_CARLOS_PC_X03CCONNOR_TALKTO.text: !514! {S}{*1}I know there’s something you didn’t tell me.{*2}I need to know, before they take you away…

X0302C_CELLS_CARLOS_PC_X03CCONNOR_DEVIAN.text: !516! {S}{*1}Do you know any other deviants?{*2}Are there many of you?

X0302C_CELLS_CARLOS_PC_X03CCONNOR_SECRET.text: !518! {S}{*1}What you said yesterday…{*2}"the truth is inside"…{*3}What does it mean?

X0302C_CELLS_CARLOS_PC_X03CCONNOR_RA9.text: !51A! {S}{*1}What you wrote on the wall...{*2}rA9…{*3}What does it mean?

X0302C_CELLS_CARLOS_PC_X03CCONNOR_STATUE.text: !51C! {S}{*1}The sculpture you made…{*2}Tell me more about it…

X0302C_CELLS_ANDGAMEVOER_FA_X03CCHAD_AND.text: !51P! {S}{*TC:0|1240}Open the cell! Quick! Hurry up!{*TC:1240|2240}Fuck, I don't believe it…{*TC:2240|4040}Come on, there's nothing you can do about it…

X0302C_HANK_DEVIANTS_PC_X03CCONNOR_DEVIA.text: !51Q! {S}{*TC:0|3000}If you have any files on deviants, I could have a look at them if you like…

X0302C_HANK_DEVIANTS_PC_X03CHANK_DEVIANT.text: !51R! {S}{*TC:3000|8840}37 unsolved cases involving androids that no police officer in his right mind would want to even look at… It's all on your terminal. Don't be shy.

MENU_SPECIFIC_03C_NEWS_FILE_01_TITLE.text: !51V! DETROIT POLICE DISMANTLE A NETWORK OF RED ICE DEALERS

MENU_SPECIFIC_03C_NEWS_FILE_01_TEXT.text: !51W! More than 50 arrests throughout the country.<QD_BR>Detroit’s finest has dealt a massive blow to the city’s growing red ice epidemic, with a number of high-profile dealers and suppliers now behind bars and narcotics seized with a street value of $500,000. Detective Hank Anderson, a young but hugely talented Detective, is said to have been instrumental in the operation, which took months of planning. The DA described the work of Detective Anderson and his colleagues as “model investigative police work”.

MENU_SPECIFIC_03C_NEWS_FILE_02_TITLE.text: !51Z! DETECTIVE ANDERSON PROMOTED TO THE RANK OF LIEUTENANT

MENU_SPECIFIC_03C_NEWS_FILE_03_TITLE.text: !520! NEW RECORD SEIZURE OF RED ICE IN DETROIT!

MENU_SPECIFIC_03C_NEWS_FILE_02_TEXT.text: !521! Becoming the youngest lieutenant on the Detroit police force.<QD_BR> Lieutenant Hank Anderson was among the most decorated Detectives in DPD’s recent history, securing a number of high-profile arrests and serving as an integral member of the force. Captain Fowler said the promotion was “long over-due”, describing Anderson as “among the most talented police I’ve ever worked with”. The new Lieutenant is expected to rise quickly through the ranks of the department and is already being tipped as a future Commissioner.

MENU_SPECIFIC_03C_NEWS_FILE_03_TEXT.text: !522! Nearly a ton of red ice discovered in the hold of a boat after a long investigation conducted by Lieutenant Anderson of the Detroit police force.

X0302C_FOWLER_MEET_PC_X03CFOWLER_JOB00A.text: !524! {S}{*1}I've got ten new cases involving androids on my desk every day.{*2}We've always had isolated incidents,{*3}old ladies losing their android maids and that kind of crap…{*4}But now,{*5}we’re getting reports of assaults and even homicides, like that guy last night…{*6}This isn't just CyberLife’s problem anymore.{*7}It's now a criminal investigation and we've gotta deal with it before the shit hits the fan.{*8}I want you to investigate these cases and see if there's any link.

X0302C_FOWLER_MEET_PC_X03CHANK_JOB00A.text: !525! {S}{*1}Why me?{*2}Why do I gotta be the one to deal with this shit?{*3}I am the least qualified cop in the country to handle this case!{*4}I know jack shit about androids, Jeffrey! I can barely change the settings on my own phone…

X0302C_FOWLER_MEET_PC_X03CHANK_JOB01.text: !528! {S}{*1}No fuckin' way! I don't need a partner, and certainly not this plastic prick!

X0302C_FOWLER_MEET_PC_X03CFOWLER_JOB02.text: !52A! {S}{*1}Hank, you are seriously starting to piss me off! You are a police lieutenant, you are supposed to do what I say and shut your goddamn mouth!{*2}Ok, ok...{*3}I'll pretend like I didn't hear that, so I don't have to add any more pages to your disciplinary folder ‘cause it already looks like a fuckin' novel! This conversation is over!{*4}Listen,{*5}I’ve had just about enough of your bitching. Either you do your job or you hand in your badge. Now if you'll excuse me, I've got work to do.

X0302C_FOWLER_MEET_PC_X03CHANK_JOB02.text: !52B! {S}{*2}You know what my goddamn mouth has to say to you, huh? {*3}Jeffrey, Jesus Christ! Why are you doin' this to me? You know how much I hate these fuckin' things. Why you doin' this to me?

X0302C_FOWLER_MEET_PC_X03CFOWLER_JOB00B.text: !52G! {S}{*1}Everybody's overloaded. I think you're perfectly qualified for this type of investigation. {*2}CyberLife sent over this android to help with the investigation.{*3}It's a state-of-the-art prototype. It'll act as your partner.

X0302C_FOWLER_MEET_PC_X03CHANK_JOB00B.text: !52H! {S}{*1}Bullshit! The truth is nobody wants to investigate these fuckin' androids and you left me holdin' the bag!

X0302C_HARVEY_TALK_PC_X03CCONNOR_CONNORD.text: !52J! {S}{*1}Unfortunately, my predecessor was too damaged to be repaired.{*2}I’m the new Connor.

X0302C_HARVEY_TALK_PC_X03CHARVEY_CONNORD.text: !52L! {S}{*1}Good Lord! {*2}They already repaired you?{*3}They don't waste any time over at CyberLife… {*4}I don’t think Hank's gonna be overjoyed to see you…

X0302C_HARVEY_TALK_PC_X03CHARVEY_CONNORA.text: !52M! {S}{*1}You still here? {*2}I thought your assignment was over. {*4}Hank's gonna be overjoyed to hear that…

X0302C_HARVEY_TALK_PC_X03CHARVEY_ANDSTIL.text: !52N! {S}{*1}You were right about that android… {*2}it's been quiet in the cell all night. {*3}Scheduled for transfer today.

X0302C_HANK_PARTNER_PC_X03CCONNOR_UNDERS.text: !52O! {S}{*1}I get the impression my presence causes you some inconvenience, Lieutenant.{*2}I'd like you to know I'm very sorry about that.

X0302C_HANK_PARTNER_PC_X03CCONNOR_PRAGMA.text: !52P! {S}{*1}Listen,{*2}I know you don't like me,{*3}but we're going to have to work together,{*4}we'll both have to make an effort.

X0302C_HANK_PARTNER_PC_X03CCONNOR_CONSTR.text: !52Q! {S}{*1}It's an honor to be working with you, Lieutenant.{*2}I'm sure we'll make a great team.

X0302C_HANK_PARTNER_PC_X03CCONNOR_NEWCON.text: !52R! {S}{*1}I understand the destruction of my predecessor may have been unpleasant for you, Lieutenant.{*2}I'll do everything I can to make sure it doesn't happen again.

X0302C_HANK_PARTNER_PC_X03CCONNOR_LASTNI.text: !52S! {S}{*1}I'm…{*2}sorry I bothered you at the bar last night, Lieutenant.{*3}I guess I ruined your evening…

X0302C_HANK_PARTNER_PC_X03CCONNOR_TEAMMA.text: !52T! {S}{*1}Now that we're partners, it would be great to get to know each other better.

X0302C_HANK_PARTNER_PC_X03CCONNOR_DESK.text: !52U! {S}{*1}Is there a desk anywhere I could use?

X0302C_HANK_PARTNER_PC_X03CCONNOR_THANKS.text: !52W! {S}{*1}I wanna thank you {*2}for last night, Lieutenant.{*3}Without your intervention, I probably would have been destroyed.

X0302C_HANK_PARTNER_PC_X03CCONNOR_POSITI.text: !52Y! {S}{*1}In any case,{*TC:3030|5576}I'd like you to know I'm very happy to be working with you.{*3}I'm sure we'll make a great team.

X0302C_HANK_PARTNER2_PC_X03CCONNOR_DOG.text: !53A! {S}{*1}You have a dog, right?{*2}The dog hairs on your chair.{*3}I like dogs.{*4}What's your dog's name?

X0302C_HANK_PARTNER2_PC_X03CHANK_DOG.text: !53B! {S}{*1}How do you know that?{*2}What's it to you?{*3}Sumo,{*4}I call him Sumo.

X0302C_HANK_PARTNER2_PC_X03CCONNOR_BASKE.text: !53C! {S}{*1}You’re a Detroit Gears fan, right?{*2}Denton Carter scored 53% of his shots from the three-point line yesterday.{*3}Did you see the game?{*4}Oh…

X0302C_HANK_PARTNER2_PC_X03CHANK_BASKET.text: !53D! {S}{*1}That's what I was watchin' at the bar last night.

X0302C_HANK_PARTNER2_PC_X03CCONNOR_FOWLE.text: !53E! {S}{*1}Have you known Captain Fowler for long?

X0302C_HANK_PARTNER2_PC_X03CCONNOR_ANTIA.text: !53G! {S}{*1}A lot of people don't appreciate having androids around…{*2}I was wondering…{*3}Is there any reason in particular you despise me?

X0302C_HANK_PARTNER2_PC_X03CCONNOR_HOURS.text: !53I! {S}{*1}I was wondering…{*2}Do you always arrive at the office at this time?

X0302C_HANK_PARTNER2_PC_X03CHANK_HOURS.text: !53J! {S}{*1}I arrive when I arrive.{*2}Stop busting my balls, okay?

X0302C_HANK_PARTNER2_PC_X03CCONNOR_MUSIC.text: !53K! {S}{*1}Do you listen to Knights of the Black Death?{*2}I really like that music.{*3}It's… full of energy…{*4}Well, I don't really listen to music, as such…{*5}but I'd like to.

X0302C_HANK_PARTNER2_PC_X03CCONNOR_HANKS.text: !53M! {S}{*1}I know what happened to your son,{*2}and I want you to know-

X0302C_HANK_PARTNER2_PC_X03CHANK_HANKSON.text: !53N! {S}{*1}You never talk about my son! You got that? Never!

X0302C_HANK_PARTNER2_PC_X03CCONNOR_FILE.text: !53O! {S}{*1}If you have any files on deviants,{*2}I’d like to take a look at them…

X0302C_HANK_PARTNER2_PC_X03CHANK_FILE.text: !53P! {S}{*1}Terminal’s on your desk. Knock yourself out.

X0302C_TVSCREEN_TODD_PC_X03CWEBB_NOTKILL.text: !53Y! {S}{*TC:0|9200}… and now back to this morning's top story. An AX400 android is reported to have attacked its owner in a Detroit suburb last night, before escaping the scene. Police have questioned the victim but have issued no statements so far…

X0302C_TVSCREEN_TODD_PC_X03CWEBB_KILLED.text: !53Z! {S}{*TC:0|8920}… and now back to this morning's top story. An AX400 android is suspected of killing its owner in a Detroit suburb last night. A neighbor found the victim shot dead this morning. So far, the police have issued no statement…

X0302C_CELLS_DRUNKGUY_PC_X03CDRUNKGUY_FU.text: !540! {S}{*1}What?.. {*2}What are you lookin' at?.. {*3}Hey, fuck you! {*4}Fuckin' android…

X0302C_TV_NEWS_PC_X03CBRINKLEY_CARLOSUPD.text: !541! {S}{*1}Several sources report that CyberLife has provided Detroit Police with a prototype detective android.{*2}Although police assistant androids have existed for several years now, this would be the first case of an android being authorized to play an active role in criminal investigations.{*3}We contacted CyberLife for comment {B}but no one was available to answer our questions.

X0302C_TV_NEWS_PC_X03CBRINKLEY_RUSSIANCO.text: !542! {S}{*1}Tensions in the Arctic have reached a new level, with a Russian carrier and an American patrol boat reported to have clashed last night.{*2}Several warning shots were exchanged, apparently with no damage or casualties to either side.{*3}The Minister for Defense, Denis Riggs, has spoken of "intolerable provocation that cannot go unanswered".{*4}The countries in the region, particularly Sweden and Canada,{*5}have called for military forces to withdraw and an international conference to be held.{*6}So far, there has been no response from either Moscow or Washington.{*7}We’ll keep you informed minute by minute as the situation develops.

X0302C_TV_NEWS_PC_X03CCARTLAND_AIAUTHOR.text:
!543! {S}{*1}The first book written by an artificial intelligence has just been published and to call it a success would be an understatement –{B}Do Humans Dream of Mammalian Sheep? has shot to the top of the bestseller list.{*2}Moreover, critics are unanimous in their praise for the depth of thought and originality of this first work.
{*3}Designed by CyberLife, the AI known as VOLTAIRE analyzed human centers of interest on social networks for several months before its complex algorithms generated the plot of the novel.
{*4}According to several specialists, it will be very difficult for human authors to compete with these algorithms and the odds are that most of the books written in the coming years will be the work of artificial intelligence.

X0302C_TV_NEWS_PC_X03CWEBB_CARLOSUPDATEW.text: !544! {S}{*1}Detroit Police found the body of thirty-year-old Carlos Ortiz in his home last night, following calls from concerned neighbors.{B}Known to the police as a petty criminal, Mr. Ortiz is reported to have suffered from a psychiatric condition and rarely left his apartment.{*2}He is thought to have died several weeks ago.{*3}The police are conducting forensic tests but appear to be treating the death as a homicide.{*4}The victim's android is also reported missing.{*5}We’ll bring you more on that story as it develops.

MENU_SPECIFIC_03C_FILES_FILE_01_DETAILS.text: !54F! The plaintiff reports that he left his android at home as usual when he went to work. When he returned, the android was nowhere to be found. No trace of a break-in in the apartment. The android may have left the home without being ordered to.

MENU_SPECIFIC_03C_FILES_FILE_02_DETAILS.text: !54K! The plaintiff claims to have been attacked by a AV500 #234 777 821 model android working as a waiter in the FAST CONEY DOGS restaurant chain situated at 842 Chamberlain Avenue. The plaintiff claims the android “lunged” at him unexpectedly and attempted to strangle the man, before leaving the scene. The android remains at large.

MENU_SPECIFIC_03C_FILES_FILE_03_DETAILS.text: !54W! The plaintiff claims to have been attacked by her android, an AP700 #480 913 802 model. The android also trashed several rooms in the house before taking flight.

MENU_SPECIFIC_03C_FILES_FILE_04_DETAILS.text: !557! The plaintiff, the manager of the EDEN CLUB, reported the unexplained disappearance of a "Sex android", model WR400 #641 790 831. The android disappeared after accompanying a customer to his home and never returned to the club.

MENU_SPECIFIC_03C_FILES_FILE_0501_DETAIL.text: !55I! Leo MANFRED was found unconscious in the home of his father, Carl MANFRED. The latter’s witness statement attests to an altercation between his son and the house android. The android is thought to be a prototype (unknown model and serial number) and was destroyed at the scene by attending officers.

MENU_SPECIFIC_03C_FILES_FILE_0601_DETAIL.text: !55T! The plaintiff claims he was violently attacked by his domestic android, an AX400 model. The android had just returned from being repaired the previous day and had shown signs of aggression in the past.

MENU_SPECIFIC_03C_FILES_FILE_0602_DETAIL.text: !55U! The victim's body was found by a friend who came by to say hello. He immediately called the emergency service at 8:42, who recorded death by gunshot wound. The murder weapon may have belonged to the victim. His android, an AX400, was not found on the scene and is the main suspect.

MENU_SPECIFIC_03C_FILES_FILE_0502_DETAIL.text: !567! Famous painter Carl MANFRED was found dead in his home following an altercation between his android and his son. The latter’s witness statement attests to the android behaving violently. The android is thought to be a prototype (unknown model and serial number) and was destroyed at the scene by attending officers.

X0302M_LANDFILL_SLOPE_PC_X03MPHILEAS_PHI.text: !56W! {S}{*2}There’s a place where we can be free! Find Jericho!{*3}Find Jericho!..

X0302M_LANDFILL_EYE_FA_X03MHEAD01_MODEL.text: !56X! {S}{*1}Hello.{*2}I'm an AK700 android.{*3}I was designed to serve you.{*4}What can I do for you?

X0302M_LANDFILL_EYE_FA_X03MHEAD01_ANOMAL.text: !56Y! {S}{*1}My program has detected an anomaly.{*2}Please contact the nearest CyberLife maintenance center.

X0302M_LANDFILL_GOODBALANCE_FA_X03MHEART.text: !56Z! {S}{*1}Wait! Please! Please, don’t do that!{*2}I wanna live…
!571! {S}{*1}Wait! Please, don’t do that! I wanna live…

X0302M_LANDFILL_EVENTDYINGV2_FA_X03MANGR.text: !577! {S}{*1}I’m begging you, please… {*2}End it… {*3}I don’t wanna live anymore…

X0301K_BUS_PLEASE_PC_X03KKARA_STAY.text: !57C! {S}{*1}Listen, we have nowhere to go… {*2}She’s exhausted and it's pouring rain … {*3}Can we just stay for a little while?

X0301K_BUS_PLEASE_PC_X03KKARA_SHELTER.text: !57E! {S}{*1}Do you know if there's any other place we could spend the night?

X0301K_BUS_PLEASE_PC_X03KCONTROLLER_STAY.text: !57G! {S}{*1}This bus is going back to the depot. There’s nothing I can do.

X0301K_BUS_PLEASE_PC_X03KCONTROLLER_SHEL.text: !57H! {S}{*1}I have no idea…{*2}But you're gonna have to leave.

X0301K_STREET_BUSSTOP_PC_X03KKARA_WHERE.text: !57M! {S}{*1}I know… {*2}We'll get you somewhere warm soon.  {*3}We have nowhere to go… {*4}But, that's on the other side of town… {*5}We need a place for tonight!{*6}Come on, Alice.

X0301K_STREET_BUSSTOP_PC_X03KANDDUSTMAN_.text: !57O! {S}{*1}You look lost.  {*2}I know someone who can help you.

X0301K_CAR_OPEN_PC_X03KKARA_OPEN.text: !57P! {S}{*1}It's dry inside {*2}and nobody will find us here…

X0301K_CAR_OPEN_PC_X03KALICE_OPEN.text: !57Q! {S}{*1}I don’t want to sleep in there. {*2}Can't we find a better place?

X0301K_CAR_OPEN_PC_X03KKARA_STAYHERE.text: !57R! {S}{*1}We're better off staying, Alice. {*2}The important thing is for us to be safe... {*3}And it’s just for tonight.

X0301K_CAR_OPEN_PC_X03KKARA_ONENIGHT.text: !57V! {S}{*1}It's just for one night, Alice… {*2}At least you'll be safe and dry…

X0301K_CAR_POORALICE_PC_X03KALICE_CONFOR.text: !580! {S}{*1}Why didn't he ever love me? {*2}Why was he always so upset with me? {*3}All I wanted was a life like other girls. {*4}Maybe I did something wrong? {*5}Maybe I wasn't good enough? {*6}That's why he was always so angry. {*7}I just wanted us to be a family. {*8}I just wanted him to love me. {*9}Why couldn't we just be happy? {*10}You'll never leave me, right? {*11}Promise you'll never go!

X0301K_CAR_POORALICE_PC_X03KKARA_PROMISE.text: !585! {S}{*1}Alice, we don’t know what’s going to happen.

X0301K_STREET_GAMEOVER_FA_X03KKARA_ALLRI.text: !58E! {S}{*1}You're gonna be all right, Alice… {*2}You'll be all right…

X0301K_BUS_SHELTER_PC_X03KKARA_BUSSHELTE.text: !58F! {S}{*1}You're gonna be ok?{*2}We'll find somewhere to spend the night.

X0301K_STREET_TAKEHAND_FA_X03KKARA_TAKE0.text: !58H! {S}{*1}Come on, Alice. We've got to hurry.
!58I! {S}{*1}I know you're tired, but we have to find a place to spend the night.
!58J! {S}{*1}Your hand is freezing… {*2}It won't be long, you'll be alright…
!58L! {S}{*1}I need you to hang on, Alice. We're gonna find some place soon.

X0301K_BUS_INTRO_PC_X03KCONTROLLER_INTRO.text: !58Q! {S}{*3}Alright…{*4}End of the line. {*5}Yeah, you gonna have to leave.

X0301K_MOTEL_DISCOVER_FA_X03KKARA_MOTEL.text: !58T! {S}{*1}A motel… {*2}Looks like we found a place to stay…

X0301K_STREET_ANDPARK_PC_X03KKARA_SHELTE.text: !58U! {S}{*1}We need a place to stay… {*2}Do you know anywhere we could spend the night?

X0301K_STREET_COMFORT_PC_X03KKARA_STAGE2.text: !58W! {S}{*1}Alice, you're freezing cold. {*2}We need to hurry up and find somewhere.

X0301K_STREET_COMFORT_PC_X03KKARA_STAGE3.text: !58Y! {S}{*1}Alice, you're freezing cold. {*2}We need to hurry up and find somewhere.
!591! {S}{*1}Alice, you're freezing cold. {*3}We need to hurry up and find somewhere.

X0305K_SQUAT_COOLHOUSE_FA_X03KKARA_FENCE.text: !597! {S}{*1}Don't worry, we're just having a look.

X0305K_SQUAT_COOLHOUSE_FA_X03KKARA_SCRAT.text: !598! {S}{*1}Yes, it's just a scratch. Be careful.

X0301K_SQUAT_DISCOVER_PC_X03KKARA_THOUGH.text: !59A! {S}{*1}An abandoned house… {*2}At least we'd be out of the rain… {*3}I know… {*4}But, it's just for one night and no one will look for us here…

X0303K_STATION_ALICE_PC_X03KKARA_DIVERSI.text: !59C! {S}{*1}Alice, I need your help. {*2}You see those cans over there? {*3}I want you to go over and knock them down. {*4}Please. {*5}Alice, just trust me.
