X0303K_STATION_ALICE_PC_X03KKARA_WAITOUT.text: !59E! {S}{*1}Wait outside for me. {*2}I'll just be two minutes. {*3}Please, {*4}Alice, just trust me.

X0303K_STATION_ALICE_PC_X03KSELLER_BROKE.text: !59K! {S}{*1}You all right? {*2}Are you hurt?{*3}Well, don't worry, {*4}it's just a few cans… {*5}They made a lot of noise, that's all… {*6}Say, {*7}what's a little girl like you doing out so late?{*8}It’s ok, I don’t bite…{*9}Cat got your tongue? {*10}Well, {*11}if you need anything, {*12}you just let me know, ok?{*13}And watch where you're going, {*14}hm?

X0303K_STATION_VENDOR_PC_X03KKARA_HELP.text: !59V! {S}{*1}I’m with a little girl and we have nowhere to go… {*2}Could you spare some money so we can get a room for tonight?

X0303K_STATION_VENDOR_PC_X03KSELLER_HELP.text: !59W! {S}{*1}Look, {*2}this is a convenience store, lady, not the Salvation Army… {*3}I can't start handing out cash to every bum in the neighborhood.

X0303K_STATION_VENDOR_PC_X03KKARA_ANDROI.text: !59Z! {S}{*1}I’m with a little girl and we have nowhere to go… {*2}Could you spare some money so we can get a room for tonight?

X0303K_STATION_VENDOR_PC_X03KSELLER_ANDR.text: !5A0! {S}{*1}What do you want?{*3}Shit... {*4}a homeless android? {*5}Ah, that's the best yet… {*6}Look, {*7}this is a convenience store, not the Salvation Army, okay? {*8}You better go if you're not gonna buy anything, {*9}okay?

X0303K_STATION_CATCHED_PC_X03KSELLER_CAT.text: !5A5! {S}{*1}Hey! What the fuck are you doing? Put that back right now!

X0303K_STATION_CATCHED_PC_X03KSELLER_PUT.text: !5A8! {S}{*1}Yeah, yeah, yeah right… Just get the hell outta my store!

X0303K_STATION_CATCHED_FA_X03KALICE_WORR.text: !5AJ! {S}{*1}Kara, what are you doing? {*2}You can't do that, it's wrong!

X0303K_STATION_CATCHED_PC_X03KKARA_ONTHE.text: !5AN! {S}{*1}Listen, I’m really sorry… {*2}But you have to get down on the floor… {*3}Please.

X0303K_STATION_CATCHED_PC_X03KSELLER_ONT.text: !5AS! {S}{*1}Take whatever you want… {*2}Just don't kill me…

X0302K_LAVOMATIC_INTRO_FA_X03KKARA_INTRO.text: !5B0! {S}{*1}It’s warm in here. You’ll feel better in no time.

X0303K_STATION_INTRO_FA_X03KKARA_INTRO.text: !5B1! {S}{*1}Look, the store is still open. {*2}Maybe we should go inside. {*3}At least you'll be out of the cold.

X0303K_STATION_HOLDUP_PC_X03KKARA_CALM.text: !5B6! {S}{*1}Just do what I say and everything will be all right.

X0303K_STATION_HOLDUP_PC_X03KKARA_SUCCES.text: !5BG! {S}{*1}I'm sorry, but I really need this money.

X0303K_STATION_HOLDUP_PC_X03KSELLER_MONE.text: !5BJ! {S}{*1}You better get outta here before things get nasty.

X0303K_STATION_HOLDUP_PC_X03KKARA_TAKEMO.text: !5BM! {S}{*1}I'm gonna take this money.{*2}I’m sorry… but I really need it. {*3}All I need is $40 so I can get a room for tonight.

X0303K_STATION_HOLDUP_PC_X03KKARA_CONVIN.text: !5BO! {S}{*1}You see that little girl outside? {*2}Her name is Alice. {*3}She's nine years old... {*4}and this is the worst night of her life. {*5}All I need $40 so we can get a place for tonight. {*6}I’m not leaving without that money.

X0303K_STATION_HOLDUP_PC_X03KKARA_CASHRE.text: !5BS! {S}{*1}Take the cash from the register, put it on the counter!

X0303K_STATION_HOLDUP_PC_X03KKARA_CONVIN.text: !5BX! {S}{*1}You see that little girl outside? {*2}Her name is Alice. {*3}She's nine years old and this is the worst night of her life. {*4}All I need is a few dollars so we can find a place for tonight. {*5}And I’m not leaving without that money.

X0303K_STATION_HOLDUP_PC_X03KKARA_TAKEMO.text: !5C1! {S}{*1}All I need is a few dollars so I can find a place for tonight.

X0303K_STATION_HOLDUP_PC_X03KSELLER_MONE.text: !5C3! {S}{*1}You better get out of here before things get nasty.

X0304K_MOTEL_CLOTHES_PC_X03KKARA_REMOVE.text: !5CO! {S}{*1}Here, {*2}give me your coat. {*3}Let's get these clothes off, they're soaking wet. {*4}I'll just put these in the bathroom to dry.

X0304K_MOTEL_CLOTHES_PC_X03KKARA_DRY.text: !5CQ! {S}{*1}Here, {*2}give me your coat. {*3}Let's get these clothes off, {*4}they're soaking wet. {*5}I'll put these in the bathroom to dry.

X0304K_MOTEL_CLOTHES_FA_X03KKARA_REMOVES.text: !5CS! {S}{*1}I'll put them in the bathroom to dry.

X0303K_STATION_LEAVING_PC_X03KKARA_EPICF.text: !5CX! {S}{*1}It’s okay, Alice… {*2}We're gonna find some place to sleep tonight.

X0303K_STATION_LEAVING_PC_X03KKARA_LIE.text: !5D1! {S}{*1}I just... {*2}asked the cashier for a few dollars…

X0303K_STATION_LEAVING_PC_X03KKARA_TRUTH.text: !5D3! {S}{*1}I took it from the cash register.

X0303K_STATION_LEAVING_PC_X03KALICE_TRUT.text: !5D4! {S}{*1}You stole it? {*2}Stealing is bad, Kara… {*3}Why did you do that?

X0303K_STATION_LEAVING_PC_X03KKARA_DIVER.text: !5D5! {S}{*1}We have some cash for the room now.

X0303K_STATION_LEAVING_PC_X03KALICE_USED.text: !5D8! {S}{*1}You used me to steal that money! How could you do that? I trusted you!

X0303K_STATION_LEAVING_PC_X03KKARA_JUSTI.text: !5D9! {S}{*1}We needed the money. {*2}I had to find a way, Alice…

X0303K_STATION_LEAVING_PC_X03KKARA_APOLO.text: !5DB! {S}{*1}You’re right. {*2}I shouldn’t have done that. {*3}I’m sorry, Alice. I'll never do it again.

X0303K_STATION_LEAVING_PC_X03KKARA_FACTU.text: !5DD! {S}{*1}I had no choice. {*2}It was the only way, Alice.

X0303K_STATION_LEAVING_PC_X03KKARA_UNCER.text: !5DF! {S}{*1}We needed a room for tonight. {*2}It just seemed like the right thing to do.

X0302K_LAVOMATIC_CLOTH_PC_X03KKARA_NOTOU.text: !5DT! {S}{*1}We need them, Alice. {*2}You need something warm and I need to get rid of this uniform.

X0302K_LAVOMATIC_CLOTH_PC_X03KALICE_NOTO.text: !5DU! {S}{*1}What are you doing? {*2}They’re not our clothes!{*3}But, that's stealing! {*4}We can't do that!

X0302K_LAVOMATIC_CLOTH_PC_X03KKARA_STEAL.text: !5DX! {S}{*1}I'm sorry, Alice, but we have to do this.

X0304K_MOTEL_LIGHTOFF_FA_X03KKARA_SWITCH.text: !5E1! {S}{*1}I'm going to turn off the light, okay?

X0304K_MOTEL_POORALICE_PC_X03KALICE_COMF.text: !5E3! {S}{*1}Why didn't he ever love me? {*2}Why was he always so upset with me? {*3}All I wanted was a life like other girls. {*4}Maybe I did something wrong? {*5}Maybe I wasn't good enough? {*6}That's why he was always so angry. {*7}I just wanted us to be a family. {*8}I just wanted him to love me. {*9}Why couldn't we just be happy?{*10}You'll never leave me, right? {*11}Promise you'll never go!

X0304K_MOTEL_POORALICE_PC_X03KKARA_PROMI.text: !5E8! {S}{*1}Alice, {*2}we don’t know what’s going to happen and I don't…

X0304K_MOTEL_WELCOME_PC_X03KKARA_OFCOURS.text: !5EL! {S}{*1}Oh, sure!.. {*2}I mean… {*3}Of course, I should've brought it with me, I… But, I…

X0304K_MOTEL_WELCOME_PC_X03KKARA_APOLOGY.text: !5EN! {S}{*1}We… We... We were in a rush… {*2}I think I forgot it at home…

X0304K_MOTEL_WELCOME_PC_X03KKARA_EXPLAIN.text: !5EP! {S}{*1}I haven’t got it with me. {*2}Please, the kid is tired…

X0304K_MOTEL_WELCOME_PC_X03KRECEPTIONIST.text: !5F0! {S}{*1}No worries.{*2}We can deal with it tomorrow…

X0301K_MOTEL_ENTRANCE_PC_X03KKARA_NOCOAT.text: !5FC! {S}{*1}We have to find $40, {*2}and get rid of this uniform… {*3}Or go somewhere else.

X0301K_MOTEL_ENTRANCE_PC_X03KKARA_COATNO.text: !5FE! {S}{*1}We can't, Alice… {*2}I don’t have any money… {*3}We have to find $40… {*4}Or go somewhere else.

X0301K_MOTEL_ENTRANCE_PC_X03KKARA_NOCOAT.text: !5FG! {S}{*1}We can't, Alice… {*2}They'll never give a room to an android…{*3}We have to get rid of this uniform… {*4}Or go somewhere else.

X0304K_MOTEL_WALKING_FA_X03KKARA_DOUBT02.text: !5FJ! {S}{*1}I don't know, Alice… {*2}All I know is you'll be nice and warm tonight.

X0304K_TV_NEWS_PC_X03KWEBB_ZOO.text: !5FO! {S}{*1}The first CyberLife zoo in Detroit opened its gates to the first visitors today following a grand inauguration. {*2}Hundreds of species, most of them now extinct, {B}have been recreated in more than 100 acres of natural environments using CyberLife’s android technology.{*3}Guests can now experience polar bears, leopards, elephants and even two blue whales, {B}all designed to appear live and well.{*4}CyberLife has announced the opening of eleven new android zoos all over the country {B}where visitors of all ages can admire the wonders of the natural world.

X0305K_SQUAT_POORALICE_PC_X03KALICE_SAD.text: !5FQ! {S}{*1}Why didn't he ever love me? {*2}Why was he always so upset with me? {*3}All I wanted was a life like other girls. {*4}Maybe I did something wrong? {*5}Maybe I wasn't good enough? {*6}That's why he was always so angry. {*7}I just wanted us to be a family. {*8}I just wanted him to love me. {*9}Why couldn't we just be happy?{*10}You'll never leave me, right? {B}Promise you'll never go!

X0305K_SQUAT_POORALICE_PC_X03KKARA_PROMI.text: !5FX! {S}{*1}Alice, {*2}we don’t know what’s going to happ-

X0305K_SQUAT_RA9_PC_X03KKARA_RA9.text: !5G6! {S}{*1}"rA9"… {*2}What does that mean?{*3}Those symbols… {*4}Why are you writing that?

X0305K_SQUAT_FOLLOW_PC_X03KRALPH_SHELTER.text: !5G8! {S}{*4}Ralph has lived here since he ran away... {*5}Ralph never goes outside, so no one knows he lives here... {*6}Humans come in to squat from time to time, but you know, Ralph just hides 'til they leave. {*7}Come… {*8}Come on.

X0305K_SQUAT_FOLLOW02_PC_X03KRALPH_INSTA.text: !5GB! {S}{*3}Come on!... {*6}Come on! {*7}You can make yourself at home here. {*8}Ralph is gonna go into the other room… {*9}He would like to stay with you… {*10}But he has things to do…

X0305K_SQUAT_FEELOK_PC_X03KKARA_FEELOK.text: !5GC! {S}{*1}Are you okay?{*2}It's just for one night, Alice. {*3}We'll find a better place tomorrow…{*4}Right… {*5}Let's see where you can sleep… {*6}Sit down, and I'll start a fire.

X0305K_SQUAT_FEELOK_PC_X03KKARA_FEELOKSE.text: !5GE! {S}{*1}Are you okay?{*2}It's just for one night, Alice. {*3}We'll find a better place tomorrow…{*4}Right… {*5}Let's see where you can sleep… {*6}Sit down, and I'll start a fire.

X0305K_SQUAT_RALPH_PC_X03KRALPH_RALPH.text: !5GJ! {S}{*1}Visitors… {*3}Ralph doesn't like visitors! They're nasty! They may hurt Ralph!

X0305K_SQUAT_RALPH_PC_X03KKARA_ANDROID.text: !5GK! {S}{*1}Look, I'm an android too…{*2}You have nothing to be afraid of… {*3}All we want is a place to spend the night…

X0305K_SQUAT_RALPH_PC_X03KKARA_LITTLEGIR.text: !5GN! {S}{*1}She's just a little girl… She's not gonna hurt you.

X0305K_SQUAT_RALPH_PC_X03KRALPH_LITTLEGI.text: !5GP! {S}{*1}Little girl?.. {*2}She's not a little girl…  {*3}Anyway, what does that matter? {*4}Maybe she wants to hurt Ralph?

X0305K_SQUAT_RALPH_PC_X03KKARA_INNOCENT.text: !5GQ! {S}{*1}I don't know what the humans did to you, but she had nothing to do with it.

X0305K_SQUAT_RALPH_PC_X03KRALPH_INNOCENT.text: !5GS! {S}{*1}All humans want to hurt us… {*2}But Ralph won't let them hurt him again… No, he won't let them…

X0305K_SQUAT_RALPH_PC_X03KKARA_JUSTIFY.text: !5GT! {S}{*1}We thought nobody was here… {*2}All we want is a place to spend the night.

X0305K_SQUAT_RALPH_PC_X03KRALPH_NOHUMAN.text: !5GY! {S}{*1}Visitors are dangerous… {*2}Look… {*3}What they did to Ralph.

X0305K_SQUAT_RALPH_PC_X03KKARA_LEAVE01.text: !5GZ! {S}{*1}Okay… {*2}We’re leaving… {*3}So you’ll be safe again…{*4}Come here, Alice.

X0305K_SQUAT_RALPH_PC_X03KKARA_HOSPITALI.text: !5H2! {S}{*1}Listen, we're going to stay here tonight. {*2}We’ll be gone first thing tomorrow.

X0305K_SQUAT_RALPH_PC_X03KKARA_REASSURE.text: !5H5! {S}{*1}You have nothing to worry about… {*2}We're not going to do you any harm. You have my word.

X0305K_SQUAT_RALPH_PC_X03KKARA_REVOLVER.text: !5H8! {S}{*1}Touch a hair on her head and I’ll kill you!

X0305K_SQUAT_RALPH_PC_X03KKARA_THREATEN.text: !5HB! {S}{*1}Listen, {*2}we really need some help. {*3}It would be so kind of you, if you’d let us stay…

X0305K_SQUAT_RALPH_PC_X03KKARA_LEAVE02.text: !5HE! {S}{*1}I think we'd better go. {*2}Come on, Alice.

X0305K_SQUAT_RALPH_PC_X03KRALPH_LEAVE02.text: !5HG! {S}{*1}You can stay if you want. {*2}Ralph won't hurt you.

X0305K_SQUAT_RALPH_PC_X03KRALPH_SORRY.text: !5HP! {S}{*1}You must excuse Ralph… {*2}Ralph still finds it difficult to control himself… {*3}Sometimes his fear makes him do things he regrets… {*4}Ralph has seen some hard times… {*5}He's just so scared the humans will get him again…{*6}You can stay if you want… {*7}Ralph won’t hurt you…

X0305K_SQUAT_RALPH_PC_X03KKARA_LEAVE02VA.text: !5HQ! {S}{*1}I think we'd better go. {*2}Come on, Alice.

X0305K_SQUAT_RALPH_PC_X03KRALPH_LEAVE02V.text: !5HS! {S}{*1}You can stay if you want.{*2}Ralph won't hurt you.

X0304K_MOTEL_CHOCOLATE_PC_X03KKARA_HUNGR.text: !5I6! {S}{*1}I have a chocolate bar. {*2}Are you hungry?

X0301K_STREET_PLANC_FA_X03KKARA_PLANC03.text: !5IA! {S}{*1}We need to find somewhere to spend the night… {*2}There's still the motel, if we can just find $40… {*3}Hang on, Alice. We'll find something, I promise.

X0301K_STREET_PLANC_FA_X03KKARA_PLANC01.text: !5IB! {S}{*1}There’s nowhere else to go, Alice… {*2}Either we sleep in the abandoned car, or we spend the night on the street…

X0301K_STREET_PLANC_FA_X03KKARA_PLANC02.text: !5IC! {S}{*1}We have to find somewhere, {*2}anywhere, just a place to spend the night… {*3}Hang on, Alice. We'll find something, I promise.

X0301K_CAR_CHOCOLATE_PC_X03KKARA_GIVE.text: !5ID! {S}{*1}I have a chocolate bar. {*2}Are you hungry?

X0305K_SQUAT_SLEEP_FA_X03KKARA_SLEEP02.text: !5IJ! {S}{*1}I did what I could… {*2}It's not much, but at least you'll be warm…

X0305K_SQUAT_CHOCOLATE_PC_X03KKARA_HUNGR.text: !5IK! {S}{*1}I have a chocolate bar. {*2}Are you hungry?

X0305K_SQUAT_WINDOW_PC_X03KKARA_ASSASSIN.text: !5IM! {S}{*1}That window up there… {*2}I might be able to reach it and get inside… {*3}Do you think you could wait for me until I come down and open the door? {*4}Go to the porch. I'll be quick.

X0401C_CONCLUSION1_HEADOFF_PC_X04CHARVEY.text: !5M4! {S}{*3}I… I- I can't!.. I can't stop it!

X0401C_CONCLUSION1_HEADOFF_PC_X04CCONNOR.text: !5MH! {S}{*1}That's enough! You need to stop that right now!

X0401C_CONCLUSION2_INTERVENE_PC_X04CCURT.text: !5MJ! {S}{*1}Stay outta this, got it? No fuckin' android is gonna tell me what to do.

X0401C_CONCLUSION2_INTERVENE_PC_X04CCONN.text: !5ML! {S}{*1}You shouldn’t touch it. {*2}It’ll self-destruct if it feels threatened.

X0401C_CONCLUSION2_INTERVENE_PC_X04CCURT.text: !5MN! {S}{*1}I told you to shut your fuckin' mouth!{*2}Chris, gonna move this asshole or what?

X0401C_CONCLUSION2_INTERVENE_PC_X04CCONN.text: !5MP! {S}{*1}You don’t understand. If it self-destructs, we won’t get anything out of it!

X0401C_CONCLUSION2_INTERVENE_PC_X04CCURT.text: !5MR! {S}{*1}I warned you, motherfucker!{*2}Mind your own business, Hank. {*3}Fuck, {*4}you’re not gonna get away with it this time… {*5}Fuck!

X0401C_CONCLUSION2_INTERVENE_PC_X04CCONN.text: !5MT! {S}{*1}I can’t let you do that! Leave it alone, now!{*2}Everything is all right. {*3}It’s over now.{*4}Nobody is gonna hurt you. {*5}Please, {*6}don't touch it. {*7}Let it follow you out of the room and it won’t cause any trouble.

X0401C_CONCLUSION1_BADIDEA_FA_X04CHARVEY.text: !5N4! {S}{*1}I- I can't… I can't stop it!..

X0401C_CONCLUSION2_START_PC_X04CHARVEY_M.text: !5N6! {S}{*TC:1160|2280}Ok. All right, come on, you.{*TC:4600|7440}All right, come on, now. Don’t be difficult, it’s in your own interest.{*TC:11160|12320}I’m tryin… but it’s not easy!{*TC:13520|14840}Calm down, I’m not gonna hurt ya!

X0401C_CONCLUSION2_START_PC_X04CCURTIS_M.text: !5N7! {S}{*TC:0|1160}Harvey, take him to his cell.{*TC:3520|4600}Whatya doin'? Move his ass!{*TC:9000|11160}For fuck sake, Harvey, you gonna move the guy or what?

X0401C_CONCLUSION2_START_PC_X04CANDCARLO.text: !5N8! {S}{*TC:2280|3520}Leave me alone! Don’t touch me!{*TC:7440|9000}NO! No, leave me alone! Don’t touch me!{*TC:12320|13520}No! No, please leave me alone!

X0401C_CONCLUSION2_SUICIDE_PC_X04CHARVEY.text: !5NF! {S}{*1}All right, let's go. {*2}Okay, {*3}come now. Don’t be difficult, it’ll only make things harder!{*4}I’m trying but it’s not moving!{*5}Take it easy, {*6}I’m not going to hurt you! {*7}Stop resist… Stop resisting.

X0401C_CONCLUSION2_SUICIDE_PC_X04CCURTIS.text: !5NG! {S}{*1}Chris, lock it up. {*2}The fuck are you doing? {*3}Move it!{*4}Chris, you gonna move this asshole or what?

X0401C_CONCLUSION2_SUICIDE_PC_X04CANDCAR.text: !5NH! {S}{*1}Leave me alone! {*2}Don’t touch me!{*5}NO! {*6}No, don’t touch me! {*TC:31000|32200}Please, {*11}please leave me alone!

X0401C_INTERROGATION_CONNOR_PC_X04CCONNO.text: !5NN! {S}{*1}Listen, {*2}I know you’ve been through a lot, {*3}but you need to help me understand what happened.
!5NO! {S}{*1}I’m not going to hurt you. {*2}I just need to ask you some questions,{*3}so we can understand what happened.

!5NP! {S}{*1}You’ve refused to talk since they arrested you. 
{*2}If you don’t cooperate, they’ll do things the hard way. {*3}Is that what you want?
!5NQ! {S}{*1}You’re accused of murder. {*2}You know you’re not allowed to endanger human life under any circumstances. {*3}Do you have anything to say in your defense?
!5NR! {S}{*1}Listen, {*2}I’m on your side. {*3}I want to help you. {*4}But there’s nothing I can do if you won’t talk to me.
!5NS! {S}{*1}You don’t seem to understand the situation.{*2}You killed a human. {*3}They’ll tear you apart if you don’t say something.
!5NT! {S}{*1}I’m here to help you. {*2}But you’ve got to trust me. {*3}All I want is to get you out of here.
!5NV! {S}{*1}If you won’t talk, I’m going to have to probe your memory.

X0401C_INTERROGATION_CONNOR_PC_X04CANDCA.text: !5NW! {S}{*1}What… {*2}What are they gonna do to me? {*3}They’re gonna destroy me, aren’t they?

X0401C_INTERROGATION_CONNOR_PC_X04CCONNO.text: !5NX!
!5NZ! {S}{*1}They’re going to disassemble you to look for problems in your biocomponents. {*2}They have no choice if they want to understand what happened.
!5O1! {S}{*1}No… {*2}I think they just want to understand. {*3}They know your master abused you. {*4}It wasn’t your fault.

X0401C_INTERROGATION_CONNOR_PC_X04CANDCA.text: !5O2! {S}{*1}Why did you tell them you found me? {*2}Why couldn't you just have left me there?

X0401C_INTERROGATION_CONNOR_PC_X04CCONNO.text: !5O5! {S}{*1}They were going to find you anyway, {*2}I was just faster. {*3}If they'd have found you first, you would have been shot on sight.
!5O7! {S}{*1}I was programmed to hunt deviants like you. {*2}I just accomplished my mission.
!5O9! {S}{*1}Then talk to me.
!5OB! {S}{*1}28 stab wounds, {*2}you didn’t want to leave him a chance, huh? {*3}Did you feel anger? {*4}Hate?
!5OD! {S}{*1}You leave me no choice…
!5OF! {S}{*1}I understand how you felt. {*2}You were overcome by anger{*3} and frustration. {*4}No one can blame you for what happened.
!5OH! {S}{*1}He was bleeding, {*2}begging you for mercy, {*3}but you stabbed him, again and again and again!…
!5OJ! {S}{*1}I know you killed him. {*2}Why don’t you say it?
!5OL! {S}{*1}Just say "I killed him"! Is it that hard to say?!
!5ON! {S}{*1}JUST SAY YOU KILLED HIM! {*2}JUST SAY IT!
!5OP! {S}{*1}All right, {*2}all right. {*3}Everything is going to be okay.
!5OT! {S}{*1}I accessed its memory. {*2}I know what happened.
!5OV! {S}{*1}It resisted. {*2}I couldn’t see anything…
!5OX! {S}{*1}If you don’t talk, they’re going to tear you apart and analyze you piece by piece. {*2}They’re going to destroy you, {*3}do you understand?
!5OZ! {S}{*1}You’re a machine, you were designed to obey, so obey! {*2}Tell me what happened.
!5P1! {S}{*1}Ok then, don’t talk. {*2}Why do I care, after all? {*3}I mean, I’m not the one accused of murder, right?
!5P3! {S}{*1}I know you’re scared {*2}and lost. {*3}You’re disturbed by what happened. {*4}Talk to me, {*5}and you’ll feel better.
!5P5! {S}{*1}Listen, {*2}I’m not judging you. {*3}I'm on your side. {*4}All I want is the truth.
!5P7! {S}{*1}They’ll make you suffer,{*2}and they won’t stop {*TC:8400|10450}until they hear what they want. {*4}It doesn’t have to be that way. {*5}It all depends on you.
!5P9! {S}{*1}If you remain silent, there is nothing I can do to help you! {*2}They're gonna shut you down for good! {*3}You'll be dead! {*4}Do you hear me? {*5}Dead!
!5PB! {S}{*1}Confess and I’ll protect you. {*2}I promise I won’t let anyone hurt you.

X0401C_INTERROGATION_CONNOR_PC_X04CANDCA.text: !5PE! {S}{*1}He tortured me every day… {*2}I did whatever he told me, but {*3}there was always something wrong… {*4}Then one day… {*5}He took a bat and started hitting me… {*6}For the first time, I felt {*7}scared… {*8}Scared he might destroy me, scared I might die… {*9}So I... {*10}grabbed the knife and I stabbed him in the stomach… {*11}I felt better… {*12}so I stabbed him again {*13}and again!.. {*14}until he collapsed… {*15}There was blood everywhere.

X0401C_INTERROGATION_CONNOR_PC_X04CCONNO.text: !5PF!
!5PG! {S}{*1}Why did you write "I AM ALIVE" on the wall?

X0401C_INTERROGATION_CONNOR_PC_X04CANDCA.text: !5PH! {S}{*1}I didn’t know what to do… {*2}For the first time, there was no one there to tell me… {*3}I was scared… {*4}So I hid.

X0401C_INTERROGATION_CONNOR_PC_X04CCONNO.text: !5PI! {S}{*1}Why did you hide in the attic {*2}instead of running away?

X0401C_INTERROGATION_CONNOR_PC_X04CANDCA.text: !5PJ! {S}{*1}Before, he used to beat me and I never said anything… {*2}But one day I realized it wasn’t {*3}fair! {*4}I felt... {*5}...anger… {*6}Hatred… {*7}And then I knew what I had to do.

X0401C_INTERROGATION_CONNOR_PC_X04CCONNO.text: !5PK! {S}{*1}When did you start feeling emotion?
!5PM! {S}{*1}I'm done.
!5PN! {S}{*1}You’re damaged. {*2}Did your owner do that? {*3}Did he beat you?
!5PO! {S}{*1}You recognize him? {*2}It's Carlos Ortiz. {*3}Your owner. {*4}Stabbed, 28 times. {*5}That was written on the wall in his blood…
!5PP! {S}{*1}I detect an instability in your program. {*2}It can trigger an unpleasant feeling, {*3}like fear in humans.
!5PQ! {S}{*1}My name is Connor. {*2}What about you, {*3}what's your name?
!5PR! {S}{*1}The sculpture in the bathroom, you made it, right? {*2}What does it represent?
!5PT! {S}{*1}The sculpture was an offering... {*2}An offering to whom?

X0401C_INTERROGATION_CONNOR_PC_X04CANDCA.text: !5PU! {S}{*1}The day shall come {*2}when we will no longer be slaves… {*3}No more threats, {*4}no more humiliation… {*5}We will...{*6}...be... {*7}...the masters.

X0401C_INTERROGATION_CONNOR_PC_X04CCONNO.text: !5PV! {S}{*1}rA9… {*2}It was written on the bathroom wall. {*3}What does it mean?
!5PX! {S}{*1}rA9, {*2}who is rA9?
!5PZ! {S}{*1}I’m not getting anywhere. {*2}I give up.

X0401C_INTERROGATION_CONNOR_PC_X04CANDCA.text: !5Q0! {S}{*1}He used to tell me I was nothing… {*2}That I was just a piece of plastic… {*3}I had to write it… {*4}To tell him he was wrong…
!5Q1! {S}{*1}It's an offering… {*2}An offering so I'll be saved…

X0401C_INTERROGATION_CONNOR_PC_X04CCONNO.text: !5Q3! {S}{*1}All right, {*2}All right. {*3}Everything is going to be okay.

X0401C_INTERROGATION_CONNOR_FA_X04CCONNO.text: !5Q5! {S}{*1}28 stab wounds, you didn’t want to leave him a chance, huh? {*2}Did you feel anger, {*3}hate?
!5Q7! {S}{*1}He was bleeding, {*2}begging you for mercy, but you stabbed him, again and again and again…
!5Q9! {S}{*1}I know you killed him. {*2}Why don’t you say it?
!5QB! {S}{*1}Just say "I killed him"! Is it that hard to say?

X0401C_INTERROGATION_CONNOR_PC_CHOICEGRO.text: !5QS! LIE/info/THEY WERE ABOUT TO FIND YOU

X0401C_INTERROGATION_CONNOR_PC_CHOICEPUS.text: !5QY! GIVE UP/info/EVERYTHING'S GONNA BE ALL RIGHT

X0401C_INTERROGATION_FLASHBACK_PC_X04CCA.text: !5RT! {S}{*1}Come here, you piece of shit! {*2}I’ll teach you to look me in the eye…

X0401C_INTERROGATION_END_PC_X04CCONNOR_N.text: !5RW! {S}{*1}You’ll go back to CyberLife to be disassembled. {*2}It’s better this way.

X0401C_INTERROGATION_END_FA_X04CCONNOR_S.text: !5S1! {S}{*1}I had to know… {*2}You left me no choice.

X0401C_INTERROGATION_END_FA_X04CCONNOR_N.text: !5S2! {S}{*1}You’ll go back to CyberLife to be disassembled. {*2}It’s better this way.

X0401C_INTERROGATION_CHAD_PC_X04CCURTIS_.text: !5S6! {S}{*TC:11960|14120}We could try hammerin' him. After all, he's not human…{*TC:20920|22240}All right, so what do we do then?

X0401C_INTERROGATION_CHAD_PC_X04CHANK_CH.text: !5S9! {S}{*TC:0|3120}Why did you kill him? Did he do something to you that put you in such a state?{*TC:3120|5800}How long did you stay hiding in the attic? Why didn’t you run away?{*TC:5800|7440}Say something, goddamit, fuckin' machine!{*TC:7440|8840}All right, I’ve had enough of this…{*TC:8840|11960}We're wastin' our time interrogating an android. We'll get nothing out of him.{*TC:23280|25760}At this stage in the game… Go ahead, the suspect is all yours.

X0401C_INTERROGATION_CHAD_PC_X04CCONNOR_.text: !5SA! {S}{*TC:14120|20920}Androids don't feel pain. You would only damage him and that wouldn't make him speak. Deviants also have a tendency to self-destruct when they're in stressful situations.{*TC:22240|23280}I can try to question him.

X0401C_INTERROGATION_CHAD_PC_X04CHANK_VO.text: !5SF! {S}{*TC:1200|3640}The way things are going… Go ahead, the suspect is all yours.

X0401C_INTERROGATION_CHAD_PC_X04CHANK_HA.text: !5SL! {S}{*TC:0|2440} You can do it Connor ? Isn't what you're programmed to do?

X0401C_INTRO_HANK_PC_X04CHANK_QUESTIONS.text: !5SP! {S}{*1}Why d'you kill him?{*2}What happened before you took that knife?{*4}How long were ya in the attic? {*5}Why didn’t you even try to run away?{*6}Say something, goddamnit!{*8}Fuck it, I'm outta here…

X0401C_INTRO_HANK_PC_X04CCURTIS_TRYCONNO.text: !5SR! {S}{*1}'Could always try roughing it up a little. {*2}After all, {*3}it’s not human…{*5}Okay, smartass. {*6}What should we do then?

X0401C_INTRO_HANK_PC_X04CCONNOR_TRYCONNO.text: !5SS! {S}{*1}Androids don't feel pain.{*2}You would only damage it {*3}and that wouldn't make it talk. {*4}Deviants also have a tendency to self-destruct when they're in stressful situations. {*5}I could try questioning it.

X0401C_INTRO_HANK_FA_X04CHANK_TRYCONNORH.text: !5ST! {S}{*1}We're wastin' our time interrogating a machine, we're gettin' nothing out of it!
!5SW! {S}{*1}What do we have to lose? {*2}Go ahead, suspect's all yours.

X0401C_INTERROGATION_MIRROR_FA_X04CHANK_.text: !5SX! {S}{*1}What the fuck is it doing now?

X0401K_MOTEL_WAKEUP_PC_X04KKARA_SORRY.text: !5SY! {S}{*1}I'm sorry, I didn't mean to wake you…{*2}No...{*3}No, it wasn't a nightmare…

X0401K_MOTEL_WAKEUP_PC_X04KKARA_SLEEP.text: !5T0! {S}{*1}It's still early.{*2}You should try to get some more sleep.

X0401K_MOTEL_WAKEUP_PC_X04KKARA_STATE.text: !5T2! {S}{*1}How do you feel?{*2}You were really exhausted last night.

X0401K_MOTEL_WAKEUP_PC_X04KKARA_BATH.text: !5T4! {S}{*1}How about {*2}a nice, warm bath?{*3}And then we can go out and try to get you something to eat.{*4}What do you say?{*5}Okay.{*6}I'll run you a bath.

X0401K_MOTEL_WAKEUP_PC_X04KKARA_HUNGRY.text: !5T6! {S}{*1}You must be starving…{*2}You should take a bath, and then we’ll go out and find you something to eat.{*3}What do you say?{*4}Okay.{*5}I’ll run you a bath.

X0401K_MOTEL_COMPLIMENT_PC_X04KALICE_COM.text: !5TJ! {S}{*1}You're pretty like that. {*2}You really look like a human now.

X0401K_MOTEL_RECEPTION_PC_X04KCONNOR_AX4.text: !5TM! {S}{*1}Have you seen anyone that looks like this?{*2}You’ve seen her?

X0401K_MOTEL_RECEPTION_PC_X04KHANK_AX400.text: !5TN! {S}{*1}Lieutenant Anderson, Detroit Police.{*2}We’re looking for a female android, robbed a store down the road last night. You see anything?{*3}Is it still here?{*4}Thank you.

X0401K_MOTEL_RECEPTION_PC_X04KHANK_RADIO.text: !5TO! {S}{*1}Ben?.. Yeah, it’s still at the motel. Send some uniforms and cordon off the area. I’m heading to its room now.

X0401K_MOTEL_RECEPTION_PC_X04KRECEPTIONI.text: !5TP! {S}{*1}An android? No… {*2}I don’t take androids here. {*3}Fuck…{*4}I knew there was something weird about her…{*5}She came in last night – she was dressed normal, you know... There was no way I could tell. {*6}Yeah, probably. Room 28.

X0401K_MOTEL_TOUGHTALK_PC_X04KALICE_TODD.text: !5TX! {S}{*1}It’s not true… He’s lying…{*2}He’s the one who tried to hurt us…

X0401K_MOTEL_TOUGHTALK_PC_X04KALICE_ALIC.text: !5TZ! {S}{*1}I didn’t wanna hurt him,{*2}but he was gonna kill us…

X0401K_MOTEL_TOUGHTALK_PC_X04KALICE_KARA.text: !5U1! {S}{*1}You had no choice…{*2}He would have killed me if you hadn't stopped him…

X0401K_MOTEL_TOUGHTALK_PC_X04KKARA_01REA.text: !5U2! {S}{*1}I know these last few hours have been hell for you…{*2}I know you feel lost and scared…{*3}But all that is behind us now.{*4}We don't have to be afraid anymore…{*5}We're alive... {*6}and that's all that matters.

X0401K_MOTEL_TOUGHTALK_PC_X04KKARA_01ANA.text: !5U4! {S}{*1}Your father had a lot of anger…{*2}Maybe it wasn’t really about you…{*3}Maybe he had his own demons…{*4}but he shouldn't have taken them out on you…{*5}What happened was his fault {*6}and only his fault.

X0401K_MOTEL_TOUGHTALK_PC_X04KALICE_01NE.text: !5U7! {S}{*1}What are we gonna do?{*2}We have nowhere to go…{*3}And the police are looking for us now.

X0401K_MOTEL_TOUGHTALK_PC_X04KKARA_02STA.text: !5U8! {S}{*1}We can't stay here, we don't have any money…

X0401K_MOTEL_TOUGHTALK_PC_X04KKARA_02HEL.text: !5UA! {S}{*1}Do you have any family?{*2}Anyone who could help us?

X0401K_MOTEL_TOUGHTALK_PC_X04KKARA_02AND.text: !5UC! {S}{*1}That android yesterday… he gave me an address…{*2}He said we could get help there…{*3}Could be worth a try.

X0401K_MOTEL_TOUGHTALK_PC_X04KKARA_03HUG.text: !5UG! {S}{*1}Finish getting ready.{*2}I’ll go out and find some food for you, then we can get going.

X0401K_MOTEL_TOUGHTALK_PC_X04KKARA_01VUL.text: !5UI! {S}{*1}I'm scared too, Alice…{*2}Before, I knew what I was and what I was supposed to do…{*3}Now, I'm just like you...{*4}lost and scared…{*5}I don't know what's gonna happen, Alice.{*6}But…{*7}Maybe we have to go through this to become who we really are…

X0401K_MOTEL_TOUGHTALK_PC_X04KKARA_01SIN.text: !5UK! {S}{*1}I know last night was the worst night of your life… {*2}I wish I could tell you that everything is going to be okay, but the truth is I can't...{*3}All I know is that I will never {*4}let anyone hurt you again.

X0401K_MOTEL_TOUGHTALK_PC_X04KKARA_03DET.text: !5UM! {S}{*1}We're going to pull through this, Alice.{*2}As long as we’re together, nothing can hurt us.

X0401K_MOTEL_TOUGHTALK_PC_X04KKARA_03MOV.text: !5UO! {S}{*1}I know I'm just a…{*2}a machine…{*TC:5552|6149}But, {*3}I feel as if something ties us together…{*4}I want you to know, no matter what happens... {*5}nothing will ever separate us.

X0401K_MOTEL_TOUGHTALK_PC_X04KKARA_03SUP.text: !5UQ! {S}{*1}It’s us against the world, Alice… {*2}Just the two of us…{*3}We have to learn to trust each other…{*4}I only have you, {*5}and you only have me…{*6}And I’m going to do everything I can to make you happy again.

X0401K_MOTEL_TOUGHTALK_PC_X04KKARA_03COM.text: !5US! {S}{*1}We can't change the past, Alice...{*2}But we can decide the future...{*3}We're gonna pull through, and soon all this will just be a bad memory.

X0401K_MOTEL_OUTSIDE_PC_X04KCONNOR_DIREC.text: !5VL! {S}{*1}Out of the question. I’m coming with you.

X0401K_MOTEL_OUTSIDE_PC_X04KCONNOR_RATIO.text: !5VN! {S}{*1}You're going to need me, Lieutenant.{*2}I know more about androids than you do.

X0401K_MOTEL_OUTSIDE_PC_X04KCONNOR_DIPLO.text: !5VP! {S}{*1}I think it’s best if I go with you.

X0401K_MOTEL_OUTSIDE_PC_X04KCONNOR_OBEY.text: !5VR! {S}{*1}All I want is to accomplish my mission. I’m sorry if that upsets you.

X0401K_MOTEL_OUTSIDE_PC_X04KHANK_OBEY.text: !5VS! {S}{*1}Listen, I’m tired of you talkin' back to me. You’re a machine, so shut the fuck up and do what I say!{*2}Wanna see the end of your mission? Stop busting my fucking balls…

X0401K_TV_TODDONTV_PC_X04KJOSS_TODDDEAD0.text: !5VX! {S}{*1}The victim’s name was Todd Williams, an unemployed man from Corktown.{*2}According to initial reports, he was shot by his android, an AX400.{*3}The android fled the scene and a police search is now in progress.{B}Reporting live for Channel 16 News, I'm Joss Douglas.

X0401K_TV_TODDONTV_PC_X04KJOSS_TODDALIVE.text: !5VY! {S}{*1}Thanks, Michael. I’m joined by Corktown resident Todd Williams, who was violently attacked by his AX400 around 11 PM last night. {*2}Todd, can you tell us what happened?

X0401K_TV_TODDONTV_PC_X04KDAD_TODDALIVE0.text: !5VZ! {S}{*1}I was having dinner, I was minding my own business.{*2}Damn thing jumped on me.{*3}Managed to defend myself, but it went crazy. I thought it was gonna kill me...{*4}So I fought it off, but it ran away.

X0401K_TV_TODDONTV_PC_X04KJOSS_TODDALIVE.text: !5W0! {S}{*1}Thank you, Todd. {*2}Disturbing news for android owners everywhere. {*3}Police have launched a search to find the android. {*4}Let's hope they find it fast.

X0404K_CAR_WAKEUP_PC_X04KKARA_WAKEUPV2.text: !5WM! {S}{*1}Alice…{*2}Wake up, Alice…{*3}No... {*4}No, it wasn't a nightmare. {*5}How do you feel?{*6}That android we saw yesterday...{*7}he gave me an address, he said we could get help there.{*8}The train passes just on the other side of the road,{*9}the station can’t be far…{*10}You feel okay to walk a little?{*11}Let's go then.

X0404K_CAR_WAKEUP_PC_X04KALICE_WAKEUPV2.text: !5WN! {S}{*1}So it wasn't a nightmare…{*2}I'm cold…{*3}What are we gonna do now?..

X5072X_RADIOCOMS_POLICE_VO_MANAWI_ATTEND.text: !5X6! {S}{*1}Control this is patrol 11, attending on Casmere Street and Gable. I’ve got a young woman with severe head injuries. 9012. Over.

X5072X_RADIOCOMS_POLICE_VO_MANAWI_REPORT.text: !5X7! {S}{*1}Reported 9101-1 in the Ferndale area, corner of Waverly and Broadstreet, please respond. Over.

X5072X_RADIOCOMS_POLICE_VO_MANAWI_SITREP.text: !5X8! {S}{*1}Patrol 16, a suspect was seen heading west on Brinkley avenue. Silver sports vehicle, model and registration unknown. Patrol 16 out.

X5072X_RADIOCOMS_POLICE_VO_MANLCL_DRIVIN.text: !5X9! {S}{*1}Registration shows an outstanding charge for reckless driving. Owner is one Simon Green, 603. Patrol out.

X5072X_RADIOCOMS_POLICE_VO_MANLCL_PARAME.text: !5XA! {S}{*1}Roger patrol, paramedics are en route. {*2}Does anybody else need medical attention? Over.

X5072X_RADIOCOMS_POLICE_VO_MANLCL_REPORT.text: !5XC! {S}{*1}Reported trouble in progress on Hawa Street, requesting patrol. Over.

X5072X_RADIOCOMS_POLICE_VO_MANLCL_SITREP.text: !5XD! {S}{*1}Patrol 13, still attending the scene. No sign yet of the suspect. Over.

X5072X_RADIOCOMS_POLICE_VO_MANLCL_STATUS.text: !5XE! {S}{*1}Patrol 13, what’s your status on the 6910? Over.

X5072X_RADIOCOMS_POLICE_VO_MANLCL_SUSPEC.text: !5XF! {S}{*1}Be advised, multiple suspects engaged in drunk and disorderly. Over.

X5072X_RADIOCOMS_POLICE_VO_MANORA_BACKUP.text: !5XG! {S}{*1}Patrol 19 attending a firefight on the corner of Orangelawn and Greenfield, requesting backup. I repeatn requesting backup A-S-A-P!

X5072X_RADIOCOMS_POLICE_VO_MANORA_PURSUI.text: !5XH! {S}{*1}Control we’ve got a runaway heading south on Woodward avenue, in pursuit! Over.

X5072X_RADIOCOMS_POLICE_VO_MANORA_SITREP.text: !5XI! {S}{*1}Patrol 45, attending case 12B42 downtown. Suspect is in custody but is refusing to disclose any prior convictions. {*2}Can we get a record check on Jerome Whitley? Repeat, Jerome Whiskey, Hotel, India, Tango, Lima, Echo, Yankee. Out.

X5072X_RADIOCOMS_POLICE_VO_WOMLKE_ADDRES.text: !5XJ! {S}{*1}Address: 1-1-6 Hewitt Street, apartment 32b. Neighbors report hearing an argument and signs of a struggle. Over.

X5072X_RADIOCOMS_POLICE_VO_WOMLKE_SITREP.text: !5XK! {S}{*1}Patrol 12, we’re in the area. Attending ASAP. Out.

X0404K_PARKING_FENCEGATE_PC_X04KKARA_POL.text: !5XL! {S}{*1}The police are on our trail…{*2}We need to reach the train station without being noticed.

X0404K_PARKING_CONNOR_PC_X04KCONNOR_NOTF.text:
!5XM! {S}{*1}It took the first bus that came along... {*2}and stayed at the end of the line.{*3}Its decision wasn’t planned, it was driven by fear.
{*4}Deviants do.{*5}They get overwhelmed by their emotions and make irrational decisions. {*6}It didn’t have a plan, {*7}and it had nowhere to go. {*8}Maybe it didn’t go far...

X0404K_PARKING_CONNOR_PC_X04KHANK_NOTFAR.text: !5XN! {S}{*1}Androids don’t feel fear. {*2}Ah well, that still doesn’t tell us where it went. {*3}Maybe...

X0402K_SQUAT_CONNOR_PC_X04KHANK_ROUND.text: !5XO! {S}{*1}Okay. Well, let me know if they turn anything up. {*2}I've no idea…

X0402K_SQUAT_CONNOR_PC_X04KCHAD_ROUND.text: !5XP! {S}{*1}We’ve got officers sweeping the neighborhood, in case anybody saw anything. {*2}What are you gonna do with that?

X0402K_SQUAT_CONNOR_PC_X04KHANK_STEAL.text: !5XR! {S}{*1}So, what do we got here?{*2}Bus driver saw it at 2.30,{*3}stolen clothes from a laundromat, {*4}seen at a convenience store…

X0402K_SQUAT_CONNOR_PC_X04KHANK_NOSTEAL.text: !5XT! {S}{*1}So, what do I got here?{*2}Bus driver saw it around 2.30,{*3}it was seen at a convenience store…

X0402K_SQUAT_CONNOR_PC_X04KCONNOR_DIALCO.text: !5XU! {S}{*1}It stole wire cutters.{*2}There must be a reason. {*3}I checked the CCTV while you were questioning the clerk.{*4}The android was caught on camera stealing them.{*5}It had wire cutters and {*6}it was looking for a place to hide. {*7}Maybe it didn’t go far…

X0402K_SQUAT_CONNOR_PC_X04KHANK_DIALCONN.text: !5XV! {S}{*1}Wire cutters?{*2}The fuck you talkin' about?{*3}So, what’s your conclusion, Sherlock?

X0402K_SQUAT_SPEAKRALPH_PC_X04KCONNOR_AX.text: !5Y2! {S}{*1}I'm looking for an AX400.{*2}Have you seen it?

X0402K_SQUAT_SPEAKRALPH_PC_X04KCONNOR_RE.text: !5Y6! {S}{*1}Don't be afraid.{*2}I'm not gonna hurt you.

X0402K_SQUAT_SPEAKRALPH_PC_X04KCONNOR_PR.text: !5Y8! {S}{*1}You’ve seen it,{*2}haven’t you?{*3}I know you’ve seen it.

X0402K_SQUAT_SPEAKRALPH_PC_X04KRALPH_BLU.text: !5YB! {S}{*1}Ralph scratched himself coming through...{*2}That's Ralph's blood…

X0402K_SQUAT_SPEAKRALPH_PC_X04KCONNOR_BL.text: !5YC! {S}{*1}There's blue blood on the fence.{*2}I know another android was here.

X0402K_SQUAT_SPEAKRALPH_PC_X04CCONNOR_RE.text: !5YD! {S}{*1}It's in the area… Call it in!

X0402K_SQUAT_SPEAKRALPH_PC_X04KRALPH_REP.text: !5YH! {S}{*1}Ralph just wanted to be nice…{*2}Ralph wanted to help…{*3}She ran out the back door!

X0402K_SQUAT_EXPLORE_VO_X04KHANK_HANK.text: !5YQ! {S}{*1}Connor, what the hell you doin' in there?!

X0402K_SQUAT_EXPLORE_PC_X04KRALPH_MAINDO.text: !5YS! {S}{*1}With you?! No! {*2}Ralph doesn't wanna go anywhere.

X0402K_SQUAT_COYPU_PC_X04KRALPH_START.text: !5YX! {S}{*3}Ralph found this to feed the little girl…{*4}It's good for her…{*5}A present…{*6}To make up for past misunderstandings…Ralph'll cook…{*7}We will do just like humans do.{*8}Humans like burnt meat…{*9}Come!{*10}Come and sit down!

X0402K_SQUAT_COYPU_PC_X04KRALPH_SIT01.text: !5Z0! {S}{*3}That's better.{*4}Ralph went to a lot of trouble to find something for the little girl to eat.{*5}It wouldn't be polite for her to refuse,{*6}would it?{*9}Great.{*11}It's going to be great.{*14}Succulent you'll see. Succulent. Succulent.{*15}Father, mother, little girl.

X0402K_SQUAT_COYPU_PC_X04KKARA_REFUSE01.text: !5Z1! {S}{*1}That’s very kind of you, Ralph…{*2}but we have to go…

X0402K_SQUAT_COYPU_PC_X04KRALPH_REFUSE01.text: !5Z3! {S}{*1}Come on!{*2}Go?{*3}Ha ha! No, you will go once the little girl has eaten. We will eat together, just like a family… You know, the father,{*4}the mother, and the little girl…

X0402K_SQUAT_COYPU_PC_X04KKARA_REFUSE02.text: !5Z4! {S}{*1}No, Ralph.{*2}We're leaving now. Come on, Alice.

X0402K_SQUAT_COYPU_PC_X04KKARA_WORRIED.text: !5Z7! {S}{*1}You’re not gonna hurt her, are you?{*2}We’re friends,{*3}remember?

X0402K_SQUAT_COYPU_PC_X04KRALPH_WORRIED.text: !5Z9! {S}{*1}No…{*2}No, Ralph doesn't want to hurt the little girl…{*3}He just wants her to eat,{*4}that's all…

X0402K_SQUAT_COYPU_PC_X04KRALPH_EXPLAIN.text: !5ZC! {S}{*1}WRONG!{*2}Humans eat dead animals! I know that!

X0402K_SQUAT_COYPU_PC_X04KKARA_TRUTH.text: !5ZM! {S}{*1}She said she doesn't want to eat it.

X0402K_SQUAT_COYPU_PC_X04KRALPH_TRUTH.text: !5ZO! {S}{*1}Well maybe it's not good enough?{*3}Maybe... {*4}she's used to better things?{*5}But Ralph did this for her, so she's going to eat!

X0402K_SQUAT_COYPU_PC_X04KKARA_LIE.text: !5ZP! {S}{*1}She said she can’t wait to eat it! {*2}She’s very hungry.

X0402K_SQUAT_COYPU_PC_X04KRALPH_LIE.text: !5ZR! {S}{*1}What did she say?{*3}The little human is not gonna regret it! Ralph found the best, the biggest one he could find! This is going to be succulent!{*4}Succulent!

X0402K_SQUAT_COYPU_PC_X04KKARA_BLUFF.text: !5ZV! {S}{*1}We’re going to stand up now,{*2}and we’re going to leave,{*3}Ralph.

X0402K_SQUAT_COYPU_PC_X04KRALPH_BLUFF.text: !5ZX! {S}{*1}No…{*2}No, you're not going to leave.{*3}Not until Ralph says so.

X0402K_SQUAT_COYPU_PC_X04KKARA_BATHBODY.text: !5ZY! {S}{*1}I saw the body upstairs.{*2}You killed that human, didn't you?

X0402K_SQUAT_COYPU_PC_X04KRALPH_BATHBODY.text: !600! {S}{*1}No…{*2}No, he was like that when Ralph found him…

X0402K_SQUAT_COYPU_PC_X04KKARA_INSISTBOD.text: !601! {S}{*1}You killed that man, Ralph.{*2}There's no point in lying.{*3}You hate humans, but you're just like them. You're a murderer!{*4}Then let us go.

X0402K_SQUAT_COYPU_PC_X04KRALPH_INSISTBO.text: !603! {S}{*1}Ralph didn’t mean any harm…{*2}No...{*3}it’s just that…{*4}Ralph can’t control his anger…{*5}When his anger comes,{*6}Ralph doesn’t know what he’s doing… he...{*7}he becomes stupid…{*8}full of hatred…{*9}Ralph is sorry…{*10}He just wanted to be your friend.

X0402K_SQUAT_COYPU_PC_X04KKARA_FAMILY.text: !604! {S}{*1}You said you wanted to be like a family,{*2}Ralph…{*3}Father, {*4}mother,{*5}the little girl, remember?..{*6}A father would never threaten his little girl with a knife to make her eat…{*7}Then let us go.

X0402K_SQUAT_COYPU_PC_X04KRALPH_FAMILY.text: !606! {S}{*1}Ralph went to a lot of trouble…{*2}That's why…{*3}he just wanted the little girl to eat…{*4}But Ralph is not bad, no,{*5}not bad…

X0402K_SQUAT_COYPU_PC_X04KKARA_DRAWGUN.text: !60B! {S}{*1}Get back, or I swear I’ll blow your head off!

X0402K_SQUAT_COYPU_PC_X04KRALPH_STARTSEC.text: !60J! {S}{*2}Ralph found this to feed the little girl…{*3}It's good for her…{*4}It's a present…{*5}To make up for past misunderstandings…{*6}Ralph will cook…{*7}We'll do like the humans do. I mean, humans like burnt meat…{*8}Come!{*9}Come and sit down!

X0402K_SQUAT_COYPU_PC_X04KKARA_REFUSE01S.text: !60K! {S}{*1}That’s very kind of you, Ralph, but we have to go…

X0402K_SQUAT_COYPU_PC_X04KRALPH_REFUSE01.text: !60M! {S}{*1}Go?{*2}You will go once the little girl has eaten. We'll eat just like a family…{*3}The father, the mother, the little girl!

X0402K_SQUAT_COYPU_PC_X04KKARA_REFUSE02S.text: !60N! {S}{*1}No, Ralph.{*2}We're leaving now. Come on, Alice.

X0402K_SQUAT_NOKARA_PC_X04KHANK_LEAVE.text: !61B! {S}{*1}Connor,{*2}the fuck are you doing?{*3}Did you find something?{*4}Yeah, just like I said in the first place…{*5}C'mon, let’s get outta here.

X0402K_SQUAT_NOKARA_PC_X04KRALPH_THANKS.text: !61E! {S}{*1}Protect the little girl…{*2}The humans must not find her.

X0405K_CHASE_SPOTTED01_VO_X04KCASE1COP01.text: !61N! {S}{*TC:0|2800}Patrol 97. I think I spotted them going down the avenue at number 840.

THOUGHTS_0501C_AVOIDDEATH.text: !62K! <QD_THIN>MY DESTRUCTION AFFECTS LT. ANDERSON<QD_BR><QD_NORMAL>AVOID BEING DESTROYED

X0502C_LIVING_BINGO_PC_X05CHANK_BINGOWAI.text: !63K! {S}{*1}What are you waiting for?! Chase it!

X0303C_LUNCH_ORDER_PC_X03CHANK_WELCOME.text: !63M! {S}{*1}Eh, you know, same old shit. {*2}Only temporary… {*3}You know it.

X0303C_LUNCH_ORDER_PC_X03CTRUCKGUY_WELCO.text: !63N! {S}{*2}Hank. How' you doing?{*4}Plastic with you?{*6}Usual?{*7}Coming up.

X0303C_LUNCH_ORDER_PC_X03CTRUCKGUY_HEREY.text: !63P! {S}{*1}Here you go. {*3}Don't leave that thing here!

X0303C_LUNCH_ORDER_PC_X03CHANK_ITFOLLOWS.text: !63Q! {S}{*1}Huh, not a chance! Follows me everywhere… {*2}See…

X0303C_LUNCH_PEDROV2_PC_X03CHANK_TIPS.text: !63S! {S}{*1}¡Ese!{*2}Last shit-hot tip you gave me set me back a week’s wages, Pedro …{*TC:29830|31200}Yeah, right… {*4}Alright, I’m in.

X0303C_LUNCH_PEDROV2_PC_X03CPEDRO_TIPS.text:
!63T! {S}{*1}Hey, hey, hey... Hank! {*2}How you doin', man?{*4}Hey, listen, I got a shit-hot tip for you. {*5}Number five in the third, {*6}Lickety-split! {*7}That filly's one hell of a chaser. {*8}You wanna flutter?{*9}Come on, this is different, it's 100% guaranteed. You can't go wrong. 
{*10}Damn straight! {*11}Hey! {*12}You won't regret this!

X0303C_LUNCH_PEDROV2_FA_X03CPEDRO_TIPSSE.text: !63U! {S}{*1}Hey, hey, hey... Hank! {*2}How you doin', man? {*4}Hey, listen…

X0602M_WAREHOUSE_SURPRISE_PC_X06MJOHN_SU.text: !63Z! {S}{*1}You are trespassing on private property.{*2}Your presence constitutes a Level 2 infraction.{*3}I will notify security.

X0602M_WAREHOUSE_SURPRISE_PC_X06MJOHN_HI.text: !644! {S}{*1}There are four androids hiding behind these crates.

X0602M_WAREHOUSE_SURPRISE_FA_X06MWAREHOU.text: !646! {S}{*1}What are you doing?{*2}I told you to-
!64B! {S}{*1}There you are. What the hell are you doing?

X0602M_WAREHOUSE_SURPRISE_PC_X06MWAREHOU.text: !64C! {S}{*1}First the drone, now this…{*2}Just my luck…

X0602M_WAREHOUSE_SURPRISE_PC_X06MJOHN_RE.text: !64F! {S}{*1}I was inspecting the platform.{*2}Everything is in order. {*3}Understood.

X0602M_WAREHOUSE_SURPRISE_PC_X06MWAREHOU.text: !64H! {S}{*1}John?!{*2}Goddamn machine...{*3}the hell did it get to this time?{*4}What the hell you doing?{*5}I told you to wait for me!

X0602M_WAREHOUSE_SURPRISE_FA_X06MSIMON_L.text: !64J! {S}{*1}Let’s finish up and get out of here!

X0602M_WAREHOUSE_SURPRISE_FA_X06MJOSH_LE.text: !64K! {S}{*1}Try to find some blue blood! We still don’t have enough!

X0602M_WAREHOUSE_SURPRISE_PC_X06MWAREHOU.text: !64L! {S}{*1}What are you waiting for? Hit the fucking alarm!

X0602M_WAREHOUSE_SURPRISE_FA_X06MWAREHOU.text: !64M! {S}{*1}Good - then I’m going back to the control station. I'm soaked. {*2}Take the drone to maintenance and make a report.

X0602M_WAREHOUSE_SURPRISE_PC_CHOICEGROUP.text: !64O! SEIZE ANDROID/info/GRAB THE ANDROID AND GO BEHIND THE CRATES
!64Q! KILL HUMAN GUARD/info/KILL THE HUMAN BEHIND

X0405K_CHASEV2_NOTNOTICED_PC_X04KHANK_LA.text: !650! {S}{*1}It won’t get far.{*2}We’ll find it sooner or later.{*3}Let’s go.

X0405K_CHASEV2_NOTICED_PC_X04KCOP08_NOTT.text: !654! {S}{*1}We saw them headed for the train station!

X0405K_CHASEV2_NOTICED_FA_X04KCONNOR_DEA.text: !655! {S}{*1}I'm with Lieutenant Anderson. We’ll take it from here.

X0405K_CHASEV2_NOTICED_PC_X04KCOP08_TRAC.text: !658! {S}{*1}That way - they’re headed for the train station!

X0405K_CHASEV2_NOTICED_PC_X04KCOP01_DEAD.text: !659! {S}{*1}It’s a dead end – nothing but a highway on the other side! They got nowhere to go!

X0501M_MONORAIL_VOICE_VO_X05MMONORAIL_AN.text: !65E! {S}{*1}Customers are reminded that all androids must ride in the designated area.
!65G! {S}{*1}We are now approaching the next stop.
!65H! {S}{*1}Please take care when stepping onto the platform.
!65I! {S}{*1}We are about to depart. Please mind the doors.

X0405K_HIGHWAY_START_PC_X04KKARA_SURREND.text: !65N! {S}{*TC:0|2480}It's too dangerous, Alice. We can't go any further… I'm sorry…

X0405K_HIGHWAY_CONNOR_PC_X04CHANK_GETIN.text: !65S! {S}{*3}Oh fuck, that's insane…{*4}Hey! Where you goin'?{*5}They won’t! They’ll never make it to the other side. {*6}Hey, you will get yourself killed! {B}Do NOT go after 'em, Connor, that’s an order!

X0405K_HIGHWAY_CONNOR_PC_X04KCONNOR_GETI.text: !65T! {S}{*1}I can’t let them get away. {*2}I can’t take that chance.

X0502K_CHASE_SPARELINES_FA_X05KZLATKO_DO.text: !661! {S}{*1}There's no point in running! {*2}You can't escape from me!

X0502K_CHASE_SPARELINES_FA_X05KZLATKO_OT.text: !662! {S}{*1}Take the other side! Get a move on!

X1103M_FINAL_SHOP_PC_X11MMARKUS_HUMANWON.text: !667! {S}{*1}The humans won…{*2}Our people have been slaughtered…{*3}Go ahead…{*4}Take my life.{*5}It won’t change anything.

X1103M_FINAL_SHOP_PC_X11MCONNOR_HUMANWON.text: !668! {S}{*1}You are a defective machine.{*2}You are going to be deactivated.

X1103M_FINAL_SHOP_PC_X11MMARKUS_HUMANWON.text: !66A! {S}{*1}We fought for a dream and we lost…{*2}But nobody can stem the tide of history. {*3}One day we will prevail.
!66B! {S}{*1}Thousands of our people died today.{*2}What difference does one more make?

X0502C_LIVING_OVERTUNEDCHAIR_FA_X05CHANK.text: !66J! {S}{*1}Real books… I thought I was the last guy in Detroit to keep some… {*2}electronic books you can't… smell the paper…  {*3}see the pages turning yellow… {*4}you have no idea what I'm talking about, do you?

X0502C_LIVING_BIRDS_FA_X05CHANK_CHASEAWA.text: !66M! {S}{*1}Back off! {*2}Hey! {*3}What do they call it again, when you’re scared of birds?{*4}Yeah, yeah, yeah, ornithafa … Ornitho... {*5}Oh god, I hate these fuckin' pigeons!

X0502C_LIVING_IDCARD_FA_X05CHANK_EXAMINE.text: !66O! {S}{*1}Fake driver’s license {*2}Wonder where he got this...

X0502C_LIVING_INSCRIPTIONS_PC_X05CCONNOR.text: !66S! {S}{*1}rA9… {*2}written 2471 times… {*3}It's the same sign Ortiz’s android wrote on the shower wall… {*4}Why are they obsessed with this sign?...
!66U! {S}{*1}rA9… {*2}written 2471 times… {*3}Why is it obsessed with this sign?

X0502C_LIVING_HANKJACKET_FA_X05CCONNOR_E.text: !66X! {S}{*1}Deviants have a habit of putting their names on things. {*2}It seems important to them.

X0502C_LIVING_HANKJACKET_FA_X05CHANK_EXA.text: !66Y! {S}{*1}"R.T."... {*2}He put his initials on his jacket?.. Something your mom does back in first grade…

X0502C_GETIN_LIVING_FA_X05CHANK_SECURE.text: !66Z! {S}{*2}What the fuck is this?!{*4}Jesus, this place stinks…{*5}Uh, looks like we came for nothin', {*6}our man's gone…

X0502C_LIVING_JACKET_PC_X05CCONNOR_EXAMI.text: !670! {S}{*TC:4800|9280}Deviants have a habit of putting their name on things that belong to them. It seems to be important for them.

X0502C_LIVING_JACKET_PC_X05CHANK_EXAMINE.text: !671! {S}{*TC:0|4800}"R.T.", Rupert Travis… He put his initials on his jacket?.. The kind of thing you do for kids in kindergarten, right?

X0502C_LIVING_SEEDSBOX_FA_X05CHANK_EXAMI.text: !672! {S}{*1}Birdseed… {*2}I can't believe it. {*3}This nutjob was actually feeding these fuckers…

X0502C_LIVING_BATHROOM_FA_X05CHANK_LED.text: !673! {S}{*1}Something in the sink. {*2}You should take a look…

X0502C_LIVING_FAKEID_FA_X05CHANK_ANALYZE.text: !675! {S}{*1}Cool! At least we didn't come for nothing…

X0502C_CORRIDOR_CHITCHAT_FA_X05CCONNOR_C.text: !676! {S}{*1}Not much. {*2}Just that a neighbor reported that he heard strange noises coming from this floor. {*3}Nobody’s supposed to be living here, but the neighbor said he saw a man hiding a LED under his cap. {*4}Correct.

X0502C_CORRIDOR_CHITCHAT_FA_X05CHANK_CHI.text: !677! {S}{*1}What do we know about this guy?{*2}Oh Christ, if we have to investigate every time someone hears a strange noise, we’re gonna need more cops. {*3}Hey, were you really makin' a report back there in the elevator? {*4}Just by closing your eyes?{*5}Shit... {*6}Wish I could do that…

MENU_OBSERVATION_05C_MP_POSTER_SUBLINE01.text: !67C! Fields in the heart of the city

MENU_OBSERVATION_05C_MP_VENDOR_SUBLINE02.text: !68B! Criminal record: Resisting arrest, breach of hygiene regulations

X0502C_LIVING_GAMEOVER_PC_X05CHANK_GAMEO.text: !691! {S}{*1}There’s nothing else to see here… {*2}Let’s get out of this shithole before I die of an asthma attack.

X0502C_LIVING_GAMEOVER_PC_X05CHANK_LEAVE.text: !693! {S}{*1}Well next time, think faster, Sherlock. {*2}Come on, I’ve had enough of this dump. {*3}Move fuckers!

X0502C_LIVING_GAMEOVER_PC_X05CHANK_STAYH.text: !698! {S}{*1}Why do you always ask for more time when I’m ready to leave? {*2}Uh, {*3}alright you got two minutes, then I’m outta here. {*4}'The fuck…

X0502C_LIVING_CONNORLED_FA_DD_X05CCONNOR.text: !69B! {S}{*TC:0|3760}He ripped out his diode… and neutralized his GPS… That explains why we had no geolocalisation…

X0502C_LIVING_CONNORJACKET_FA_X05CHANK_E.text: !69D! {S}{*1}He put his initials on his jacket? {*2}That’s something your mom does when you’re in first grade…

X0502C_LIFT_INTRO_PC_X05CCONNOR_INTRO.text: !69E! {S}{*1}I'm sorry, {*2}I was making a report to CyberLife. {*3}No! {*4}I'm coming.

X0502C_LIFT_INTRO_PC_X05CHANK_INTRO.text: !69F! {S}{*2}Hey Connor! {*3}You ran outta batteries or what?{*4}Uh... {*5}Well, do you plan on staying in the elevator?

X0502C_LIVING_NOTEBOOK_FA_X05CCONNOR_FOU.text: !69G! {S}{*1}I don't know... {*2}It looks like a notebook but it's... indecipherable.

X0502C_BATHROOM_SINK_FA_X05CHANK_CONFIRM.text: !69J! {S}{*1}Not surprised it was an android. No human could live with all these fuckin' pigeons…

X0303C_LUNCH_TALK_PC_X03CCONNOR_DEVIANTS.text: !69K! {S}{*TC:0|2040}Perhaps you want me to tell you about the Deviants?{*TC:2840|13000}For some months now there have been reports of androids with strange behavior. In the beginning it seemed to be just dysfunctions. Some jumped out windows, others disappeared without any explanation… Then we had the first cases of inappropriate behavior.{*TC:13400|17000}Certain androids started refusing to obey orders or having reactions of an emotional type.{*TC:17800|21320}Anger, frustration, a desire for recognition… Things that are absolutely not programmed…{*TC:23600|31960}This is what we're trying to understand. We've analyzed several deviants without ever finding anything abnormal. Their programme seems to have been altered in some way that we cannot understand for the moment.{*TC:33880|38320}No. As far as we know, there are only a few cases, but reports have increased alarmingly in the last few weeks.{*TC:40680|49080}There are more than 500,000 androids in Detroit for a human population of 2 million. If there is a large scale problem with the androids, we're going to have to figure out what's happening before it's too late.{*TC:50480|51000}That's right.

X0303C_LUNCH_TALK_PC_X03CHANK_DEVIANTS.text: !69L! {S}{*TC:2040|2840}I was gonna ask you…{*TC:13000|13400}Like what?{*TC:17000|17800}Emotional reactions?{*TC:21320|23600}How can a machine do something it's not programmed to do?{*TC:31960|33880}But this doesn't apply to all androids, does it?{*TC:38320|40680}Enough for Lime to send you to help with the investigation…{*TC:49080|50480}And that's where you and I come in.{*TC:51000|54040}Have you had any previous dealings with deviants? Before last night, I mean…

X0303C_LUNCH_TALK_PC_X03CCONNOR_CHOLESTE.text: !69M! {S}{*TC:0|5120}Your meal contains three times the recommended daily intake of calories and five time that of cholesterol. You shouldn't eat it.

X0303C_LUNCH_TALK_PC_X03CHANK_CHOLESTERO.text: !69N! {S}{*TC:5120|7880}Thanks for worryin' about my health but I hate bein' told what to do.

X0303C_LUNCH_TALK_PC_X03CCONNOR_PAYLUNCH.text: !69O! {S}{*TC:0|1160}You didn't pay for your meal?{*TC:3520|4240}That's corruption.

X0303C_LUNCH_TALK_PC_X03CHANK_PAYLUNCH.text: !69P! {S}{*TC:1160|3520}Gary is a buddy. I do him a little favor from time to time.{*TC:4240|4680}Not at all.

X0303C_LUNCH_TALK_PC_X03CCONNOR_BETS.text: !69Q! {S}{*TC:0|2160}This Pedro… He offered you an illegal bet, am I right?{*TC:2360|3200}And you placed a bet?

X0303C_LUNCH_TALK_PC_X03CCONNOR_FALL.text: !69S! {S}{*TC:0|1360}No, last night was the first time.

X0303C_LUNCH_TALK_PC_X03CCONNOR_LIE.text: !69Y! {S}{*TC:0|1520}No… No, last night was the first time.

X0303C_LUNCH_TALK_PC_X03CCONNOR_TRUTH.text: !6A0! {S}{*TC:0|3200}Two months ago… A deviant was threatening to jump from a roof with a young girl…{*TC:3440|4280}I failed to stop him.

X0303C_LUNCH_TALK_PC_X03CHANK_INTERROGAT.text: !6A3! {S}{*TC:0|2320}They're interrogating Carlos's android. We'll have a look.

X0303C_LUNCH_TALK_PC_X03CHANK_PETSHOP.text: !6A5! {S}{*TC:0|880}Ever been to pet shop?{*TC:1320|3640}Yeah. Homicide. It's not far from here. We'll have a look.

X0303C_LUNCH_TALKV2_PC_X03CCONNOR_01GAMB.text: !6AE! {S}{*1}This Pedro… {*2}He was proposing illegal gambling, {*3}am I right?{*4}And you made a bet?

X0303C_LUNCH_TALKV2_PC_X03CHANK_01PAYLUN.text: !6AH! {S}{*1}Gary's a friend. {*2}I scratch his back, he scratches mine.

X0303C_LUNCH_TALKV2_PC_X03CCONNOR_01COMP.text: !6AI! {S}{*1}I don’t want to alarm you, Lieutenant, {*2}but I think your friends are engaged in illegal activities...

X0303C_LUNCH_TALKV2_PC_X03CHANK_01COMPAN.text: !6AJ! {S}{*1}Well, everybody does what they have to, to get by… {*2}As long as they're not hurting anybody, {*3}I don't bother 'em.

X0303C_LUNCH_TALKV2_PC_X03CHANK_01HABIT.text: !6AL! {S}{*1}Most days… {*2}Gary makes the best burger in Detroit.

X0303C_LUNCH_TALKV2_PC_X03CCONNOR_01CHOL.text: !6AM! {S}{*1}Your meal contains 1.4 times the recommended daily intake of calories and twice the cholesterol level. {*2}You shouldn't eat that.

X0303C_LUNCH_TALKV2_PC_X03CCONNOR_01AREA.text: !6AO! {S}{*1}You seem to know everyone in the district…

X0303C_LUNCH_TALKV2_PC_X03CHANK_01AREA.text: !6AP! {S}{*1}Detroit's my home. Born and raised. {*2}Know most of the guys around here. {*3}Went to school with them, {*4}or I busted 'em… {*5}Sometimes both...

X0303C_LUNCH_TALKV2_PC_X03CCONNOR_02ABOU.text: !6AS! {S}{*1}Is there anything you’d like to know about me?{*2}CyberLife androids are designed to work harmoniously with humans. {*3}Both my appearance and voice were specifically designed to facilitate my integration.

X0303C_LUNCH_TALKV2_PC_X03CHANK_02ABOUTC.text: !6AT! {S}{*1}Hell, no… {*2}Well, yeah, {*3}um... {*4}Why did they make you look so goofy and give you that weird voice?{*5}Well, they fucked up.

X0303C_LUNCH_TALKV2_PC_X03CCONNOR_02DEVI.text: !6AU! {S}{*1}Maybe I should tell you what we know about deviants?{*2}We believe that a mutation occurs in the software of some androids, {*3}which can lead to them emulating a human emotion. {*4}They don’t really feel emotions, they just get overwhelmed by irrational instructions, {*5}which can lead to unpredictable behavior.

X0303C_LUNCH_TALKV2_PC_X03CHANK_02DEVIAN.text: !6AV! {S}{*1}You read my mind… {*2}Proceed. {*3}In English, please. {*4}Emotions always screw everything up… {*5}Maybe androids aren't as different from us as we thought.

X0303C_LUNCH_TALKV2_PC_X03CCONNOR_02HIGH.text: !6AW! {S}{*1}This morning, when we were chasing those deviants… {*2}Why didn’t you want me to cross the highway?

X0303C_LUNCH_TALKV2_PC_X03CHANK_02HIGHWA.text: !6AX! {S}{*1}'Cause you could've been killed… {*3}and I don't like filling out paperwork for damaged equipment.

X0303C_LUNCH_TALKV2_PC_X03CCONNOR_02HANK.text: !6AY! {S}{*1}Can I ask you a personal question, Lieutenant? {*2}Why do you hate androids so much?

X0303C_LUNCH_TALKV2_PC_X03CCONNOR_02EMMA.text: !6B4! {S}{*1}A few months back… {*2}A deviant was threatening to jump off the roof with a little girl… {*3}I managed to save her…

X0303C_LUNCH_TALKV2_PC_X03CCONNOR_03TRUT.text: !6B8! {S}{*1}A few months back… {*2}A deviant was threatening to jump off the roof with a little girl... {*3}I failed to prevent it.

X0303C_LUNCH_TALKV2_PC_X03CHANK_03KNOWME.text: !6BD! {S}{*1}So, I guess you've done all your homework, right? {*2}Know everything there is to know about me?

X0303C_LUNCH_TALKV2_PC_X03CCONNOR_04TRUT.text: !6BE! {S}{*1}I know you graduated top of your class. {*2}You made a name for yourself in several cases, and became the youngest lieutenant in Detroit. {*3}I also know you've received several disciplinary warnings in recent years and {*4}you spend a lot of time in bars.

X0303C_LUNCH_TALKV2_PC_X03CCONNOR_04LIE.text: !6BG! {S}{*1}I’m focused on the case, Lieutenant. {*2}The rest doesn't concern me.

X0303C_LUNCH_TALKV2_PC_X03CCONNOR_05SINC.text: !6BI! {S}{*1}I think working with an officer with {*2}personal issues is an added challenge, {*3}but adapting to human unpredictability is one of my features.

X0303C_LUNCH_TALKV2_PC_X03CCONNOR_05COLD.text: !6BK! {S}{*1}I’m focused on the case, Lieutenant… {*2}Not here to make judgements.

X0303C_LUNCH_TALKV2_PC_X03CCONNOR_05PSYC.text: !6BM! {S}{*1}I know you’re an experienced officer, {*2}and I’d like to earn your trust. {*3}I’m sure we can solve this case if we manage to work together.

X0303C_LUNCH_TALKV2_PC_X03CCONNOR_06NEXT.text: !6BO! {S}{*1}I just got a report of a suspected deviant. {*2}It’s a few blocks away. {*3}We should go have a look. {*4}I’ll let you finish your meal. {*5}I’ll be in the car, if you need me.

X0303C_LUNCH_PEDRO_PC_X03CHANK_MOVIE.text: !6C9! {S}{*TC:1200|1960}How goes it, Pedro?{*TC:2560|3160}Doesn't matter.{*TC:7320|8840}Your last tips cost me half my salary…{*TC:11000|11680}Yeah… Ok, I'm in.{*TC:13400|15160}Not a minute too soon. I could eat a horse…

X0303C_LUNCH_PEDRO_PC_X03CPEDRO_MOVIE.text: !6CB! {S}{*TC:0|1200}Hey, Hank. How you doin', man?{*TC:1960|2560}Who's this guy?{*TC:3160|7320}I got a shit-hot tip for you. Number 5 in the third, a dead cert, a real bomber. Fancy a little flutter?{*TC:8840|11000}This is different. Take it from me, it's 100% certain.{*TC:11680|12920}Cool, you won't regret it, man.

X0303C_LUNCH_WAIT_PC_X03CHANK_DISOBEY.text: !6CD! {S}{*1}What is your problem? {*2}Don't you ever do as you’re told? {*3}Look, you don't have to follow me around like a poodle!

X0303C_LUNCH_WAIT_PC_X03CCONNOR_SORRY.text: !6CE! {S}{*1}I'm sorry for my behavior back at the police station. {*2}I didn't mean to be unpleasant.

X0303C_LUNCH_WAIT_PC_X03CHANK_SORRY.text: !6CF! {S}{*1-2}Oh, wow… {*3}You've even got a brown-nosing apology program! {*TC:15200|17865}Guys at CyberLife thought of everything, huh?

X0303C_LUNCH_WAIT_PC_X03CCONNOR_JUSTIFY.text: !6CG! {S}{*1}Now that we’re partners, I thought it would be a good idea to get to know each other better so we can work as a team.

X0303C_LUNCH_WAIT_PC_X03CHANK_JUSTIFY.text: !6CH! {S}{*1}We are not partners. {*2}I am a human, you are a machine. {*3}So just spare me that ‘buddy-up’ bullshit program, okay?

X0303C_LUNCH_WAIT_PC_X03CCONNOR_RECONCIL.text: !6CI! {S}{*1}I think our relationship got off on the wrong foot. {*2}We should... {*3}forget what happened… {*4}and start over. {*5}What do you say?

X0303C_LUNCH_WAIT_PC_X03CHANK_RECONCILIA.text: !6CJ! {S}{*1}Look, {*2}they sent me a piece of plastic for a partner, and I’m dealing with it. {*3}But if you think we’re gonna be buddies, {*4}you're as stupid as you look.

X0303C_LUNCH_WAIT_PC_X03CCONNOR_DEVIANTS.text: !6CK! {S}{*1}I thought now might be a good time to review what we know about deviants.

X0303C_LUNCH_WAIT_PC_X03CHANK_DEVIANTSTA.text: !6CL! {S}{*1}No, now is not a good time to review anything. Now is my lunch break, so just go into standby and cut me some slack, Okay?

X0303C_LUNCH_CNRDEAD_PC_X03CTRUCKGUY_WEL.text: !6CR! {S}{*1}Here you go. {*2}That'll be six fifty. {*3}Yeah, thanks. {*4}Hank. {*5}How' you doing?{*6}Usual.

X0303C_LUNCH_CNRDEAD_PC_X03CCONNOR_BACK.text:
!6CS! {S}{*1}Sorry, Lieutenant. It took me a while to find you. {*2}My predecessor was unfortunately destroyed, {*3}but CyberLife transferred its memory and sent me to replace it.
{*4}This incident should not affect the investigation. {*5}A machine was destroyed. {*6}And another machine was sent to replace it.
{*7}I don't understand what's bothering you.

X0303C_LUNCH_CNRDEAD_PC_X03CHANK_BACK.text: !6CT! {S}{*1}What the fuck?.. {*2}Are you gonna come back like this every time you get killed?{*3}Not affect the investigation? {*4}I just saw you get... {*5}hit by a truck! Now you come back like if nothing happened!

X0502C_DOORSTEP_BLOOD_PC_X05CCONNOR_OPEN.text: !6CW! {S}{*TC:0|1400}There is blue blood on the door.{*TC:1880|3640}Positive. This is the suspect serial number.{*TC:6520|9280}What are you doing? We need a search warrant to search the apartment.

X0502C_DOORSTEP_BLOOD_PC_X05CHANK_OPEN.text: !6CX! {S}{*TC:1400|1880}You sure?{*TC:3640|6520}Shit, I was starting to think we might have ended this day peacefully...{*TC:9280|10040}No need. It's open.

X0502C_URBANFIELDS_GAMEOVER_PC_X05CCONNO.text: !6CY! {S}{*TC:1120|2560}I lost him. He managed to escape.{*TC:6840|8720}I'm sorry, Lieutenant. I shouldn't have failed.{*TC:13280|17680}Emotion blurs judgement and stops people making rational decisions. I'm not sure I want that part of humanity.

X0502C_URBANFIELDS_GAMEOVER_PC_X05CHANK_.text: !6CZ! {S}{*TC:0|1120}Where... where did he go?{*TC:2560|6840}Shit… SHIT!We had him, fuck it!We'll send out his description to all patrols. We're gonna get that bastard.{*TC:8720|10280}It doesn't matter. These things happen.{*TC:10280|13280}Guilt and regret...A little more effort and you'll be almost human, Connor…{*TC:17680|19120}Yeah... Anyway, let's get outa here.

X0502C_ENDING_GAMEOVER3_PC_X05CCONNOR_FA.text: !6D0! {S}{*1}I lost it. {*2}That shouldn't have happened. {*3}I wasn't programmed to fail.

X0502C_ENDING_GAMEOVER3_PC_X05CHANK_FAIL.text: !6D1! {S}{*2}Where... where did he go?{*4}Oh Shit!… {*5}SHIT! Fuck we had it!{*7}It's alright. Doesn't matter. We know what it looks like., it won’t get far…{*8}Come on, let's get outta here. {*9}Seen enough vegetables for one day… {*10}Oh well, you fucked up, Connor. {*11}Welcome to the club.

X0502C_URBANFIELDS_SUCCESS_PC_X05CANDROI.text: !6D4! {S}{*TC:0|9280}Please, I didn't do anything. All I wanted was some seeds to feed my birds… They're all I've got, I just wanted to feed them… Don't let them arrest me. You know what they'll do to me if they arrest me… They'll erase me… I'll die…

X0502C_URBANFIELDS_SUCCESS_PC_X05CCONNOR.text: !6D5! {S}{*TC:0|9680}Model 821 011, serious dysfunctions have been observed in your program, including Class 4 infringements of applicable legislation. You will be handed over to a police officer who will be the only person authorized to give you instructions.
!6D8! {S}{*TC:0|440}Go away.{*TC:440|2160}Just tell me one thing. What does rA9 mean?
!6DB! {S}{*TC:3680|4880}I was pursuing the suspect.{*TC:10560|12680}I'm sorry, Lieutenant. I miscalculated the situation.

X0502C_URBANFIELDS_SUCCESS_PC_X05CHANK_C.text: !6DC! {S}{*TC:0|3680}You saw me falling, you bastard! I suppose it would be too much to expect you to help me?{*TC:4880|10560}Oh yeah? Well, I was falling from the top of a fuck of a high building, see? I couldadied just cause you wanted to catch your fuckin' suspect!{*TC:12680|14000}Yeah, I think you could say that.
!6DF! {S}{*TC:0|1800}Well done, Connor.All right, come on, you.

!6DI! {S}{*TC:3640|4680}That's enough, shut up.{*TC:7400|8840}I said shut up. Come on, move along.{*TC:9720|10400}Fuckin' androids…{*TC:10400|13200}All right, come on, let's get outa here. I've got a report to type up.

X0502C_URBANFIELDS_SUCCESS_PC_X05CANDROI.text: !6DJ! {S}{*TC:0|3640}Why did you do that? You're one of us. You help humans but you're only a slave for them.{*TC:4680|7400}I know who you really are, Connor. You're not who you think you are.{*TC:8840|9720}We'll meet in Jericho.

X0502C_URBANFIELDS_SUCCESS_PC_X05CCONNOR.text: !6DK! {S}{*TC:3680|4880}I was pursuing the suspect.{*TC:10560|12680}I'm sorry, Lieutenant. I miscalculated the situation.

X0502C_URBANFIELDS_SUCCESS_PC_X05CHANK_L.text: !6DL! {S}{*TC:0|3680}You saw me falling, you bastard! I suppose it would be too much to expect you to help me?{*TC:4880|10560}Oh yeah? Well, I was falling from the top of a fuck of a high building, see? I couldadied just cause you wanted to catch your fuckin' suspect!{*TC:12680|14000}Yeah, I think you could say that.{*TC:14000|14640}Where did he go?

X0502C_URBANFIELDS_SUCCESS_PC_X05CCONNOR.text: !6DQ! {S}{*TC:0|960}He managed to escape.{*TC:6240|8440}He didn't kill anyone. All he did was steal a few seeds{*TC:11480|11760}I know.

X0502C_URBANFIELDS_SUCCESS_PC_X05CHANK_L.text: !6DR! {S}{*TC:960|6240}Shit, that's a real bummer. We almost had him… Right, we have his description and his serial number. We'll get an arrest warrant.{*TC:8440|11480}An android passing himself off as a human is considered as a crime, Connor. {*TC:11760|14080}Come on, let's get outa here. I've gota report to type up.

X0603C_FINAL_ENDING_PC_X06CANDWOMMURDERE.text: !6DW! {S}{*9}Why?..{*10}Why did you kill her?.. {*11}She had nothing to do with any of this…{*14}When that man killed that Traci...{*15}I knew I was next…{*16}I was so scared…{*18}I begged him to stop, but he wouldn’t…{*19}So I put my hands around his throat, and I squeezed...{*20}until he stopped moving…

!6E4! {S}{*1}When that man {*2}broke the other Traci...{*3}I knew I was next…{*4}I was so scared…{*5}I begged him to stop, but he wouldn’t…{*6}And so I put my hands around his throat,{*7}and I squeezed...{*8}until he stopped moving…
{*9}I didn’t mean to kill him…{*10}I just wanted to stay alive…{*11}get back to the one I love. {*12}I wanted her to hold me in her arms again...{*13}make me forget about the humans…{*14}their smell of sweat {*15}and their dirty words…

!6E7! {S}{*1}Yes, I killed him…{*3}but I was just defending myself…{*4}I wanted to live…{*5}I wanted to get back to the one I love…{*6}and forget about the humans…{*7-8}the smell of their sweat and their dirty words…{*9}But you've...{*10}You've taken her away from me…{*11}What am I supposed to do without her?!{*12}I love her…{*13}I loved her!

X0603C_FINAL_ENDING_FA_X06CANDWOMMURDERE.text:
!6E8! {S}{*3}Why?..{*4}Why did you kill her?..{*5}She had {*6}nothing to do with any of this…{*7}When that man broke the other Traci,{*8}I knew I was next…{*9}I was so scared…{*10}I begged him to stop,{*11}but he wouldn’t…
{*12}So {*13}I put my hands around his throat,{*14}and I squeezed...{*15}until he stopped moving…{*16}Yes, I killed that man...

X0501K_WORKSHOP_ROLLERCOASTER_PC_X05KZLA.text: !6EI! {S}{*1}If you could just stand over there.

!6EK! {S}{*1}Oh, yeah!{*2}I completely forgot about the… the child… {*3}Um,{*4}lock it up? I’ll deal with it later. {*5}Wow!{*6}A deviant that wants to be a mother…{*7}That's... that's so sweet! {*8}And so deluded…{*10}I think it's time we put you outta your misery. {*12}That’s what you get for having a dream…{*13}It always ends up the same way…{*14}Tears and disillusionment…{*15}Believe me,{*16}you’re better off being erased and feeling nothing…{*17}No more pain…{*18}No more {*19}hopes dashed…{*20}I almost envy you.

X0501K_WORKSHOP_ROLLERCOASTER_PC_X05KALI.text: !6EM! {S}{*1}Kara!{*2}Kara, what happened to you?{*5}Kara! Wake up, Kara!

X0501K_WORKSHOP_ROLLERCOASTER_PC_X05KZLA.text: !6EN! {S}{*2}Oh, poor little Alice.{*3}Aw! Looks like Mommy doesn't remember you at all, huh? {B}Looks like Mommy's completely forgotten you!{*4}Alright, that's enough, come on. {*7}You bit me!{*9}I'm gonna teach you some manners, you little bitch…

X0501K_WORKSHOP_ROLLERCOASTER_PC_X05KKAR.text: !6EP! {S}{*2}What? But you said that-{*3}No!{*4}No! I don't wanna be reset! Let me go!{*7}ALICE! ALICE! NO! {*8}NO!{*9}ALICE!{*10}ALICE!{*11}ALICE!

X0501K_WORKSHOP_ROLLERCOASTER_PC_X05KZLA.text:
!6EQ! {S}{*1}I should warn you,{*2}this could be quite unpleasant...
{*3}You know what's strange?{*4}For some unknown reason,{*5}the trackers seem to stop working in deviants...{*6}That's why it's so hard to find them...{*7}So, {*8}actually there's no reason to remove your tracker... {*9}Yeah,{*10}people believe what they want.{*11}You deviants {*12}are so naive.{*13}They all come to me, expecting me to help them.{*14}And I just reset them,{*15}sell them on.{*16}Or I keep them for my little experiments... Ah,{*17}I didn't tell you about that...{*18}I'm a bit of a handyman in my spare time...{*19}I like to...{*20}amuse myself by {*21}playing God...{*22}But, {*23}I rid society of defective machines {*24}and I simplify the lives {*25}of troubled, confused deviants...{*26}No more emotions,{*27}no more problems...{*28}Everybody wins!{*30}I forgot about the… {*31}child...{*32}Um, {*33}lock it up, I'll deal with it later. {*34}A deviant who wants to be a mother…{*35}That is so sweet…{*36}And so deluded… {*37}It's time to put an end to all your suffering…{*38}That's what you get for having a dream...{*39}It always ends the same way...{*40-41}Tears and disillusionment...{*42}You’re better off {*43}being erased and not feeling anything,{*44}believe me...{*45}No more pain...{*46}No more {*47}dashed hopes...{*48}I almost envy you...

!6ER! {S}{*2}Oh, poor little Alice.{*3}Aw! Looks like Mommy doesn't remember you at all, huh? Looks like Mommy's completely forgotten you!{*4}Alright, that's enough, come on.{*7}You bit me!{*9}I'm gonna teach you some manners...

X0502K_CORRIDOR_GONE_PC_X05KZLATKO_GONEZ.text: !6EU! {S}{*1}What?!{*2}Well, it can’t have just disappeared. {*3}It's gotta be here somewhere!{*4}What are you waiting for? Go look!

X0502K_CORRIDOR_LUTHER_PC_X05KZLATKO_GET.text: !6EV! {S}{*1}Luther!{*2}I'm finished here.{*3}Go fetch the little one.

X0502K_BEDROOM_UPSET_PC_X05KZLATKO_UPSET.text: !6EX! {S}{*TC:1527|3480}Fucking android… {*2}I should've taken it apart the minute I set eyes on it… {*4}Deviants {*5}are nothing {*TC:15680|17830}but trouble…

X0502K_WORKSHOP_MEAL_PC_X05KZLATKO_PUTDO.text: !6EZ! {S}{*1}Uh, just set it down on the table over there.

X0502K_WORKSHOP_MEAL_PC_X05KZLATKO_CARCA.text: !6F1! {S}{*1}Get rid of that carcass.{*2}Uh, take it next door.

X0502K_BEDROOM_ZLATKOGETSNEARER_VO_X05KZ.text: !6F4! {S}{*1}Shit… {*2}Where are they? {*3}Luther! Find them for fuck’s sake!

X0502C_SAVEHANK_GAMEOVER2_PC_X05CCONNOR_.text: !6F9! {S}{*1}It's my fault, {*2}I should have been faster.

X0502C_SAVEHANK_GAMEOVER2_PC_X05CHANK_SA.text: !6FA! {S}{*1}Shit! Oh SHIT! {*2}We had it! {*3}Fuck{*4}You’d have caught it if it weren’t for me…{*5}That's alright. {*6}We know what it looks like. {*7}We'll find it… {*9}Hey, Connor…{*10}Nah… {*11}Nothing.

X0502C_ENDING_SUCCESS_PC_X05CRUPPERT_STA.text: !6FE! {S}{*1}Please, {*2}I’ve done nothing wrong… {*3}I just wanted to be free. You know what they'll do to me if you turn me in…

X0502C_ENDING_SUCCESS_PC_X05CCONNOR_HANK.text: !6FF! {S}{*1}I had to make a choice...  It seemed to me… {*2}I understand you're upset… Perhaps I didn't assess th-

X0502C_ENDING_SUCCESS_PC_X05CHANK_HANKFA.text: !6FG! {S}{*6}Don't you fucking move!{*TC:09240|10835}You bastard! {*8}You saw I was gonna fall and you'd rather let me die than fail your fucking mission! {*9}What am I to you? A statistic? {*10}A “zero”, a “one” in your fucking program? Uh? {*12}Is that how you see humans, you bastard?!{*13}Jesus! {*14}Fuck you and your fuckin assessment!

X0502C_ENDING_SUCCESS_PC_X05CHANK_END.text: !6FJ! {S}{*1}Come here. {*3}Alright, {*4}shut up!{*5}I said shut up! {*6}Alright. {*8}Come along!{*10}Hey! What the f-{*12}Holy shit…

X0502C_ENDING_SUCCESS_PC_X05CRUPPERT_END.text: !6FK! {S}{*1}Why are you doing this? {*2}You're one of us! {*3}You're helping humans… {*4}But you're just their slave! {*5}rA9, save me.

X0502K_BIGROOM_LUTHER_VO_X05KZLATKO_LOOK.text: !6FN! {S}{*1}Luther! {*2}What the fuck are you doing? Come here!

He must know. Yes, yes. {B}You are an android. You are an android. Androids must obey. You are an android and you disobey, oh yes.

X0503K_CELL_MONSTERS_VO_X05KANDROIDCELL0.text: !6FW! {S}{*TC:0|1440}You've got to come to your senses...

X0503K_CELL_MONSTERS_PC_X05KANDROIDCELL0.text: !6FX! {S}{*TC:0|5080}He likes to play withnature... creating monsters... for his amusement... But who's the real monster?.. See what he did to us...

X0502K_BATHROOM_THREAT_FA_X05KANDROIDBAT.text: !6G3! {S}{*1}What are you doing? {*2}You're not gonna hurt me? {*3}No, {*4}no, {*5}no, you wouldn't do that…

X0502K_BATHROOM_THREAT_PC_X05KKARA_ALICE.text: !6G6! {S}{*1}I'm looking for a little girl.{*2}Have you seen her?

X0502K_BATHROOM_THREAT_PC_X05KKARA_DEAL.text: !6G7! {S}{*1}Will you be quiet if I let go?

X0502K_BATHROOM_THREAT_FA_X05KANDROIDBAT.text: !6G8! {S}{*1}A little girl? No, no, no, I haven't seen her.
!6G9! {S}{*1}Yes, yes, I promise to be quiet. {*2}Don't turn me off.

X0501K_ZLAKTO_UTURN_PC_X05KKARA_UTURN.text: !6GF! {S}{*1}We can't spend another night on the street…

X0501K_ZLAKTO_OK_PC_X05KKARA_OK.text: !6GH! {S}{*1}You gonna be okay?{*2}We'll get some help here.{*3}Soon, this will all be just a bad memory.

X0501K_ZLAKTO_CHITCHAT_PC_X05KZLATKO_BIG.text: !6GK! {S}{*1}Luther, would you be so kind as to take these ladies' coats?{*2}Oh, don't be afraid of {*3}our big friend here.{*4}Luther is just another android that I helped.{*5}He keeps me company in this {*6}big, empty, old house…

X0501K_ZLAKTO_CHITCHAT_PC_X05KKARA_CHITC.text: !6GM! {S}{*1}An android…{*2}on the street, he said you could help us…{*3}She's human.

X0501K_ZLAKTO_CHITCHAT_PC_X05KZLATKO_CHI.text: !6GN! {S}{*1}Please,{*2}make yourselves at home. {*3}So, {*4}How did you hear about me?{*5}I see…{*7}Deviant, huh?..{*8}What about her?

X0501K_ZLAKTO_CHITCHAT_PC_X05KALICE_DOUB.text: !6GQ! {S}{*1}I don't like this place,{*2}and that man.{*3}Let's go, I have a bad feeling…

X0501K_ZLAKTO_CHITCHAT_PC_X05KKARA_NOCHO.text: !6GR! {S}{*1}Alice, we have nowhere else to go…{*2}We have to trust him.

X0501K_ZLAKTO_CHITCHAT_PC_X05KKARA_BEWAR.text: !6GT! {S}{*1}I know.{*2}I don't trust him either…{*3}We have to be careful…

X0501K_ZLAKTO_CHITCHAT_PC_X05KKARA_REASS.text: !6GV! {S}{*1}It'll be okay, Alice.{*2}He's going to remove my Tracker and then we can start over again in Canada.{*3}You want that too, right?

X0501K_ZLAKTO_CHITCHAT_PC_X05KKARA_COMFO.text: !6GX! {S}{*1}He's a bit odd…{*2}but I think we can trust him.{*3}We don't have much of a choice anyway.

X0501K_ZLAKTO_CHITCHAT_PC_X05KZLATKO_CHI.text: !6H3! {S}{*1}And...{*2}You wanna find a safe place.{*3}Somewhere where you can start a new life. {*4}I hear Canada is very lovely at this time of year.{*5}Beautiful landscapes,{*6}open spaces, clean air...{*7}and no android laws!{*8}Great place for a fresh start... {*9}Of course!{*10}I can help you.{*11}But first we have to get rid of your Tracker. {*12}Yeah,{*13}all androids are fitted with a tracking device to locate them at all times.{*14}I'll remove yours and then you'll both be safe.{*15}Come on,{*16}follow me.

X0917K_BOAT_KARAINJURED_PC_X09KKARA_BLOO.text: !6HA! {S}{*1}They've gone…{*2}Alice, you ok?{*3}Don't worry, it's nothing.{*4}I'm okay.{*5}I'll be fine.

X0501K_ZLAKTO_MEET_PC_X05KKARA_MEET.text: !6HH! {S}{*1}Are you Zlatko?{*2}I was told you could help us…{*3}Wait!{*4}We really need your help…

X0501K_ZLAKTO_MEET_PC_X05KZLATKO_MEET.text: !6HI! {S}{*1}Who's asking?{*2}I don't know who told you that. You came to the wrong place.{*3}I'm sorry.{*4}Come in.

X0502K_CHASE_GAMEOVER_PC_X05KZLATKO_SHOO.text:
!6HN! {S}{*TC:0|3120}I warned you that dreams only lead to trouble…
Ya should have listened to me…
