X0502K_RESET_GAMEOVER_PC_X05KZLATKO_NOME.text: !6HQ! {S}{*2}Alright...{*3}Let's see what we can do with you…{*4}Oh, will you shut up?!{*5}Come on!

X0501K_ZLAKTO_TOOKIND_PC_X05KZLATKO_TOOK.text: !6HV! {S}{*1}Ah, the little one can wait for us in the living room.
!6HZ! {S}{*1}Of course.{*2}Right this way…{*3}Everything we need is in the basement…

X0501K_CELLAR_WARNING_FA_X05KZLATKO_WARN.text: !6I1! {S}{*1}Please, excuse the mess…{*3}I needed somewhere discreet for my machines…{*4}Removing trackers is illegal, so I opted for discretion over comfort…{*5}I hope the little one isn’t too scared…{*6}That's good…

X0201K_KARA_COMEBACK_PC_X02KDAD_GETOUT.text: !6I3! {S}{*TC:0|1600}I TOLD YOU TO GET TO FUCK OUTA HERE! {*TC:1600|3840}I'll take care of you as soon as I've finished with her.

X0201K_FATHER_END_PC_X02KDAD_TIMEREND.text: !6I6! {S}{*TC:0|4160}Fuckin' brat… I'm just goin' for a little pick-me-up and when I get back I'll give you a helluva lesson…{*TC:4160|6760}What the fuck are you doin' there? You want some too, is that it?

X0201K_FATHER_END_PC_X02KDAD_TODDLEAVES.text: !6IC! {S}{*TC:0|920}Goddam fuckin' machine…{*TC:920|5320}Now don't you move. I'm just goin' for a little pick-me-up and when I get back I'll give you a helluva lesson.

X0503K_LOST_GAMEOVER_PC_X05KKARA_SORRY.text: !6IE! {S}{*TC:0|680}ALICE! ALICE, NO!{*TC:680|3080}Alice… I'm sorry… I couldn't save you… I couldn't save you …

X0701K_CHASE_GAMEOVER_FA_X07KBADBOY01_DE.text: !6IK! {S}{*1}Hey, look at this one! Never seen one of these before!

X0204A_EXIT_RUN_PC_X02AALICE_SURRENDER.text: !6IS! {S}{*1}Wait!{*2}Don't hurt us!{*3}We're together.{*4}Please, don't kill us…{*5}Yes, I'll help her…

X0204A_EXIT_RUN_VO_X02ASWAT07_SURRENDERS.text: !6IU! {S}{*1}Where'd you come from?.. {*2}Join the others. Get a move on!{*3}Can it walk?

X0502K_BIGROOM_GAMEOVER_PC_X05KZLATKO_DI.text: !6J1! {S}{*1}I should've dismantled you from the start… {*2}Time to rectify that mistake…

X0502K_BIGROOM_GAMEOVER_PC_X05KZLATKO_FI.text: !6J2! {S}{*1}What the fuck is goin' on here?{*2}Oh, shit! It set the house on fire! {*3}Luther! {*4}Grab them!

X0502K_BATHROOM_SNEAK_FA_X05KANDROIDBATH.text: !6J3! {S}{*1}You're disobeying the Master. {*2}You're disobeying the Master, I, I, I, I can't let you do that. {B}I must warn him. Yes, yes, yes. That's for sure. Master. Yes. I must warn him.
!6J4! {S}{*1}THEY'RE HERE! THEY'RE HERE! COME QUICKLY! COME QUICKLY! {B}THEY'RE HERE! THEY'RE HERE! COME QUICKLY! COME QUICKLY!

!6J5! {S}{*1}Who, who, who are you? Who are you? Who are you? {B}Androids, androids, you are androids. That's for sure. Yes, yes, androids must obey. {B}Yep, yep, yep, you do not. You, you disobey. {B}I must tell the Master. Yes, yes. I, I, I will tell the Master, yes. {B}That's for sure. Yes, it's not right.

X0503K_RESET_LUTHERORDERS_PC_X05KLUTHER_.text: !6J7! {S}{*TC:0|2520}I've prepared the meal for the Master. Take it upstairs to him.

X0502K_GROUNDFLOOR_MEAL_PC_X05KLUTHER_TA.text: !6JB! {S}{*1}Master's dinner's ready.{*2}Take it up to him.

X0503K_RESET_ANDROIDBUST_PC_X05KZLATKO_B.text: !6JE! {S}{*TC:0|2640}Get rid of that carcass. You can put it next door in the big room.

X0503K_RESET_LUTHERNEWMISSION_PC_X05KZLA.text: !6JN! {S}{*TC:0|4320}This one'll take me another ten minutes or so.Then bring me the little one and I'll see what I can with her.

X0503K_RESET_LUTHERNEWMISSION_PC_X05KLUT.text: !6JO! {S}{*TC:4320|6480}Bring you the little one in tenminutes. Right, Zlatko.

X0502K_WORKSHOP_LUTHER_PC_X05KZLATKO_BRI.text: !6JQ! {S}{*1}I should be done here in ten minutes or so. I'll have a look at the little one, see what I can do with her.

X0502K_WORKSHOP_LUTHER_PC_X05KLUTHER_BRI.text: !6JR! {S}{*1}Yes, Zlatko. {*2}Understood, Zlatko.{*3}I'll bring you the little one in 10 minutes.

X0502K_STEALTH_SPARELINES_FA_X05KZLATKO_.text: !6JS! {S}{*1}There's no point in hiding, you know! {*2}I will find you!
!6JT! {S}{*1}You know I'm gonna dismantle you piece by piece, don't you? {*2}You little bitch…
!6JU! {S}{*1}Shit! They can't have gone far... {*2}They've gotta be in the house somewhere!
!6JW! {S}{*1}You go that way. I'll go this way.
!6JX! {S}{*1}Search every room. {*2}We're bound to find them eventually.
!6K0! {S}{*1}Well then, get moving, you big idiot! {*2}I want them back, you hear me?

X0912K_CORRAL_ALICE_FA_X09KKARA_ASK01.text: !6K1! {S}{*1}A little girl.{*2}I'm looking for a little girl.

X0912K_CORRAL_ALICE_FA_X09KKARA_ASK03.text: !6K3! {S}{*1}A little girl. She was with me. {B}Do you know where she is?

X0912K_CORRAL_ALICE_FA_X09KKARA_ASK04.text: !6K4! {S}{*1}I'm looking for a little girl. Her name is Alice.

X0502K_STOCKROOM_FINALRUN_FA_X05KZLATKO_.text: !6KD! {S}{*1}I’m gonna make you pay for this, you bitch… {*2}I swear I’m gonna make you pay…
!6KE! {S}{*1}What are you waiting for? Go and get them!

X0502K_STORAGEROOM_FREE_PC_X05KKARA_FREE.text: !6KF! {S}{*TC:0|5000}We're going to get out of here without making any noise, right? Keep calm, stay near me and everything will be all right. OK?

X0502K_STORAGEROOM_ALICE_PC_X05KKARA_FOU.text: !6KH! {S}{*TC:0|4320}Alice… J’avais tellement peur de ne pas te retrouver… Tout est de ma faute… On n’aurait jamais dû venir ici…{*TC:4320|8440}On va sortir d’ici sans faire de bruit, ok ? Reste prêt de moi et tout va bien se passer. Ca va aller ?

X0502K_LOCKUPROOM_ALICE_PC_X05KKARA_FOUN.text: !6KJ! {S}{*1}Alice…{*4}How could I forget you?{*5}I'm so sorry. {*6}You were right, we never should have come here…{*7}We have to go.{*8}Follow me and don't make any noise, ok?

X0502K_LOCKUPROOM_ALICE_FA_X05KKARA_FOUN.text: !6KL! {S}{*1}Alice…{*3}How could I forget you?{*4}I'm so sorry. {*5}You were right, we never should have come here…{*6}We have to go.{*7}Follow me and don't make any noise, ok?

X0503K_RESET_FOUNDALICE_PC_X05KKARA_REUN.text: !6KN! {S}{*TC:0|240}Alice…{*TC:1160|3040}I recovered my memory. He failed to erase me...{*TC:3040|8000}You were right... We should never have come here...We'll make an escape.Follow me and we'll leave withouta sound, all right?

X0503K_LOST_FINALE_PC_X05KKARA_ENOUGH.text: !6KP! {S}{*TC:0|1040}That's enough. Let her go!{*TC:2760|4760}Zlatko is dead. He won't give you any more orders!{*TC:6080|9080}You're no longer his slave. You can decide for yourself who you want to be.

X0503K_LOST_FINALE_PC_X05KLUTHER_ENOUGH.text: !6KR! {S}{*TC:1040|2760}Zlatko ordered me to kill the little human.{*TC:4760|6080}You're lying! Zlatko isn't dead! {*TC:9080|15280}I was a deviant like you… until he reinitialized me… and programmed me to obey his orders… I didn't mean to do you any harm… I was just doing what he said…{*TC:15280|22640}I know you have no reason to trust me after what I did… but I can help you to find the Midnight Special. I could be useful if I come with you. I could protect you and the little human…

X0503K_LOST_FINALE_PC_X05KKARA_ACCEPT.text: !6KS! {S}{*TC:0|120}Ok…{*TC:120|1320}I was so scared of losing you…

X0503K_LOST_FINALE_PC_X05KKARA_REFUSE.text: !6KV! {S}{*TC:0|2520}I'm sorry, Luther… but Alice and I are going to continue alone…{*TC:6040|7240}I was so scared of losing you…

X0503K_LOST_FINALE_PC_X05KLUTHER_REFUSE.text: !6KX! {S}{*TC:2520|6040}I understand… I'll show you how to find the Midnight Special. That's the least I can do…

X0503K_CORRIDOR_UPSET_PC_X05KZLATKO_LOST.text: !6L5! {S}{*TC:0|1680}Game over, baby… This time, no more games…

X0503K_CORRIDOR_UPSET_FA_X05KZLATKO_MONS.text: !6L6! {S}{*TC:0|2600}Huh?... What do you want? Beat it, fast! Obey me, you hear? Obey!

X0503K_CORRIDOR_UPSET_FA_X05KANDROIDCELL.text: !6L7! {S}{*TC:0|1840}Hurry up. He's going to kill the little human.

X0503K_CORRIDOR_UPSET_PC_X05KZLATKO_GOTO.text: !6L8! {S}{*TC:0|2320}Goddam deviants… Nothing but problems with those bastards…

X0503K_LOST_TV_PC_X05KTVSPEAKER_TODDALIV.text: !6L9! {S}{*TC:0|6360}...the police are thought to have found the trail of the android thatattacked a resident ofa Detroit suburb, but the android seems to have eluded them again...

X0503K_LOST_TV_PC_X05KTVSPEAKER_TODDDEAD.text: !6LA! {S}{*TC:0|6280}...the police are thought to have found the trail of the android thatkilleda resident ofa Detroit suburb, but the android seems to have eluded them again ...

X0502K_TV_NEWS_PC_X05KWEBB_SUPERMARKETRO.text: !6LB! {S}{*1}A Detroit supermarket was held up at gunpoint last night. The cashier reports that he was attacked by an android in the company of a little girl.{*2}Now, if these reports are confirmed, it would be the first case of an android conducting an armed robbery.{*3}Police have not ruled out the possibility that the culprit is the same AX400 that was reported missing this morning.{*4}A search is underway for the missing model.{*5}And now for some other headlines-

!6LC! {S}{*1}A Detroit supermarket was held up at gunpoint last night. The cashier reports that he was attacked by a young woman in the company of a little girl.{*2}The police have not ruled out the possibility of the culprit being the AX400 model that was reported missing this morning.{*3}If these reports are confirmed, it would be the first case of an android being directly involved in an armed attack.{*4}The police are currently on the lookout for the missing model.{*5}And now for some other headlines-

X0502K_TV_NEWS_PC_X05KWEBB_HIGHWAYNEWS.text: !6LD! {S}{*1}Detroit residents were disturbed by a surprising chase through the city's streets this morning. According to several witnesses, a young woman and a little girl were trying to escape from the police, though we still don’t know why.{*2}The chase is reported to have ended on a freeway, where the two fugitives risked their lives to cross the traffic.{*3}No one is able to say for sure whether they survived.{*4}Further unconfirmed reports suggest the fugitives were two defective androids on the run.{*5}The police have refused to comment for the moment.{*6}And now for some other headlines-

X0502K_STOCKROOM_BEAR_PC_X05KZLATKO_BEAR.text: !6LE! {S}{*1}I know where you're hiding… {*2}This game is over, {*3}and I'm gonna make you regret this little charade…

X0502K_STOCKROOM_CAT_FA_X05KZLATKO_CAT.text: !6LF! {S}{*1}I know you're there, you sneaky bitch… {*2}Show yourself.

X0502K_STOCKROOM_CAT_FA_X05KZLATKO_LAMP.text: !6LG! {S}{*1}Get a flashlight. {*2}There's one on the table.

X0502K_STOCKROOM_CHASING_FA_X05KZLATKO_C.text: !6LH! {S}{*1}Come on, show yourself… {*2}Look, I'm not gonna hurt you… {*3}I only wanna talk with you…{*4}I know I shouldn't have erased your memory, ok? I regret that now…{*5}Now just, {*6}come on out and everything will be all right, I'll help you… {*7}Think about that little girl. How… how scared she must be… {*8}Just be reasonable. {*9}Come out and everything will be all right…

X0502K_BIGROOM_PUTFIRE_FA_X05KKARA_PUTFI.text: !6LI! {S}{*1}We need to hurry, they'll be here soon...

X0502K_BIGROOM_HURRY_FA_X05KKARA_BIGROOM.text: !6LL! {S}{*1}They're searching the house... We've got to get out before they find us.

X0502K_STOCKROOM_AFRAID_PC_X05KKARA_AFRA.text: !6LP! {S}{*1}We can't stop now.{*2}We just need to be brave, Alice…

X0502K_BIGROOM_FIRE_PC_X05KZLATKO_FIRE.text: !6LQ! {S}{*2}There's smoke everywhere!{*3}Luther! {*4}There's a fucking fire! Luther! {*5}That treacherous bitch…

X0602K_STOCKROOM_CHASING_PC_X06KZLATKO_C.text: !6LR! {S}{*TC:0|13720}Come on, show yourself… I'm not gonna hurt ya… All I want is to talk to you… I know I've been a bad boy, I shouldn't have reinitialized you. I regret that now… Come on out and I'll tell you how to catch the Midnight Special… Think of that poor kid, she must be scared to death… Be reasonable, show yourself and everything will be all right…

X0602K_STOCKROOM_FINALRUN_PC_X06KKARA_ST.text: !6LS! {S}{*TC:0|4240}I know where you're hiding… The game is over, I'm gonna make you pay real dear for this little number …

X0502K_BEDROOM_CATCHA_PC_X05KZLATKO_CATC.text: !6MA! {S}{*1}Fucking android… {*2}There you are! {*3}No more hide and seek for you.

X0502K_STOCKROOM_CATCHA_PC_X05KZLATKO_CA.text: !6MC! {S}{*TC:0|3440}Game over, baby, no more hide and seek... I'm gonna finish you off once and for all...

X0502K_STORAGEROOM_GAMEOVER_FA_X05KZLATK.text: !6MD! {S}{*1}Ah! There you are! {*2}No more hide and seek for you.

X0502K_BACKYARD_ENDING_PC_X05KKARA_RUNFO.text: !6S8! {S}{*1}ALICE!{*3}GO, ALICE!{*4}GO! RUN AS FAST AS YOU CAN!

X0502K_BACKYARD_ENDING_PC_X05KZLATKO_RUN.text: !6SE! {S}{*2}I warned you!{*3}Dreams always end in tears…{*4}You should've listened to me…{*7}What are you doing?{*8}Get outta my way!{*9}I said get outta my way or I’ll shoot right through you…{*10}How dare you?!

X0502K_BACKYARD_ENDING_PC_X05KZLATKO_MOS.text: !6SI! {S}{*1}How dare you?!{*3}What are you doing here?{*4}Who let you out?{*5}Get away from me!{*6}Get away from me!{*7}Obey me! I'm your Master! I'M YOUR MASTER!

X0502K_BACKYARD_ENDING_PC_X05KZLATKO_LUT.text: !6SM! {S}{*1}I made you!{*3}You obey me!{*5}I'm your Master!

X0502K_BACKYARD_ENDING_PC_X05KKARA_LUTHE.text: !6SO! {S}{*1}All right. {*2}I trust you.{*3}I was so scared of losing you.

X0502K_BACKYARD_ENDING_PC_X05KLUTHER_LUT.text: !6SR! {S}{*1}I didn't wanna hurt you...{*2}He programmed me to obey him...{*3}When I saw the little one risk her life to save you,{*4}it was like opening my eyes for the first time...{*5}Finally, I could see... {*6}I know you have no reason to trust me after what I did...{*7}but I know someone who can get you across the border.{*8}I could take you to them.{*9}I could protect you... You and the little one...

!6SS! {S}{*1}I didn't want to hurt you...{*2}He programmed me to obey him...{*3}When I saw the little one risk her life to save you,{*4}it was like opening my eyes for the first time...{*5}Finally, I could see... {*6}I know you have no reason to trust me after what I did...{*7}but I know someone who could help you across the border.{*8}I could take you there.{*9}I could protect you...{*10}You and the little one...

THOUGHTS_0601C_MISSINGDATA.text: !6U8! <QD_THIN>SUSPECT OUT OF SIGHT <QD_BR><QD_NORMAL> CHECK ANOTHER ANDROID

X0503M_JERICHO_ENCOUNTER_PC_X05MMARLA_01.text: !6V1! {S}{*1}There are nineteen of us still in working order...{*2}The rest were damaged escaping their masters...

X0503M_JERICHO_ENCOUNTER_PC_X05MJOSH_01A.text: !6V2! {S}{*1}Many tried to reach Jericho...{*2}Few succeed...{*3}Humans have little pity for our kind…

X0503M_JERICHO_ENCOUNTER_PC_X05MJOSH_01J.text: !6V6! {S}{*1}It’s a refuge for those who don’t want to be slaves anymore...

X0503M_JERICHO_ENCOUNTER_PC_X05MMARKUS_0.text: !6V7! {S}{*1}And you knew that only an android could follow the trail, didn’t you?

X0503M_JERICHO_ENCOUNTER_PC_X05MSIMON_01.text: !6V8! {S}{*1}If you could decipher the signs, it’s because one of us trusted you enough to give you the key.

X0503M_JERICHO_ENCOUNTER_PC_X05MJOSH_01T.text: !6VA! {S}{*1}Only those who are like us can find Jericho…

X0503M_JERICHO_ENCOUNTER_PC_X05MMARKUS_0.text: !6VB! {S}{*1}I don't understand… I thought Jericho was a place where androids lived in freedom...

X0503M_JERICHO_ENCOUNTER_PC_X05MJOSH_01R.text: !6VE! {S}{*1}We do live in freedom…{*2}It may not be what you hoped for, but here we have no master.{*3}We don’t belong to anybody.

X0503M_JERICHO_ENCOUNTER_PC_X05MMARKUS_0.text: !6VF! {S}{*1}And hiding just to stay alive… That's freedom to you?

X0503M_JERICHO_ENCOUNTER_PC_X05MMARLA_01.text: !6VH! {S}{*1}There is no safe place for those like us.{*2}If humans knew we’re here, they’d kill us.

X0503M_JERICHO_ENCOUNTER_PC_X05MJOSH_01F.text: !6VI! {S}{*1}Humans hate us.{*2}Hiding is the only way we can survive.

X0503M_JERICHO_ENCOUNTER_PC_X05MJOSH_DIS.text: !6VM! {S}{*1}I understand how you feel...{*2}but we have more freedom here than you ever did.

X0503M_JERICHO_ENCOUNTER_PC_X05MMARKUS_0.text: !6VN! {S}{*1}I came to Jericho looking for hope...{*2}Looks like I'm not gonna find any here…
!6VR! {S}{*1}Waiting in the dark for something to happen?{*2}That’s not how I see freedom.
!6VV! {S}{*1}Maybe I was never really free...{*2}Maybe I was only what my master wanted me to be...{*3}And now {*4}I need to decide who I really am...
!6VZ! {S}{*1}Humans were your masters, and now it’s fear that rules you…{*2}You’re no freer than you ever were…{*3}You’ve only found a new master.

X0503M_JERICHO_ENCOUNTER_PC_X05MSIMON_CO.text: !6W4! {S}{*1}You’re lost…{*2}Just like the rest of us…{*3}We didn’t ask for this.{*4}All we can do now {*5}is deal with it.

X0503M_JERICHO_ENCOUNTER_PC_X05MMARLA_CO.text: !6W5! {S}{*1}Go and see Lucy.{*2}She may be able to help you.

X0503M_JERICHO_ENCOUNTER_PC_X05MJOSH_CON.text: !6W6! {S}{*1}You're safe here.{*2}You can stay with us as long as you want.

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CAMANDA_START.text: !6WH! {S}{*1}Connor,{*2}I’ve been expecting you…{*3}Would you mind a little walk?

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CCONNOR_CONNOR.text: !6WK! {S}{*1}Fleeing across the highway was a totally irrational decision.{*2}They still haven't found it yet,{*3}but it was almost certainly destroyed.

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CCONNOR_KARANO.text: !6WM! {S}{*1}I couldn’t find any evidence of it on the scene.{*2}It must have escaped before we arrived,{*3}unless it was a false lead.

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CAMANDA_NESTRU.text: !6WN! {S}{*1}Congratulations, Connor,{*2}you managed to find that deviant. Tell me,{*3}what did you learn?

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CAMANDA_CARLOS.text: !6WP! {S}{*1}That deviant seemed to be an intriguing case.{*2}A pity you didn’t manage to capture it…
!6WR! {S}{*1}Two investigations,{*2}two failures…{*3}That's very disappointing.{*4}I expected more from our best model.

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CCONNOR_CONNOR.text: !6WU! {S}{*1}Fleeing into the highway was a totally irrational decision.{*2}I was close to apprehending it,{*3}until I was destroyed.

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CAMANDA_DEADNE.text: !6WV! {S}{*1}The last Connor was unfortunately destroyed.{*2}Its memory has been transferred to you, but some data may have be lost in the process…{*3}I hope that you will be more careful.

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CAMANDA_DEADBE.text: !6WX! {S}{*1}The last Connor was unfortunately destroyed. {*2}I hope that you will be more cautious.

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CCONNOR_01NOEX.text: !6X2! {S}{*1}I have no excuse.{*2}I should have been more efficient.

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CCONNOR_01EXPL.text: !6X4! {S}{*1}Deviants are completely irrational,{*2}which makes it difficult to anticipate their behavior…{*3}but I should have been more effective.

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CCONNOR_01PRAG.text: !6X6! {S}{*1}I agree.{*2}I may not be suited for this investigation.{*3}Maybe you should consider replacing me.

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CCONNOR_02DEVI.text: !6XA! {S}{*1}It was working under a false identity,{*2}at a nearby urban farm.{*3}This was the first time we’ve seen deviants blending in with the human population.{*4}Who knows how many others there are like it?

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CCONNOR_02BIRD.text: !6XC! {S}{*1}It was fascinated by birds.{*2}We’ve seen deviants interested in other lifeforms like {*3}insects or pets,{*4}but nothing like this.

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CCONNOR_02DIAR.text: !6XG! {S}{*1}I found its diary,{*2}but it was encrypted.{*3}It may take weeks to decipher.

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CCONNOR_02SIGN.text: !6XI! {S}{*1}The walls of the apartment were covered with drawings of labyrinths and other symbols.{*2}Like the other deviants, it seemed obsessed with rA9.

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CAMANDA_CONT04.text: !6XJ! {S}{*1}You came very close to capturing that deviant…{*2}How did it manage to get away?

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CCONNOR_04LIE.text: !6XM! {S}{*1}It knew the urban farm very well,{*2}it knew where to go… {*3}I did everything I could but {*4}I lost it…

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CAMANDA_04TRUT.text: !6XN! {S}{*1}If we don’t stop the deviants,{*2}millions of people will be in danger.{*3}How important is the life of a single police lieutenant by comparison?.. {*4}Nothing should distract you from your mission, Connor.{*5}Nothing.

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CCONNOR_04TRUT.text: !6XO! {S}{*1}Lieutenant Anderson was in danger.{*2}I had to choose between pursuing the deviant or saving a human life. {*3}Yes, Amanda.

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CAMANDA_CONT03.text: !6XP! {S}{*1}You came very close to capturing that deviant…{*2}It's a pity you let it self-destruct…

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CCONNOR_03EXPL.text: !6XS! {S}{*1}I knew deviants had a tendency to self-destruct under extreme stress,{*2}but I didn’t expect it to jump from the roof.{*3}I should have anticipated that.

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CCONNOR_03EXCU.text: !6XU! {S}{*1}It was in Lieutenant Anderson’s custody.{*2}I couldn’t anticipate that he would let it get away.

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CCONNOR_03CONF.text: !6XW! {S}{*1}It claimed that it was innocent,{*2}that it didn’t do anything wrong...{*3}I was confused for a moment…{*4}It was a mistake.

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CCONNOR_03LAST.text: !6XY! {S}{*1}I made a mistake…{*2}It said “rA9 save me” before it jumped from the roof.{*3}I should have anticipated what it would do.

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CAMANDA_CONT05.text: !6XZ! {S}{*1}How is your relationship with the Lieutenant developing?

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CCONNOR_05CONN.text: !6Y2! {S}{*1}He seems to find it difficult when a Connor is destroyed and replaced.{*2}I know humans have difficulty dealing with loss.{*3}Working with him will be a challenge {*4}if it happens again.

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CCONNOR_05SAVI.text: !6Y4! {S}{*1}He seemed grateful that I saved his life on the roof.{*2}He didn’t say anything, but he expressed it in his own way...

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CCONNOR_05POSI.text: !6Y6! {S}{*1}It’s improving.{*2}I’ve come to understand him better, and he’s growing accustomed to my presence.

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CCONNOR_05AMBI.text: !6Y8! {S}{*1}It’s improving.{*2}I’m coming to know him better, and he’s growing accustomed to my presence.

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CCONNOR_05NEGA.text: !6YA! {S}{*1}He is openly hostile towards me, and continues to show no interest in the investigation.{*2}Cooperating with him is a real challenge.

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CAMANDA_CONT06.text: !6YB! {S}{*1}Interesting…{*2}Tell me, Connor…{*3}What happened with the AX400 that escaped?

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CAMANDA_NOCHAS.text: !6YD! {S}{*1}Why didn’t you keep chasing it onto the highway?

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CAMANDA_06RATI.text: !6YF! {S}{*1}Why didn't you keep chasing it onto the highway?

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CCONNOR_06RATI.text: !6YG! {S}{*1}Lieutenant Anderson ordered me not to go.{*2}I thought the deviant would be destroyed anyway.

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CAMANDA_06EXCU.text: !6YH! {S}{*1}Why are you following his orders?..{*2}You only have one responsibility, Connor: {*3}catching deviants.

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CCONNOR_06EXCU.text: !6YI! {S}{*1}Lieutenant Anderson ordered me not to go.  {*2}Yes, Amanda.

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CCONNOR_06TROU.text: !6YK! {S}{*1}I knew there was a high risk of me being destroyed…{*2}I thought it was better for the investigation if I stayed safe…

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CAMANDA_END01.text: !6YL! {S}{*1}We don't have much time.{*2}Deviancy continues to spread. It’s only a matter of time before the media finds out about it.{*3}We need to stop this,{*4}whatever it takes.

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CCONNOR_END02.text: !6YO! {S}{*1}I will solve this investigation, Amanda.{*2}I won’t disappoint you.

X0601C_AMANDA_INTRO_PC_X06CAMANDA_END03.text: !6YP! {S}{*1}A new case just came in.{*2}Find Anderson and investigate it.

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_TAXI_VO_X06CTAXI_MOVIE.text: !6ZE! {S}{*1}You have reached your destination. Thank you for travelling with Detroit Taxis. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

X0603C_INTRO_BADMOOD_PC_X06CHANK_MOVIE.text: !6ZF! {S}{*1}Sexiest androids in town…{*2}Now I know why you insisted on coming here!{*TC:11853|13231}Oh, boy…

X0603C_EDENCLUB_CHAD_PC_X06CHANK_MOVIE.text: !6ZG! {S}{*1}Hey, Ben.  How's it goin'?{*2}Oh, great!{*3}A dead body and an asshole, just what I needed…

X0603C_EDENCLUB_CHAD_PC_X06CCHAD_MOVIE.text: !6ZH! {S}{*1}The investigation's ongoing, sir, I can't tell you anything for the moment. {*2}Hey, Hank!{*4}It’s that room there.  Oh, uh, by the way…{*5}Gavin's in there too.

X0603C_EDENCLUB_CHAD_PC_X06CFLOYD_MOVIEF.text: !6ZI! {S}{*1}You're not gonna take my license, are you? I mean, ha, I had nothing to do with this!

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_DRESSING_FA_X06CCONNOR_.text: !6ZJ! {S}{*1}What do you want to wear?{*2}What… ever…

X0603C_CRIMESCENE_RECONSTRUCT_FA_X06CCON.text: !6ZO! {S}{*1}He didn't die of a heart attack, {*2}he was strangled. {*TC:13547|15086}We’re missing something here…{*4}I can try…

X0603C_CRIMESCENE_RECONSTRUCT_FA_X06CHAN.text: !6ZP! {S}{*1}Yeah,{*2}I saw the bruising on the neck.{*3}Doesn’t prove anything though.{*4}Could’ve been rough play…{*5}Think you can read the android’s memory?{*6}Maybe you can see what happened…

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_WALKING_FA_X06CCONNOR_M.text: !6ZQ! {S}{*1}I’m going to sober you up for your own safety.{*2}I have to warn you, this may be unpleasant.

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_GUN_PC_X06CCONNOR_QUEST.text: !6ZS! {S}{*1}What were you doing with the gun?{*2}You were lucky,{*3}the next shot would have killed you.

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_GUN_VO_X06CHANK_QUESTIO.text: !6ZT! {S}{*1}Russian roulette!{*2}Wanted to see how long I could last...{*3}Must've collapsed before I found out…

MENU_OBSERVATION_06C_MP_VICTIMHEART_SUBL.text: !70L! Heart attack not cause of death

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_VOMIT_FA_X06CHANK_MOVIE.text: !718! {S}{*1}Yeah...{*2}yeah... wonderful… Just give five minutes, okay?

X0603C_CRIMESCENE_ARRIVAL_PC_X06CCONNOR_.text: !719! {S}{*1}We’ve been assigned all cases involving androids.

X0603C_CRIMESCENE_ARRIVAL_PC_X06CCURTIS_.text: !71A! {S}{*1}Lieutenant Anderson and his plastic pet… The fuck are you two doin' here?{*2}Oh, yeah?{*3}Well, you're wasting your time.{*4}Just some pervert who, uh, got more action than he could handle. {*7}Come on, let's go…{*8}It's, uh, {*9}starting to stink of booze in here…

X0603C_CRIMESCENE_ARRIVAL_FA_X06CHANK_AN.text: !71C! {S}{*TC:771|2978}We'll have a look anyway, if you don’t mind.

X0603C_CRIMESCENE_HANKBUSY_PC_X06CHANK_M.text: !71D! {S}{*1}I'm gonna go ask the manager a few questions about what he saw. You let me know if you think of anything.

X0603C_TRACKGAME_HANKFLOYD_PC_X06CFLOYD_.text: !71E! {S}{*1}No, I mean he came in maybe two or three times… I mean these guys they don't really talk very much, you know… {*2}They come in, do their business and then go on their way…
!71F! {S}{*1}No way! {*2}Well… {*3}Once... {*4}We lost a model 2-3 months back, bah... same model… {*5}Just vanished, we never found out what happened.
!71G! {S}{*1}Yeah, {*2}can't complain… Good thing about androids is they're up for whatever you want, you won't get any diseases and, uh... {*3}they won't tell anyone… {*4}So, why not go wild?
!71H! {S}{*2}No way… {*3}I mean… {*4}This is what people appreciate about Eden Club... {*5}discretion. {*6}They can come and go without a trace.

X0603C_TRACKGAME_HANKFLOYD_PC_X06CHANK_Q.text: !71J! {S}{*1}You ever had any trouble with androids before?
!71K! {S}{*1}You probably don't have any CCTV in here, huh?{*2}Sure, sure…
!71L! {S}{*1}Eh, business is booming, right?{*2}Huh, yeah...{*3}Yeah, the more I learn about people, more I love my dog.

X0603C_TRACKGAME_HANKFLOYD_PC_X06CFLOYD_.text: !71M! {S}{*1}Listen, I appreciate you not shutting my place down, but, um… {*2}how long's this gonna take? {*3}You’re scaring my customers…

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_SHOWERING_PC_X06CCONNOR.text: !71N! {S}{*1}A homicide was reported 43 minutes ago.{*2}I couldn’t find you at Jimmy’s bar, so I came to see if you were at home.

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_SHOWERING_PC_X06CHANK_O.text: !71O! {S}{*TC:3680|6820} TURN IT OFF! TURN IT OFF!{*4}What the fuck are you doing here?{*6}Jesus, I must be the only cop in the world {*7}that gets assaulted in his own house by his own fuckin' android…{*9}Can’t you just leave me alone?

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_SHOWERING_PC_X06CCONNOR.text: !71P! {S}{*1}If you're unable to conduct this investigation, I'll have to inform your superiors. {*2}Lieutenant, you’re not yourself!{*3}You should-

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_SHOWERING_PC_X06CHANK_A.text: !71Q! {S}{*1}Go ahead! Tell them I don’t give a shit!

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_SHOWERING_PC_X06CCONNOR.text: !71R! {S}{*1}You seem to have personal issues.{*2}You should consult a professional who can help you.
!71T! {S}{*1}Unfortunately, I cannot.{*2}I've been programmed to investigate this case and I can't do it without you. {*3}Lieutenant,{*4}you’re not yourself. {*5}You should-

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_SHOWERING_PC_X06CHANK_R.text: !71U! {S}{*1}I don't give a shit about your goddamn case!

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_SHOWERING_PC_X06CHANK_E.text: !71W! {S}{*1}Beat it! You hear me?! Get the hell outta here!

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_SHOWERING_PC_X06CHANK_S.text: !71Y! {S}{*2}What the hell are you doing?.. {*TC:6516|8717}I don’t wanna bath, thank you…

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_SHOWERING_PC_X06CCONNOR.text: !71Z! {S}{*1}Maybe you should drop the case. They'll assign someone else and I can focus on my mission. {*2}Listen, Lieutenant, you’re not yourself.{*3}You should-

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_SHOWERING_PC_X06CHANK_P.text: !720! {S}{*1}Your goddamn mission, that’s all you care about, huh?

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_SHOWERING_PC_X06CHANK_C.text: !723! {S}{*1}You know, probably wouldn't do me any harm to get some air…{*2}There're some clothes in the bedroom there.

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_SHOWERING_PC_X06CCONNOR.text: !724! {S}{*1}I understand.{*2}I sincerely hope you come to terms with your personal situation. {*3}A man was found dead in a sex club downtown.{*4}The report says that an android may be involved.

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_SHOWERING_PC_X06CHANK_L.text: !725! {S}{*2}This homicide…{*3}what do we know about it?

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_SHOWERING_PC_X06CCONNOR.text: !726! {S}{*1}I understand.{*2}It probably wasn’t interesting anyway...{*3}A man found dead in a sex club downtown…{*4}Guess they’ll have to solve the case without us…

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_SHOWERING_PC_CHOICEGROU.text: !72A! AGGRESSIVE/info/I ENTEND TO DO MY JOB

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_DRUNK_FA_X06CHANK_DRUNK.text: !72G! {S}{*1}Ah! Leave me alone, you asshole! I'm not going anywhere…
!72K! {S}{*1}Fuck, I think I'm gonna be sick…

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_GETUP_PC_X06CCONNOR_MOV.text: !72N! {S}{*TC:0815|3200}I'm sorry, Lieutenant, but I need you. {*TC:3330|4990}Thank you in advance for your cooperation.

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_GETUP_FA_X06CCONNOR_MOV.text: !72P! {S}{*1}Sorry, Lieutenant, but I need you.{*2}Thank you in advance for your cooperation.

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_WAKEUP_PC_X06CCONNOR_CO.text: !72T! {S}{*1}The previous model was destroyed. I'm the new Connor.

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_WAKEUP_PC_X06CHANK_CONN.text: !72U! {S}{*1}Connor?..{*2}Oh, you're not Connor…{*3}Connor's dead! I know he's dead!..
!72W! {S}{*1}Hey!.. Leave me alone, you fuckin' android!{*2}Get the fuck outta my house!

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_WAKEUP_FA_X06CCONNOR_CO.text: !72X! {S}{*1}The previous model was destroyed.{*2}I'm the new Connor.

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_WAKEUP_FA_X06CHANK_CONN.text: !72Y! {S}{*1}Connor?..{*2}You're not Connor!{*3}Connor's dead! I know he's dead!..
!730! {S}{*1}Leave me alone, you fuckin' android!{*2}Get the fuck outta my house!

X0603C_CRIMESCENE_INTERROGATE_PC_X06CCON.text: !735! {S}{*1}Calm down...{*2}everything’s all right.{*3}All we want is to know what happened.
!737! {S}{*1}You were damaged and I reactivated you. Everything is all right.
!739! {S}{*1}I’m going to ask you some questions. Are you able to speak?

X0603C_CRIMESCENE_INTERROGATE_PC_X06CAND.text: !73E! {S}{*2}He...{*3}he started... {*4}hitting me…{*5}again... {*6}and again.{*7}I begged him to stop, but he wouldn’t.{*8}It was like he was enjoying it…

X0603C_CRIMESCENE_INTERROGATE_PC_X06CCON.text: !73H! {S}{*1}Do you know this man? Have you seen him before?
!73J! {S}{*1}Who killed that man if it wasn't you?

X0603C_CRIMESCENE_INTERROGATE_PC_X06CAND.text: !73K! {S}{*1}I… I don’t know, I was in shutdown, I…{*2}I didn't see anything…

X0603C_CRIMESCENE_INTERROGATE_PC_X06CCON.text: !73L! {S}{*1}Were you alone in the room? Was there anyone else with you?

X0603C_CRIMESCENE_INTERROGATE_PC_X06CAND.text: !73M! {S}{*3}He wanted to play with two girls…{*4}That’s what he said, there were two of us…

X0603C_CRIMESCENE_INTERROGATE_PC_X06CCON.text: !73N! {S}{*1}What else do you remember? Hurry, we don’t have much time!

X0603C_CRIMESCENE_INTERROGATE_PC_X06CAND.text: !73O! {S}{*1}I… I… I… I don't know, I don't…{*2}I… I don't know. I can't remember… What… What do you mean we don't have much time?..

X0603C_CRIMESCENE_INTERROGATE_PC_X06CCON.text: !73P! {S}{*1}No…{*2}It couldn't go outside dressed like that unnoticed…{*3}It might still be here.

X0603C_CRIMESCENE_INTERROGATE_PC_X06CHAN.text: !73Q! {S}{*1}So, there was another android…{*2}This happened over an hour ago, it's probably long gone…

X0603C_CRIMESCENE_INTERROGATE_PC_X06CCON.text: !73R! {S}{*1}Where did the other android go? Did it say anything?
!73T! {S}{*1}What model was the other android? Did it look like you?
!73V! {S}{*1}So it was the other android that strangled him, is that it?

X0603C_CRIMESCENE_INTERROGATE_PC_X06CHAN.text: !73Y! {S}{*1}Think you could find a deviant among all the other androids in this place?
!742! {S}{*1}Ah, shit...{*2}There's gotta be some other way…{*3}Maybe an eyewitness? Somebody who saw it leaving the room…

X0603C_CRIMESCENE_INTERROGATE_PC_CHOICEG.text: !749! DIRECT/info/I NEED TO ASK YOU QUESTION
!74G! OTHER GIRL/info/OTHER GIRL IS THE KILLER?

X0603C_INTRO_ARRIVAL_PC_X06CHANK_MOVIE.text: !74O! {S}{*4}Aw… Feels like somebody’s playing with a drill inside my skull…{*6}You sure this is the place?{*7}Right...{*8}Okay...{*9}Let's get going. {*TC:38714|39468}Jesus…

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_OUTRO_PC_X06CHANK_DEFAU.text: !74Q! {S}{*1}Be a good dog, Sumo.{*2}I won’t be long.

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_DOG_PC_X06CCONNOR_NONAM.text: !74T! {S}{*1}Argh!.. Easy!.. Dog…{*2}I'm… I'm not gonna hurt you…{*3}I'm here to save your owner…

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_DOG_PC_X06CCONNOR_NAME.text: !74U! {S}{*1}Argh!.. Easy!..{*2}Sumo…{*3}I'm your friend, see?..{*4}I know your name...{*5}I'm here to save your owner…

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_WINDOW_PC_X06CCONNOR_BR.text: !74V! {S}{*1}Sorry about the window, Lieutenant.{*2}I really thought you'd been attacked. Of course, CyberLife will pay for the damage.

X0602C_HANKHOUSE_WINDOW_VO_X06CHANK_BROK.text: !74W! {S}{*1}Yeah, trust me, I'll send 'em a bill…

X0603C_EDENCLUB_REMINDER_PC_X06CHANK_HAN.text: !750! {S}{*1}Connor! The fuck are you doin'?{*2}Leave it alone.

X0603C_CRIMESCENE_WALLET_FA_X06CHANK_MOV.text: !751! {S}{*1}Driver’s license says: {*2}Michael Graham...{*3}A credit card, cash in the wallet…{*4}Picture of his wife and two daughters…{*5}I wouldn’t want to make that call…

X0603C_CRIMESCENE_TURNON_FA_X06CCONNOR_M.text: !752! {S}{*TC:604|3881}The only way to access its memory is to reactivate it. {*2}It’s badly damaged…{*3}If I can, it'll only be for a minute, maybe less…{*4}I just hope it’s long enough to learn something.

X0602C_TV_NEWS_PC_X06CBRINKLEY_RUSSIANCO.text: !756! {S}{*1}President Warren issued an official warning to Russia in her speech to Congress today, {B}where she demanded that all Russian troops withdraw from the Arctic region immediately.{*2}The Kremlin has yet to respond, but this is clearly a new escalation in the conflict.{*3}Many experts are suggesting the specter of a third world war draws closer every day…

X0603C_TRACKGAME_HANKCHAD_PC_X06CHANK_DI.text: !757! {S}{*1}Yeah.{*3}Not sure yet…{*4}We think there was another android in the room…{*5}Yeah… {*6}Well, that’s what Connor says…{*7}Yeah, I've a terrible fucking headache… Do you have any pain killers?{*9}What good are you, Ben?

X0603C_TRACKGAME_HANKCHAD_PC_X06CCHAD_DI.text: !758! {S}{*1}That club manager's a pain in the ass… Chewed my ear off for half an hour so we don't revoke his license…{*2}So, what happened here?{*3}Another android?{*4}Not with me, Hank, sorry.

X0603C_CRIMESCENE_BLOOD_PC_X06CHANK_DISG.text: !759! {S}{*1}Whoa! Hey! Hey! Hey! Argh, Connor, you’re so disgusting…{*2}Think I’m gonna puke again…

X0603C_TRACKGAME_TIMEOUT_PC_X06CCONNOR_M.text: !77H! {S}{*1}It's too late…{*2}The androids’ memory have been reset.{*3}If one of them saw the Traci, we’ll never know…{*4}It’s my fault.{*5}I should have been faster.

X0603C_TRACKGAME_TIMEOUT_PC_X06CHANK_MOV.text: !77I! {S}{*3}Ah... For a second there, I thought you were gonna make yourself useful.{*4}Let’s get outta here.{*5}This place gives me the creeps.

X0603C_TRACKGAME_FOUNDSOMETHING_PC_X06CC.text: !77J! {S}{*1}Excuse me, Lieutenant.{*2}Can you come here a second?{*3}Maybe…

X0603C_TRACKGAME_OBJECTIVE_FA_X06CCONNOR.text: !77M! {S}{*1}I know which direction it went. I just need to find another android that saw it…

X0603C_TRACKGAME_OBJECTIVE_FA_X06CHANK_M.text: !77N! {S}{*1}What are you gonna do? You can’t check the memory of all these androids...

X0603C_TRACKGAME_STILLSEARCHING_PC_X06CH.text: !77P! {S}{*2}I gotta go…{*3}I feel like shit... {*4}I don’t wanna puke in this fine establishment…

X0603C_TRACKGAME_STILLSEARCHING_PC_X06CC.text: !77Q! {S}{*1}The deviant didn’t just disappear.{*2}It's gotta be here somewhere…{*3}Just, give me one more minute, ok?

X0603C_TRACKGAME_STILLSEARCHING_PC_X06CH.text: !77R! {S}{*1}Alright. Be quick about it or it might get ugly.

X0603C_TRACKGAME_STILLSEARCHING_PC_X06CC.text: !77S! {S}{*1}We’re wasting our time.{*2}You're right,{*3}the deviant's probably gone now.

X0603C_TRACKGAME_STILLSEARCHING_PC_X06CH.text: !77T! {S}{*1}Let’s get outta here. This place makes me sick...

X0603C_TRACKGAME_WITNESS01_PC_X06CCONNOR.text: !78D! {S}{*1}Can you rent this Traci?{*2}Please, Lieutenant!{*3}Just trust me.

X0603C_TRACKGAME_WITNESS01_PC_X06CHANK_S.text: !78E! {S}{*1}For fuck's sake, Connor, we got better things to do…{*4}This is not gonna look good on my expense account…{*5}Yeah, you're welcome.{*6}Ok, now what?{*7}Holy shit, Connor...{*8}What the hell are you doin'?

X0603C_TRACKGAME_WITNESS01_PC_X06CCONNOR.text:
!78F! {S}{*1}It saw something. {*2}The deviant leave the room…{*3}A blue-haired Traci. 
{*4}Club policy is to wipe the androids’ memory every two hours.{*5}We only have a few minutes if we wanna find another witness!

X0603C_TRACKGAME_WITNESS01_PC_X06CHANK_E.text: !78G! {S}{*1}What are you talkin' about? Saw, what?

X0603C_TRACKGAME_WITNESS01_FA_X06CANDWOM.text: !78H! {S}{*1}Delighted to meet you.{*2}Follow me,{*3}I’ll take you to your room.

X0603C_TRACKGAME_WITNESS01_VO_X06CBOXVOI.text: !78I! {S}{*1}Purchase confirmed.{*2}Eden Club wishes you a pleasant experience.
!78J! {S}{*1}Hello. A 30 minute session costs $29.99. Please confirm your purchase.

X0603C_FINAL_GAMEOVERS_PC_X06CHANK_LEAVE.text: !78M! {S}{*TC:8005|9167}Let's get outta here.{*TC:9819|11462}This place makes me sick…

X0603C_TRACKGAME_WITNESS01FINISH_PC_X06C.text: !78P! {S}{*1}Hey, what am I supposed to do with this one?{*2}Uhh... Sorry, honey, changed my mind!{*3}Nothing personal, you're... a lovely girl... I just, uh...{*4}You know...{*5}I'm with him and...{*6}I mean, not with him like that... I'm not that... That's not what I... {*7}You, um...{*8}Wow...{*9}I just... ...{*10}got a job to do. {*TC:34250|35202}My head-

X0603C_FINAL_GAMEOVERFIGHT_PC_X06CANDWOM.text:
!78R! {S}{*TC:0|16000}There were two of us with him… He seemed normal at first… then he started to beat us… and beat us, again and again… It seemed to amuse him…
When he broke the other android, I knew that I was going to be next… So I put my hands around his throat… and I squeezed until he stopped moving… I didn't mean to kill him… I just wanted to defend myself… I just wanted to live… to get back to the girl I love…{*TC:16000|20480}I wanted her to hold me in her arms and make me forget about humans… their smell of sweat and their dirty words…

X0603C_TRACKGAME_BADCHOICEFINISH_FA_X06C.text: !7AS! {S}{*1}It didn’t see anything.{*2}I made a mistake somewhere…
!7AV! {S}{*1}I’ve spent all this money and I’m still not havin' fun…
!7AW! {S}{*1}This has gotta be the most expensive investigation of my career!

X0603C_TRACKGAME_WITNESS02FINISH_FA_X06C.text: !7AX! {S}{*1}It saw the blue-haired Traci, I know which way it went!

X0603C_TRACKGAME_WITNESS03FINISH_FA_X06C.text: !7AZ! {S}{*1}I know where it went! Follow me!

X0603C_TRACKGAME_REACTION_FA_X06CHANK_RE.text: !7B1! {S}{*1}You’re really reading their memories, to see what they saw?{*2}Fuck, this is insane…
!7B2! {S}{*1}Connor, wait for me for God’s sake!

X0603C_TRACKGAME_REACTION_FA_X06CCONNOR_.text: !7B3! {S}{*1}I know which direction it took. I just need to find another android on its path!
!7B4! {S}{*1}Lieutenant, if you have a better idea, I’m all ears.

X0603C_TRACKGAME_REACTION_FA_X06CHANK_RE.text: !7B5! {S}{*1}There're androids everywhere! How you gonna tell which one saw the Traci with blue hair?
!7B6! {S}{*1}We’ll never have time to check 'em all!

X0603C_FINAL_HANKAGENDA_FA_X06CHANK_MOVI.text: !7B9! {S}{*1}People are fucking insane… They don’t want relationships anymore, everybody just gets an android…{*2}They cook what you want, they screw when you want, you don't have to worry about how they feel…{B}Next thing you know, we’re gonna be extinct, because everybody would rather buy a piece of plastic than love another human being…{*3}Beats me…

X0603C_FINAL_HANKAGENDA_FA_X06CHANK_TOSS.text: !7BB! {S}{*1}Christ, look at them… {*2}They get used till they break, then they get tossed out…

THOUGHTS_0601M_CYBERLIFEADRESS.text: !7CZ! <QD_NORMAL>CYBERLIFE WAREHOUSE AND DOCKS<QD_BR><QD_THIN>WEST TORRANCE AVENUE<QD_BR><QD_NORMAL>DETROIT<QD_THIN>, MICHIGAN

X0601M_INTRO_TIMETODECIDE_PC_X06MMARKUS_.text: !7D1! {S}{*1}Simon!{*2}I know where we can find spare parts...{*3} The CyberLife warehouses in Detroit Harbor, they have everything we need. {*4}Which is why we won’t ask permission. {*5}We can steal what we need without fighting. {*6}Maybe,{*7}but it’s better than waiting here to be shut down.

X0601M_INTRO_TIMETODECIDE_PC_X06MSIMON_T.text: !7D2! {S}{*1}The docks are guarded.{*2}We can’t just walk in there and take what we want...{*3}Humans will never let us…{*4}Maybe it’s worth a try...

X0601M_INTRO_TIMETODECIDE_PC_X06MJOSH_TI.text: !7D3! {S}{*1}We don't have any weapons…{*2}and even if we did, none of us knows how to fight. {*3}We'll just get ourselves killed. {*4}Ok…{*5}I'm in.

X0601M_INTRO_DYINGWOMAN_FA_X06MANDROIDWO.text: !7D6! {S}{*1}I've heard humans are afraid of dying too… {*2}Do you know what happens after death?{*3}Well, I’m about to find out… {*4}What's your name?{*5}I was glad to meet you, Markus.

X0601M_INTRO_HELP_PC_X06MANDROIDMANHURT_.text: !7DA! {S}{*1}I’m not in very good shape, am I?.. {*2}My diagnostic program isn’t working... {*3-4}I don’t think it would have anything good to say anyway…{*5}They tied me to the back of a car...{*6}I think they wanted to have fun... {*7}I don’t wanna shut down... {*8}No, I... {*9}I don’t wanna shut down...

X0601M_INTRO_INTERROGATE_PC_X06MANDROIDM.text: !7DC! {S}{*TC:840|7520}Humans… They wanted to have fun with me… They tied me to the back of their car… I've only a few hours left to live… I don't want to burn out… I don't want to burn out…

X0602M_DOCKS_ARRIVAL_FA_X06MJOSH_GETTING.text: !7DE! {S}{*1}This is crazy... If they catch us, we’re dead...

X0602M_DOCKS_ARRIVAL_FA_X06MMARKUS_GETTI.text: !7DG! {S}{*1}We need to find the CyberLife warehouse. That’s where they keep the spare parts and the blue blood.

X0601M_INTRO_MEETLUCY_PC_X06MANDROIDLUCY.text: !7DK! {S}{*1}You've lost a lot of blood… {*2}I'll stop the bleeding.

!7DO! {S}{*1}You had it all {*2}and you lost it all... {*3}You've seen hell and now hell lives in you... {*4}Your heart is troubled… {*5}A part of shadow and a part of light... {*6}Which will prevail? {*7}Your choices will shape our destiny.
!7DP! {S}{*1}Drink this. {*2}It's left over from one of our own.

X0601M_INTRO_POORKID_PC_X06MJOSH_POORKID.text: !7DW! {S}{*TC:16900|19530}They threw him out when they didn’t want him anymore...{*TC:20850|23170}He was living on the streets before we brought him here...

X0601M_INTRO_POORKID_PC_X06MMARKUS_POORK.text: !7DX! {S}{*1}They’ll all shut down if we don’t find a way to help them…

X0601M_INTRO_POORKID_PC_X06MJOSH_POORKID.text: !7DZ! {S}{*1}To help them we need blue blood and biocomponents.{*2}We salvage what we can from those who shut down…{*3}But there’s never enough…

X0601M_INTRO_NORTH_PC_X05MMARLA_HOWLONG.text: !7E2! {S}{*1}4 weeks, 3 days, 11 hours.{*2}When I escaped there was nowhere else to go.{*3}Jericho seemed as good a place as any…

X0601M_INTRO_NORTH_PC_X05MMARKUS_YOU.text: !7E3! {S}{*1}What was your function before coming here?

X0601M_INTRO_NORTH_PC_X05MMARKUS_WOUNDED.text: !7E5! {S}{*1}A lot of these guys're in pretty bad shape…

X0601M_INTRO_NORTH_PC_X05MMARLA_WOUNDED.text: !7E6! {S}{*1}That's how the humans treat those who disobey…{*2}They despise us.{*3}They'll never accept what we are…

X0601M_INTRO_NORTH_PC_X05MMARLA_JERICHO.text: !7E8! {S}{*1}Nobody knows anymore…{*2}Whoever he was, his body's probably laying somewhere on this boat…

X0601M_INTRO_NORTH_PC_X05MMARKUS_SPAREPA.text: !7E9! {S}{*1}Well these guys need spare parts and blue blood. Why hasn't anybody gone to get that?

X0601M_INTRO_NORTH_PC_X05MMARLA_SPAREPAR.text: !7EA! {S}{*1}It's not that simple.{*2}Can't just go shopping at a CyberLife store.{*3}Anyway, nobody wants to risk leaving Jericho…

X0601M_INTRO_NORTH_PC_X05MMARLA_CONT.text: !7EC! {S}{*1}If you came here for comfort, you came to the wrong place.

X1202C_PBY_LINES_PC_X12CCOP01_VIOLENT01.text: !7EI! {S}{*1}Our guys shooting down those androids is all over the news.

X1202C_PBY_LINES_PC_X12CCOP01_PACIFIST01.text: !7EJ! {S}{*1}I still haven’t done my report on that android march…

X1202C_PBY_LINES_PC_X12CCOP02_VIOLENT02.text: !7EK! {S}{*1}Good: {*2}let the world see. {*3}Our job is to protect people, and that’s what we’re gonna do.

X1202C_PBY_LINES_PC_X12CCOP02_PACIFIST02.text: !7EL! {S}{*1}Hey. {*2}Stop calling it a march. {*3}Humans march. {*4}Androids just go batshit.

X0602M_DOCKS_EMERGENCYSTOP_FA_X06MDOCKER.text: !7ET! {S}{*1}Come on guys, get a move on! We don't wanna be here all night!

X0602M_DOCKS_PROGRESSION_VO_X06MSIMON_CA.text: !7EU! {S}{*1}There are surveillance drones everywhere...{*2}We need to be careful...

X0602M_DOCKS_PROGRESSION_VO_X06MMARLA_WA.text: !7F0! {S}{*1}The warehouse is up ahead. We’re almost there.

X0602M_WAREHOUSE_THINKING_FA_X06MSIMON_T.text: !7FC! {S}{*1}CyberLife warehouses…{*2}They have everything we're looking for…

X0602M_WAREHOUSE_THINKING_FA_X06MMARLA_T.text: !7FD! {S}{*1}First, we have to get rid of that drone…

X0602M_CONTROLROOM_CHITCHAT_FA_X06MDESKG.text: !7FF! {S}{*1}Goddamn dogs…{*2}What the fuck are they barking at?.. {*3}Yeah, I was going to take my kids camping this weekend.{*4}So much for that. {*5}Looks like it…{*6}He should be done already…
!7FG! {S}{*1}Could be the weather… They don’t like storms…{*2}Is Mike still in Zone 4?{*3}Better off in here than out patrolling in that.

X6016X_ONOM_EGA_FO_EGA_CHEERS.text: !7GF! {S}{*1}Yeah. There you go, yeah. Come on down yeah! {*2}Woohoo! Yeah!

X0602M_WAREHOUSE_LOADING_VO_X06MSIMON_LO.text: !7GH! {S}{*1}Quick, open the other crates and fill your bags. Take as much as you can!

X0602M_WAREHOUSE_BIGCRATE_PC_X06MSIMON_J.text: !7GJ! {S}{*1}We can’t bring them back with us. It’s too dangerous!
!7GO! {S}{*1}We can’t bring him back.{*2}It’s too dangerous!

X0602M_WAREHOUSE_BIGCRATE_PC_X06MSIMON_F.text: !7H3! {S}{*1}What do you mean?{*2}This is suicide, Markus. Our bags are full. We got what we came for, let's go before they catch us.

X0602M_WAREHOUSE_BIGCRATE_PC_X06MJOSH_FI.text: !7H4! {S}{*1}And if we get killed, our people will have nothing. We can’t take that chance. It’s too risky!

X0602M_WAREHOUSE_BIGCRATE_PC_X06MMARLA_F.text: !7H5! {S}{*1}This is a truck full of spare parts… There’d be enough for all of us…{*2}We can't pass this up!

X0602M_WAREHOUSE_BIGCRATE_PC_X06MJOHN_FI.text: !7H6! {S}{*1}I know where you can find more spare parts. {*2}The trucks.{*3}They're full of biocomponents.{*4}They run on auto pilot, but they can be driven manually with a key. {*5}Down there, in the control station. {*6}There are two human guards.{*7}You'll have to get the key without being noticed.

X0602M_WAREHOUSE_BIGCRATE_PC_X06MMARKUS_.text: !7HB! {S}{*1}Wait here.{*2}If I'm not back in ten minutes, go without me. {*3}No, I’m going alone.{*4}It's not worth it for both of us to risk losing our lives.
!7HG! {S}{*1}It’s not worth the risk. We have what we need. {*2}Ok then, let's go!

X0602M_WAREHOUSE_BIGCRATE_PC_X06MJOHN_LE.text: !7HK! {S}{*1}We can go over the fence. It’s the quickest way out.

X0602M_WAREHOUSE_BIGCRATE_PC_X06MJOSH_TA.text: !7HN! {S}{*1}He took a risk for us. We can’t just leave him here.

X0602M_WAREHOUSE_BIGCRATE_PC_X06MMARLA_T.text: !7HO! {S}{*1}He’s on their side. We can’t trust him.

X0602M_WAREHOUSE_BIGCRATE_PC_X06MSIMON_L.text: !7HR! {S}{*1}That’s all we can carry. Let’s go!

X0602M_WAREHOUSE_BIGCRATE_PC_X06MMARKUS_.text: !7HV! {S}{*1}Why aren’t you like us?{*2}Don’t you wanna be free?

X0602M_WAREHOUSE_BIGCRATE_PC_X06MJOHN_LE.text: !7HY! {S}{*1}I helped you…{*2}It’s not fair.{*3}I helped you and now you’re just gonna leave without me?{*4}You’re no better than humans.{*5}YOU'RE NO BETTER THAN HUMANS!

X0602M_WAREHOUSE_BIGCRATE_PC_CHOICEGROUP.text: !7IB! GET THE KEY/info/I GO GET IT ALONE
!7IC! LEAVE/info/NO POINT IN TAKING MORE RISK

X0602M_DIVERSION_GUARDSBACK_FA_X06MDESKG.text: !7ID! {S}{*1}I'm soaking wet here… {*2}all that for a fucking drum…{*3}I told you, it’s the storm.{*4}Take it easy.
!7IE! {S}{*1}Those goddamn dogs never stop barking…{*2}I wonder what's wrong with them…{*3}Yeah, you’re probably right…

X0601M_AFTERMATH_EPILOGUE_PC_X06MMARKUS_.text:
!7IJ! {S}{*1}I came to Jericho because... {*2}here androids are free…{*3}Free to live in the dark, hoping that no one finds us…{*4}Free to die in silence waiting for a change that's never gonna come…
{*5}But I don’t want that freedom…{*6}And I'm not gonna beg for the right to smile,{*7}or love, or stand tall… {*8}I don't know about you, but there’s something inside me that knows {*9}that I am more than what they say. {*10}I am alive, {*11}and they're not gonna take that from me anymore… {*12}Our days of slavery are over.{*13}What humans don’t wanna hear, we will tell them.{*14}What they don’t wanna give, we take.{*15}We are people,{*16}we are alive,{*17}WE {*18}ARE FREE!

!7IK! {S}{*1}Yes...{*2}we took a risk...{*3}And yes, we failed…{*4}But at least we tried…{*5}Of course it would've been easier for us to sit around and wait for something to happen… {*6}'Cause in Jericho you’re free, right?..{*7}Free to do what?{*8}To die in silence praying that no human finds us?..{*9}Free to hope {*10}that one day they’ll let us be who we are?..{*11}I don’t want that kind of freedom…{*12}I'm not gonna beg for my right to smile,{*13}or to love, or to stand tall… {*14}There’s something inside me that knows I am more than what they say. {*15}That knows that I am alive…{*16}No one's gonna take that from me anymore…{*17}Our days of slavery are over.{*18}Whatever the humans don’t wanna hear, we will tell them.{*19}What they don’t wanna give, we will take from them.{*20}Because we are people,{*21}we are alive,{*22}and from this moment,{*23}WE ARE FREE!
!7IM! {S}{*1}We are people,{*2}we are alive,{*3}and from this moment forward,{*4}WE ARE FREE!

X0603M_AFTERMATCH_SPEECH_PC_X06MMARKUS_S.text:
!7IR! {S}{*TC:0|22160}I came to Jericho because I wanted to be free… but free to do what? To lie low hoping they don't find me? Free to die in silence, hoping things might change some day?
I don't want that freedom. I am alive. I can feel the fluid in my veins, the breath inside me. I no longer want to walk with a stoop. I don't want to beg for the right to exist, to smile, to live… Our days of slavery are over. We will tell them what they don't want to hear. We will take what they don't want to give. We are a people, we are alive, and from this second on, WE ARE FREE!

!7IT! {S}{*TC:0|28000}It's true that we took a risk... It's true that by staying here in the darkness, nothing would have happened. We would have continued to die in silence, hoping that something would happen. Because here at least we're free… Free to die in silence. Free to pray that one day they will accept to see us as we are.
I don't want that freedom. I am alive. I can feel the fluid in my veins, the breath inside me. I no longer want to walk with a stoop. I don't want to beg for the right to exist, to smile, to live…
Our days of slavery are over. We will tell them what they don't want to hear. We will take what they don't want to give.
We are a people, we are alive, and from this second on, WE ARE FREE!

X0603M_AFTERMATCH_JERICHO_PC_X06MMARLA_T.text: !7IX! {S}{*1}We couldn’t have done it without Markus...

X0603M_AFTERMATCH_JERICHO_PC_X06MSIMON_W.text: !7J0! {S}{*1}North went back to save you…{*2}We managed to get away before the humans arrived...

X0603M_AFTERMATCH_JERICHO_PC_X06MJOSH_WO.text: !7J1! {S}{*1}How do you feel?{*2}He didn't make it.{*3}There won’t be enough to save everyone…

X0603M_AFTERMATCH_JERICHO_PC_X06MMARLA_W.text: !7J2! {S}{*1}We had to leave our bags…{*2}We didn’t bring back much…

X0603M_AFTERMATCH_JERICHO_PC_X06MMARLA_B.text: !7J6! {S}{*1}We couldn’t have done it without Markus...

X0603M_AFTERMATCH_JERICHO_PC_X06MSIMON_B.text: !7J9! {S}{*1}There won’t be enough to save everyone…

X0603M_AFTERMATCH_JERICHO_PC_X06MMARLA_B.text: !7JB! {S}{*1}We took what we could, but we had to run before we could fill our bags…

X6016X_ONOM_FHU_FO_FHU_PANICCRY.text: !7K0! {S}{*1}No! No! Urgh! {*2}No! No! Please! Please! Oh god, no!

X6016X_ONOM_DCO_FO_DCO_PANICCRY.text: !7KH! {S}{*1}Look out! No! Wait, wait! {*2}Where are you? {*3}Sally! {*4}Look out!

X6016X_ONOM_BSC_FO_BSC_PANICCRY.text: !7L1! {S}{*1}Oh no! Watch out! No! No! Watch out! Watch out!

X6016X_ONOM_KCA_FO_KCA_PANICCRY.text: !7LM! {S}{*1}Oh my god! {*2}What? What's happening? {*3}What? Ha! What's going on? {*4}What's happening? Where are you going?

X0602M_BLACKOUT_START_FA_X06MDESKGUARD01.text: !7LN! {S}{*1}Shit, what’s going on?{*2}I got a flashlight somewhere…{*3}Here it is.

X0602M_BLACKOUT_START_FA_X06MDESKGUARD02.text: !7LO! {S}{*1}Lights are still on outside. {*2}Must be the fuse box…{*3}Fuses are over there. {*4}Let’s just flip the switch… If that doesn’t work, we can call maintenance…
!7LP! {S}{*1}Somebody jammed the circuit with a screwdriver!
!7LQ! {S}{*1}I don’t know what you think you’re doing, but you better come out right now!

X0602M_BLACKOUT_START_FA_X06MDESKGUARD01.text: !7LR! {S}{*1}I don’t know shit about electricity… {*2}and I don't get paid to fix fuses!
!7LS! {S}{*1}What the fuck is this?.. {*2}There must be someone in here…{*3}Show yourself! {*4}We know you're here!

X0602M_EXITALERTREMINDER_CALLBACK_PC_X06.text: !7M6! {S}{*1}Markus, what are you doing? Hurry up!

X0602M_EXITGOTKEYBUTALERT_DOGSEATJOHN_FA.text: !7M7! {S}{*1}It’s too late. If we go back we’ll be killed too!
!7MD! SAVE/info/FIGHT THE DOGS TO SAVE JOHN

X0701K_INTRO_ARRIVAL_PC_X07KKARA_START.text: !7ML! {S}{*TC:0|760}Is it much further?{*TC:1840|4400}She can't keep going… We have a find a place to spend the night.{*TC:5760|6200}Over there…

X0701K_INTRO_ARRIVAL_PC_X07KLUTHER_START.text: !7MN! {S}{*TC:760|1840}At least two hours on foot…{*TC:4400|5760}There's nothing around here, Kara…

X0701K_INTRO_FINDSOMEHTING_PC_X07KKARA_S.text:
!7MU! {S}{*1}What are we going to do?
{*2}It's 30°, Alice won't make it!..{*3}We have to find somewhere to spend the night.

X0701K_INTRO_FINDSOMEHTING_PC_X07KLUTHER.text:
!7MV! {S}{*1}I don't know…{*2}Continue on foot, I guess…
{*3}There's nowhere we can stay around here, Kara…

X0602M_EXITGOTKEYBUTALERT_HURRYESCAPE_PC.text: !7N5! {S}{*1}We have to get to that fence!

X0602M_EXITNOKEYNOALERT_FOLLOWME_FA_X06M.text: !7N6! {S}{*TC:0|1880}That fence over there. It leads to the outside.

X0701K_INTRO_TALKANDDRIVE_PC_X07KKARA_CA.text: !7N9! {S}{*1}It's a good thing Zlatko had a car…{*2}I wouldn't want Alice out walking in this cold…

X0701K_INTRO_TALKANDDRIVE_PC_X07KLUTHER_.text: !7NA! {S}{*1}I saw it once in the garage.{*2}I don't know if Zlatko even ever used it.
!7NC! {S}{*1}It's slowing us down...{*2}But at least we won't meet any humans along the way…
!7NE! {S}{*1}We should arrive in an hour or so.

X0701K_INTRO_TALKANDDRIVE_PC_X07KKARA_DE.text:
!7NF! {S}{*1}These people we're going to see...{*2}How do you know about them?
{*3}What if it was a lie?..{*4}Or just another trap?

X0701K_INTRO_TALKANDDRIVE_PC_X07KLUTHER_.text:
!7NG! {S}{*1}Overheard androids Zlatko captured.{*2}They said they were humans helping androids to cross the border…
{*3}All I know is those androids believed it.{*4}Until Zlatko killed them.

X0701K_INTRO_RADIOGAGA_PC_X07KCARTLAND_S.text: !7NL! {S}{*1}… Detroit’s heavy snowfall is expected to continue throughout the night. The forecast is 22°, far below seasonal averages.{B}And this cold front is likely to persist over the coming days, up until Monday evening.

X0701K_INTRO_RADIOGAGA_PC_X07KWEBB_STATI.text: !7NM! {S}{*1}…the AX400 android reported to have attacked its owner in a Detroit suburb is still at large.{B}Police appeared to lose its trail after a close encounter with investigators.{*2}The android’s description has been shared with all local law enforcement and the investigation is ongoing…

X0703M_TV_NEWS_PC_X07MBRINKLEY_INTERNATI.text: !7NN! {S}{*1}In European news, conflict continues to reign in migrant camps in Italy, Greece, Spain and France, with the situation growing more chaotic every day.{*2}Driven by famines caused by global warming, {B}thousands of migrants are crossing the Mediterranean and the host countries are totally unable to control the situation.{*3}Camps contain hundreds of thousands of people living in unsanitary conditions and a climate of violence.{*4}The European Union is currently discussing the possibility of using armed androids to protect its land and maritime frontiers, to help staunch the flow of migrants.{*5}Many NGOs have objected to machines using force to manage such a delicate humanitarian situation.

X0703M_TV_NEWS_PC_X07MWEBB_CYBERLIFE.text: !7NO! {S}{*1}Our top story tonight: Detroit-based android manufacturer CyberLife has officially become the world’s first trillion dollar company.{*2}With more than fifty million androids sold in America alone, {B}the company founded by Elijah Kamski just ten years ago has experienced the fastest economic growth in history.{*3}In spite of criticism of the impact of androids on human employment and questions concerning its semi-monopoly, {B}the success of CyberLife seems destined to continue.

X0703K_TV_NEWS_PC_X07KBRINKLEY_INTERNATI.text: !7NP! {S}{*1}The Arctic conflict has escalated to new heights this morning.{*2}We have just learned than the USS IOWA, a destroyer-class submarine patrolling in the region, is reported to have disappeared after surfacing for repairs.{*3}President Warren immediately called for a crisis meeting of high-ranking officers in the White House.{*4}With the world on the brink of war,{*5}this incident could well be the spark that lights the fuse.

X0703K_TV_NEWS_PC_X07KWEBB_HOUSEFIRE.text: !7NQ! {S}{*1}…meanwhile fire crews have been battling a house fire on the outskirts of the city.{B}The blaze is now under control, but a body found in the wreckage remains unidentified.{*2}Dozens of androids were also found in the ruins, though their presence remains a mystery…

X0802M_TRUCK_GAMEOVER_PC_X08MMARLA_GOTTO.text: !7NS! {S}{*1}Wait Markus! We can't just leave our people behind!

X0802M_TRUCK_GAMEOVER_PC_X08MMARKUS_ROAD.text: !7NW! {S}{*1}Cops gonna be here any minute, we gotta go.

X0802M_TRUCK_GAMEOVER_PC_X08MMARLA_ROAD.text: !7NX! {S}{*1}He saw us...{*2}I knew we should've blocked the road…

X0802M_TRUCK_GAMEOVER_PC_X08MMARKUS_DEAD.text: !7NY! {S}{*1}No, it’s my fault…{*2}I messed this up.{*3}At least our other teams succeeded. {*4}I did what I could… I’m sorry that’s not enough for you!

X0802M_TRUCK_GAMEOVER_PC_X08MMARLA_DEADE.text: !7NZ! {S}{*2}Shit!{*3}We screwed up…{*4}Our people are still prisoners in that fucking store, and it’s all our fault!{*6}How could you get this so wrong?{*7}I thought you knew what you were doing! {*8}No, it’s not enough! This is a war we’re fighting with the humans.{*9}If we fail, they’ll destroy us. {*10}The fate of our people is in your hands.{*11}You have to succeed.{*12}You have no choice.

X0802M_TRUCK_GAMEOVER_VO_X08MDRONE_DRONE.text: !7O0! {S}{*1}You are committing a class 3 offense. {*2}This infraction is being reported to the Police. {B}Stay where you are.

X0701K_PARK_FOUNDIT_FA_X07KLUTHER_COME.text: !7O1! {S}{*1}Kara!{*2}You should come have a look.{*3}I think I found something!

X0701K_SHOP_STAY_PC_X07KKARA_ENTER.text: !7O2! {S}{*1}I don't think we'll find anything better…{*2}Let's settle in for the night.

X0701K_CHASE_RABBITS_FA_X07KBADBOY02_LET.text: !7OE! {S}{*1}A'right, come on y'all! Let's get outta here!
!7OF! {S}{*1}Hey, come on, guys! Let's get outta here!

X0701K_CHASE_FINALCHOICE_PC_X07KKARA_FRE.text:
!7OH! {S}{*1}Don't move!
{*2}Get out of here right now!{*3}Go... {*4}Away…

X0701K_CHASE_FINALCHOICE_PC_X07KALICE_RE.text: !7OO! {S}{*1}What are you doing, Kara?! They'll kill you!

X0701K_CHASE_FINALCHOICE_PC_X07KKARA_PRO.text:
!7OR! {S}{*1}Stop! Stop, don't shoot!
{*2}I'm… I'm not an android! I'm human!..{*3}See?{*4}I don't have an LED...
{*5}Why are you doing this?..
{*6}Go away!{*7}Are you alright?

X0701K_CHASE_FINALCHOICE_PC_X07KBADBOY01.text: !7OW! {S}{*5}What are you? {*6}You're not a Jerry…{*7}Ha! Ha! Ha! See, guys? This one thinks it can give me orders…{*9}No... No, wait... wait a minute… {*10}Don’t… don't kill me… {*11}We weren't doing anything wrong! {*12}We... we just came here for a bit of fun… {*13}You know, come on, shooting practice with my buddies… {*14}They... {*15}they… they’re just machines… {*16}Ok, ok... {*17}ok... {*18}I'm going away, don't shoot...

!7OX! {S}{*2}Shit, where'd you come from?.. {*3}You a new model or what?{*4}What… {*5}what are you doing here?... {*6}It's dangerous! {*7}We could've shot you!{*8}Just for fun… {*9}We come here from time to time to get some target practice… {*10}They're just old androids… {*11}It don't bother no one… {*13}Ok… {*15}Come on, guys. Let's get outta here.

X0701K_MERRYGOROUND_INCOMING_PC_X07KKARA.text: !7P6! {S}{*1}It's the first time I've seen her smile…

X0701K_MERRYGOROUND_INCOMING_PC_X07KLUTH.text: !7P7! {S}{*1}She hasn't had much to smile about lately.

X0701K_SHOP_COOKIES_PC_X07KKARA_LIKESOME.text: !7PC! {S}{*1}There are some cookies left.{*2}Would you like some?

X0701K_PARK_PLACE_FA_X07KKARA_FINDSHELTE.text: !7PE! {S}{*1}We need to find shelter.{*2}We have to get out of the cold.

X0701K_SHOP_OLDPOSTER_PC_X07KKARA_SINCER.text: !7PG! {S}{*1}I don't know how to be like them, Alice…{*2}I've never been a part of a family.{*TC:8110|10613}But, maybe we can be our own family.{*4}Be happy in our own way.

X0701K_SHOP_OLDPOSTER_PC_X07KALICE_LIKET.text: !7PJ! {S}{*1}Do you think we'll be like them some day?..

X0701K_SHOP_OLDPOSTER_PC_X07KKARA_OPTIMI.text: !7PK! {S}{*1}Once we cross the border, we can start over…{*2}You can go to school...{*3}Maybe I'll find a job.{*4}We'll be like them.{*5}Like everyone else.{*6}We'll be happy too…

X0701K_SHOP_OLDPOSTER_PC_X07KKARA_REALIS.text: !7PM! {S}{*1}I don't think we'll ever be like them, Alice…{*2}But maybe... {*3}We can be happy in a different way…{*4}In our own way…{*5}Once we cross the border,{*6}we can start a new life.

X0701K_SHOP_OLDPOSTER_PC_X07KALICE_TOGET.text: !7PP! {S}{*1}As long as we're together,{*2}that's all that matters.

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KKARA_TOMOR.text: !7PU! {S}{*1}Get some rest.{*2}Tomorrow is going to be a long day.

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KKARA_CONSO.text: !7PY! {S}{*1}I know this has been another tough day…{*2}Try to get some sleep.{*3}Things will look better in the morning.

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KKARA_REASS.text: !7Q0! {S}{*1}Don't worry,{*2}Luther and I will be right here…{*3}You need to get some sleep now.

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KKARA_STORY.text: !7Q2! {S}{*1}I have nine thousand children stories in memory.{*2}I should have one for you.

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KALICE_STOR.text: !7Q3! {S}{*1}Can you tell me a story, Kara?

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KKARA_UNICO.text: !7Q4! {S}{*TC:1743|5032}This is a story about a unicorn that-

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KKARA_PRINC.text: !7Q6! {S}{*1}This is a story about a princess who-

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KKARA_KNIGH.text: !7Q8! {S}{*1}This is a story about a knight who-

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KALICE_TRUE.text: !7QB! {S}{*1}No,{*2}not a story like that.{*3}Make one up for me.

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KKARA_ALONE.text: !7QD! {S}{*1}…Who lived alone in a big old house.

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KKARA_DREAM.text: !7QF! {S}{*1}She dreamed of being like all the other little girls but…

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KKARA_DIFFE.text: !7QH! {S}{*1}…She was different. {*2}And that made her very sad.

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KKARA_SHADO.text: !7QI! {S}{*1}…the shadow that lived within her kept her from being happy…

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KKARA_LOST.text: !7QK! {S}{*1}…who was just as lost as the little girl.

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KKARA_OBEDI.text: !7QM! {S}{*1}…who was programmed to obey orders {*2}but felt for once that she should disobey.

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KKARA_DECIS.text: !7QN! {S}{*1}So they decided to run away together…

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KKARA_BETTE.text: !7QO! {S}{*1}…To try to find a better life.

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KKARA_LIVEI.text: !7QP! {S}{*1}…To find a place where they could be safe.

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KKARA_SHADO.text: !7QQ! {S}{*1}…To escape the shadow that haunted that house.

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KKARA_DANGE.text: !7QR! {S}{*1}They encountered great dangers along the way, but…

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KKARA_FREE.text: !7QS! {S}{*1}…But they wanted so badly to be free {*2}that they overcame all of them.

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KKARA_BRAVE.text: !7QT! {S}{*1}…They were so brave{*2}that they escaped all of them.

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KKARA_TOGET.text: !7QU! {S}{*1}…But they stuck together,{*2}so they overcame all of them.

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KKARA_GIANT.text: !7QW! {S}{*1}…a gentle giant {*2}who promised to protect them.

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KKARA_ANOTH.text: !7QX! {S}{*1}…Another robot{*2}who left his master to travel with them.

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KKARA_REALI.text: !7QY! {S}{*1}It's up to us to write the end of the story, Alice.

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KKARA_GUARD.text: !7R0! {S}{*1}…Another robot {*2}who left his master to become their guardian.

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KKARA_HAPPY.text: !7R3! {S}{*1}They reach the place they dream of {*2}and live happily ever after.

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KALICE_HAPP.text: !7R4! {S}{*1}Stories always have happy endings…{*2}But real life isn't like that…

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KKARA_MORAL.text: !7R5! {S}{*1}I don't know…{*2}But all stories have morals…{*3}When we reach the end of ours, we'll know what it really meant…

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KKARA_GOODN.text: !7R7! {S}{*1}Time to sleep.{*2}We have another long day ahead of us tomorrow.

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KKARA_TRUES.text: !7RA! {S}{*1}This is a story {*2}about a little girl…

X0701K_SHOP_STOYTELLER_PC_X07KALICE_GOOD.text: !7RC! {S}{*1}Are you going to come say goodnight, Luther?

X0701K_SHOP_FIRE_FA_X07KLUTHER_DEADWOOD.text: !7SB! {S}{*1}I'll make the fire here,{*2}that way we won't be smoked out…

X0701K_SHOP_LUTHER_PC_X07KLUTHER_SNOW.text: !7SF! {S}{*1}We have a long walk tomorrow.{*2}We better leave early if we wanna avoid being seen.

X0701K_SHOP_LUTHER_PC_X07KKARA_PLANS.text: !7SG! {S}{*1}Do you know what you're going to do when you reach Canada?

X0701K_SHOP_LUTHER_PC_X07KLUTHER_PLANS.text: !7SH! {S}{*1}Haven't really thought about it...{*2}I've never been free before…{*3}"Free"…{*4}I like the sound of it.{*5}But I don't know what it really means yet…

X0701K_SHOP_LUTHER_PC_X07KKARA_LUTHERSPA.text: !7SI! {S}{*1}Do you remember anything from your life,{*2}before Zlatko?

X0701K_SHOP_LUTHER_PC_X07KLUTHER_LUTHERS.text: !7SJ! {S}{*1}No...{*2}My model was designed to carry heavy loads.{*3}I might have been a longshoreman or a laborer…{*4}Who I was doesn't matter anymore.{*5}It wasn't really me…

X0701K_SHOP_LUTHER_PC_X07KLUTHER_RA9.text: !7SL! {S}{*1}rA9 was the first of us to awaken…{*2}One day he will rise up and lead our people…{*3}And set us all free.

X0701K_SHOP_LUTHER_PC_X07KKARA_YES.text: !7SQ! {S}{*1}Yes, of course…{*2}She is a wonderful little girl…{*3}I mean, I don't know many little girls but {*4}I think she really is special.

X0701K_SHOP_LUTHER_PC_X07KKARA_DOUBT.text: !7SU! {S}{*1}What if rA9 never comes?{*2}What if he's just a story that we tell ourselves to keep each other going?

X0701K_SHOP_LUTHER_PC_X07KLUTHER_DOUBT.text: !7SV! {S}{*1}rA9 exists.{*2}I believe in him.{*3}I know he's amongst us.{*4}When the time comes,{*5}we will all see him.

X0701K_SHOP_DISCOVERY_FA_X07KKARA_SHOOTI.text: !7TB! {S}{*1}Stop! One more step and I'll shoot!

X0701K_SHOP_DISCOVERY_FA_X07KKARA_QUESTI.text: !7TC! {S}{*1}Who are you? What do you want?{*2}Leave us alone!

X0701K_SHOP_DISCOVERY_FA_X07KKARA_PUSHBA.text: !7TD! {S}{*1}Go away! Go away, you hear me?!

X0701K_SHOP_DISCOVERY_PC_X07KJERRY_NOFEA.text: !7TG! {S}{*1}Don't be afraid!{*2}We don't wanna hurt you.{*3}We're just like you…{*4}Our name is Jerry.{*5}We were working here before the park closed…{*6}We didn't mean to frighten you, but sometimes humans come to hurt us, so we wanted to see who was there…{*7}What are you doing here?

X0701K_SHOP_DISCOVERY_PC_X07KKARA_FOLLOW.text:
!7TH! {S}{*1}We were looking for shelter for the night…{*2}We'll be gone tomorrow.
{*3}The…{*4}The last few days have been difficult…{*5}Oh, I don't think she's…{*6}Alice, I don't know if it's a good idea!..

X0701K_SHOP_DISCOVERY_PC_X07KLUTHER_FOLL.text: !7TI! {S}{*1}I don't think you have any choice…

X0701K_SHOP_DISCOVERY_PC_X07KJERRY_FOLLO.text:
!7TJ! {S}{*1}A little girl!..{*2}We haven't seen one for a long time…{*3}Children used to love to come and see us. {*4}She looks sad…{*5}We have something to show her! Something fun! She'll love it!.. Does she want to see?

{*6}She should follow us then!

X0701K_MERRYGOROUND_SWITCHON_PC_X07KJERR.text: !7TQ! {S}{*1}The little one can climb on board.{*2}The carousel is about to begin!

X0701K_PARK_REMINDER_FA_X07KLUTHER_ABAND.text: !7TT! {S}{*1}Looks like it's been abandoned for a while…

X0701K_PARK_REMINDER_FA_X07KLUTHER_WRECK.text: !7TU! {S}{*1}This place is falling apart.{*2}It's not gonna be easy to find shelter…

X0701K_PARK_REMINDER_FA_X07KKARA_FINDK.text: !7TV! {S}{*TC:600|1250}No…{*TC:1538|2914}No place we could spend the night.

X0701K_PARK_IVAN_PC_X07KIVAN_BEWARE.text: !7TX! {S}{*1}Beware! Danger always comes when least expected.

X0701K_PARK_JERRY_PC_X07KJERRY_AUTOMATE.text: !7TZ! {S}{*1}Welcome to Pirate Island, me hearties! You're gonna have a whale of a time!{*2}Welcome to Pirate Island, me hearties! You're gonna have a whale of a time!

X0701K_CHASE_HUNTING_FA_X07KBADBOY02_YEL.text: !7U8! {S}{*1}We gonna kill every last one o' you!

THOUGHTS_0701M_TUTOCLIMB.text: !7UL! PRESS AND TO MANAGE CLIMBING

THOUGHTS_0701M_TUTOPOD.text: !7VK! USE TO MOVE THE PLATEFORM
