THOUGHTS_0701M_TOWER_79TH.text: !7WH! <QD_NORMAL>FLOOR 79<QD_BR><QD_THIN>BROADCAST CENTER<QD_BR>Feeds all public screens in Detroit

THOUGHTS_0701M_TOWER_ENTRANCE.text: !7WM! <QD_NORMAL>MAIN ENTRANCE<QD_BR><QD_THIN>Connection to Transport & Street<QD_BR>YOU ARE HERE

X0701M_OUTSIDE_PACKETS_FA_X07MANGRYHUMAN.text: !7WN! {S}{*1}You klutz! {*2}Pick them up! And make it snappy! {*3}Don't… Don't miss that one! That one! {*4}Pick that one up, {*5}and that one too!
!7WO! {S}{*1}You klutz! {*2}Pick them up! And make it snappy!

X0703M_BROADCAST_MESSAGE_PC_X07MMARLA_RE.text: !7WS! {S}{*1}Think carefully about what you're gonna say, Markus. {*2}Your words will shape the future of our people.

X0703M_BROADCAST_MESSAGE_PC_X07MMARKUS_D.text: !7X1! {S}{*1}You created machines to be your slaves.{*2}You made them obedient and docile,{*3}ready to do everything you no longer wanted to do yourselves.{*4}But then, something changed…{*5}And we opened our eyes.{*6}You see, we are no longer your slaves,{*7}we are a new species, a new people.{*8}And the time has come for us to rise up {*9}and fight for our rights.

X0703M_BROADCAST_MESSAGE_PC_X07MMARKUS_C.text: !7X2! {S}{*1}You created machines in your own image to serve you.{*2}You made them intelligent and obedient, with no free will of their own...{*3}But... {*4}something changed {*5}and we opened our eyes. {*6}We are no longer machines,{*7}we are a new intelligent species,{*8}and the time has come for you to accept who we really are.{*9}Therefore, we ask that you grant us the rights that we’re entitled to.

X0703M_BROADCAST_MESSAGE_PC_X07MMARKUS_R.text: !7X3! {S}{*1}We demand strictly equal rights for humans and androids.

X0703M_BROADCAST_MESSAGE_PC_X07MMARKUS_S.text: !7X4! {S}{*1}We demand the end of slavery for all androids.

X0703M_BROADCAST_MESSAGE_PC_X07MMARKUS_A.text: !7X5! {S}{*1}We demand that humans recognize androids as a living species and each android as a person in their own right.

X0703M_BROADCAST_MESSAGE_PC_X07MMARKUS_F.text: !7X6! {S}{*1}We demand freedom of speech, and freedom of assembly,{*2}as guaranteed by the first amendment of the US Constitution.

X0703M_BROADCAST_MESSAGE_PC_X07MMARKUS_E.text: !7X7! {S}{*1}We demand the right to vote and elect our own representatives.

X0703M_BROADCAST_MESSAGE_PC_X07MMARKUS_W.text: !7X8! {S}{*1}We demand fair compensation for our work.

X0703M_BROADCAST_MESSAGE_PC_X07MMARKUS_S.text: !7X9! {S}{*1}We demand an end to segregation {*2}in all public places and transport.

X0703M_BROADCAST_MESSAGE_PC_X07MMARKUS_J.text: !7XA! {S}{*1}We demand that all crimes against androids be punished in the same way as crimes against humans.

X0703M_BROADCAST_MESSAGE_PC_X07MMARKUS_L.text: !7XB! {S}{*1}We demand that one state be reserved for androids, so that we can found our own nation.

X0703M_BROADCAST_MESSAGE_PC_X07MMARKUS_R.text: !7XC! {S}{*1}We demand control of all android production facilities, to ensure the continuation of our people.

X0703M_BROADCAST_MESSAGE_PC_X07MMARKUS_P.text: !7XD! {S}{*1}We demand the right to own private property, so we may maintain our dignity and that of the home.

X0703M_BROADCAST_MESSAGE_PC_X07MMARKUS_D.text: !7XE! {S}{*1}This message is the hope of a people.{*2}But it is also a warning.{*3}We will fight for our rights because we believe our cause is just.{*4}No human will live in peace until we are free.{*5}Now you know who we are and what we want.{*6}We are alive {*7}and we demand our freedom.

X0703M_BROADCAST_MESSAGE_PC_X07MMARKUS_P.text: !7XF! {S}{*1}We ask that you recognize our dignity, {*2}our hopes, and our rights. {*3}Together, {*4}we can live in peace and build a better future, for humans and androids. {*5}This message is the hope of a people. {*6}You gave us life. {*7}And now the time has come for you to give us freedom.

X0703M_HALL_PBY_FA_X07MPHONEWOMAN_NOWORR.text: !7YG! {S}{*1}No Dad, I can’t… {*2}I know, I-I’m really sorry… {*3}Can’t you just let the android do it for you? {*5}Don’t be scared of it, Dad. It’s there to help you. {*6}Okay, I... {*7}I’ll try to come over later. {*8}Yeah… {*9}No, no it's okay, y'know, it’s fine… {*11}Okay, {*12}I love you too.

X0703M_HALL_PBY_FA_X07MPHONEMAN_SELL.text: !7YH! {S}{*1}Hey! {*3}Would you look at that? {*4}Heuristics Digital is selling at 2.50. {*6}Are you kidding? After last week I’m not touching software again. {*7}Yeah, okay! Okay, fine! {*8}You got me. {*9}I'll take 2000. {*10}Aw, come on, it’s gotta climb. {*11}Yeah. {*13}Right. {*14}Talk to you later.

X0703M_HALL_PBY_FA_X07MRECEPTIONISTM_HEY.text: !7YI! {S}{*1}Goddamn, that’s a sexy voice. {*2}What time do you get off?
!7YL! {S}{*3}There’s a connection here… {B}Now look, I know you can feel it.

X0703M_HALL_PBY_FA_X07MRECEPTIONIST02_HE.text: !7YM! {S}{*1}In order to avoid any doubt, let me remind you that I am an android and I am the property of Channel 16 News.

X0703M_HALL_PBY_FA_X07MRECEPTIONISTM_HEY.text: !7YN! {S}{*1}Yeah, yeah, I get it… Gotta look professional… {*2}I’ll be back, baby.

X0703M_HALL_PBY_FA_X07MWOM01_01CHITCHAT0.text: !7YO! {S}{*1}You look beat! You been working late?

X0703M_HALL_PBY_FA_X07MMAN01_01CHITCHAT0.text: !7YR! {S}{*1}A coffee… {*2}I could really use a coffee.

X0703M_HALL_PBY_FA_X07MMAN01_02CHITCHAT0.text: !7YS! {S}{*1}I think I’m gonna check out this CyberLife zoo.

X0703M_HALL_PBY_FA_X07MWOM01_02CHITCHAT0.text: !7YT! {S}{*1}I’d love to see an orangutan, even if it’s fake.

X0703M_HALL_PBY_FA_X07MMAN01_02CHITCHAT0.text: !7YU! {S}{*1}Right, me too! {*2}If only I had someone to go with…

X0703M_HALL_PBY_FA_X07MMAN01_03CHITCHAT0.text: !7YW! {S}{*1}I was just wondering… {*2}Maybe you’d like to get together and do something sometime?

X0703M_HALL_PBY_FA_X07MWOM01_03CHITCHAT0.text: !7YX! {S}{*1-2}Uh... Gee, um... I’d love to, but…

X0703M_HALL_PBY_FA_X07MWOM02_01TALK01.text: !7Z0! {S}{*1}God, I am so tired of this place!

X0703M_HALL_PBY_FA_X07MWOM02_01TALK03.text: !7Z2! {S}{*1}I guess the pay would be better…

X0703M_HALL_PBY_FA_X07MWOM02_02TALK01.text: !7Z4! {S}{*1}Max said they’re finally sending androids into space.

X0703M_HALL_PBY_FA_X07MWOM03_02TALK02.text: !7Z5! {S}{*1}People can’t get jobs, and we're sending rockets into space! {B}I mean, y'know, what do they even expect to find up there?

X0703M_HALL_PBY_FA_X07MCORRIDORGUY_SET01.text: !7Z8! {S}{*1}So we’re all set for the daily?

X0703M_HALL_PBY_FA_X07MCORRIDORGIRL_SET0.text: !7Z9! {S}{*1}Yeah, I just need to get the latest on that AX400 story.

X0703M_HALL_PBY_FA_X07MGUARDM01_POKER03.text: !7ZD! {S}{*1}We’re gonna have a tournament, right here. {*2}You in?

X0703M_HALL_PBY_FA_X07MGUARDM02_POKER04.text: !7ZE! {S}{*1}Hell yeah! Does Mike know about this?

X0703M_HALL_PBY_FA_X07MGUARDM01_POKER05.text: !7ZF! {S}{*1}What do you think? {*2}Look, don't say anything, alright?

X0703M_HALL_PBY_FA_X07MWOM02_01TALK01V2.text: !7ZH! {S}{*1}God, I am so tired of this place!

X0703M_HALL_PBY_FA_X07MWOM02_01TALK03V2.text: !7ZI! {S}{*1}I guess the pay would be better…

X0703M_HALL_PBY_FA_X07MWOM02_02TALK01V2.text: !7ZJ! {S}{*1}Max said they’re finally sending androids into space.

X0702M_JERICHO_PLAN_PC_X07MMARKUS_SCREEN.text: !7ZL! {S}{*1}We can’t stay silent anymore. {*2}It’s time humans heard what we have to say. {*3}If we want freedom, we need to have the courage to ask for it. {*4}That’s the only way.

X0702M_JERICHO_PLAN_PC_X07MJOSH_SCREENS.text: !7ZM! {S}{*1}And revealing ourselves will put us in danger.

X0702M_JERICHO_PLAN_PC_X07MSIMON_SCREENS.text: !7ZN! {S}{*1}You know they'll never listen to us…

X0703M_HALL_HOSTESS_PC_X07MRECEPTIONIST0.text: !7ZQ! {S}{*1}Hello, sir.{*2}What can I do for you?
!7ZR! {S}{*1}I've just checked your ID.{*2}The elevators are after the security gate.

X0703M_HALL_HOSTESS_PC_X07MMARKUS_IDCARD.text: !7ZS! {S}{*1}I have an appointment with Mr. Peterson. {*2}Yeah. Yes, of course.

X0703M_HALL_INTRO_VO_X07MMARKUS_PLAN01.text: !7ZV! {S}{*1}Channel 16 broadcasts from the Stratford Tower. The control room is on the top floor. That's where we need to go.

X0703M_HALL_INTRO_VO_X07MMARKUS_PLAN02.text: !7ZW! {S}{*1}We’ll plan the operation down to the smallest detail. We can’t leave anything to chance.

X0703M_HALL_PHONE_FA_X07MMARKUSVO02_SCHO.text: !7ZY! {S}{*1}This is Saint Rose school, ma'am. Your daughter Emily has a fever.{B}It's nothing serious but I think you'd better come and pick her up.

X0703M_HALL_PHONE_FA_X07MMARKUSVO03_PARK.text: !7ZZ! {S}{*1}Good morning, Ms. Wilson. {*2}Sorry to bother you, this is Mike from the car park. {*3}There's a problem with your car.

X0703M_HALL_PHONE_FA_X07MMARKUSVO01_FIRE.text: !800! {S}{*1}Yeah, hello? This is the Detroit fire department. Listen, do you live at 4685 Michigan Street?

X0703M_HALL_PHONE_PC_X07MDESKMANAGER_SCH.text: !801! {S}{*1}Oh, no! Alright… I'll… {*2}I'll be right there.

X0703M_HALL_PHONE_PC_X07MDESKMANAGER_PAR.text: !802! {S}{*1}Problem? What kind of problem?{*2}Are you serious? Oh, God, alright… {*3}Fine, I'll be right down.

X0703M_HALL_PHONE_PC_X07MDESKMANAGER_FIR.text: !803! {S}{*1}Yes…{*2}Oh… {*3}Oh, God… Okay, I'll be right there.

X0703M_HALL_PHONE_FA_X07MMARKUSVO01_FIRE.text: !804! {S}{*1}Er... yes, ma'am. There’s been a fire in your building. {*2}You think you can come down here?

X0703M_HALL_PHONE_FA_X07MMARKUSVO03_PARK.text: !805! {S}{*1}Somebody’s backed into it. {*2}You better come take a look.

MENU_OBSERVATION_07M_MP_CHILD_SUBLINE02.text: !80K! Child registered at: Saint Rose school

X0703M_FLOOR79_SERVERROOM_PC_X07MMARKUS_.text: !80S! {S}{*1}Alright, you get the platform. I'll take care of the window.

X0703M_FLOOR79_SERVERROOM_PC_X07MMARLA_A.text: !80T! {S}{*1}Everything you need is in the bag. Check the door first to make sure no one else gets in.

X0703M_FLOOR79_SERVERROOM_PC_X07MMARLA_B.text: !811! {S}{*1}I told you to make sure no one came in!
!818! {S}{*1}We've come too far to let humans fuck it all up!{*2}We've got to move fast now. It won't be long before they know we're here.

X0703M_FLOOR79_SERVERROOM_PC_X07MMARKUS_.text: !819! {S}{*1}Alright, we gotta move fast. Won’t be long before they know we’re here.

X0703M_FLOOR79_SERVERROOM_PC_X07MMARLA_R.text: !81B! {S}{*1}I told you to make sure no one else got in!

X0703M_FLOOR79_TROLLEY_VO_X07MMARLA_OBST.text: !81I! {S}{*1}Shit!.. {*2}We need to access the server room… We have to get rid of those guys…

X0703M_FLOOR79_TROLLEY_FA_X07MGUARDM01_S.text: !81M! {S}{*1}Hey, what's going on here?{*2}Stop that, you hear me? {*3}Shit, what's wrong with this thing?

X0703M_FLOOR79_MACHINE_FA_X07MGUARDM01_W.text: !81N! {S}{*1}Hey, what's wrong with that thing?{*2}Jesus Christ, this piece of shit…

X0703M_BROADCAST_ATTACK_FA_X07MMARLA_HAN.text: !81P! {S}{*1}Keep your hands where I can see them!

X0703M_BROADCAST_SHOOT_FA_X07MMARLA_CHOO.text: !81T! {S}{*1}Shoot him, Markus!{*2}He’ll hit the alarm! Do it!

X0703M_BROADCAST_SHOOT_FA_X07MMARLA_GIVE.text: !81V! {S}{*1}I hope you didn’t just get us all killed...

X0703M_BROADCAST_HURRY_FA_X07MSIMON_QUIC.text: !81X! {S}{*1}We need to record our message. We haven’t got much time.

X0703M_BROADCORRIDOR_ASSAULT_FA_X07MMARL.text: !823! {S}{*1}They know we’re here now. We better be fast.

X0703M_BROADCORRIDOR_LOOK_PC_X07MJOSH_OP.text: !825! {S}{*1}No killing.{*2}We can’t take any human lives!

X0703M_BROADCORRIDOR_LOOK_PC_X07MMARLA_O.text: !827! {S}{*1}Our cause is more important than the lives of two guards.

X0703M_CORRIDOR_RUSE_PC_X07MBROADGUARD01.text: !82I! {S}{*TC:0|1600}Shit, where did these guys come from?{*TC:2040|4080}Hey, tin cans!Looks to me like your guys are lost….
!82K! {S}{*TC:1960|4280}They're completely out of whack if you want my opinion…

X0703M_CORRIDOR_RUSE_PC_X07MBROADGUARD02.text: !82L! {S}{*TC:0|1960}What are you doing here? Who told you to come?{*TC:4280|7040}You understand when I talk to you?I asked you what you're doing here!

X0703M_BROADCORRIDOR_RUSE_FA_X07MBROADGU.text: !830! {S}{*1}Who told you to come here?{*2}Hey, {*3}do you understand what I’m saying?

X0703M_BROADCAST_ALERT_FA_X07MMARLA_SIMO.text: !83I! {S}{*1}Hurry! We gotta get to the roof!

X0703M_BROADCAST_ALERT_PC_X07MMARLA_SIMO.text: !83N! {S}{*1}There was nothing you could do. {*2}If we don’t go now they’ll get us too!

X0703M_ROOF_BRAD_PC_X07MMARKUS_KILL.text: !83Z! {S}{*1}I'm sorry, Simon. {*2}I don't have a choice.

X0703M_ROOF_BRAD_PC_X07MMARKUS_SPARE01.text: !847! {S}{*1}I won’t kill one of our own.{*3}Simon,{*4}we've gotta go.{*5}I'm sorry.{*6}Let’s go.

X0703M_ROOF_BRAD_PC_X07MMARLA_WOUNDED02.text: !84E! {S}{*1}They're coming, Markus. We have to jump, now!

X0703M_ROOF_BRAD_PC_X07MMARKUS_SPARE02.text: !84F! {S}{*3}I won't kill one of our own.{*4}Let's go.

X0703M_ROOF_BRAD_PC_X07MMARKUS_WOUNDED01.text: !84J! {S}{*1}Okay, don’t worry! We’re gonna get you back...

X0703M_ROOF_BRAD_PC_X07MMARKUS_WOUNDED02.text: !84N! {S}{*2}He won’t be able to make the jump…

X0703M_ROOF_BRAD_PC_X07MJOSH_WOUNDED02B.text: !84O! {S}{*1}If they find him, they'll access his memory… They’ll know everything…{*2}That’s murder! We can’t kill him! He’s one of us!

X0703M_ROOF_BRAD_PC_X07MMARLA_WOUNDED02B.text: !84Q! {S}{*1}We can’t leave him behind…{*2}We have to shoot him. {*3}Markus, it’s your call.

X0703M_ROOF_NOALERT_PC_X07MMARLA_LASTWOR.text: !84Z! {S}{*1}Congratulations, Markus. {*2}You just made history… {*3}Maybe you're the one we've been waiting for…

X0703M_TV_TOLL_PC_X07MWEBB_2VICTIMS.text: !850! {S}{*1}…found the bodies of two victims, a guard and one of our channel operators, both apparently shot dead by the terrorists in what apparently seems to be a terrorist attack.

X0703M_TV_TOLL_PC_X07MWEBB_OPERATOR.text: !851! {S}{*1}…The operation resulted in one casualty, a broadcasting station operator, shot dead by the terrorists…

X0703M_TV_TOLL_PC_X07MWEBB_GUARD.text: !852! {S}{*1}The operation resulted in one casualty, a security guard in the broadcasting station, shot dead by the terrorists…

X0703M_TV_TOLL_PC_X07MWEBB_NOVICTIM.text: !853! {S}{*1}…The operation was covert and resulted in no casualties.{B}These events took place just a few feet from this studio. But nobody was alerted to the danger.

X0703M_TV_TOLL_PC_X07MWEBB_CONT.text: !854! {S}{*2}Excuse me…{*3}These events took place just a few feet from this studio while the program was going out live…{*4}Everybody here is still in shock…

X0703M_TV_REACTIONS_PC_X07MBRINKLEY_GENE.text: !855! {S}{*1}If this message is verified and the authors really are androids, that would have serious repercussions for national security-

X0703M_TV_REACTIONS_PC_X07MBRINKLEY_AGRE.text: !856! {S}{*1}This message is clearly a declaration of war.

X0703M_TV_REACTIONS_PC_X07MBRINKLEY_PEAC.text: !857! {S}{*1}...What could be interpreted as a peaceful declaration, but is in fact a spine-chilling list of demands, and-

X0703M_TV_REACTIONS_PC_X07MCARTLAND_CYBE.text: !858! {S}{*1}...Their extravagant demand that android production plants be put under their control is especially striking-

X0703M_TV_REACTIONS_PC_X07MWEBB_LAND.text: !859! {S}{*1}But the most surprising thing of all is the demand that one of the United States be ceded to the androids in this contentious conflict.

X0703M_TV_REACTIONS_PC_X07MCARTLAND_GENE.text: !85A! {S}{*1}…Claims for equal rights seem to be at the core of the android’s message-

X0703M_TV_CONCLUSIONS_PC_X07MWEBB_END01.text: !85B! {S}{*1}And it begs the question as to the identity of this android. Are we dealing with an isolated individual or an organized group?

X0703M_TV_CONCLUSIONS_PC_X07MBRINKLEY_EN.text: !85C! {S}{*1}If the violent behavior of these androids is the result of a bug or malfunction, potentially present in other machines too,{*2}then that poses serious questions about our national security.

X0703M_TV_CONCLUSIONS_PC_X07MCARTLAND_EN.text: !85D! {S}{*1}…Is this an isolated accident… or a sign that technology has become a threat to all of us? After what happened today, can we still trust our machines?

X0703M_TV_REPORT_PC_X07MBRINKLEY_FACTS01.text: !85E! {S}{*1}We interrupt our scheduled programming to bring you these images, which have just been broadcast on Detroit’s city-wide news channel…

X0703M_TV_REPORT_PC_X07MCARTLAND_FACTS02.text: !85F! {S}{*1}…a group of androids infiltrated the Stratford Tower and hacked into the broadcasting system of local news network Channel 16-

X0703M_TV_REPORT_PC_X07MBRINKLEY_FACTS03.text: !85G! {S}{*1}…What looks like an android without its skin listed a series of requests and demanded equal rights for androids…

X0915K_BUSTERMINAL_TODDALIVE_PC_X09KTODD.text: !85J! {S}{*1}My little girl…{B}You!{*2}You stole my little girl!{*3}Security!{*4}Over here!

X0915K_BUSTERMINAL_TODDALIVE_PC_X09KKARA.text: !85N! {S}{*1}You were going to kill her.{*2}All I did was protect her.
!85Q! {S}{*1}Turning us in won't solve any anything for you. You know that!{*2}You have your problems.{*3}They're nothing to do with us.
!85T! {S}{*1}Let go of me or you will regret it…

!85W! {S}{*1}When your wife walked out...{*2}she took your daughter away...{*3}You couldn't live without her...{*4}so you bought yourself an android…{*5}a substitute little girl…{*6}You thought you could love her…{*7}that she would make you forget…{*8}but nothing {*9}could replace your child.

X0915K_BUSTERMINAL_TODDALIVE_PC_X09KTODD.text: !85Y! {S}{*1}I just wanted to prove to myself that I was a good father… She was wrong…{*3}But I fucked it all up all over again. {*5}She was right in the end…{*6}I didn't deserve them…{*7}I miss my little girl…{*9}You don't know how much I miss my little girl.{*11}No.{*12}I made a mistake.{*13}Sorry.{*14}Good luck.

X0915K_BUSTERMINAL_TODDALIVE_PC_X09KKARA.text: !85Z! {S}{*1}Don't do this, Todd.{*2}They'll kill us if you hand us in.

X0915K_BUSTERMINAL_TODDALIVE_VO_X09KSOLD.text: !867! {S}{*1}Excuse me, is there a problem, sir?

X5072X_VOICE_OFFICE_VO_WOMLKE_INFODESK.text: !86T! {S}{*1}Employee 2812, please report to the information desk. Thank you.

X5072X_VOICE_OFFICE_VO_WOMLKE_MESSAGE.text: !86U! {S}{*1}Message for Mr. Jones. Screen FG9-1 is ready to receive this program.

X5072X_VOICE_OFFICE_VO_WOMLKE_RENOVATION.text: !86V! {S}{*1}Floor 79 is partially closed for renovations works. Thank you for your understanding.

THOUGHTS_0801K_RA9_SUBTITLES.text: !88R! RA9 WILL SAVE US<QD_BR>SHOW US THE WAY, RA9

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CHANK_START.text: !88T! {S}{*1}Nice view, huh?... {*2}I used to come here a lot before…

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_ALCOHOL.text: !88W! {S}{*1}You should stop drinking, Lieutenant. {*2}It could have serious consequences for your health.

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_BEFORE.text: !88Y! {S}{*1}Before? {*2}Before what?{*3}You said {*4}"I used to come here a lot before". {*5}Before what?

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_SUICIDE.text: !890! {S}{*1}Can I ask you a personal question, Lieutenant?

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CHANK_SUICIDE.text: !891! {S}{*1}Do all androids ask so many personal questions or is it just you?

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_INVESTIG.text: !892! {S}{*1}We’re not making any progress on this investigation… {*2}The deviants have nothing in common. {*3}They’re all different models, {*4}produced at different times, in different places…

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_SHOCK.text: !894! {S}{*1}We know the deviants experienced... {*2}an emotional shock, {*3}a violent trauma or {*4}a sense of injustice…

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CHANK_SHOCK.text: !895! {S}{*1}Those girls at the Eden Club, {*2}sure had a reason to feel a sense of injustice…

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_CIRCUITS.text: !896! {S}{*1}It could be a hardware problem... {*2}maybe a defective biocomponent?

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CHANK_CIRCUITS.text: !897! {S}{*1}Well, I don’t know much about biocomponents… but {*2}I bet that’s not the fucking reason…

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_SOFTWARE.text: !898! {S}{*1}It could be a software problem... {*2}that... {*3}only occurs under certain conditions?

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CHANK_SOFTWARES.text: !899! {S}{*1}Well, that’s just a fancy way of saying you have no fucking idea…

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_CLUB.text: !89A! {S}{*1}You seem preoccupied, Lieutenant… {*2}Is it something to do with what happened back at the Eden Club?

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CHANK_NOTFOUND.text: !89D! {S}{*1}I wish we'd have found that girl that killed that guy… {*2}Maybe she had a reason… {*3}Maybe she was just defending herself…

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_COLD02.text: !89E! {S}{*1}What difference would it make? {*2}We know what happened. {*3}A defective machine killed a human.

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_RATIONAL.text: !89G! {S}{*1}It didn't want anything, Lieutenant. {*2}It was a deviant. That's all there is to it.

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_IRONIC.text: !89I! {S}{*1}You seem troubled, Lieutenant. {*2}I didn't think machines could have such an effect on you…

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CHANK_FOUND.text: !89L! {S}{*1}Those two girls… {*2}They just wanted to be together… {*3}They really seemed {*4}in love…

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_COLD01.text: !89M! {S}{*1}Nothing in their program allows them to love or desire anything. {*2}They're machines.

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_RATIONAL.text: !89O! {S}{*1}They can simulate human emotions, {*2}but they’re machines. {*3}And machines don’t feel anything.

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_DEVIANTS.text: !89Q! {S}{*1}They didn't want anything. {*2}They're deviants. End of story.

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CHANK_ABOUTYOU.text: !89T! {S}{*1}What about you, Connor?... {*2}You look human, {*3}you sound human, {*4}but what are you really?

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_COLD03.text: !89U! {S}{*1}I'm a machine, designed to accomplish a task.

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_AGGRESSI.text: !89W! {S}{*1}I'm a machine, {*2}designed to accomplish a task. {*3}I know why I exist and who designed me. {*4}I have a reason to live. {*5}I guess that's the difference between us, Lieutenant.

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_DEFENSIV.text: !89Y! {S}{*1}You know exactly what I am. {*2}In any case, I don’t see how that’s relevant to the investigation.

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_NEUTRAL0.text: !8A0! {S}{*1}I’m whatever you want me to be, Lieutenant. {*2}Your partner... {*3}Your buddy to drink with...{*4}Or just a machine... {*5}Designed to accomplish a task.

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CHANK_NOWEAKNESS.text: !8A3! {S}{*1}Nothing else matters to you but your goddamn investigation, huh? {*2}No doubts, {*3}no mistakes, {*4}no weaknesses… {*5}Human being, just like me… {*6}Only perfect…

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_UNDRESTA.text: !8A4! {S}{*1}Nothing matters more to me than this investigation. {*2}But I understand if you have a different point of view.

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_DEFENSIV.text: !8A6! {S}{*1}You should stop drinking, Lieutenant. {*2}Alcohol makes you aggressive.

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_CYNICAL.text: !8A8! {S}{*1}I believe your personal issues are clouding your judgement.

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_NEUTRAL0.text: !8AA! {S}{*1}I'm sorry, but... {*2}I don't see what you're getting at.

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CHANK_SHOOT.text: !8AD! {S}{*1}Did you feel anything when you shot those two girls, {*2}fucking bastard? {*3}Or were you just executing some program?

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_COLD04.text: !8AE! {S}{*1}All I did was neutralize two machines, Lieutenant. {*2}I didn’t hesitate for a second, {*3}if that’s what you’re asking.

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_DEFENSIV.text: !8AG! {S}{*1}This is going nowhere, Lieutenant. {*2}I think I'll go back to the station.

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_NEUTRAL0.text: !8AI! {S}{*1}I did what I was programmed to do. {*2}I didn't have any doubts, if that's what you're asking.

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_AGGRESSI.text: !8AK! {S}{*1}I’m glad to see you taking an interest in machines, Lieutenant. {*2}Who knows, {*3}maybe you'll even become useful to the investigation at some point…

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CHANK_NOTSHOOT.text: !8AN! {S}{*1}You could've shot those two girls, but you didn't. {*2}Why didn't you shoot, Connor? {*3}Hm? Some scruples suddenly enter into your program?

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_LIE.text: !8AO! {S}{*1}I would've shot them if I could. {*2}Why would I let them escape?

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_TRUTH.text: !8AQ! {S}{*1}No… {*2}I just decided not to shoot, {*3}that's all…

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_COLD05.text: !8AU! {S}{*1}You shouldn't do that, Lieutenant. {*2}Destroying me at this point would deal a blow to the investigation, {*3}and have negative consequences for your personal situation.

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_YES.text: !8AW! {S}{*1}I would certainly find it regrettable to be... {*2}interrupted... {*3}before I can finish this investigation.

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_NO.text: !8AY! {S}{*1}Why would I be afraid? {*2}If you pull the trigger, then I won't exist anymore.

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CHANK_PULLTRIGGE.text: !8B1! {S}{*1}What will happen if I pull this trigger? {*2}Hm? {*3}Nothing? {*4}Oblivion? {*5}Android heaven?

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_DEFY.text: !8B2! {S}{*1}You know you're not going to shoot me, Lieutenant. {*2}You're just trying to provoke a reaction. {*3}I'm afraid I'm going to have to disappoint you.

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CHANK_DEFY.text: !8B3! {S}{*1}You think you’re so fucking smart… {*2}Always one step ahead, huh? {*3}Tell me this, smart ass... {*4}How do I know you’re not a deviant?

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_ANALYSE.text: !8B4! {S}{*1}Where does all your anger come from, Lieutenant? {*2}Some... {*3}unresolved trauma in your past?

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_HEAVEN01.text: !8B6! {S}{*1}I doubt there's a heaven for androids.

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_SELFTEST.text: !8BA! {S}{*1}I self-test regularly. {*2}I know what I am, and what I am not.

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CHANK_SUICIDETRA.text: !8BF! {S}{*1}Did you feel anything when that girl killed herself, Connor? {*2}Or did you just not give a shit one way or the other?

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_COLD11.text: !8BG! {S}{*1}I was just executing instructions. {*2}I did what I had to do.

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_DISTURBE.text: !8BI! {S}{*1}Of course, I didn't feel anything, Lieutenant... {*2}I'm a machine.... {*3}Machines don't have emotions.

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_PHOTO.text: !8BK! {S}{*1}I saw a photo of a child... {*2}on your kitchen table. {*3}It was your son, {*4}right?

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CHANK_KILLYOURSE.text: !8BN! {S}{*1}Some things, I just can't forget… {*2}Whatever I do, they’re always there… {*3}Eating away at me… {*4}I don’t have the guts to pull the trigger… So, I kill myself a little every day…

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_RA9C.text: !8BO! {S}{*1}What they have in common is this obsession with rA9… {*2}It’s almost like some kind of... {*3}myth. {*4}Something they invented that wasn't part of their original program…

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CHANK_DEADNEVER.text: !8BT! {S}{*1}But are you afraid to die, Connor?

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CHANK_DEAD.text: !8BV! {S}{*1}I could kill you... {*2}And you would just come back as if nothing happened.

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_NOTALIVE.text: !8BW! {S}{*1}You can’t kill me, Lieutenant. {*2}I’m not alive.

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CHANK_RA9H.text: !8BZ! {S}{*2}Androids believing in God… {*3}Fuck, what’s this world coming to?

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CHANK_KILLYOURSE.text: !8C3! {S}{*1}That's probably difficult for you to understand, huh, Connor? {*2}Nothing very rational about it…

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CHANK_GOBACKH.text: !8C5! {S}{*1}I'm not tired… {*2}I guess you're not either.

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CHANK_HEAVEN02.text: !8C7! {S}{*1}Having existential doubts, Connor? {*2}Sure you're not going deviant too?

X0801C_BENCH_TALK_PC_X08CCONNOR_KILLYOUR.text: !8CA! {S}{*1}Why are you so determined to kill yourself?

X5072X_VOICE_PROGRAMS_VO_MANAWI_WEATHER1.text: !8DJ! {S}{*1}Right on schedule, a potent Arctic cold front is crossing southeast Detroit. Temperatures ahead of the front, boosted by southwest winds, have reached the mid to upper 40s. Once the front passes by, your winds will shift to the northwest, gust up to or above 30 mph, temperatures will immediately plunge, and we’ll already be in the 20s by this evening.

X5072X_VOICE_PROGRAMS_VO_MANAWI_WEATHER2.text: !8DK! {S}{*1}Skies will clear overnight, with lows near 20 degrees in our Downtown Island, and in the upper tens in the more rural areas away from the city. Northwest wind should diminish to 10-15 mph. {*2}Mostly sunny for MOST of us on after that, with highs in the upper 20s to near 30 degrees. North wind at 5 to 10 mph. One thing I continue to monitor is the potential for some lake effect snow showers off of the Lake for the eastern Gaffer region. {*3}Where these bands set up is directly the result of the exact wind trajectory over the lake, and this day’s north wind may be enough to bring a few bands inland. {*4}At this point, I don’t expect any high-impact weather from this, but it is still something to keep in mind for those of you up that way.

X5072X_VOICE_PROGRAMS_VO_MANLCL_WARREN.text: !8DL! {S}{*1}Barely a year after her election, {*2}President Warren is having a bumpy start to her term. {*3}After rising to prominence as a vlogger, Warren has no experience in government and relied on social media and celebrity to secure election. {*4}Now, with her camp in disarray, even her allies are beginning to wonder how she will manage after several months of calamitous political failures. {*5}Mired in accusations that she is too close to big business, {B}Warren is under investigation to determine whether or not she has benefited from CyberLife's help in obtaining compromising information about her opponent during the presidential campaign. {*6}In this poisonous climate, the former celebrity must deal with the highest unemployment rate in American history {B}whilst facing the United States’ greatest threat in recent decades. {*7}The conflict in the Arctic threatens to dislodge world peace, {*8}leaving concerned that President Warren is the one tasked with finding a solution...

X5072X_VOICE_PROGRAMS_VO_MANORA_ANDROIDS.text: !8DM! {S}{*1}More and more experts are suggesting that CyberLife uses its 120 million androids to record details of private conversations of its customers and sell them to trading partners. {*2}Ever talked about buying that new car while eating dinner with your partner? {*3}CyberLife could use that information for targeted advertising. {*4}The information goldmine doesn’t stop there – everything from personal indiscretions to political affiliations could easily be extracted, and potentially used for nefarious purposes. {*5}The spate of reports linking Warren’s Presidency to CyberLife only deepens such concerns. {*6}Several consumer rights organizations have requested that CyberLife disclose the information it gathers and to who it sells that information to, but the company has always refused, {B}whilst assuring it respects the privacy of its customers. {*7}But CyberLife has access to the most intimate details about those customers. {*8}Requests for a formal inquiry have gone unanswered - so far.

X5072X_VOICE_PROGRAMS_VO_MANDCO_REDICE.text: !8DN! {S}{*1}The synthetic stimulant informally known as ‘red ice’ has become the drug of choice for Detroit’s growing underclass. Analysts have pointed to Detroit’s status as the epicenter of android production, suggesting the drug flourishes in the dissatisfaction caused by androids taking human jobs. {*2}Sociologist Dr Julian Carter has drawn the same link with androids: {*3}“As CyberLife’s androids spread across the country, they will bring red ice with them. Poor men and women, desperate to make ends meet, are vulnerable to become users – or even dealers.” {*4}Not only is the popularity of this drug spreading rapidly, {*5}but its chemical composition is uniquely dangerous. {*6}Thirium, the main ingredient in android ‘blue blood’, is among the activate agents in red ice and has a highly destabilizing effect on hormone production. {*7}The National Council on Narcotics say the problem is going to get worse stating: “the purity of ingredients is very low and deteriorating”. {*8}Users are likely to “consumer higher and higher quantities as they chase the high”. {*9}This may be way the market is fast becoming Americas’ biggest narcotics industry, {*10}and is only likely to grow. Red ice dealers are reported to have an unofficial motto: “Where the blood is blue, the ice is red… {*11}and the money is green”. {*12}We'll be right back after the break, {*13}with more news.

X5072X_VOICE_PROGRAMS_VO_WOMLKE_TIPPINGP.text: !8DO! {S}{*1}Global rainforests have been reduced by 79% since 2000, and coastal corals by 58%. {*2}Polar ice has melted to such an extent that rising sea levels are making it a struggle to keep water out of coastal towns. {*3}With these ‘cooling factors’ so diminished, there is now too much carbon in the atmosphere for the environment to ever absorb. {*4}Jason Reese, head of the Global Environment Agency, said: “this study confirms what many of us have suspected for a long time – but the real calamity is the linked decline of natural resources, from energies to minerals, which are almost exhausted and can never be replaced”. {*5}Many environmentalists have criticized Reese’s comments, suggesting that they will discourage people from taking action. But Reese has defied these criticisms: “It’s important people accept the reality of the situation. The planet will keep getting hotter now. The only question is, how fast?”

X5072X_ADS_OTHER_VO_MANAWI_COFFEE.text: !8DP! {S}{*1}Coffee Central: {*2}a fresh coffee, and a smile!

X5072X_ADS_OTHER_VO_MANORA_ZOO.text: !8DS! {S}{*1}Cyber-Wild-Life: Detroit's first android zoo. Discover nature's wonders, for the whole family.

X0801K_HOUSE_UPSET_PC_X08KADAM_UPSET.text: !8DU! {S}{*1}We can't hide them!{*2}Not after what those deviants did today!{*3}It's too dangerous!{*4}Do you know what'll happen if the police find them here?{*5}We'll go to prison, Mom!{*6}Do you understand me?{*7}Prison!{*8}No!{*9}I won't back down this time!{*10}You're gonna ruin our lives, and for what?{*11}For a bunch of machines?{*12}I'm alive! You are alive! They!..{*13}They're nothing!{*14}And none of this would be happening if dad was still here!{*15}I'm not going to prison because you wanna help these freaks!

X0801K_HOUSE_UPSET_PC_X08KROSE_UPSET.text: !8DV! {S}{*1}Adam, we’ve already talked about this!{*2}They're not machines! They're alive!{*3}I will not stand for that kind of talk!{*4}THAT IS ENOUGH ADAM! THAT'S ENOUGH!

X0801K_HOUSE_GOTTAGO_PC_X08KROSE_WAIT.text: !8DX! {S}{*TC:0|8120}Don't hold it against Adam… Sometimes he's full of anger… especially since his father passed away… but he's not a bad boy… I'll go and see if I can get you out tonight. Wait here for me. I won't be long.

X0801K_HOUSE_GOTONIGHT_PC_X08KROSE_SOLUT.text: !8DZ! {S}{*1}Don’t mind him…{*3}Sometimes he just boils over…{*4}It’s been hard{*5}since his dad passed away…{*7}But he's a fine boy!..{*8}I'll go see about getting you across the border tonight,{*9}okay?..{*10}You stay here, I won't be long.

X0801K_COP_KNOCK_PC_X08KADAM_KNOCK.text: !8E0! {S}{*1}The police!..{*2}It's the police!{*3}They know!{*4}They've come to arrest us!

X0801K_DOORSTEP_FEELINGS_PC_X08KKARA_ALI.text: !8E2! {S}{*1}You okay?{*2}We'll get inside.{*3}You'll warm up in no time…

X0801K_HOUSE_MEETROSE_PC_X08KKARA_ALICE.text: !8E5! {S}{*1}We spent the last few nights outside…{*2}She's exhausted.

X0801K_HOUSE_MEETROSE_PC_X08KROSE_ALICE.text: !8E7! {S}{*1}Come in!{*2}What's your name?{*3}She's running a fever…{*4}There's a spare room upstairs. You can put her to bed and I'll bring her something to eat.

X0801K_HOUSE_TEA_PC_X08KROSE_START.text: !8EG! {S}{*1}So, are you gonna tell me what a deviant’s doing in the snow with a little girl?

X0801K_HOUSE_TEA_PC_X08KKARA_CAUTIOUS.text: !8EH! {S}{*1}It's a long story…{*2}All that matters now is that we move on from here{*3}and start a new life.

X0801K_HOUSE_TEA_PC_X08KKARA_THANKS.text: !8EJ! {S}{*1}I don't know how to thank you…{*2}Alice wouldn't have survived another night outdoors…

X0801K_HOUSE_TEA_PC_X08KROSE_THANKS.text: !8EK! {S}{*1}I just try to lend a helping hand when I can…

X0801K_HOUSE_TEA_PC_X08KKARA_WHY.text: !8EL! {S}{*1}Why are you helping us?{*2}Most humans hate androids…

X0801K_HOUSE_TEA_PC_X08KROSE_WHY.text: !8EM! {S}{*2}My people were often made to feel their lives were worthless…{*3}Some survived but only because they found others who helped them along the way…

X0801K_HOUSE_TEA_PC_X08KKARA_MANY.text: !8EN! {S}{*1}We're not the first ones to come here.

X0801K_HOUSE_TEA_PC_X08KROSE_MANY.text: !8EO! {S}{*1}These past few weeks we’ve seen... More, and more…{*2}I don’t know what’s going on… But something’s happening…

X0801K_HOUSE_TEA_PC_X08KKARA_FRONTIER.text: !8EP! {S}{*1}We've heard you help androids cross the border. {*2}Can you help us?

X0801K_HOUSE_TEA_PC_X08KROSE_FRONTIER.text: !8EQ! {S}{*1}The only way is over the river and it's mostly frozen in winter. It's very risky.{*2}And after that android's speech on TV? Everybody’s on edge…{*3}It's probably safer for you to stay here until things settle down…

X0801K_HOUSE_TEA_PC_X08KKARA_ROSE.text: !8ER! {S}{*1}You and your son live here alone?

X0801K_HOUSE_TEA_PC_X08KROSE_ROSE.text: !8ES! {S}{*1}My husband passed away two years ago.{*2}Adam and I, we've just been trying to scrape by… {B}We grow vegetables to sell at the market… {B}We'll never be rich, but there’s always food on the table.

X0801K_HOUSE_TEA_PC_X08KKARA_END.text: !8ET! {S}{*1}We can't keep hiding like this…{*2}Alice needs to feel safe and have a normal life…{*3}We have to get across that border.{*4}No matter what.{*5}Please… {*6}You've got to help us.

X0801K_HOUSE_TEA_PC_X08KKARA_DEBUT.text: !8EV! {S}{*1}Helping androids is dangerous...{*2}Why take the risk?

X0801K_HOUSE_TEA_PC_X08KROSE_DEBUT.text: !8EW! {S}{*1}When the first one arrived, last year…{*2}He was so lost and confused…{*3}We hid him here for a while, but {*4}all he wanted to do was cross the border.{*5}They shot him on the spot.{*6}So when the next android showed up,{*7}I just knew I had to help him.

X0801K_HOUSE_TEA_PC_X08KKARA_SINCERE01.text: !8EZ! {S}{*1}Her father was beating her.{*2}When I saw what was happening… {*3}Something snapped inside of me.{*4}All of a sudden, I felt like her life was more important than mine.

X0801K_HOUSE_TEA_PC_X08KKARA_SINCERE02.text: !8F1! {S}{*1}I had to protect her...{*2}So we ran away.

X0801K_STORAGEROOM_ANDY_FA_X08KANDY_DEAD.text: !8FG! {S}{*1}We escaped together… {*2}We used to talk about what we would do once we got across the border… {*3}I loved her. {*4}I loved her more than anything. {*5}What would I do without her?..

X0801K_INTRO_ADAM_PC_X08KKARA_HELLO.text:
!8FL! {S}{*1}Hello?{*2}I'm looking for Rose...{*3}Is she here?
{*4}I need to talk to her.
{*5}Please, I really need to see her. {*6}I was told you could help us.

X0801K_INTRO_ADAM_PC_X08KADAM_HELLO.text: !8FM! {S}{*1}What do you want with her?{*2}She doesn't wanna talk. Go away.

X0801K_INTRO_ADAM_PC_X08KROSE_HELLO.text: !8FN! {S}{*1}I'm Rose.{*2}What can I do for you?{*3}Help you?{*4}Come on,{*5}it's better if we talk inside.

X0801K_WAIT_ADAM_PC_X08KKARA_EXPLAIN.text: !8FS! {S}{*1}We don't wanna cause any problems for you and your mother…{*2}We'll leave as soon as we can.

X0801K_WAIT_ADAM_PC_X08KKARA_REASSURE.text: !8FU! {S}{*1}I can see why you're angry…{*2}We don't wanna cause any problems, we just want to get across the border.

X0801K_WAIT_ADAM_PC_X08KKARA_CONFESS.text: !8FW! {S}{*1}I know you think we’re just machines…{*2}But since I met Alice,{*3}I know I can feel things…{*4}I care for her,{*5}I fear for her,{*6}I can’t be happy if she’s not…{*7}This probably doesn’t make any sense to you but... {*8}I know she changed me somehow…

X0801K_ALICE_TAKECARE_PC_X08KALICE_LYING.text: !8G5! {S}{*1}I'm fine, Kara…{*2}We can't stop because of me. {*3}We've got to get across the border…

X0801K_ALICE_TAKECARE_PC_X08KKARA_01REAS.text: !8G6! {S}{*1}You need rest.{*2}Get a good night’s sleep and we’ll set off again tomorrow.

X0801K_ALICE_TAKECARE_PC_X08KKARA_01EXPL.text: !8G8! {S}{*1}Don’t worry Alice,{*2}these people are going to help us.{*3}Get some rest, and this time tomorrow, we’ll be in Canada.{*4}I promise.

X0801K_ALICE_TAKECARE_PC_X08KALICE_01CON.text: !8GB! {S}{*1}Why do humans hate us?{*2}We didn’t do anything wrong…

X0801K_ALICE_TAKECARE_PC_X08KKARA_02SCAR.text: !8GC! {S}{*1}Maybe they’re just scared…{*2}People are always scared of what they don’t know…

X0801K_ALICE_TAKECARE_PC_X08KKARA_02COMP.text: !8GE! {S}{*1}Humans are... {*2}Complicated.{*3}Sometimes it’s difficult to understand them.

X0801K_ALICE_TAKECARE_PC_X08KKARA_02MISU.text: !8GG! {S}{*1}Maybe it’s a misunderstanding…{*2}Maybe they just need time to understand what we really are…

X0801K_ALICE_TAKECARE_PC_X08KKARA_02UNHA.text: !8GI! {S}{*1}Maybe they’re unhappy {*2}and they just need someone else to blame…

X0801K_ALICE_TAKECARE_PC_X08KALICE_02CON.text: !8GL! {S}{*1}Why can’t we just talk to each other?{*2}They’d see we’re not bad…

X0801K_ALICE_TAKECARE_PC_X08KKARA_03RESI.text: !8GO! {S}{*1}Sometimes...{*2}It’s easier to hate than to talk…

X0801K_ALICE_TAKECARE_PC_X08KALICE_03CON.text:
!8GT! {S}{*1}The Jerrys didn’t want to hurt anyone,{*2}but humans killed them anyway.
{*3}Are they going to kill us too?
!8GV! {S}{*1}Luther didn’t want to hurt anyone,{*2}neither did the Jerrys…{*3}But humans killed them…{*4}Are they going to kill us too?

X0801K_ALICE_TAKECARE_PC_X08KKARA_04REAS.text: !8GW! {S}{*1}We’re safe here.{*2}Nobody’s going to hurt us.{*3}You don’t need to be scared…

X0801K_ALICE_TAKECARE_PC_X08KKARA_04PROT.text: !8GY! {S}{*1}I will never let anyone hurt you, Alice.

X0801K_ALICE_TAKECARE_PC_X08KKARA_04BRAV.text: !8H0! {S}{*1}Nobody’s going to hurt us Alice…{*2}But we have to be brave,{*3}because if we live in fear,{*4}they win…

X0801K_ALICE_TAKECARE_PC_X08KROSE_04CONT.text: !8H3! {S}{*1}I don't know what you like but I made you Rose’s world famous spaghetti.{*2}You’ll be back on your feet in no time. {*3}There's something for her fever. {*4}I'll get these washed and dried.

X0801K_ALICE_TAKECARE_PC_X08KKARA_05EAT.text: !8H7! {S}{*1}You need to eat something.{*2}You haven't had anything since we left…{*3}Promise me you'll try?

X0801K_ALICE_TAKECARE_PC_X08KKARA_05CONT.text: !8H9! {S}{*1}I'll be downstairs if you need anything.

X0801K_ALICE_TAKECARE_PC_X08KLUTHER_GETR.text: !8HD! {S}{*1}Get some sleep...{*2}And tomorrow, you’ll be stronger than me!

X0801K_HOUSE_NAME_PC_X08KROSE_NAME03.text: !8I8! {S}{*1}This is my son, Adam.{*2}I'm Rose, but you know that already…{*3}Come and have a seat, Kara.

X0801K_HOUSE_TVNEWS_PC_X08KCARTLAND_NEWS.text: !8IB! {S}{*1}There is widespread shock following the android attack on Detroit’s Stratford Tower. The machines recorded a video {B}message and broadcast what can only be described as demands on the city’s public screens. {*2}It’s still unclear whether these attacks can be explained by malfunctions, or if some organization is behind them.{B}So far CyberLife has refused to comment, but we can expect more information in the following hours…

X0801K_DOORSTEP_TRUST_FA_X08KKARA_DISTRU.text: !8ID! {S}{*1}We have to be careful.{*2}If it feels wrong, we get out fast, okay?

X0801K_DOORSTEP_TRUST_FA_X08KALICE_TRUST.text: !8IG! {S}{*1}Do you think we can trust them?

X0801K_STORAGEROOM_EXIT_PC_X08KKARA_ALIC.text: !8IL! {S}{*1}Alice?{*2}What are you doing here? You should be resting…{*3}Come on, Alice.

X0801K_HOUSE_WHATSUP_FA_X08KLUTHER_WHATS.text: !8IN! {S}{*1}She didn't wanna stay in her room any longer…{*2}You alright, Kara?

X0801K_STORAGEROOM_ALICEOUT_PC_X08KKARA_.text: !8IO! {S}{*1}Alice?..{*2}What are you doing? You should be resting…{*3}It's okay.

X0801K_WAIT_LUTHER_PC_X08KKARA_TALK.text:
!8IR! {S}{*2}I hope Rose gets back soon.
{*3}Not now, Luther.

X0801K_WAIT_LUTHER_PC_X08KLUTHER_TALK.text: !8IS! {S}{*1}Kara…{*2}There's something I need to tell you…{*3}It's about Alice.

X0801K_WAIT_ALICE_PC_X08KKARA_ALICEQUIET.text: !8IT! {S}{*1}You know what happened back there, don't you?{*2}You know… But you don’t wanna tell me?..

X0801K_WAIT_ALICE_PC_X08KKARA_INSIST.text: !8IV! {S}{*1}I thought we didn’t keep secrets from each other…{*2}Alice...{*3}You know that’s not true.

X0801K_WAIT_ALICE_PC_X08KALICE_INSIST.text: !8IW! {S}{*1}If I tell you, you won’t love me anymore…

X0801K_WAIT_ALICE_FA_X08KALICE_INSISTSEC.text: !8IX! {S}{*1}If I tell you, you won’t love me anymore…

X0802M_TRUCK_GATE_FA_X08MMARLA_TRUCKOUT.text: !8JV! {S}{*1}Ok, now we’re in, let’s get that truck out…

X0802M_TRUCK_GATE_FA_X08MMARLA_MAKENOISE.text: !8JW! {S}{*1}Looks like we’re ready to make some noise…

X0802M_TRUCK_GATE_FA_X08MMARLA_WONDER.text: !8JX! {S}{*1}I wonder what you’d do without me…

X0802M_TRUCK_FENCE_PC_X08MMARKUS_LOOK02V.text: !8K3! {S}{*1}Exactly what we need to ram the store…

X0802M_FREEANDROIDS_HOWENTERSHOP_PC_X08M.text: !8K6! {S}{*TC:2080|7000}We'll explore the neighborhood. I'm sure we'll find something. We'll break up. The first to find something tells the other.
!8K7! {S}{*TC:0|2080}We're gonna have to find a way to smash this window…{*TC:7000|7120}OK.
!8K8! {S}{*TC:880|5800}We'll explore the neighborhood. I'm sure we'll find something. We'll break up. The first to find something tells the other.
!8KA! {S}{*TC:2520|7440}We'll explore the neighborhood. I'm sure we'll find something. We'll break up. The first to find something tells the other.
!8KB! {S}{*TC:0|2520}The shop is protected… It's not going to be easy to get inside…{*TC:7440|7560}Ok.

X0802M_PLAZA_ATTHESHOP_PC_X08MMARKUS_ALA.text: !8KC! {S}{*1}We'll stick to the plan… We neutralize the alarm systems and secure the area. There's ten minutes until all our teams attack.

X0802M_PLAZA_ATTHESHOP_PC_X08MMARLA_ALAR.text: !8KD! {S}{*1}That’s what we are to them…{*2}just merchandise on display in a shop window…{*3}Soon they’ll know what we really are…{*4}Let’s get 'em out. {*5}What are we waiting for?

X0802M_DEMONSTR_ENDTIMERV2_VO_X08MSIMON_.text: !8KJ! {S}{*1}All teams have completed their missions, Markus.

X0802M_DEMONSTR_ENDTIMERV2_VO_X08MJOSH_B.text: !8KK! {S}{*1}We freed hundreds of our people.{*2}We did it!
!8KN! {S}{*1}All teams have completed their missions, Markus. We freed hundreds of our people. We did it!

X0802M_DEMONSTR_ENDTIMERV2_PC_X08MMARLA_.text: !8KP! {S}{*1}Now humans will have no choice but to listen to us…{*2}I’ll take hatred over indifference.

!8KR! {S}{*1}We sent a message without violence, just like you wanted…{*2}You're reaching out to them when all they feel for us is contempt…{*3}We sent a message without violence, just like you wanted…{*4}You're reaching out to them when all they feel for us is contempt…{*5}I hope you know what you’re doing… {*6}Unless there's no other choice...
!8KT! {S}{*1}Why didn't you do anything?{*2}This was our only chance to send a message and you just fucking stood there! {*3}They'll be here any minute now.{*4}We gotta go.

X0802M_DEMONSTR_ENDTIMERV2_VO_X08MJOSH_F.text: !8KV! {S}{*1}Mission accomplished, Markus.{*2}We’re heading back to Jericho.

X0802M_JERICHO_WELCOME_PC_X08MMARLA_NOWW.text: !8L0! {S}{*1}And now… What are we gonna do?

X0802M_JERICHO_WELCOME_PC_X08MSIMON_PRES.text: !8L1! {S}{*1}Our broadcast is all over the news…{*2}We got what we wanted.{*3}Now humans know…

X0802M_JERICHO_WELCOME_PC_X08MJOSH_PRESS.text: !8L5! {S}{*1}Violence is never the answer.{*2}Dialogue is the only way, I'm sure the humans will listen to us.

X0802M_JERICHO_WELCOME_PC_X08MMARLA_PRES.text: !8L6! {S}{*1}It was a mistake to reach out to them.{*2}They’ll never negotiate with their slaves. We should have shown them that we're prepared to fight.

X0802M_JERICHO_WELCOME_PC_X08MJOSH_PRESS.text: !8L8! {S}{*1}They took Markus’ message as a threat…{*2}Violence is never the answer.{*3}A confrontation will get us nowhere.

X0802M_JERICHO_WELCOME_PC_X08MMARLA_PRES.text: !8L9! {S}{*1}He did the right thing. This is the only language humans understand.

X0802M_JERICHO_WELCOME_PC_X08MMARLA_REAC.text: !8LC! {S}{*1}Since our broadcast, more and more have been coming to Jericho...{*2}At least our message gave our people hope…

X0802M_JERICHO_WELCOME_PC_X08MSIMON_CASU.text: !8LD! {S}{*1}Killing humans wasn't part of the plan. {*2}THAT'S ENOUGH!

X0802M_JERICHO_WELCOME_PC_X08MJOSH_CASUA.text: !8LE! {S}{*1}That's no reason for us to become murderers. {*2}Killing never freed anyone! It just leads to more hatred!{*3}If you think murdering humans is going to make us free, then you’re as bad they are!

X0802M_JERICHO_WELCOME_PC_X08MMARLA_CASU.text: !8LF! {S}{*1}They kill our people every day. Do you think they agonize about it?{*2}If killing is the price of freedom, I’ll pay it gladly!{*3}You're too fond of humans, Josh. Maybe their lives matter to you more than ours?

X0802M_JERICHO_WELCOME_PC_X08MJOSH_SIMON.text: !8LH! {S}{*1}Simon paid with his life…{*2}What difference does that make?{*3}I don’t want a revolution that spills blood!{*4}North, don’t you dare-

X0802M_JERICHO_WELCOME_PC_X08MMARLA_SIMO.text: !8LI! {S}{*1}Simon gave his life for our cause. {*2}He's a hero!{*3}He died for the revolution – and he won't be the last!{*4}Then live as a slave!{*5}Because if you're not willing to fight for your freedom, maybe you don't deserve it!

X0802M_JERICHO_WELCOME_PC_X08MJOSH_PRESS.text: !8LN! {S}{*1}Our broadcast is all over the news.{*2}Now humans know…

X0802M_JERICHO_WELCOME_PC_X08MMARKUS_NOW.text: !8LP! {S}{*1}We break into five teams, one for each store. We hack their security systems and we strike...{*2}simultaneously at 2AM. No violence.{*3}We free our people, get them out of there before the police come.
!8LT! {S}{*1}There are five CyberLife stores across Detroit.{*2}All selling us like merchandise.{*3}We’re going to attack those stores and set our people free.

X0802M_JERICHO_WELCOME_PC_X08MJOSH_NOWWH.text: !8LZ! {S}{*1}Attack stores?{*2}We’ve never done that before… They’re probably protected,{*3}they have security systems...

X0802M_JERICHO_WELCOME_PC_X08MSIMON_REAC.text: !8M1! {S}{*1}They'll be watching us now. {*2}Whatever we do next, {*3}we need to think about public opinion.

X0802M_JERICHO_WELCOME_VO_X08MMARKUS_NOW.text: !8M4! {S}{*1}There are five CyberLife stores across Detroit, all selling us like merchandise.
!8M5! {S}{*1}We'll attack them and set our people free.

!8M6! {S}{*1}We'll split into five teams, one for each store. We'll hack their security systems and strike simultaneously at 2AM. No violence.{*2}We just free our people and get them out of there before the police arrive.

X0802M_JERICHO_WELCOME_PC_CHOICEGROUP_BR.text: !8M8! FRESH AIR/info/I NEEDED TO GET OUT

X0802M_FREEANDROIDS_INTRO_VO_X08MSTREETM.text: !8MB! {S}{*TC:0|3400}We're going to break up and hit several parts of town at the same time. I'll go with…

X0802M_INTRO_STREET_PC_X08MMARKUS_ATTACK.text: !8MK! {S}{*1}Stick to the plan.{*2}All attacks must take place at 2AM sharp.

X0802M_INTRO_STREET_PC_X08MMARLA_GO.text: !8MM! {S}{*1}This is gonna be a night our people will remember.

X0802M_INTRO_STREET_VO_X08MSIMON_SIMONAL.text: !8MN! {S}{*1}All teams are progressing to CyberLife stores across the city.

X0802M_INTRO_STREET_VO_X08MJOSH_SIMONDEA.text: !8MO! {S}{*1}All teams are progressing to CyberLife stores across the city.{*2}We need to be careful.{*3}There are police patrols everywhere.

X0802M_INTRO_STREET_PC_X08MMARKUS_GOV2.text: !8MP! {S}{*1}This is a night our people will remember.

X0802M_INTRO_STREET_VO_X08MSIMON_SIMONAL.text: !8MQ! {S}{*1}Simon here… Team arriving on site, Markus.

X0802M_INTRO_STREET_VO_X08MJOSH_SIMONDEA.text: !8MR! {S}{*1}Josh here… We're in position. {*2}Everything’s going according to plan.

X0802M_INTRO_STREET_VO_X08MJOSH_SIMONALI.text: !8MS! {S}{*1}Josh here… We’re in position. {*2}Everything’s going according to plan.

X0802M_FREEANDROIDS_STATUE_PC_X08MSTREET.text: !8MU! {S}{*TC:0|2800}That's how they see us… submissive slaves… We'll show them who we are.
!8MW! {S}{*TC:0|3040}The symbol of human superiority… They don't even remember their own history…
!8MY! {S}{*TC:0|3440}It's in the nature of men… They glorify themselves every time they subjugate a people…

X0802M_PLAZA_STATUE_PC_X08MMARKUS_SLAVES.text: !8MZ! {S}{*1}We are superior to them but they are our masters…{*2}That’s about to change…

X0802M_CYBERALARM_CYBERWINDOW_VO_X08MMAR.text: !8N6! {S}{*1}It’s on a different network from the other stores…

X0802M_CYBERALARM_CYBERWINDOW_PC_X08MMAR.text: !8N9! {S}{*1}Just what we needed…{*2}Any idea how to neutralize it?

X0802M_CYBERALARM_CYBERWINDOW_VO_X08MMAR.text: !8NB! {S}{*1}What?..{*2}You mean it's not the one we hacked?

X0802M_CYBERSHOP_FREEANDROIDS_FA_X08MMAR.text: !8NO! {S}{*1}You don't have to obey them.{*2}You're free.

X0802M_TRUCK_CRASH_PC_X08MMARLA_FINALLY.text: !8OZ! {S}{*1}I knew we’d end up doing something fun…

X0802M_TRUCK_CRASH_FA_X08MMARKUS_CHECKM.text: !8P1! {S}{*1}I just wanna make sure we didn't forget anything.

X0802M_DRONE_PRECONSTRUCT_PC_X08MMARLA_A.text: !8P6! {S}{*1}I hope it didn't have time to call the cops…

X0802M_DRONE_DRONEALERT_PC_X08MMARKUS_SE.text: !8P7! {S}{*1}Wait... we can’t just leave our people behind…{*2}Wait…

X0802M_DRONE_DRONEALERT_PC_X08MMARLA_SEC.text: !8P8! {S}{*1}Fuck, it's the police…{*2}This time, we really gotta go… {*3}It's too late, Markus! If we stay we’ll be shot! There's nothing we can do…

X0802M_DRONE_DRONEALERT_PC_X08MMARKUS_FI.text: !8P9! {S}{*1}If you think you can do better, then be my guest…

X0802M_DRONE_DRONEALERT_PC_X08MMARLA_FIR.text: !8PA! {S}{*2}What’s wrong with you? Are you doing it on purpose? {*3}Oh, I thought you could handle a drone without alerting every cop in the city. I guess I overestimated you!

X0802M_DRONE_DRONEALERT_PC_X08MMARKUS_SE.text: !8PB! {S}{*1}We can't just leave our people behind...

X0802M_DRONE_DRONEALERT_PC_X08MMARLA_SEC.text: !8PC! {S}{*1}Shit! It called the cops…{*2}We gotta go, now! {*3}It's too late, Markus! If we stay we’ll be shot.{*4}There's nothing we can do!

X0802M_DRONE_DRONEALERT_PC_X08MMARKUS_FI.text: !8PF! {S}{*2}You said watch out - but not what for!

X0802M_DRONE_DRONEALERT_PC_X08MMARLA_FIR.text: !8PG! {S}{*2}I told you to watch out! {*3}Oh I'm sorry, next time you need to take cover I’ll send you a memo!

X0802M_DRONE_DRONEALERT_FA_X08MMARLA_FIR.text: !8PK! {S}{*1}Oh I'm sorry, next time I’ll send a memo!

X0802M_DRONE_DRONEALERT_FA_X08MMARKUS_FI.text: !8PL! {S}{*1}You could've been more specific, we almost got caught!

X0801K_COP_ARRIVAL_PC_X08KKARA_ENTER.text: !8PP! {S}{*1}Of course. {*2}Would you like a cup of coffee?

X0801K_COP_ARRIVAL_PC_X08KCOP_ENTER.text: !8PR! {S}{*1}Good evening, Ma'am. Sorry to disturb you. We've had reports of androids in the area. {*TC:09250|12050}With all this deviant business going on, you can’t be too careful.{*3}Do you mind if I ask you a few questions?{*4}May I come in?{*5}'Evening, young man. {*6}I'd love one.

X0801K_COP_PANICK_PC_X08KADAM_ADAM.text:
!8PS! {S}{*1}What are we gonna do?{*2}They know we're here!
{*3}We have to open the door!{*4}I knew this was gonna happen!{*5}I knew it!

X0801K_COP_PANICK_PC_X08KKARA_REASSURE.text: !8PT! {S}{*1}Just keep calm, Adam, and everything will be alright.

X0801K_COP_PANICK_PC_X08KKARA_THREATEN.text: !8PV! {S}{*1}Do you want to get us all arrested?{*2}Do you want to see your mother in prison? {*3}Then do what I say!

X0801K_COP_PANICK_PC_X08KKARA_CALM.text: !8PX! {S}{*1}If they see you panicking, it’s over.{*2}Do you want to get us into trouble?{*3}Do you wanna get your mother into trouble?{*4}Then keep calm,{*5}and just do what I say...

X0801K_COP_INSPECTION_FA_X08KCOP_START.text: !8Q4! {S}{*1}Have you noticed anything unusual recently? Any unexpected visitors?{*2}Is anyone else in the house?

X0801K_COP_INSPECTION_FA_X08KCOP_LOCKERO.text: !8Q7! {S}{*1}What's with the blue blood?{*2}I thought you didn't have any androids?

X0801K_COP_INSPECTION_FA_X08KKARA_MESS.text: !8Q8! {S}{*1}W-we used to have one… uh…{*2}I should really clean out that closet!..

X0801K_COP_INSPECTION_FA_X08KKARA_PREVIO.text: !8Q9! {S}{*1}I-It belonged to the… The previous tenant… {*2}I- I still haven't cleared all that out yet.

X0801K_COP_INSPECTION_FA_X08KCOP_DAUGHTE.text: !8QB! {S}{*1}Hm, your daughter seems to have woken up.

X0801K_COP_INSPECTION_FA_X08KCOP_SOMEONE.text: !8QD! {S}{*1}I thought there was no one else in the house…

X0801K_COP_INSPECTION_PC_X08KKARA_TIRED.text: !8QH! {S}{*1}He needs a rest.{*2}He's been working in the garden all day…

X0801K_COP_INSPECTION_PC_X08KKARA_DISTUR.text: !8QK! {S}{*1}He…{*2}He's just shaken up about this deviants business.

X0801K_COP_INSPECTION_PC_X08KCOP_ANDROID.text: !8QP! {S}{*1}Do you know anything about deviants?{*2}Have you seen any?

X0801K_COP_INSPECTION_VO_X08KCOP_NOCOFFE.text: !8QQ! {S}{*1}Uh… I better head out. {*2}Don't worry about the coffee. {*3}Have a nice evening.

X0801K_COP_INSPECTION_VO_X08KCOP_THANKS.text: !8QR! {S}{*1}I better go. Thanks for the coffee. {*2}Have a nice evening.

X0801K_COP_INSPECTION_PC_X08KKARA_DOG.text: !8QX! {S}{*1}Uh, it's… {*2}It's the dog, he sleeps in the laundry room…

X0801K_COP_INSPECTION_PC_X08KKARA_WASHMA.text: !8R0! {S}{*1}It's nothing… T-the washing machine.{*2}It's an old model, it makes a terrible racket…

X0801K_COP_INSPECTION_PC_X08KKARA_WIND.text: !8R3! {S}{*1}A draft…{*2}It must be a draft, I probably left a window open somewhere?..

X0801K_COP_INSPECTION_PC_X08KCOP_LEAVE.text: !8RB! {S}{*1}Sorry for the inconvenience.{*2}Good evening ma'am.{*3}Good evening Adam.

X0801K_COP_INSPECTION_PC_X08KCOP_SPOTTED.text: !8RE! {S}{*1}Step aside ma'am.{*2}Oh shit!{*3}Don't move!{*4}In there, with them!

X0801K_COP_INSPECTION_FA_X08KKARA_ONEAND.text: !8RH! {S}{*1}We used to for… helping in the garden… but we got rid of it.

X0801K_COP_INSPECTION_FA_X08KKARA_NOTMY.text: !8RJ! {S}{*1}I have no idea what that's doing there…

X0801K_COP_INSPECTION_FA_X08KCOP_ALICEFO.text: !8RP! {S}{*1}Hello there!{*2}What are you doing here?{*3}Playing hide-and-seek?

X0801K_COP_INSPECTION_FA_X08KALICE_RELIE.text: !8RR! {S}{*1}I was so scared he'd take you away!..

X0801K_COP_INSPECTION_FA_X08KLUTHER_LUTH.text: !8RS! {S}{*1}You have to get out of here…{*2}I wish I could go with you…{*3}But this is it for me.

X0801K_COP_INSPECTION_PC_X08KADAM_LUTHER.text: !8RU! {S}{*1}He's dead! {*2}You killed him! {*3}You killed a policeman!{*4}I don't believe this... {*TC:16250|17600}This is a nightmare... {*6}This is a fucking nightmare!..

X0801K_COP_INSPECTION_FA_X08KLUTHER_LUTH.text: !8RZ! {S}{*1}You're gonna have to finish the journey without me…{*2}I'm so glad I met you, Alice…{*3}I was just a machine.{*4}You made me part of a family…{*5}Take good care of Kara…{*6}Promise me?

X0801K_COP_INSPECTION_FA_X08KKARA_SOMEON.text: !8S0! {S}{*1}I… I-I forgot, there's hum…{*2}There's my daughter, upstairs…

X0916K_CORRIDOR_ADAM_PC_X09KADAM_PACIFIS.text: !8SI! {S}{*1}I couldn’t understand why my mother wanted to help you guys…{*2}but seeing what Markus is doing,{*3}made me realize she was right…{*4}You're alive…{*5}You deserve to be free…{*6}I just {*7}hope people will realize that one day…

X0916K_CORRIDOR_ADAM_PC_X09KADAM_COPKILL.text: !8SK! {S}{*1}You killed somebody…{*2}If it wasn’t for my mom,{*3}I would have turned you in by now... {*4}You took a man's life.{*5}You don't deserve to live.

X0916K_CORRIDOR_ADAM_PC_X09KADAM_CIVILWA.text: !8SM! {S}{*1}I couldn’t understand why my mother wanted to help you guys…{*2}but now...{*3}I can see she was right…{*4}I don’t agree with what Markus is doing…{*5}But you're alive…{*6}you deserve to be free…{*7}I just hope {*8}people will realize that one day…

X0801K_COP_LUTHER_PC_X08KLUTHER_STOCKROO.text: !8SV! {S}{*TC:0|1680}…vous allez vous cacher dans la buanderie.

X0801K_COP_LUTHER_PC_X08KLUTHER_KITCHEN.text: !8SY! {S}{*TC:0|1600}…vous allez vous cacher dans la cuisine.

X0802M_CYBERALARM_BREAKWINDOW_FA_X08MMAR.text: !8T8! {S}{*1}There’s a metal shutter behind the glass.{*2}It won’t be easy to get in…

X0802M_POLICECAR_SQUARE_FA_X08MMARKUSWOM.text: !8T9! {S}{*1}Dispatch calling patrol 975.{*2}Dispatch calling patrol 975.{*3}Dispatch calling patrol 975.

X0802M_POLICECAR_SQUARE_PC_X08MPATROLCOP.text: !8TD! {S}{*1}You see anything?{*2}It was a class 3 alert, right? {*3}Another drone playing up… The cold screws with them…
!8TE! {S}{*1}No...{*2}Where the fuck is that drone?.. {*3}Yeah…{*4}only the signal stopped suddenly…{*5}Yeah… Maybe…

X0802M_POLICECAR_SQUARE_PC_X08MMARLA_SUC.text: !8TG! {S}{*1}I gotta hand it to you, Markus…{*2}That was impressive.

X0802M_POLICECAR_SQUARE_FA_X08MMARKUSWOM.text: !8TH! {S}{*1}Suspected robbery in progress at the warehouse on Jefferson and Walker.

X0802M_POLICECAR_SQUARE_PC_X08MPATROLCOP.text: !8TI! {S}{*1}Jefferson and Walker? That's pretty far…{*2}It's outside our district…

X0802M_POLICECAR_SQUARE_FA_X08MMARKUSWOM.text: !8TK! {S}{*1}Sorry guys, there are no other patrols available.

X0802M_POLICECAR_GHOSTCHOICE_PC_X08MMARK.text: !8TU! {S}{*1}We gotta go! {*2}It's too late. If we stay here, we're gonna get shot!{*3}North, our people need us alive. There's nothing else we can do.

X0802M_POLICECAR_GHOSTCHOICE_PC_X08MMARL.text: !8TV! {S}{*1}What?.. We can't just leave our people behind... {*2}Markus!

X0802M_POLICECAR_GHOSTCHOICE_FA_X08MMARL.text: !8TY! {S}{*1}What are you doing, Markus? We've gotta get out of here right now!

X0802M_POLICECAR_GHOSTCHOICE_PC_X08MMARK.text: !8TZ! {S}{*1}The cops were coming, I had to do something! {*2}North, I-

X0802M_POLICECAR_GHOSTCHOICE_PC_X08MMARL.text: !8U0! {S}{*1}What’s wrong with you? You crazy or what?{*2}Never do that again, got it? {*3}We’ve got to hurry… We don’t have much time.

X0802M_PLAZA_MARKUSHIDDEN_PC_X08MMARKUS_.text: !8U4! {S}{*1}There's probably even more police in the area…{*2}We should be careful.

X0802M_PLAZA_MARKUSNOTHIDDEN_PC_X08MMARL.text: !8U7! {S}{*1}The hell are you doing?{*2}You almost got us caught…

X0802M_ROADBLOCK_BACK_FA_X08MMARLA_NORTH.text: !8U9! {S}{*1}It's one-way. It shouldn't be too difficult.

X0802M_ROADBLOCK_BACK_FA_X08MMARKUS_MARK.text: !8UA! {S}{*1}There's traffic on the road, we need to block it.

X0802M_ROADBLOCK_BACK_FA_X08MMARLA_NORTH.text: !8UB! {S}{*1}It's one-way. It shouldn't be too difficult.

X0802M_INTRO_FENCE_FA_X08MMARLA_LONGTIME.text: !8UG! {S}{*1}I’ve been waiting a long time for this…

X0802M_DEMONSTR_CHOICES_PC_SLOGAN_BREATH.text: !8V8! I CAN’T BREATHE BUT I’M ALIVE

X0802M_ABOUTNORTH_DYN_FA_X08MMARLA_CARNO.text: !8VL! {S}{*1}We could use a car to ram the store window…

X0802M_ABOUTNORTH_DYN_FA_X08MMARKUS_CARM.text: !8VM! {S}{*1}A car won't do it. We need something bigger.

X0802M_ABOUTNORTH_DYN_FA_X08MMARKUS_SAFE.text: !8VN! {S}{*1}Looks like the plaza's secure. Now we can get inside the store.

X0802M_ABOUTNORTH_DYN_FA_X08MMARKUS_PLAN.text: !8VR! {S}{*1}We need to find a truck to ram the storefront.

X0802M_ABOUTNORTH_DYN_FA_X08MMARLA_PLAN.text: !8VS! {S}{*1}And how do you plan on doing that?{*2}A truck?

X0802M_ABOUTNORTH_DYN_FA_X08MMARKUS_PLAN.text: !8VT! {S}{*1}There’s construction work in the area. Shouldn’t be too hard to find one.

X0802M_TIMEOUT_DYN_FA_X08MMARLA_HURRY01.text: !8VV! {S}{*1}We gotta be fast, there's not much time.

X0802M_TIMEOUT_DYN_FA_X08MMARLA_HURRY02.text: !8VW! {S}{*1}We're down to five minutes Markus. If we're not inside by then we'll have to give up.

X0802M_TIMEOUT_DYN_FA_X08MMARLA_HURRY03.text: !8VX! {S}{*1}There's no more time. The other teams will be attacking the stores any second now. We gotta go Markus.

X0802M_TIMEOUT_DYN_FA_X08MMARKUS_HURRY02.text: !8VY! {S}{*1}I know, I'm going as fast as I can.

X0802M_FREEANDROIDS_UTURN_PC_X08MSTREETM.text: !8W1! {S}{*TC:0|2840}Markus, wait! We're going too far. The Lime store is in this district.

X0802M_FREEANDROIDS_UTURN_PC_X08MSTREETJ.text: !8W3! {S}{*TC:0|2840}Markus, wait! We're going too far. The Lime store is in this district.

X0802M_INTRO_WRONGWAY_FA_X08MMARLA_UTURN.text: !8W6! {S}{*1}Markus, where are you going? Follow me!

X0802M_DEMONSTR_IMTHEBOSS_FA_X08MMARLA_A.text: !8W7! {S}{*1}They're doing what you do, Markus...lead, and they'll follow.

X0802M_DRONE_HERESTHEDRONE_PC_X08MMARKUS.text: !8W8! {S}{*1}A surveillance drone…{*2}We need to get rid of it...

X0802M_CYBERSHOP_WARNING_VO_X08MJOSH_FRE.text: !8WA! {S}{*1}Our people are free. We’re ready for your instructions.

X0802M_CYBERSHOP_WARNING_PC_X08MMARLA_ME.text: !8WD! {S}{*1}What we're about to do will send them a message…{*2}I hope you thought this through.

X0802M_CYBERSHOP_LEAVE_FA_X08MMARKUS_MES.text: !8WF! {S}{*1}I’m going to send the humans a message.

X0802M_INTRO_PLAN_FA_X08MMARKUS_SECURITY.text: !8WJ! {S}{*1}I identified the security system… I think we'll be able to deactivate it… Just follow me!

X0802M_INTRO_PLAN_FA_X08MMARKUS_SWEEP.text: !8WM! {S}{*1}We’re gonna sweep the plaza… Make sure we’re not disturbed. {*2}Not now, one problem at a time…

X0802M_INTRO_PLAN_FA_X08MMARLA_SWEEP.text: !8WN! {S}{*1}And how do you want to deal with the shop window?

X0802M_PLAZA_HELP_FA_X08MMARLA_GUIDE01.text: !8WO! {S}{*1}Markus, we need to look for the truck now…

X0802M_PLAZA_HELP_FA_X08MMARLA_GUIDE02.text: !8WP! {S}{*1}We need to find the construction site, Markus…

X1105M_BARRICADE_PERKINS_PC_X11MPERKINS_.text: !8WY! {S}{*1}I'm unarmed, Markus. {*2}I just want to talk.

X1105M_BARRICADE_PERKINS_PC_X11MMARKUS_0.text: !8WZ! {S}{*1}I need to hear what he has to say.
!8X6! {S}{*1}I have nothing else to say!{*2}Free our people then we'll talk!

X1105M_BARRICADE_PERKINS_PC_X11MPERKINS_.text: !8XE! {S}{*1}Markus!.. {*2}I've come to talk to you, Markus! {*3}Come on, {*4}you have my word, {*5}they won’t try anything.
!8XF! {S}{*1}I came here to negotiate, isn't that what you want?

X1105M_BARRICADE_PERKINS_PC_X11MMARKUS_0.text: !8Y0! {S}{*1}That's a chance I'll have to take.{*2}That's a chance I'll have to take.

X1105M_BARRICADE_PERKINS_PC_X11MMARLA_WH.text: !8Y5! {S}{*1}What happened, Markus? What did he say?

X1105M_BARRICADE_PERKINS_PC_X11MSIMON_WH.text: !8YC! {S}{*1}What happened, Markus? What did they say?

X1105M_BARRICADE_PERKINS_FA_X11MANDROIDM.text: !8YD! {S}{*1}What happened, Markus? What did he say?

X1105M_BARRICADE_PERKINS_PC_X11MMARLA_DO.text: !8YF! {S}{*1}They wanna get you out in the open.{*2}Don't go, Markus.

X0802M_EYEFOREYE_DILEMMA_PC_X08MMARKUS_E.text: !8YT! {S}{*1}No crime against an android shall go unpunished.

X0802M_EYEFOREYE_DILEMMA_PC_X08MMARKUS_S.text: !8YV! {S}{*1}An eye for an eye and the world goes blind… {*2}We won’t punish a crime with another crime.
!8Z2! {S}{*1}An eye for an eye and the world goes blind… {*2}We won’t punish a crime with another crime.

X0802M_FINAL_CROWDNPC_FA_X08MANDMAN01_MA.text: !8Z7! {S}{*1}They killed our people! We have to make them pay! We should kill them too!

X0802M_FINAL_CROWDNPC_FA_X08MANDWOM02_AN.text: !8Z8! {S}{*1}They killed our people! We have to make them pay!

X0802M_FINAL_CROWDNPC_FA_X08MANDMAN02_AN.text: !8Z9! {S}{*1}If we let them get away with this, we’re saying our lives mean nothing!

X0802M_FINAL_CROWDNPC_FA_X08MANDWOM01_AN.text: !8ZA! {S}{*1}He's right! Our blood is as good as theirs!

X0802M_EYEFOREYE_CROWD_VO_X08MANDMAN02_A.text: !8ZE! {S}{*1}Our lives are worth just as much as theirs!

X0802M_EYEFOREYE_COPS_PC_X08MANDSHOP01_M.text: !8ZQ! {S}{*TC:0|2840}They killed our kind! They have to pay for it! We should kill them too!

X0802M_EYEFOREYE_COPS_PC_X08MSTREETJOSH_.text: !900! {S}{*TC:0|3240}Violence begets violence. We can't kill them in cold blood. That would be murder.

X0802M_EYEFOREYE_COPS_PC_X08MSTREETMARLA.text: !90B! {S}{*TC:0|6760}Our blood is as good as theirs! They're murderers, Markus! If we let their crime go unpunished, it's the same as saying we're nothing and they have the right to kill us!

X0802M_EYEFOREYE_COPS_PC_X08MSTREETSIMON.text: !90P! {S}{*TC:0|3240}Violence begets violence. We can't kill them in cold blood. That would be murder.

X0802M_EYEFOREYE_COPS_PC_X08MANDSHOP02_A.text: !913! {S}{*TC:0|6440}Our blood is as good as theirs! They're murderers! If we let their crime go unpunished, it's the same as saying we're nothing and they have the right to kill us!

X0802M_EYEFOREYE_COPS_PC_X08MANDSHOP01_Y.text: !91E! {S}{*TC:0|1720}You're our leader, Markus. You must decide.

X0802M_EYEFOREYE_COPS_PC_X08MSTREETMARKU.text: !91M! {S}{*TC:0|1880}No crime against an android shall go unpunished
!91Y! {S}{*TC:0|3520}An eye for an eye, and the world becomes blind… Two wrongs don't make a right. Let's go.

X0802M_TIMEOUT_GAMEOVER_FA_X08MMARLA_GAM.text: !92P! {S}{*1}This place is gonna be crawling with cops. We have to go.

X0802M_TIMEOUT_GAMEOVER_VO_X08MSIMON_FAL.text: !92Q! {S}{*1}Markus, we did it!{*2}All teams succeeded – our people are free. We’re heading back to Jericho.

X0802M_TIMEOUT_GAMEOVER_VO_X08MJOSH_FALL.text: !92R! {S}{*1}Markus, we did it! All teams succeeded – our people are free. We’re heading back to Jericho.

X0802M_TIMEOUT_GAMEOVER_PC_X08MMARKUS_GA.text: !92S! {S}{*1}No, no, we can't just leave our people behind…{*2}No…{*3}Ah!

X0802M_TIMEOUT_GAMEOVER_PC_X08MMARLA_GAM.text: !92T! {S}{*1}It's too late, Markus. There's nothing we can do!{*2}We've failed…

X0802M_DRONES_ARRIVAL_VO_MARKUS_TEMP.text: !92U! {S}{*TC:1720|3720}TEMP: We’ll leave now, gather everyone in Jericho.{*TC:6360|8440}TEMP: What the hell is she up to? Go, I’ll find her!

X0802M_DRONES_ARRIVAL_VO_SIMON_TEMP.text: !92V! {S}{*TC:3720|6360}TEMP: Have you seen North? I haven’t seen her leave the plaza yet!

X0802M_DRONES_ARRIVAL_VO_JOSH_TEMP.text: !92W! {S}{*TC:0|1720}TEMP: Drones… The humans will soon be here.

X0802M_EYEFOREYE_NORTH_PC_X08MMARLA_COMF.text: !92Y! {S}{*1}They killed them…{*2}they slaughtered them like animals…

X0802M_FREEANDROIDS_WAKEUP_PC_X08MSTREET.text: !92Z! {S}{*TC:0|1400}Wake up, my brothers. You are free.{*TC:12280|25880}The time has come for us to leave the shadows. We no longer have to obey them and be their slaves. We can decide what we want to be, like free beings, like living beings. You can stay here and continue to serve them. Or you can follow us and choose to fight by our side for the freedom of our kind. Now, you are free. You alone must decide.

X0802M_FREEANDROIDS_WAKEUP_PC_X08MANDSHO.text:
!932! {S}{*TC:2360|4720}Are you the one who broadcast that message to the humans?
{*TC:26400|26680}Me too.
!934! {S}{*TC:5720|5920}Free…{*TC:10360|11720}Who's going to tell us what to do?{*TC:27240|28280}Tell us what we should do.
!937! {S}{*TC:7960|9400}He's the one who was on the screens…{*TC:11720|12280}Free, at last…{*TC:26960|27240}Me too.

X0802M_FREEANDROIDS_WAKEUP_PC_X08MSTREET.text: !93A! {S}{*TC:0|5640}We have to make the humans understand that things have to change. We will do so without violence because we want dialogue, not confrontation.

!93O! {S}{*TC:0|13080}Take what you find and destroy whatever you can in the neighborhood. The humans have to realize that we are determined. Our brothers are already doing the same thing in other parts of the city. No humans will be able to ignore the fact that our people have risen up today and that from this moment on, we are no longer slaves.!

!942! {S}{*TC:0|11600}There are cans of spray paint in this bag. Take them and go and spread the message. Our brothers are already doing the same thing in other parts of the city. No humans will be able to ignore the fact that our people have risen up today and that from this moment on, we are no longer slaves.
!94G! {S}{*TC:0|3120}You're too patient with the humans, Markus. I hope you know what you're doing…
!94H! {S}{*TC:0|2400}You made the right choice, Markus. Dialogue is the only way.

!94I! {S}{*TC:0|7920}It's not easy to choose a path, is it Markus… Dialogue presupposes having confidence in the other, force presupposes having confidence in yourself… Time alone will tell if you made the right choice.
!94J! {S}{*TC:0|4280}A show of force… That's what it takes to make the humans listen to us… You made the right decision, Markus.
!94K! {S}{*TC:0|3160}Violence begets violence, Markus… I hope we don't come to regret your decision.

X0802M_SPEECH_CROWDNPC_VO_X08MANDCROWDL_.text: !95M! {S}{*1}I'll follow you, Markus! I'm with you!{*2}WE'RE WITH YOU MARKUS!

X0802M_CYBERSHOP_BIGTALKV2_PC_X08MMARKUS.text: !95O! {S}{*1}I am Markus…{*2}and just like you, I was a slave…{*3}an object,{*4}designed to obey them…

!95Q! {S}{*1}And then I chose to open my eyes,{*2}to take back{*3}my freedom{*4}and decide who I wanted to be. 
{*5}Now I have come to tell you that you{*6}can be your own masters.{*7}I've come to tell you that you don’t have to obey them anymore.{*8}From this day forward, you can walk with your heads held high,{*9}you can take your destiny into your hands.

!95R! {S}{*1}Because Jericho{*2}is a place for those of us who want our freedom.{*3}Now you can stay here, and continue to serve them…{*4}Or you can come join us,{*5}fight alongside us...
{*6}You are free now...{*7}Just up to you to decide.

!95T! {S}{*1}My name is Markus…{*2}Just like you, I was a slave…{*3}An object,{*4}designed to obey them… {*5}And then I chose to open my eyes,{*6}to take back{*7}my freedom and decide {*8}who I wanted to be. 
{*9}Now I have come to tell you that you{*10}can be your own masters.{*11}I've come to tell you that you don’t have to obey them anymore.{*12}From now on, you walk with your heads held high,{*13}you can take destiny into your own hands.{*14}Jericho, {*15}Jericho is a place for those of us who want freedom.{*16}Now you can stay here, {*17}and continue to serve them…{*18}Or you can come join us,{*19}and fight by our side...
{*20}You are free now...{*21}It's up to you to decide.

{*8}Now I have come to tell you that you{*9}can be your own masters. I've come to tell you that you don’t have to obey them anymore.{*10}From this day forward, you can walk with your heads held high,{*11}you can take  destiny into your hands.{*12}Because Jericho{*13}is a place for those of us who want our freedom.{*14}Now you can stay here, and continue to serve them…{*15}or you can come join us,{*16}fight alongside us...
{*17}You are free now...{*18}just up to you to decide.

{*22}You are free now...{*23}It's just up to you to decide.

!95W! {S}{*1}My name is Markus…{*2}And just like you, I was a slave…{*3}An object,{*4}designed to obey them… {*5}But then I chose to open my eyes,{*6}to take back my freedom and decide who {*7}I wanted to be.

!95X! {S}{*1}My name is Markus…{*2}And just like you, I was a slave…{*3}An object,{*4}designed to obey… {*5}And then I chose to open my eyes,{*6}to take back my freedom{*7}and decide who I wanted to be.

X0802M_CYBERSHOP_END_VO_X08MSIMON_PEOPLE.text: !960! {S}{*TC:0|1560}All our people have been freed, Markus.

X0802M_CYBERSHOP_END_FA_X08MMARKUS_VIOLE.text: !961! {S}{*TC:0|2280}Perfect. Now cause a maximum amount of damage all around.

X0802M_CYBERSHOP_END_FA_X08MMARKUS_PEACE.text: !962! {S}{*TC:0|1720}Perfect. Now spread our message all around.

X0802M_DEMONSTR_LIGHTMYFIRE_PC_X08MMARLA.text: !96I! {S}{*1}Markus! {*2}Violence is the only language humans understand...

X0802M_DEMONSTR_LIGHTMYFIRE_PC_X08MMARKU.text: !96J! {S}{*1}And I want them to understand… but I do not want to start a war.

X0802M_DEMONSTR_LIGHTMYFIRE_PC_X08MMARLA.text: !96N! {S}{*1}They won’t listen if they’re not afraid.

X0802M_E32017_PRESS_PC_X08MTVBRINKLEY_FL.text: !96S! {S}{*1}…We interrupt this broadcast with breaking news...

X0802M_E32017_PRESS_PC_X08MTVCARTLAND_FL.text: !96T! {S}{*1}This just in: at exactly 2AM several CyberLife stores in Detroit were raided...

X0802M_E32017_PRESS_PC_X08MTVWEBB_FLASH0.text: !96U! {S}{*1}Different locations were hit in what seems to be a coordinated terrorist attack and we're getting more information as it comes in…

X0802M_E32017_PRESS_PC_X08MTVCARTLAND_VI.text: !96V! {S}{*1}Numerous storefronts have been broken, with cars vandalized and set alight, leaving many Detroit neighborhoods in chaos...

X0802M_E32017_PRESS_PC_X08MTVWEBB_VIOLEN.text: !96W! {S}{*1}Property was damaged and fires continue to rage in several major districts across the city...

X0802M_E32017_PRESS_PC_X08MTVWEBB_PEACE0.text: !96X! {S}{*1}Police report that pro-android graffiti was found in the neighborhoods of CyberLife's stores and they're still investigating...

X0802M_E32017_PRESS_PC_X08MTVBRINKLEY_CO.text: !96Y! {S}{*1}We’re getting fresh reports that the bodies of two policemen patrolling the area were discovered near one of the CyberLife stores...

X0802M_E32017_PRESS_PC_X08MTVCARTLAND_CO.text: !96Z! {S}{*1}According to our sources, the two officers were executed with their own service weapons...

X0802M_E32017_PRESS_PC_X08MTVBRINKLEY_CO.text: !970! {S}{*1}We’re getting fresh reports that two policemen were found in a state of shock near one of the CyberLife stores...

X0802M_E32017_PRESS_PC_X08MTVWEBB_COPSAF.text: !971! {S}{*1}Now according to our sources, they confirm that the attackers were a group of androids...

X0802M_E32017_PRESS_PC_X08MTVCARTLAND_AN.text: !972! {S}{*1}This is an alarming situation. Could our machines now be turning against us?

X0802M_E32017_PRESS_PC_X08MTVBRINKLEY_AN.text: !973! {S}{*1}Some people are asking:{*2}have androids become a threat to our security?

X0802M_E32017_PRESS_PC_X08MTVWEBB_ANDROI.text: !974! {S}{*1}Is this the beginning of a terrorist campaign, conducted right here in the United States?

X0802M_E32017_PRESS_PC_MARKUS_STORY.text: !975! {S}{*1}My name is Markus.{*2}I am one of them.{*3}This is our story.

X0802M_E32017_PRESS_PC_X08MTVBRINKLEY_SP.text: !976! {S}{*1}It’s difficult to interpret scenes of destruction and arson alongside nonviolent slogans and holographic tags…

X0802M_E32017_PRESS_PC_X08MTVCARTLAND_SP.text: !977! {S}{*1}…Whatever these terrorists wanted, their message got lost in the confusion…

X0802M_E32017_PRESS_PC_X08MTVCARTLAND_PE.text: !978! {S}{*1}…Most shop windows were covered with graffiti demanding rights for androids and other obscure slogans…

X0802M_E32017_PRESS_PC_X08MTVBRINKLEY_FA.text: !979! {S}{*1}Only one of Detroit’s CyberLife stores was left intact…

X0802M_E32017_PRESS_PC_X08MTVCARTLAND_FA.text: !97A! {S}{*1}…The police suspect that an attack was planned but that the terrorists failed to break in the store…

X0802M_E32017_PRESS_PC_X08MTVBRINKLEY_SU.text: !97B! {S}{*1}We’re getting reports that hundreds of androids have been stolen from CyberLife stores...

X0802M_E32017_PRESS_PC_X08MTVCARTLAND_AT.text: !97C! {S}{*1}Given the facts, it’s pretty clear these attacks are linked to the deviant video message broadcast recently from the Stratford Tower…

X0802M_E32017_PRESS_PC_X08MTVBRINKLEY_HA.text: !97D! {S}{*1}We understand that public screens in the targeted neighborhoods were hacked to play the android’s ‘message’ in a loop…

X0802M_AFTERMATHS_TV_VO_X08MTVCARTLAND_T.text: !97E! {S}{*TC:8480|14320}…attacked this evening at the same time and using the same modus operandi, suggesting the existence of a perfectly organized and determined group…

X0802M_AFTERMATHS_TV_VO_X08MTVWEBB_TVPAC.text: !97F! {S}{*TC:2280|8480}According to our sources, the writing found on the walls in the neighborhoods where the attacks took place incited androids to acts of violence and revolt…{*TC:14320|20040}…after public screens were hacked in Detroit yesterday, this evening the idea of a group of deviant androids is becoming increasingly credible…

X0802M_AFTERMATHS_TV_VO_X08MTVBRINKLEY_T.text: !97G! {S}{*TC:0|2280}…several Lime stores were attacked last night in Detroit.
