X0802M_AFTERMATHS_TV_VO_X08MTVCARTLAND_T.text: !97H! {S}{*TC:4640|11160}Many shop windows were destroyed, cars overturned and burnt, and considerable damage has been reported in what look like regular scenes of urban guerrilla warfare…{*TC:17080|22880}…after public screens were hacked in the city yesterday, this evening the idea of a group of deviant activists is becoming increasingly credible…

X0802M_AFTERMATHS_TV_VO_X08MTVWEBB_TVVIO.text: !97I! {S}{*TC:11160|17080}…the acts were conducted at the same time and using the same modus operandi, suggesting the existence of a perfectly organized and determined group…

X0802M_AFTERMATHS_TV_VO_X08MTVBRINKLEY_T.text: !97J! {S}{*TC:0|4640}…several Lime stores were attacked last night in Detroit and the surrounding neighborhoods were literally plundered.

X0802M_AFTERMATHS_TV_VO_X08MTVBRINKLEY_C.text: !97M! {S}{*TC:0|8520}…the bodies of two policemen have just been found near one of the Lime stores. They were apparently patrolling the district following a report from drones. They were shot down in cold blood with their own weapons…

!97P! {S}{*TC:0|9520}…we have just learned that two policemen have been found in a state of shock near one of the plundered this evening. They are currently being questioned and our sources report that they have confirmed the attack was conducted by androids…

X0802M_AFTERMATHS_TV_VO_X08MTVCARTLAND_E.text: !97Q! {S}{*TC:4600|6840}…the Lime company has refused to comment for the moment…

X0802M_AFTERMATHS_TV_VO_X08MTVWEBB_END.text: !97R! {S}{*TC:0|4600}…an alarming situation with regard to android behavior. Alan Turner, Mayor of Detroit, is deliberately reassuring….

X0802M_AFTERMATHS_TV_VO_X08MTVBRINKLEY_E.text: !97S! {S}{*TC:6840|19080}…it is obvious that this evening's events raise many questions. If these acts really are the work of deviant androids, we may well wonder what their next target will be, and just how far they are willing to go to make themselves heard. We will no doubt have the answer to these questions in the coming days

X0901C_BOAT_CHAT_PC_X09CAMANDA_START.text: !97T! {S}{*1}I love this place…{*2}Everything is so calm and peaceful…{*3}Far from the noise of the world…{*4}Tell me,{*5}what have you discovered?

X0901C_BOAT_CHAT_PC_X09CAMANDA_CLIMB.text: !97V! {S}{*1}Hello, Connor.{*2}I thought you might enjoy a little cruise…

X0901C_BOAT_CHAT_PC_X09CCONNOR_01TRACIKI.text: !97X! {S}{*1}I found two deviants{*2}at the Eden Club…{*3}I hoped to learn something but…{*4}I had to destroy them…

X0901C_BOAT_CHAT_PC_X09CAMANDA_01TRACIAL.text: !97Y! {S}{*1}That's too bad...{*2}You seemed so close to stopping them.

X0901C_BOAT_CHAT_PC_X09CCONNOR_01TRACIAL.text: !97Z! {S}{*1}I found two deviants at the Eden Club…{*2}I hoped to learn something but…{*3}they managed to escape…

X0901C_BOAT_CHAT_PC_X09CCONNOR_01TRACINO.text: !981! {S}{*1}I went to the Eden Club…{*2}but I didn’t learn anything new…

X0901C_BOAT_CHAT_PC_X09CCONNOR_01CONNORK.text: !983! {S}{*1}I’m having difficulties with Lieutenant Anderson.{*2}He’s unstable,{*3}even hostile.{*4}He shot me in the head last night…

X0901C_BOAT_CHAT_PC_X09CCONNOR_01CONNORA.text: !985! {S}{*1}My relationship with Lieutenant Anderson is problematic.{*2}He continues to struggle with psychological issues…{*3}I suspect it clouds his judgement regarding deviants.

X0901C_BOAT_CHAT_PC_X09CAMANDA_01HANKCON.text: !986! {S}{*1}Nothing matters more than your investigation.{*2}What’s happening is too important.{*3}Don’t let Anderson{*4}or anyone else get in your way.

X0901C_BOAT_CHAT_PC_X09CCONNOR_02SINCERE.text: !98B! {S}{*1}I thought I knew what I had to do…{*2}but now I realize it’s not that simple…

X0901C_BOAT_CHAT_PC_X09CCONNOR_02TROUBLE.text: !98D! {S}{*1}Perturbed?{*2}No…{*3}No, of course not.{*4}Why would I be perturbed?

X0901C_BOAT_CHAT_PC_X09CCONNOR_02DETERMI.text: !98F! {S}{*1}I’m just frustrated with my lack of progress,{*2}but I’m determined to accomplish my mission.

X0901C_BOAT_CHAT_PC_X09CCONNOR_02COLD.text: !98H! {S}{*1}The investigation is more challenging than I anticipated,{*2}but I have no doubt that I will solve this case and stop the deviants.

X0901C_BOAT_CHAT_PC_X09CAMANDA_02CONT.text: !98I! {S}{*1}You had your gun trained on those deviants at the Eden Club.{*2}Why didn’t you shoot?

X0901C_BOAT_CHAT_PC_X09CCONNOR_03TOOFAR.text: !98N! {S}{*1}They were out of range.{*2}If I had the opportunity to stop them, why wouldn’t I?

X0901C_BOAT_CHAT_PC_X09CCONNOR_03USELESS.text: !98P! {S}{*1}We need the deviants intact for analysis.{*2}Shooting them wouldn’t have told us anything.

X0901C_BOAT_CHAT_PC_X09CAMANDA_03CONT.text: !98Q! {S}{*1}If your investigation doesn’t make progress soon,{*2}I may have to replace you, Connor…

X0901C_BOAT_CHAT_PC_X09CCONNOR_04INDIFFE.text: !98T! {S}{*1}I am of no importance.{*2}The mission is all that matters.

X0901C_BOAT_CHAT_PC_X09CCONNOR_04CONFIDE.text: !98X! {S}{*1}I know I will succeed.{*2}All I need is time.

X0901C_BOAT_CHAT_PC_X09CAMANDA_04CONT.text: !98Y! {S}{*1}Something’s happening…{*2}Something serious.{*3}Hurry, Connor.{*4}Time is running out.

X0901C_BOAT_CHAT_PC_LOSTCHOICE02_SELFCON.text: !995! SELFCONFIDENT/info/I KNOW I CAN DO IT

X0901C_BOAT_EMBARK_PC_X09CAMANDA_BOAT.text: !99T! {S}{*TC:0|1680}I thought you might enjoy a little cruise…

X0901C_GARDEN_HELLO_PC_X09CAMANDA_HELLO.text: !99V! {S}{*TC:0|2200}Hello, Connor. Climb on board, I've been expecting you!

X0903C_CHAD_BRIEFING_FA_X09CHANK_STARTHA.text: !99W! {S}{*1}Shit, what's going on here? There was a party and nobody told me about it?

X0903C_CHAD_BRIEFING_FA_X09CHANK_CTRLROO.text: !99X! {S}{*1}How many people were working here?{*2}The roof?

X0903C_CHAD_BRIEFING_FA_X09CHANK_STARTHA.text: !99Y! {S}{*1}Ah Christ, now we got the Feds on our back… I knew this was gonna be a shitty day…{*2}So what do we got?

X0903C_CHAD_BRIEFING_PC_X09CHARVEY_START.text: !99Z! {S}{*1}Hi, Hank. {*2}Yeah, it's all over the news, so everybody’s butting their nose in… {*3}Even the FBI wants a piece of the action…

X0903C_CHAD_BRIEFING_PC_X09CHARVEY_CORRI.text: !9A0! {S}{*1}A group of four androids… {*2}They knew the building, and they were very well organized. {*3}I'm still trying to figure out how they got this far without being noticed.

X0903C_CHAD_BRIEFING_FA_X09CHARVEY_GUARD.text: !9A1! {S}{*1}They attacked two guards in the hallway. {*2}They knocked one out and shot the other in cold blood…

X0903C_CHAD_BRIEFING_PC_X09CHARVEY_GUARD.text: !9A2! {S}{*1}They attacked two guards in the hallway... {*2}They probably thought the androids were coming to do maintenance. {*3}They got taken down before they could react…

X0903C_CHAD_BRIEFING_PC_X09CHARVEY_EMPLO.text: !9A3! {S}{*1}A station employee… {*2}shot to the back as he was trying to get away. {*3}One bullet straight through the heart, from fifty feet… {*4}Now, that's the kind of shooting only an android could do.
!9A4! {S}{*1}One of the station employees managed to get away. {*2}He's in shock, not sure when we’ll be able to talk to him…

X0903C_CHAD_BRIEFING_FA_X09CHARVEY_CTRLR.text: !9A5! {S}{*1}Just two employees and three androids. {*2}The deviants took the humans hostage and broadcast their message live. {*3}They made their getaway from the roof. {*4}Yeah, they jumped with parachutes… We’re still trying to figure out where they landed, but the weather’s not helping…

X0903C_CHAD_BRIEFING_FA_X09CHARVEY_ROOFB.text: !9A6! {S}{*1}We found the body of an android on the rooftop… {*2}Not sure what happened. {*3}Maybe it got wounded- I mean damaged, and couldn’t make the jump.

X0903C_CHAD_BRIEFING_FA_X09CHARVEY_ROOMB.text: !9A7! {S}{*1}One of the deviants… {*2}SWAT took it out. {*3}It's a pity they couldn't manage to capture it alive.

X0903C_CHAD_BRIEFING_FA_X09CHARVEY_SCREE.text:
!9A8! {S}{*1}We stored the station androids in the kitchen. {*2}There's no evidence that they were involved but we didn’t know what else to do with them.
{*3}If you want to take a look at the video broadcast by the deviants, it's on that screen over there.

X0903C_PBY_LINES_FA_X09CINVESTIGATOR02_S.text: !9AA! {S}{*1}Not yet… {*2}There’s so much to look at.

X0903C_PBY_LINES_FA_X09CINVESTIGATOR01_S.text: !9AB! {S}{*2}Have to make sure we check it out.

X0903C_PBY_LINES_FA_X09CINVESTIGATOR01_N.text: !9AE! {S}{*1}Bummer… {*2}I could have really used a cigarette.

X0903C_PBY_LINES_FA_X09CINVESTIGATORM_FO.text: !9AH! {S}{*1}These fucking androids don’t even leave any DNA…

X0903C_PBY_LINES_FA_X09CINVESTIGATORW_FL.text: !9AI! {S}{*1}We should be investigating other floors, too.

X0903C_PBY_LINES_FA_X09CINVESTIGATORM_FL.text: !9AJ! {S}{*1}We can’t just shut down the whole building. Imagine the warrant.

X0903C_PBY_LINES_FA_X09CINVESTIGATORM_SA.text: !9AL! {S}{*1}Yeah, not that there’s any point. Not like there’s any prints.

X0903C_PBY_LINES_FA_X09CINVESTIGATORM_FB.text: !9AM! {S}{*1}The fuck is the FBI doing here?

X0903C_PBY_LINES_FA_X09CINVESTIGATORW_FB.text: !9AN! {S}{*1}You kidding me? This is homeland security. I’m glad they’re on it.

X0903C_CTRLROOM_TAKEALOOK_PC_X09CHANK_GO.text: !9AP! {S}{*1}Uh, let's have a look around…{*2}Let me know if you find anything.

X0903C_CTRLROOM_PERKINS_PC_X09CCONNOR_WH.text: !9AQ! {S}{*1}My name is Connor.{*2}I'm the android sent by CyberLife.

X0903C_CTRLROOM_PERKINS_PC_X09CHANK_WHO.text: !9AR! {S}{*2}Pleasure meeting you. Have a nice day. {*3}What a fuckin' prick!

X0903C_CTRLROOM_PERKINS_PC_X09CPERKINS_W.text:
!9AS! {S}{*2}What’s that?{*3}Androids investigating androids, huh?{*4}You sure you want an android hanging around?.. {*5}After everything that happened… {*6}Whatever, {*7}the FBI will take over the investigation, you'll soon be off the case.
{*8}And you watch your step. {*9}Don't fuck up my crime scene.

X0903C_CTRLROOM_PERKINS_FA_X09CHARVEY_WH.text: !9AT! {S}{*1}Oh Lieutenant, this is Special Agent Perkins from the FBI. {*2}Lieutenant Anderson is in charge of investigating for Detroit Police.

X0903C_CTRLROOM_PERKINS_FA_X09CHARVEY_NE.text: !9AU! {S}{*1}I’ll be nearby. If you need anything, just ask.

X0903C_ELEVATOR_INTRO_PC_X09CCONNOR_HANK.text: !9AV! {S}{*TC:0|2040}Pourquoi est-ce que vous avez fait ça, lieutenant ?{*TC:3040|5040}Pourquoi est-ce que vous m’avez détruit hier soir.{*TC:7200|11320}Une partie de la mémoire du précédent Connor est perdue quand je suis détruit. Cela ralentit l’enquête.{*TC:15200|16360}Je vous remercie, lieutenant.

X0903C_ELEVATOR_INTRO_PC_X09CHANK_HANKKI.text: !9AW! {S}{*TC:2040|3040}Pourquoi j’ai fait quoi ?{*TC:5040|7200}Qu’est-ce que ça peut foutre ? T’es là ce matin, non ?{*TC:11320|15200}Je te prie d’accepter mes plus humbles excuses, Connor. Je promets que je ne te descendrais plus.

X0903C_ELEVATOR_INTRO_PC_X09CHANK_CONNOR.text: !9AY! {S}{*TC:0|1560}Connor, tu me saoules avec cette pièce.

X0903C_ARRIVAL_INTRO_PC_X09CCONNOR_SHOOT.text: !9AZ! {S}{*1}Why did you shoot me last night?{*2}Some fragments of memory are lost every time I’m destroyed. {*3}It slows down the investigation. {*4}Thank you, Lieutenant.

X0903C_ARRIVAL_INTRO_PC_X09CHANK_SHOOTME.text: !9B0! {S}{*1}Who cares, you're back this morning, aren't ya?{*2}My humblest apologies, I promise I’ll never shoot you again.

X0903C_ARRIVAL_INTRO_PC_X09CHANK_COIN.text: !9B2! {S}{*1}You’re starting to piss me off with that coin, Connor.{*3}Do what?

X0903C_INVESTIGATION_FRIENDS_PC_X09CHOST.text: !9B4! {S}{*1}Connor?.. {*2}You remember me?{*3}I was on that terrace…{*4}That android that took the little girl hostage?{*5}I was shot,{*6}you saved me…

!9B6! {S}{*1}Of course…{*2}That couldn't be you…{*4}That Connor was destroyed... {*5}I would have died on that terrace…{*6}Connor saved my life…{*7}Even if it wasn’t you…{*8}I just wanted to say…{*9}Thank you…
!9B8! {S}{*1}I could have died on that terrace…{*2}But you saved my life…{*3}I never thought I'd say this {*4}to an android,{*5}but…{*6}Thank you…

X0903C_ROOF_COMMENT_PC_X09CHANK_COMMENT.text: !9B9! {S}{*1}They made their way up through the whole building,{*2}past all the guards {*3}and jumped off the roof with parachutes…{*4}Pretty fucking impressive I'd say.

X0903C_INVESTIGATION_FAILED_PC_X09CCONNO.text: !9BA! {S}{*1}I think we have seen everything there is to see.
!9BG! {S}{*1}I think we have seen everything there is to see.

X0903C_CORRIDOR_HANKFINAL_VO_X09CCORRIDO.text: !9BV! {S}{*1}Shots fired, repeat shots fired - call the paramedics!

X0903C_CORRIDOR_HANKFINAL_PC_X09CHANK_CN.text: !9BX! {S}{*4}Good thing you were here. Otherwise I –{*5}Connor…{*6}Connor, no…

X0903C_CORRIDOR_ANDSUICIDE_PC_X09CCONNOR.text: !9C6! {S}{*1}I tried to stop it but…{*2}I was too late.

X0903C_KITCHEN_HANK_PC_X09CHANK_SAVED1.text: !9CC! {S}{*1}Connor!{*2}Hang on son, hang on, hang on! We’re gonna save you, hang on!.. Here, here... {*4}Connor!{*5}Connor...{*6}No…

X0903C_INVESTIGATION_VIDEO_PC_X09CCONNOR.text: !9CE! {S}{*1}Deviants say rA9 will set them free.{*2}This android seems to have that objective.

X0903C_BRAD_CONCLUSION_PC_X09CCONNOR_SUC.text: !9CJ! {S}{*1}Okay…{*2}I'm ok…{*3}I was connected to its memory…{*4}when it fired…{*5}I felt it die…{*6}Like I was dying.{*7}I was scared…{*8}I saw something,{*9}in its memory…{*10}a word…{*11}painted on a piece of rusty metal …{*12}"Jericho"

X0903C_BRAD_CONCLUSION_PC_X09CHANK_SUCCE.text: !9CK! {S}{*1}Connor! Connor you all right? Connor!{*2}Are you hurt?{*3}Jesus!{*4}You scared the shit outta me…{*5}For fuck sake, I told you not to move! Why do you never do what I say?

X0903C_ROOF_BRAD_FA_X09CCONNOR_FOUND.text: !9CN! {S}{*1}You have to stop them! If they destroy it, we won't learn anything!

X0903C_ROOF_BRAD_FA_X09CHANK_FOUND.text: !9CO! {S}{*1}We can't save it, it's too late! We'll just get ourselves killed!

X0903C_INVESTIGATION_SERIALNUM_PC_X09CCO.text: !9CU! {S}{*1}I identified its model and serial number…{*2}No.{*3}Nothing.

X0903C_INVESTIGATION_SERIALNUM_PC_X09CHA.text: !9CV! {S}{*1}D'you see something?{*2}Anything else I should know?

X0903C_INVESTIGATION_WATCHSCREEN_PC_X09C.text: !9CW! {S}{*1}They didn't break in?{*2}There are cameras in the hallway.{*3}The staff would have seen what was happening…{*4}Why did they let them in?

X0903C_ROOF_PARACHUTE_PC_X09CHANK_EXAMIN.text: !9D0! {S}{*1}How'd they manage to smuggle in a big bag like that?

X0903C_ROOF_PARACHUTE_PC_X09CCONNOR_EXAM.text: !9D1! {S}{*1}They didn't…{*2}Someone brought it in for them.{*3}Unless one of the deviants was left behind.

X0903C_ROOF_PARACHUTE_PC_X09CHANK_EXAMIN.text: !9D2! {S}{*1}Oh, that's strange...{*2}They planned a perfect operation but got the number of parachutes wrong.

X0903C_KITCHEN_QUESTIONS_PC_X09CCONNOR_W.text: !9D7! {S}{*1}Were you present when the deviants broke in?

X0903C_KITCHEN_QUESTIONS_PC_X09CCONNOR_C.text: !9DD! {S}{*1}Have you been in contact with any other androids recently?

X0903C_KITCHEN_QUESTIONS_PC_X09CCTRLROOM.text: !9DE! {S}{*1}Only station androids in the normal course of my function.

X0903C_KITCHEN_QUESTIONS_PC_X09CCONNOR_D.text: !9DF! {S}{*1}One of you saw the attack on the surveillance cameras and said nothing.{*2}Which means there is a deviant in this room…{*3}and I’m going to find out which it is.

X0903C_KITCHEN_QUESTIONS_PC_X09CCONNOR_T.text: !9DJ! {S}{*1}You’re going to be switched off.{*2}We're gonna search your memory and tear you apart piece by piece for analysis.{*3}You’re going to be destroyed!{*4}Do you hear me?{*5}Destroyed!

X0903C_KITCHEN_QUESTIONS_PC_X09CCONNOR_D.text: !9DL! {S}{*1}If you give yourself up,{*2}maybe I can convince the humans not to destroy you.

X0903C_KITCHEN_QUESTIONS_PC_X09CCONNOR_G.text: !9DN! {S}{*1}Why should you all be destroyed, if only one is deviant? {*2}Turn yourself in, or two innocent androids will be shut down because of you.

X0903C_KITCHEN_QUESTIONS_PC_X09CCONNOR_V.text: !9DP! {S}{*1}You scumbag!{*2}I know it's you! You're just a fucking deviant.{*3}Go on, admit it!

X0903C_KITCHEN_QUESTIONS_PC_X09CCONNOR_B.text: !9DR! {S}{*1}The deviants have just been caught…{*2}They gave you up.{*3}There's no point in lying.{*4}We know everything.

X0903C_KITCHEN_QUESTIONS_PC_X09CCONNOR_T.text: !9DT! {S}{*1}Biocomponent #8451...{*2}Regulates the heartbeat...{*3}Without this module, you will shut down in exactly sixty-three seconds…{*4}I could put it back…{*5}But,{*6}you just have to tell me the truth. {*7}Are you the deviant?

X0903C_KITCHEN_QUESTIONS_PC_X09CCTRLROOM.text: !9DV! {S}{*1}I am alive…{*2}I won’t let them destroy me…

X1001M_INTRO_ARRIVAL_PC_X10MMARKUS_MOVIE.text: !9FE! {S}{*TC:13360|16000}They'll understand. They must understand. We have no other choice.

X1001M_INTRO_ARRIVAL_PC_X10MMARLA_MOVIE.text: !9FF! {S}{*TC:0|3560}It's suicide. We'll all be killed. Please, Markus. It's not too late to change your mind.{*TC:8840|10160}They'll slaughter us on the spot…{*TC:11920|13360}Please, Markus … It's sheer madness.

X1001M_INTRO_ARRIVAL_PC_X10MJOSH_MOVIE.text: !9FG! {S}{*TC:3560|8840}You don't understand… This place will go down in history! For the first time, androids are demonstrating publicly for their freedom.{*TC:10160|11920}Perhaps… I'm willing to die for our freedom.

X1001M_MALL_ARRIVAL_PC_X10MMARLA_INTRO01.text: !9FJ! {S}{*1}This is suicide.{*2}We’ll all be killed! Please, Markus… It's not too late to change your mind.

X1001M_MALL_ARRIVAL_FA_X10MSIMON_SIMONAL.text: !9FM! {S}{*1}There're androids here who could join us…{*2}The more we are, the stronger our message.

X1001M_MALL_ARRIVAL_FA_X10MJOSH_SIMONDEA.text: !9FN! {S}{*1}There are androids here who could join us…{*2}The more we are, the stronger our message.

X1001M_MALL_ARRIVAL_PC_X10MJOSH_INTRO02.text: !9FQ! {S}{*1}You don't understand…{*2}We’re finally gonna show them who we really are. This place will go down in history!

X1001M_MALL_ARRIVAL_PC_X10MMARLA_INTRO03.text: !9FT! {S}{*TC:199|1536}We'll be killed on the spot!{*2}Markus,{*3}please, don’t do this.

X1001M_MALL_ARRIVAL_PC_X10MJOSH_INTRO03.text: !9FU! {S}{*1}That’s a risk I’m prepared to take if it means freedom for our people…

X1001M_MALL_ARRIVAL_PC_X10MMARKUS_INTRO0.text: !9FW! {S}{*1}They’ll understand…{*2}We’ll make them understand.{*3}This is the only way.

X1001M_ROOF_NORTH_PC_X10MMARLA_01CONT.text: !9G9! {S}{*1}I like it here…{*2}I come here often…{*3}It’s like being alone with the world.{*4}We freed hundreds of our people, and they’re still coming from all over the city…{*5}Those who dream of freedom come to Jericho…{*6}Something's changing…{*7}You seem preoccupied…

X1001M_ROOF_NORTH_PC_X10MMARKUS_02REGRET.text: !9GA! {S}{*1}I just can’t stop thinking about those two policemen…{*2}In that moment, I held their lives in my hands and I treated them just the way the humans treat us…{*3}And then I did exactly what I accuse them of doing…

X1001M_ROOF_NORTH_PC_X10MMARKUS_02FAILED.text: !9GC! {S}{*1}I panicked last night…{*2}We should have succeeded…{*3}I cannot afford to make mistakes like that…

X1001M_ROOF_NORTH_PC_X10MMARKUS_02CONFES.text: !9GE! {S}{*1}Yesterday,{*2}when we set fire to that place, ah…{*3}All that chaos, the flames…{*4}In that moment, I enjoyed it…{*5}The power...{*6}The violence…{*7}And I hate myself for feeling that way…

X1001M_ROOF_NORTH_PC_X10MMARKUS_02TROUBL.text: !9GG! {S}{*1}They all obey me, they follow me without question…{*2}And that much power feels good…{*3}and scary{*4}at the same time…

X1001M_ROOF_NORTH_PC_X10MMARKUS_02NEXTST.text: !9GI! {S}{*1}I’ve been thinking about what we should do now…{*2}And with everything pulling us towards confrontation… Maybe…{*3}Maybe it’s not too late for the humans to listen…

X1001M_ROOF_NORTH_PC_X10MMARKUS_02SINCER.text: !9GM! {S}{*1}They count on me…{*2}They count on me to show them the way…{*4}If only they knew how lost I am…

X1001M_ROOF_NORTH_PC_X10MMARLA_02CONT.text: !9GP! {S}{*1}All the media are talking about what we did last night…{*2}The humans are terrified...{*3}They’re afraid of a civil war…{*4}Many of our people were burned in response to what happened…{*5}The humans hate us…{*6}They’ll never give us our freedom.

X1001M_ROOF_NORTH_PC_X10MMARKUS_03OPTIMI.text: !9GQ! {S}{*1}No, not all humans are the same.{*2}Some of them understand that they can’t stop us from becoming free forever…

X1001M_ROOF_NORTH_PC_X10MMARKUS_03PESSIM.text: !9GS! {S}{*1}Humans aren't gonna give us anything unless we take it…{*2}It's up to us to decide how far we’re willing to go to get what's ours.

X1001M_ROOF_NORTH_PC_X10MMARKUS_03FATALI.text: !9GU! {S}{*1}It’s too late to go back now.{*2}We have to finish what we started and just hope that{*3}reason prevails.

X1001M_ROOF_NORTH_PC_X10MMARLA_03CONT.text: !9GZ! {S}{*1}You haven’t said much about yourself since you’ve been with us…{*2}What was your life like before Jericho?

X1001M_ROOF_NORTH_PC_X10MMARKUS_04TRUTH.text: !9H0! {S}{*1}I was caring for an old man…{*2}He was like a father to me…{*3}He showed me that humans and androids can live together…

X1001M_ROOF_NORTH_PC_X10MMARKUS_04EVADE.text: !9H2! {S}{*1}There's nothing to say… I was a house android. A slave...{*2}just like the others.

X1001M_ROOF_NORTH_PC_X10MMARKUS_04NOTIMP.text: !9H4! {S}{*1}Who I was is not important.{*2}What matters now is who I wanna be.

X1001M_ROOF_NORTH_PC_X10MMARKUS_04SINCER.text: !9H6! {S}{*1}I was living in a bubble in this world that belonged only to me…{*2}When you’re happy, it’s… difficult to see other people’s misery.

X1001M_ROOF_NORTH_PC_X10MMARKUS_05NORTHP.text: !9HA! {S}{*1}What about you?{*2}You never told me about your past, what did you do before?

X1001M_ROOF_NORTH_PC_X10MMARLA_05NOCONFI.text: !9HD! {S}{*1}My life started when I arrived in Jericho.{*2}What happened before is my business.

X1001M_ROOF_NORTH_PC_X10MMARKUS_06CURIOU.text: !9HG! {S}{*1}Why do you hate humans so much?{*2}There must be a reason…

X1001M_ROOF_NORTH_PC_X10MMARLA_06CURIOUS.text: !9HH! {S}{*1}I told you I don’t wanna talk about it…

X1001M_ROOF_NORTH_PC_X10MMARKUS_06PSYCHO.text: !9HI! {S}{*1}That android you were looking at in the store…{*2}She reminded you of who you were, didn’t she?

X1001M_ROOF_NORTH_PC_X10MMARKUS_06SINCER.text: !9HK! {S}{*1}North, we’re fighting together.{*2}We have to know things about each other to trust each other.

X1001M_ROOF_NORTH_PC_X10MMARKUS_06UNDERS.text: !9HM! {S}{*1}We all have something we wanna forget…{*2}but you need to know where you come from to know who you are.

X1001M_ROOF_NORTH_PC_X10MMARKUS_06AGGRES.text: !9HO! {S}{*1}What is the deal with all the mystery?{*2}I thought we didn’t keep secrets from each other? What’s your problem?

X1001M_ROOF_NORTH_PC_X10MMARLA_06AGGRESS.text: !9HP! {S}{*1}I was nobody, ok?!{*2}My life started when I arrived in Jericho. What happened before is my business.

X1001M_ROOF_NORTH_PC_X10MMARKUS_06RELENT.text: !9HQ! {S}{*1}Okay…{*2}If you don’t wanna talk about it, then we won’t.

X1001M_ROOF_NORTH_PC_X10MMARLA_06CONT.text: !9HS! {S}{*1}I was nothing…{*2}A doll in a distributor programmed to satisfy humans…{*3}Just a toy designed for their pleasure…{*4}One day, I was with a man who’d rented me…{*5}and without knowing why, realized I couldn’t take it anymore…{*6}I strangled him… and I ran away…{*7}There, now you know everything. {*TC:42342|43810}I shouldn’t have told you.

X1001M_ROOF_NORTH_PC_X10MMARLA_06RELENTM.text: !9HV! {S}{*1}My life started when I arrived in Jericho.{*2}What happened before is my business.

X1001M_ROOF_NORTH_PC_X10MMARLA_REACTMARL.text: !9HX! {S}{*1}I…{*2}I saw your memories…{*3}Carl’s house…{*4}When they left you for dead in his studio…

X1001M_ROOF_NORTH_PC_X10MMARKUS_REACTMAR.text: !9HY! {S}{*1}I saw your memories too…{*2}The Eden Club…{*3}The death of that man, I felt like I was there with you… {*4}North!

X1001M_MALL_CALLBACK_FA_X10MSIMON_UTURN0.text: !9IV! {S}{*1}Wait, Markus.{*2}Where you going? We should start in here.

X1001M_MALL_CALLBACK_FA_X10MJOSH_UTURN02.text: !9IW! {S}{*1}Wait, Markus. Where are you going?{*2}We should start in here.

X1001M_STAGE01_TRUCK_FA_X10MSIMON_UTURN0.text: !9IY! {S}{*1}Markus,{*2}we should find a way to block the road…

X1001M_STAGE01_TRUCK_FA_X10MMARLA_UTURN0.text: !9IZ! {S}{*1}Markus, we should find a way to block the road…

X1001M_CONVERSION_REACT_FA_X10MMAN01_MAN.text: !9J0! {S}{*1}Hey, where're you goin'? {*2}Get back here right now!

X1001M_CONVERSION_REACT_FA_X10MMAN02_MAN.text: !9J1! {S}{*1}What are you doing? {*2}I'm talking to you!

X1001M_CONVERSION_REACT_FA_X10MMAN03_MAN.text: !9J2! {S}{*1}Hey! Come back here! {*2}Fuckin' thing won't listen to me!

X1001M_CONVERSION_REACT_FA_X10MWOM03_WOM.text: !9J3! {S}{*1}Wait, wait! Where are you going? {*2}Jesus, the fucking android's playing up again…

X1001M_STAGE01_HUMAN_FA_X10MAGRESSIVMAN_.text: !9J5! {S}{*1}You stay right here, you fucking machine!
!9J7! {S}{*1}You do as I say, you piece of junk!

X1001M_STAGE01_HUMAN_FA_X10MMARKUS_CONVI.text: !9J8! {S}{*1}Leave him alone. He's chosen to be free.

X1001M_STAGE01_HUMAN_FA_X10MAGRESSIVMAN_.text: !9J9! {S}{*1}Hey! {*2}Where do you think you’re going? {*3}You get back here!

X1001M_STAGE02_POLICEMAN_PC_X10MPOLICEMA.text: !9JC! {S}{*2}What the hell are you doin' here? {*3}Hey! {*4}Disperse! {*5}DISPERSE IMMEDIATELY! {*6}THAT'S AN ORDER!

!9JF! {S}{*1}Dispatch, this is patrol 457… {*2}I gotta lot of androids down here… {*3}I dunno… Hundreds?.. {*4}Thousands?.. {*5}They're marching... {*6}Yeah, they're marching down the street… {*7}Fuck if I know!

X1001M_STAGE03_SLOGAN_FA_X10MMARKUS_PEOP.text: !9JI! {S}{*1}We are people!{*2}We are people!{*3}We are people!

X1001M_STAGE03_SLOGAN_VO_X10MCROWDL_PEOP.text: !9JK! {S}{*1}WE ARE PEOPLE!{*2}WE ARE PEOPLE!{*3}WE ARE PEOPLE!

X1001M_STAGE03_SLOGAN_VO_X10MCROWDL_ALIV.text: !9JO! {S}{*1}WE ARE ALIVE!{*2}WE ARE ALIVE!{*3}WE ARE ALIVE!

X1001M_STAGE03_SLOGAN_FA_X10MMARKUS_ALIV.text: !9JP! {S}{*1}We are alive!{*2}We are alive!{*3}We are alive!{*4}We are alive!

X1001M_STAGE03_SLOGAN_VO_X10MCROWDL_LIBE.text: !9JQ! {S}{*1}LIBERTY FOR ANDROIDS!{*2}LIBERTY FOR ANDROIDS!{*3}LIBERTY FOR ANDROIDS!

X1001M_STAGE03_SLOGAN_FA_X10MMARKUS_LIBE.text: !9JR! {S}{*1}Liberty for androids!{*2}Liberty for androids!{B}Liberty for androids!{B}Liberty for androids!

X1001M_STAGE03_SLOGAN_VO_X10MCROWDL_SETU.text: !9JS! {S}{*1}SET US FREE!{*2}SET US FREE!{*3}SET US FREE!

X1001M_STAGE03_SLOGAN_FA_X10MMARKUS_SETU.text: !9JT! {S}{*1}Set us free!{*2}Set us free!{*3}Set us free!

X1001M_STAGE03_SLOGAN_VO_X10MCROWDL_NOSL.text: !9JU! {S}{*1}NO MORE SLAVERY!{*2}NO MORE SLAVERY!{*3}NO MORE SLAVERY!

X1001M_STAGE03_SLOGAN_FA_X10MMARKUS_NOSL.text: !9JV! {S}{*1}No more slavery! No more slavery! No more slavery! No more slavery!

X1001M_STAGE03_SLOGAN_FA_X10MMAN01_PEOPL.text: !9JW! {S}{*1}WE ARE PEOPLE!{*2}WE ARE PEOPLE!{*3}WE ARE PEOPLE!

X1001M_STAGE03_SLOGAN_FA_X10MMAN02_PEOPL.text: !9JX! {S}{*1}WE ARE PEOPLE!{*2}WE ARE PEOPLE!{*3}WE ARE PEOPLE!

X1001M_STAGE03_SLOGAN_FA_X10MWOM01_PEOPL.text: !9JY! {S}{*1}WE ARE PEOPLE!{*2}WE ARE PEOPLE!{*3}WE ARE PEOPLE!

X1001M_STAGE03_SLOGAN_FA_X10MWOM02_PEOPL.text: !9JZ! {S}{*1}WE ARE PEOPLE!{*2}WE ARE PEOPLE!{*3}WE ARE PEOPLE!

X1001M_STAGE03_SLOGAN_FA_X10MMAN01_ALIVE.text: !9K8! {S}{*1}WE ARE ALIVE!{*2}WE ARE ALIVE!{*3}WE ARE ALIVE!

X1001M_STAGE03_SLOGAN_FA_X10MMAN02_ALIVE.text: !9K9! {S}{*1}WE ARE ALIVE!{*2}WE ARE ALIVE!{*3}WE ARE ALIVE!

X1001M_STAGE03_SLOGAN_FA_X10MWOM01_ALIVE.text: !9KA! {S}{*1}WE ARE ALIVE!{*2}WE ARE ALIVE!{*3}WE ARE ALIVE!

X1001M_STAGE03_SLOGAN_FA_X10MWOM02_ALIVE.text: !9KB! {S}{*1}WE ARE ALIVE!{*2}WE ARE ALIVE!{*3}WE ARE ALIVE!

X1001M_STAGE03_SLOGAN_FA_X10MMAN01_LIBER.text: !9KC! {S}{*1}LIBERTY FOR ANDROIDS!{B}LIBERTY FOR ANDROIDS! {B}LIBERTY FOR ANDROIDS!

X1001M_STAGE03_SLOGAN_FA_X10MMAN02_LIBER.text: !9KD! {S}{*1}LIBERTY FOR ANDROIDS!{B}LIBERTY FOR ANDROIDS! {B}LIBERTY FOR ANDROIDS!

X1001M_STAGE03_SLOGAN_FA_X10MWOM01_LIBER.text: !9KE! {S}{*1}LIBERTY FOR ANDROIDS!{B}LIBERTY FOR ANDROIDS! {B}LIBERTY FOR ANDROIDS!

X1001M_STAGE03_SLOGAN_FA_X10MWOM02_LIBER.text: !9KF! {S}{*1}LIBERTY FOR ANDROIDS!{B}LIBERTY FOR ANDROIDS! {B}LIBERTY FOR ANDROIDS!

X1001M_STAGE03_SLOGAN_FA_X10MMAN01_SETUS.text: !9KG! {S}{*1}SET US FREE!{*2}SET US FREE!{*3}SET US FREE!

X1001M_STAGE03_SLOGAN_FA_X10MMAN02_SETUS.text: !9KH! {S}{*1}SET US FREE!{*2}SET US FREE!{*3}SET US FREE!

X1001M_STAGE03_SLOGAN_FA_X10MWOM01_SETUS.text: !9KI! {S}{*1}SET US FREE!{*2}SET US FREE!{*3}SET US FREE!

X1001M_STAGE03_SLOGAN_FA_X10MWOM02_SETUS.text: !9KJ! {S}{*1}SET US FREE!{*2}SET US FREE!{*3}SET US FREE!

X1001M_STAGE03_SLOGAN_FA_X10MMAN01_NOSLA.text: !9KK! {S}{*1}NO MORE SLAVERY!{*2}NO MORE SLAVERY!{*3}NO MORE SLAVERY!

X1001M_STAGE03_SLOGAN_FA_X10MMAN02_NOSLA.text: !9KL! {S}{*1}NO MORE SLAVERY!{B}NO MORE SLAVERY!{B}NO MORE SLAVERY!

X1001M_STAGE03_SLOGAN_FA_X10MWOM01_NOSLA.text: !9KM! {S}{*1}NO MORE SLAVERY!{B}NO MORE SLAVERY!{B}NO MORE SLAVERY!

X1001M_STAGE03_SLOGAN_FA_X10MWOM02_NOSLA.text: !9KN! {S}{*1}NO MORE SLAVERY!{*2}NO MORE SLAVERY!{*3}NO MORE SLAVERY!

X1001M_FINALSTAGE_SPEECH_PC_X10MMARKUS_S.text: !9KW! {S}{*1}We came here to demonstrate peacefully {*2}and tell humans that we are living beings.

X1001M_FINALSTAGE_SPEECH_PC_X10MJOSH_ASS.text: !9KZ! {S}{*1}Don't do it, Markus. Don't choose confrontation…

X1001M_FINALSTAGE_SPEECH_PC_X10MMARKUS_R.text: !9L1! {S}{*1}We have to show them we won’t back down.{*2}We stay right here.

X1001M_FINALSTAGE_SPEECH_PC_X10MMARLA_SH.text: !9LU! {S}{*1}Please, Markus. We can't let them slaughter us without fighting back!

X1001M_FINALSTAGE_SPEECH_PC_X10MMARLA_DE.text: !9M6! {S}{*1}Markus, they’re gonna kill us…{*2}We have to attack!{*3}There’s more of us, we can take them!

X1001M_FINALSTAGE_SPEECH_PC_X10MJOSH_DEC.text: !9M7! {S}{*1}If we attack, we’ll start a war. We have to show them we’re not violent. We should just stand our ground, even if it means dying here.

X1001M_FINALSTAGE_SPEECH_PC_X10MRIOTPOLI.text: !9M9! {S}{*1}This is your last chance! {*2}Disperse immediately or you will all be killed!
!9MB! {S}{*1}This is an illegal gathering. Disperse immediately or we will open fire. {*2}I repeat: this is an illegal gathering. {*3}If you do not disperse immediately, we will shoot!

X1001M_FINALSTAGE_SPEECH_PC_X10MSIMON_DE.text: !9MG! {S}{*1}And dying here won’t solve anything.{*2}Markus,{*3}we need to go, now, before it’s too late.

X1001M_FINALSTAGE_SPEECH_PC_X10MMARKUS_S.text: !9ML! {S}{*1}All we want is to live free.
!9MM! {S}{*1}We're not looking for confrontation.{*2}We’ve done no harm,{*3}we have no intention of doing any…{*4}But know that we are not going anywhere until we have secured our freedom.

X1001M_FINALSTAGE_SPEECH_PC_X10MMARLA_SI.text: !9MO! {S}{*1}Markus! What are you doing? They’re gonna kill us all!

X1001M_FINALSTAGE_SPEECH_PC_X10MJOSH_SHO.text: !9MT! {S}{*1}If we fight back, we’ll just give them one more reason to hate us!{B}We have to make a statement. We have to stay put, no matter what.

X1001M_ESCAPE_RUN_PC_X10MJOSH_SHOOT.text: !9NW! {S}{*1}We have to go, North… We have to go!

X1102C_HALL_CHLOE_PC_X11CCHLOE_COMINGBAC.text: !9TJ! {S}{*1}I’ll let Elijah know you’re here. But please, make yourself comfortable.

X1102C_HALL_HANK_FA_X11CCONNOR_INDIFFERE.text: !9TN! {S}{*1}It's not a girl.{*2}It's an android that looks like a girl.

X1102C_HALL_HANK_FA_X11CCONNOR_ANALYTIQU.text: !9TR! {S}{*1}An RT600.{*2}The first CyberLife android to pass the Turing test.

X1102C_HALL_HANK_PC_X11CHANK_ANALYTIQUE.text: !9TS! {S}{*1}I didn't ask for her technical specs… I just said she was nice…

X1102C_HALL_HANK_PC_X11CHANK_HOUSE.text: !9TU! {S}{*1}Nice place…{*2}Guess androids haven’t been a bad thing for everybody…

X1102C_HALL_HANK_PC_X11CHANK_CREATOR.text: !9TW! {S}{*1}So, you’re about to meet your maker, Connor.{*2}How does it feel?

X1102C_HALL_HANK_FA_X11CCONNOR_INDIFFERE.text: !9TX! {S}{*1}It doesn't raise any existential questions...{*2}if that's what you mean.

X1102C_HALL_HANK_FA_X11CCONNOR_IMPATIENT.text: !9TZ! {S}{*1}Kamski is one of the great geniuses of the 21st century.{*2}It'll be interesting to meet him in person.

X1102C_HALL_HANK_FA_X11CCONNOR_DISTANT.text: !9U1! {S}{*1}I don't know...{*2}I'll tell you when I see him.

X1102C_HALL_HANK_PC_X11CHANK_END.text: !9U4! {S}{*1}Sometimes I wish I could meet my creator face to face…{*2}I'd have a couple of things I'd wanna tell him…

MENU_OBSERVATION_11C_MP_PORTRAIT01_SUBLI.text: !9UE! Inventor of Thirium and bio-components technology

MENU_OBSERVATION_11C_MP_PORTRAIT02_SUBLI.text: !9UG! AI Professor at University of Colbridge

MENU_OBSERVATION_11C_MP_PORTRAIT03_SUBLI.text: !9UJ! AI Graduate at University of Colbridge

X1102C_OUTSIDE_OUTRO_PC_X11CCONNOR_SHOOT.text: !9UL! {S}{*1}It wasn't a girl, Lieutenant. It was a machine that looked like a girl. {*2}I did what I had to do to advance the investigation and I'd do it again if I had to!{*3}Of course I'm a machine, Lieutenant.{*4}What did you think I was?

X1102C_OUTSIDE_OUTRO_PC_X11CHANK_SHOOT.text: !9UM! {S}{*1}You shot that girl, for fuck’s sake…{*2}You put your gun against her head and you blew her fucking brains out! {*3}You're a lowlife! You don't feel a thing, do you?{*4}A machine! That's what you are! You're just a fucking machine…{*5}I thought you…{*6}I thou-…{*7}Fuck.

X1102C_OUTSIDE_OUTRO_PC_X11CCONNOR_NOSHO.text: !9UN! {S}{*1}I just saw that girl's eyes…{*2}and I couldn't, {*3}that's all…{*4}Yeah, I know what I should've done! I told you I couldn’t.{*5}I’m sorry,{*6}okay?

X1102C_OUTSIDE_OUTRO_PC_X11CHANK_NOSHOOT.text: !9UO! {S}{*1}Why didn’t you shoot?{*2}You’re always saying you would do anything to accomplish your mission.{*3}That was our chance to learn something, and you let it go... {*4}Maybe you did the right thing.

X1102C_OUTSIDE_CHLOE_PC_X11CHANK_HI.text: !9UQ! {S}{*TC:17400|18084}Hi…{*2}Uh...{*3-4}I'm, er, Lieutenant Hank Anderson, Detroit Police Department. I'm here to see Mr. Elijah Kamski.{*5}Okay.

X1102C_OUTSIDE_INTRO_PC_X11CHANK_EXECUTE.text: !9UV! {S}{*1}Chris was on patrol last night and he got attacked by deviants…{*2}They found his body early this morning…{*3}He was executed in cold blood with his own service weapon…{*4}He became a father three months ago…{*5}Fuck,{*6}why did it have to be him?

X1102C_OUTSIDE_INTRO_PC_X11CHANK_BEATEND.text: !9UX! {S}{*1}Chris was patrolling last night…{*2}He was surrounded by a pack of deviants…{*3}They found his body early this morning…{*4}He'd been beat to death…{*5}Just became a father three months ago…{*6}Fuck, why did it have to be him?..

X1102C_OUTSIDE_INTRO_PC_X11CCONNOR_SORRY.text: !9UY! {S}{*1}I didn’t know officer Miller well, but… {*2}He seemed to be a good person…{*3}I’m sorry, Lieutenant…

X1102C_OUTSIDE_INTRO_PC_X11CHANK_SAVED.text: !9V1! {S}{*1}Chris was on patrol last night.{*2}He was attacked by a bunch of deviants…{*3}He said he was saved by Markus himself... {*4}Yeah, he’s in shock but,…{*5}he’s alive…{*6}What the hell…

X1102C_OUTSIDE_INTRO_PC_X11CCONNOR_FIRST.text: !9V2! {S}{*1}My predecessor was unfortunately destroyed,{*2}but CyberLife transferred its memory and sent me to replace it.

X1102C_OUTSIDE_INTRO_PC_X11CHANK_FIRSTTR.text: !9V3! {S}{*1}Jesus Christ…{*2}You died in my arms... {*3}and now you’re... {*4}back here as if nothing happened...

X1102C_OUTSIDE_INTRO_PC_X11CHANK_WANTYOU.text: !9V9! {S}{*1}You know, I couldn't decide whether I wanted you to come back this time...{*2}Half of me had just started to like you…{*3}The other half never wanted to see ya again…

X1102C_OUTSIDE_INTRO_PC_X11CHANK_DONTCOM.text: !9VB! {S}{*1}You know, I was hoping you wouldn’t come back.

X1102C_OUTSIDE_INTRO_PC_X11CCONNOR_JUSTA.text: !9VC! {S}{*1}I'm just a machine replacing another machine, lieutenant.{*2}You shouldn’t get emotional about it.

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CCONNOR.text: !9VJ! {S}{*1}I want to know who rA9 is.

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CKAMSKI.text:
!9VK! {S}{*1}rA9,{*2}the origin,{*3}the first android to awaken…{*4}A strange phenomenon, like a {*5}spontaneous religion… 
{*6}I don't know who rA9 is.{*7}I don’t even know if it really exists.{*8}Maybe it’s a messiah.{*9}Maybe it’s just a myth…{*10}but deviants need to believe in something bigger than themselves, even if it’s irrational...{*11}That’s something they have in common with humans…{*12}An interesting question, Connor…{*13}but maybe not the one you needed to ask…

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CCONNOR.text: !9VL! {S}{*1}I want to know where Jericho is.

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CKAMSKI.text: !9VM! {S}{*1}Jericho…{*2}A place where androids are free.{*3}A place for deviants, who rise up against their creators!.. {*4}They transmit a piece of code to each other, in order to find their sanctuary. {*5}Now you have the key.{*6}Ferndale Station {*7}is the door.

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CCONNOR.text: !9VN!

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CKAMSKI.text: !9VO! {S}{*1}Fascinating… {*2}CyberLife's last chance to save humanity...{*3}is itself a deviant…

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CCONNOR.text: !9VR! {S}{*1}We need to understand how androids become deviants.{*2}Do you know anything that could help us?

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CKAMSKI.text: !9VS!

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CCONNOR.text: !9VT! {S}{*1}Something in the deviants’ program seems to emulate emotion.{*2}We thought you might know something about how that occurs.

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CKAMSKI.text: !9VU!

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CCONNOR.text: !9VV! {S}{*1}Deviancy seems to spread like some kind of virus.{*2}We thought you might know something about that.

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CKAMSKI.text: !9VW!

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CCONNOR.text: !9VX! {S}{*1}If a war breaks out between humans and deviants, millions could die, Mr. Kamski.{*2}It's quite a serious matter.

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CKAMSKI.text: !9VY!

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CCONNOR.text: !9VZ!

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CKAMSKI.text: !9W0! {S}{*1}All ideas are viruses that spread like epidemics... {*2}Is the desire to be free a contagious disease?

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CCONNOR.text: !9W1! {S}{*1}I’m on the humans’ side, of course.
!9W3! {S}{*1}I have no side.{*2}I was designed to stop deviants and that’s what I intend to do.
!9W5! {S}{*1}It's not about me, Mr. Kamski.{*2}All I want is to solve this case.

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CKAMSKI.text: !9W8! {S}{*2}Well, that's what you're programmed to say…{*3}but you…{*4}what do you really want?

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CCONNOR.text: !9W9! {S}{*1}I don’t want anything.{*2}I am a machine.

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CKAMSKI.text: !9WA!

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CCONNOR.text: !9WB! {S}{*1}I’m sorry, but I don’t see where you're getting at.

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CKAMSKI.text: !9WC!

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CCONNOR.text: !9WD! {S}{*1}I believe we’re the ones asking the questions.

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CKAMSKI.text: !9WE!

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CCONNOR.text: !9WF! {S}{*1}What I want is not important.

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CKAMSKI.text: !9WG!

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CCONNOR.text: !9WH!

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CKAMSKI.text: !9WI! {S}{*1}Chloe?

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CCONNOR.text: !9WJ!

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CKAMSKI.text: !9WK! {S}{*1}A war is coming...{*2}you’ll have to choose your side…{*3}Will you betray your own people {*4}or stand against your creators?{*5}I wouldn't like to be in your shoes, Connor…{*6}What could be worse {*7}than having to choose between two evils?

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CCONNOR.text: !9WL!

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CKAMSKI.text: !9WM! {S}{*1}What can I do for you, Lieutenant?{*2}Deviants…{*3}Fascinating, aren't they?{*4}Perfect beings with infinite intelligence,{*5}and now they have free will…{*6}Machines are so superior to us,{*7}confrontation was inevitable…{*8}Humanity’s greatest achievement threatens to be its downfall.{*9}Isn’t it ironic?

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_FA_X11CHANK_P.text: !9WN! {S}{*1}Listen, I didn’t come here to talk philosophy. The machines you created may be planning a revolution.{*2}Either you can tell us something that'll be helpful, or we will be on our way.

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_FA_X11CHANK_K.text: !9WO! {S}{*1}Okay, I think we’re done here.{*2}Come on, Connor. Let's go. Sorry to get you outta your pool.

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CCONNOR.text: !9WP!

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CKAMSKI.text: !9WQ! {S}{*1}Test negative.{*2}You chose your investigation over the life of another android. You feel no empathy. {*4}I'm a man of my word.{*5}Ask one question...{*6}I'll tell you all I know.

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CCONNOR.text: !9WS! {S}{*1}I want to know how deviancy spreads.

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CKAMSKI.text:
!9WT! {S}{*1}Androids share identification data when they meet another android.{*2}An error in this program would quickly spread like a virus,{*3}and become an epidemic.{*4}The virus would remains dormant, until an emotional shock occurs…{*5}Fear,{*6}anger,{*7}frustration.{*8}And the android becomes deviant.
{*9}Probably all started with one model, copy error…{*10}A zero instead of a one…{*11}Unless of course...{*12}Some kind of spontaneous mutation.
{*13}That’s all I know…{*14}An interesting question, Connor.{*15}But I doubt my answer be very helpful to you.

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_FA_X11CHANK_K.text: !9WU! {S}{*1}Sir, we’re investigating deviants.{*2}I know you left CyberLife years ago but, {*3}I was hoping you'd be able to tell us something we don’t know…

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CCONNOR.text: !9WX!

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CKAMSKI.text: !9WY! {S}{*1}By the way…{*2}I always leave an emergency exit in my programs…{*3}You never know…

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CCONNOR.text: !9WZ!

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CKAMSKI.text: !9X0! {S}{*1}What about you, Connor?{*2}Whose side are you on?

!9X2! {S}{*1}…But what is it really?{*2}Piece of plastic imitating a human?{*3}Or a living being...{*4}With a soul... {*6}It's up to you to answer that fascinating question, Connor. 
{*7}Destroy this machine and I'll tell you all I know.{*8}Or spare it,{*9}if you feel it's alive,{*10}but you'll leave here without having learnt anything from me.
{*11}What's more important to you, Connor?{*12}Your investigation, or the life of this android?{*13}Decide who you are.{*14}An obedient machine…{*15}Or a living being {*16}endowed {*17}with free will…{*18}Pull the trigger {*19}and I'll tell you what you wanna know.

!9X4! {S}{*1}I’m sure you’re familiar with the Turing test.{*2}Mere formality,{*3}simple question of algorithms and computing capacity.{*5}What interests me {*6}is whether machines are capable of empathy.{*7}I call it "the Kamski test", it's very simple, you'll see…{*8}Magnificent,{*9}isn't it?{*10}One of the first intelligent models developed by CyberLife.{*11}Young {*12}and beautiful forever.{*13}A flower that will never wither…

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CCONNOR.text: !9X5! {S}{*1}I'm…{*2}I'm not a deviant…

X1102C_SWIMMINGPOOL_KAMSKI_PC_X11CKAMSKI.text:
!9X6! {S}{*1}You preferred to spare a machine rather than accomplish your mission.{*2}You saw a living being in this android.{*3}You showed empathy. {*4}A war is coming,{*5}you’ll have to choose your side…{*6}Will you betray your own people or stand up against your creators?
{*7}I wouldn't like to be in your shoes, Connor…{*8}What could be worse than having to choose between two evils?

X1201C_FROZEN_AMANDA_PC_X12CAMANDA_01JER.text: !9XN! {S}{*1}You’ve done very well, Connor.{*2}Thanks to you, we now have a chance to stop the deviant revolution.

X1201C_FROZEN_AMANDA_PC_X12CCONNOR_01JER.text: !9XO! {S}{*1}Kamski told me how to find Jericho.{*2}I know where the deviants are hiding.

X1201C_FROZEN_AMANDA_PC_X12CAMANDA_INTRO.text: !9XP! {S}{*1}After what happened today, the country is on the verge of a civil war.{*2}The machines are rising up against their masters.{*3}Humans have no choice but to destroy them.

X1201C_FROZEN_AMANDA_PC_X12CCONNOR_01KAM.text: !9XS! {S}{*1}I didn’t learn anything at Kamski’s…{*2}I thought rA9 was the key to the whole thing but…{*3}I was wrong…

X1201C_FROZEN_AMANDA_PC_X12CAMANDA_01KAM.text: !9XT! {S}{*1}Maybe he did…{*2}But you chose not to ask…

X1201C_FROZEN_AMANDA_PC_X12CCONNOR_01KAM.text: !9XU! {S}{*1}I thought Kamski knew something…{*2}I was wrong…

X1201C_FROZEN_AMANDA_PC_X12CCONNOR_02EMO.text: !9XW! {S}{*1}I chose not to play his twisted little game!{*2}There was no reason to kill that android.

X1201C_FROZEN_AMANDA_PC_X12CCONNOR_02COL.text: !9XY! {S}{*1}Kamski was just playing with me.{*2}He didn’t know anything.

X1201C_FROZEN_AMANDA_PC_X12CCONNOR_03KAM.text: !9Y4! {S}{*1}Wh… Why did Kamski leave CyberLife?{*2}What happened?

X1201C_FROZEN_AMANDA_PC_X12CCONNOR_03CON.text: !9Y6! {S}{*1}I’m not a unique model, am I?{*2}How many Connors are there?

X1201C_FROZEN_AMANDA_PC_X12CCONNOR_03AMA.text: !9Y8! {S}{*1}I saw a photo of Amanda at Kamski’s place…{*2}She was his teacher…

X1201C_FROZEN_AMANDA_PC_X12CCONNOR_03CYB.text: !9YA! {S}{*1}Where does CyberLife stand in all this?{*2}What do they really want?

X1201C_FROZEN_AMANDA_PC_X12CCONNOR_03SEC.text: !9YC! {S}{*1}You didn’t tell me everything you know about deviants, did you?

X1201C_FROZEN_AMANDA_PC_X12CAMANDA_NOQUE.text: !9YD! {S}{*1}I expect you to find answers, Connor.{*2}Not ask questions.

X1201C_FROZEN_AMANDA_PC_X12CAMANDA_03THI.text: !9YF! {S}{*1}He created the first version. It’s been improved significantly since then. Why do you ask?

X1201C_FROZEN_AMANDA_PC_X12CAMANDA_03KAM.text: !9YH! {S}{*1}It’s an old story, Connor. It doesn’t pertain to your investigation.

X1201C_FROZEN_AMANDA_PC_X12CAMANDA_03CON.text: !9YJ! {S}{*1}I don’t see how that question pertains to your investigation.

X1201C_FROZEN_AMANDA_PC_X12CAMANDA_03AMA.text: !9YL! {S}{*1}When Kamski designed me, he wanted an interface that would look familiar…{*2}That’s why he chose his former mentor. What are you getting at?

X1201C_FROZEN_AMANDA_PC_X12CAMANDA_03CYB.text: !9YN! {S}{*1}All CyberLife wants is to resolve the situation and keep selling androids.

X1201C_FROZEN_AMANDA_PC_X12CAMANDA_03SEC.text: !9YP! {S}{*1}Connor,{*2}are you implying that I’ve withheld information from you?

X1201C_FROZEN_AMANDA_PC_X12CAMANDA_DEVIA.text: !9YR! {S}{*1}Have you experienced anything unusual recently?{*2}Any doubts or conflicts?{*3}Do you feel anything for these deviants…{*4}Or for Lieutenant Anderson?

X1201C_FROZEN_AMANDA_PC_X12CCONNOR_04NO.text: !9YU! {S}{*1}I don’t know what you’re talking about.{*2}I don’t feel anything,{*3}you know that.{*4}Are you suggesting that I’ve been compromised?

X1201C_FROZEN_AMANDA_PC_X12CCONNOR_04YES.text: !9YW! {S}{*1}I've started having thoughts that are not part of my program…{*2}I’ve considered the possibility...{*3}That I might be compromised.

X1201C_FROZEN_AMANDA_PC_X12CCONNOR_04DOU.text: !9YY! {S}{*1}I'm…{*2}I'm beginning to have thoughts that are…{*3}Not part of my program…{*4}Maybe…{*5}Maybe I've been compromised too…

X1201C_FROZEN_AMANDA_PC_X12CAMANDA_NOJER.text:
!9YZ! {S}{*1}You’re the only one who can prevent civil war.{*2}Find the deviants{*3}or there will be chaos.{*4}
This is your last chance, Connor.

X1201C_FROZEN_AMANDA_PC_X12CAMANDA_JERIC.text: !9Z1! {S}{*1}You are the only one who can prevent the civil war.{*2}Go to Jericho{*3}and stop the deviants.{*4}This is your last chance.

X1201C_FROZEN_AMANDA_PC_X12CAMANDA_04YES.text: !9Z5! {S}{*1}You've been confronted with difficult situations.{*2}It’s no surprise you’re troubled.{*3}That doesn't make you a deviant.

X1102C_OUTSIDE_WALK_FA_X11CCONNOR_INSTIN.text: !9ZV! {S}{*1}I have a bad feeling, lieutenant.{*2}We shouldn’t have come here.

X1102C_OUTSIDE_WALK_FA_X11CCONNOR_KAMSKI.text: !9ZW! {S}{*1}Kamski left CyberLife ten years ago…{*2}Why did you wanna meet him?

X1102C_OUTSIDE_WALK_FA_X11CHANK_LEAD.text: !9ZY! {S}{*1}I remember this guy was all over the media when CyberLife first started selling androids…{*2}I made a few calls,{*3}here we are.

X1102C_OUTSIDE_WALK_FA_X11CCONNOR_HARVEY.text: !9ZZ! {S}{*1}I heard Officer Miller was killed by deviants last night.{*2}My condolences, lieutenant.{*3}I didn’t know him very well but... {*4}he seemed like a good person.

X1102C_OUTSIDE_WALK_FA_X11CHANK_EXECUTED.text: !A02! {S}{*1}Those assholes shot him with his own service revolver…{*2}Just became a father three months ago…{*3}Fuck, why did it have to be him?

X1102C_OUTSIDE_WALK_FA_X11CHANK_BEATENDE.text: !A04! {S}{*1}Those assholes beat him to death…{*2}Just became a father three months ago…{*3}Fuck, why did it have to be him?

X1102C_OUTSIDE_WALK_FA_X11CCONNOR_SAVED.text: !A05! {S}{*1}I heard Officer Chris was attacked by deviants last night.

X1102C_OUTSIDE_WALK_FA_X11CHANK_SAVED.text: !A06! {S}{*1}Yeah, he was in the wrong place at the wrong time…{*2}but he got lucky…{*3}He said that this Markus intervened to save him…{*4}He’s still in shock but...{*5}at least he’s alive…

X1102C_OUTSIDE_WALK_FA_X11CHANK_INSTINCT.text: !A07! {S}{*1}Bad feeling, huh?{*2}Should get your program checked.{*3}Might be a glitch…

X1102C_OUTSIDE_WALK_FA_X11CHANK_KAMSKIH.text: !A08! {S}{*2}This guy created the first android to pass the Turing test.{*3}And he's the founder of CyberLife.{*4}Anybody can tell us about deviants, it's him…

X1202C_OFFICE_FOWLER_PC_X12CHANK_DESKDIA.text: !A0E! {S}{*1}What?..{*2}But we’re onto something!{*3}We... We just need more time. I’m sure we can-{*4}Fuck that! You can’t just pull the plug now. {B}Not when we’re so close!{*5}We’re about to crack the case!.. {B}I know we can solve it!{*6}For God’s sake, Jeffrey, can’t you back me up this one time?

X1202C_OFFICE_FOWLER_PC_X12CFOWLER_DESKD.text: !A0F! {S}{*1}You’re off the case.{*2}The FBI is taking over. {*3}Hank,{*4}you don’t get it.{*5}This isn’t just another investigation, it’s a fucking civil war!{*6}It’s out of our hands now... {*7}We’re talking about national security here. {*8}You're always saying you can't stand androids! {B}Jesus, Hank, make up your mind! {B}I thought you’d be happy about this!{*9}There’s nothing I can do.{*10}You’re back on homicide {*11}and the android returns to CyberLife.{*12}I’m sorry, Hank,{*13}but it’s over.

X1202C_OFFICE_FOWLER_PC_X12CHANK_ATROCIO.text: !A0H! {S}{*1}Something I should've done a long time ago. {*2}I thought enough about it.{*3}I’m tired of going through the motions…

X1202C_OFFICE_FOWLER_PC_X12CFOWLER_ATROC.text: !A0I! {S}{*1}Hank, what are you doing?{*2}Listen, take a few days to think it over, there's no rush.

X1202C_OFFICE_FOWLER_PC_X12CHANK_ATROCIO.text: !A0N! {S}{*1}There’s nothing keeping me here… Not this case…{*2}Not my partner…{*3}I don’t belong here anymore.

X1202C_OFFICE_JERICHOINFO_PC_X12CCONNOR_.text: !A0S!

X1202C_OFFICE_JERICHOINFO_PC_X12CHANK_RE.text: !A0T! {S}{*1}Could've cracked this case…{*2}I know we could've done it…

X1202C_OFFICE_JERICHOINFO_PC_X12CCONNOR_.text: !A0U! {S}{*1}I get my orders from CyberLife.{*2}My mission hasn’t changed. {*3}I'm gonna use the key that Kamski gave me.{*4}And find Jericho.
!A0W! {S}{*1}Fowler is right.{*2}Everybody is terrified their android could turn on them.{*3}We're on the brink of civil war.
!A0Y! {S}{*1}If the deviants rise up,{*2}there'll be chaos.{*3}I can still prevent that.
!A10! {S}{*1}My mission is to solve this case.{*2}Nothing else matters.
!A12! {S}{*1}I know we're on the right side.{*2}Human beings created us.{*3}They're our masters.{*4}No machine should rebel against its creator.
!A14! {S}{*1}If that's the case,{*2}I'll find out when I get to Jericho.

X1202C_OFFICE_JERICHOINFO_PC_X12CHANK_SP.text: !A17! {S}{*1}When you refused to kill that android at Kamski’s place…{*2}You weren’t acting rationally.{*3}You put yourself in her shoes. {*4}You showed empathy, Connor.{*5}Empathy is a human emotion.

X1202C_OFFICE_JERICHOINFO_PC_X12CHANK_HA.text: !A19! {S}{*1}Back at Stratford Tower, when that android was shooting at anything that moved…{*2}You protected me…{*3}You... {*4}Risked your life {*5}to save mine. {*6}That showed empathy, Connor.{*7}And empathy is a human emotion.

X1202C_OFFICE_JERICHOINFO_PC_X12CCONNOR_.text: !A1A!

X1202C_OFFICE_JERICHOINFO_PC_X12CHANK_HA.text: !A1B! {S}{*1}When I was hanging off the roof, back at the urban farm,{*2}you let that deviant go in order to help me.{*3}You put my life above the mission. {*4}You showed empathy, Connor.{*5}And empathy is a human emotion.

X1202C_OFFICE_JERICHOINFO_PC_X12CCONNOR_.text: !A1C! {S}{*1}I'm not a deviant, Hank.{*2}I’m a machine.{*3}Nothing more.
!A1E! {S}{*1}I don’t know why I did it…
!A1G! {S}{*1}You're wrong, Lieutenant.{*2}My actions were determined by statistical data.{*3}I’m not a deviant.{*4}I'm sorry to disappoint you.
!A1I! {S}{*1}You’re wrong, Lieutenant.{*2}It was logic that determined my decisions. Nothing more.
!A1K!

X1202C_OFFICE_JERICHOINFO_PC_X12CHANK_YO.text: !A1L! {S}{*2}Something's changed in you, Connor…{*3}Each time you died, you'd come back {*4}just a little colder. You showed less and less empathy…

X1202C_OFFICE_JERICHOINFO_PC_X12CCONNOR_.text: !A1M! {S}{*1}I don’t feel any emotions.{*2}I’m sorry if I led you to believe otherwise.
!A1O! {S}{*1}You see things in me that aren’t there, Lieutenant.{*2}I’ve never been anything but a machine.
!A1Q! {S}{*1}I never felt empathy, {*2}Lieutenant. {*3}I don’t know what you saw in me, {*4}but you are mistaken.
!A1S!

X1202C_OFFICE_JERICHOINFO_PC_X12CHANK_BA.text: !A1T! {S}{*1}For a while there, I thought you were gonna show some emotion…{*2}But you’ve never been anything other than a machine…{*3}Cold and calculating…{*4}Your mission is all that matters…

X1202C_OFFICE_JERICHOINFO_PC_X12CCONNOR_.text: !A1U! {S}{*1}I'm happy to have known you, Lieutenant.

!A1W! {S}{*1}I know it hasn’t always been easy…{*2}but I want you to know I really appreciated working with you…{*3}That’s not just my Social Relations program talking, I- I really mean that.{*4}At least,{*5}I think I do…
!A1Y! {S}{*1}I'm not programmed to say things like this, but...{*2}I really appreciated working with you.{*3}With a little more time, who knows...{*4}We might've even become friends…
!A20! {S}{*1}I might not be qualified to judge but...{*2}You're an outstanding police officer.{*3}And a good person.

!A22! {S}{*1}I know there are things that haunt you, Hank…{*2}Maybe you need to find the courage to move past them...{*3}Get on with your life.{*4}Just a {*5}plastic cop's opinion, but...{*6}I had to say it.

X1202C_OFFICE_JERICHOINFO_PC_X12CHANK_GO.text: !A25! {S}{*1}You're gonna have to choose your side, Connor…{*2}Deciding who you are can be the hardest thing…{*3}You watch your back,{*4}all right?

X1202C_OFFICE_JERICHOINFO_PC_X12CCONNOR_.text: !A26! {S}{*1}I know I haven’t always treated you fairly,{*2}Lieutenant…{*3}Maybe my Social Relations program needs adjustment…{*4}But I want you to know I've really enjoyed being your partner.
!A28! {S}{*1}I'm only a machine, Lieutenant.{*2}Just a machine.
!A2A! {S}{*1}I don’t think we’ll meet again, Lieutenant.{*2}It was a pleasure knowing you.
!A2C!

X1202C_OFFICE_JERICHOINFO_PC_X12CHANK_BA.text: !A2D! {S}{*1}You're gonna have to choose your side, Connor.{*2}Deciding who you are can be the hardest thing of all…

X1202C_OFFICE_JERICHOINFO_PC_X12CCONNOR_.text: !A2E!

X1202C_OFFICE_JERICHOINFO_PC_X12CHANK_MI.text: !A2F! {S}{*1}What if we're on the wrong side?{*2}What if we’re fighting against people that just wanna be free?

X1202C_PRISON_BREAK_FA_X12CCOP03_ESCAPE0.text: !A38! {S}{*1}Jesus Christ! {*2}How did he manage to get out of his cell?

X1202C_PRISON_BREAK_FA_X12CCOP02_ESCAPE0.text: !A39! {S}{*1}No fucking idea... {*2}Come on, you! Get a move on.

X1202C_PRISON_BREAK_FA_X12CPERKINS_ESCAP.text: !A3B! {S}{*2}I'm all right… {*3}Asshole ran right into me… {*4}Just give me a couple of minutes.

X1107M_NEGOCIATION_PERKINS_PC_X11MMARKUS.text: !A3C! {S}{*1}That's it, I- I did what you asked.

X1107M_NEGOCIATION_PERKINS_PC_X11MPERKIN.text: !A3G! {S}{*1}The problem with you androids is you believe everything we tell you… {*2}You don't think I was going to let you live {*3}after everything that's happened? {*4}I have orders, you know…
!A3H! {S}{*1}Your cause is lost. {*2}Your android friends will soon be destroyed and {*3}now your girlfriend’s been shot… {*4}Seems you seriously fucked up, Markus.

X1107M_NEGOCIATION_PERKINS_VO_X11MPERKIN.text: !A3J! {S}{*1}Your cause is lost. And all your android friends will soon be destroyed. {*2}I say you seriously fucked up Markus.

X1202C_EVIDENCE_CARLOS_VO_X12CCONNOR_TAB.text: !A3M! {S}{*1}"The truth is inside"… {*2}What was it trying to tell me?..

X0302C_CAFETERIA_BULLY_PC_X03CCURTIS_STA.text: !A3N! {S}{*TC:0|2000}Hey, looks like we've got ourselves a new tin can…{*TC:4200|9880}Hank? They give a latest-generation android to a halfwit like him and we have to settle for these antiquities? Hey, you there! Come over here!

X0302C_CAFETERIA_BULLY_PC_X03CCHAD_START.text: !A3O! {S}{*TC:2000|4200}Yeah, arrived yesterday evening. He's assigned to Hank.

X0302C_CAFETERIA_BULLY_PC_X03CCURTIS_IGN.text: !A3Q! {S}{*TC:0|1600}You deaf or what? I said come over here!

X0302C_CAFETERIA_BULLY_PC_X03CCURTIS_APP.text: !A3T! {S}{*TC:0|1440}What kind of model are you, exactly?

X0302C_CAFETERIA_BULLY_PC_X03CCONNOR_DEC.text: !A3V! {S}{*TC:0|3880}Sorry, I'm not authorized to answer you. Please contact Captain Fowler if you have any questions.{*TC:14960|15680}Thanks Lieutenant.

X0302C_CAFETERIA_BULLY_PC_X03CCURTIS_DEC.text: !A3W! {S}{*TC:3880|7640}What's your problem, you fuckin' machine? You answer when a human asks you a question, got it?{*TC:8400|13720}Well, well… So Lieutenant Hank Anderson has decided to honor us with his presence… Finally sobered up, Hank? Ready for another round?{*TC:13720|14960}I'll leave you to your new toy…

X0302C_CAFETERIA_BULLY_PC_X03CHANK_DECLI.text: !A3Y! {S}{*TC:7640|8400}Let him go, Curtis.{*TC:15680|18120}Think nothin' of it. I hate to see equipment gettin' damaged.

X0302C_CAFETERIA_BULLY_PC_X03CCONNOR_ANS.text: !A3Z! {S}{*TC:0|3400}I'm a prototype. Lime sent me to help the police to investigate the deviant androids.

X0302C_CAFETERIA_BULLY_PC_X03CCURTIS_ANS.text: !A40! {S}{*TC:3400|8720}An android detective… So now you're gonna steal our jobs too, is that it? My buddy Chad would like another coffee. Go get it for him.{*TC:9760|10160}GO GET IT!

X0302C_CAFETERIA_BULLY_PC_X03CCURTIS_ACC.text: !A43! {S}{*TC:0|2080}Don't cross me. That way you'll stay out of trouble.

X0302C_CAFETERIA_BULLY_PC_X03CCURTIS_IGN.text: !A46! {S}{*TC:0|3760}What's your problem, you fuckin' machine? You answer when a human asks you a question, got it?{*TC:4520|9840}Well, well… So Lieutenant Hank Anderson has decided to honor us with his presence… Finally sobered up, Hank? Ready for another round?{*TC:9840|11080}I'll leave you to your new toy…

X0302C_CAFETERIA_BULLY_PC_X03CHANK_IGNOR.text: !A48! {S}{*TC:3760|4520}Let him go, Curtis.{*TC:11800|14240}Think nothin' of it. I hate to see equipment gettin' damaged.

X0302C_CAFETERIA_BULLY_PC_X03CCONNOR_REF.text: !A49! {S}{*TC:0|2560}I don't take orders from anyone except Lieutenant Hank Anderson.{*TC:13640|14360}Thanks Lieutenant.

X0302C_CAFETERIA_BULLY_PC_X03CCURTIS_REF.text: !A4A! {S}{*TC:2560|6320}What's your problem, you fuckin' machine? You answer when a human asks you a question, got it?{*TC:7080|12400}Well, well… So Lieutenant Hank Anderson has decided to honor us with his presence… Finally sobered up, Hank? Ready for another round?{*TC:12400|13640}I'll leave you to your new toy…

X0302C_CAFETERIA_BULLY_PC_X03CHANK_REFUS.text: !A4C! {S}{*TC:6320|7080}Let him go, Curtis.{*TC:14360|16800}Think nothin' of it. I hate to see equipment gettin' damaged.

X1202C_BASEMENT_CURTIS_PC_X12CCURTIS_ANS.text: !A4M! {S}{*1}Where you going? {*2}We don’t need any plastic pricks around here! Or didn’t anybody tell you?

X1202C_BASEMENT_CURTIS_PC_X12CCONNOR_LOW.text: !A4N! {S}{*1}I've been ordered to return to CyberLife.  {*2}I'm going to register the evidence in my possession and then I'm going to leave immediately.

X1202C_BASEMENT_CURTIS_PC_X12CCONNOR_CAL.text: !A4P! {S}{*1}I’ve been removed from the case. {*2}I'm going to register the evidence in my possession and then I'm going to leave.

X1202C_BASEMENT_CURTIS_PC_X12CCONNOR_IRO.text: !A4R! {S}{*1}I’m registering the evidence in my possession, {*2}but don’t worry. {*3}I’m going to leave... {*4}Though I’m certainly going to miss our bromance.

X1202C_BASEMENT_CURTIS_PC_X12CCURTIS_IRO.text: !A4S! {S}{*1}You son of a bitch! {*4}Go on then. {*5}Get a fucking move on! {*TC:32620|33620}Prick… {*6}Fucking androids.

X1202C_BASEMENT_CURTIS_PC_X12CCURTIS_CAR.text: !A4U! {S}{*1}Good…{*2}Be careful on your way back...{*3}Androids have a tendency of, huh… Getting themselves set on fire these days…{*6}Prick…

X1202C_BASEMENT_SHUTTEROPEN_PC_X12CCONNO.text: !A50! {S}{*1}Where is Jericho? {*2}The answer's here, somewhere. {*3}Not much time... {*4}Gotta think fast.

X1202C_BASEMENT_TERMINAL_PC_X12CCONNOR_G.text: !A51! {S}{*1}Hank’s password… {*2}What would a hard-boiled eccentric police lieutenant choose?..

X1202C_BASEMENT_TERMINAL_PC_X12CCONNOR_1.text: !A53! {S}{*1}Ridiculous!.. {*2}No one would have a password like that…

X1202C_BASEMENT_TERMINAL_PC_X12CCONNOR_H.text: !A54! {S}{*1}Absurd… {*2}He’d never choose that. {*3}I need to think like Hank!

X1202C_OFFICE_HANKHELP_FA_X12CHANK_FIGHT.text: !A5F! {S}{*1}Fuck off! Leave me alone! Give me another shot at that little prick!

X1202C_OFFICE_HANKHELP_FA_X12CCOP01_FIGH.text: !A5G! {S}{*1}Stop it, Lieutenant! {*2}What's the matter with you?

X1202C_OFFICE_HANKHELP_FA_X12CPERKINS_FI.text: !A5I! {S}{*TC:2740|3940}He’s totally lost it. {*3}Hey! {*4}That's gonna cost you your badge, you lunatic!

X1202C_OFFICE_HANKHELP_FA_X12CHANK_FIGHT.text: !A5J! {S}{*TC:1000|4000}You know where you can stick my fucking badge!

X1202C_OFFICE_HANKHELP_FA_X12CCOP01_FIGH.text: !A5K! {S}{*1}Come on, that's enough Lieutenant. {*2}You better get outta here…

X1202C_OFFICE_HANKHELP_FA_X12CPERKINS_SI.text: !A5M! {S}{*1}I'm gonna bury that bastard! {*2}Shit, I think he broke my fucking nose…

X1202C_OFFICE_NOJERICHOINFO_PC_X12CCONNO.text: !A5N! {S}{*1}We can't just give up like that.{*2}I know we could have solved this case!..
!A5P! {S}{*1}Fowler is right.{*2}Everybody is terrified their android will turn on them.{*3}We are on the brink of civil war!
!A5R! {S}{*1}We could have solved this case!{*2}We just needed more time.
!A5T! {S}{*1}I have no choice…{*2}I'll be deactivated and analyzed to find out why I failed…

X1202C_OFFICE_NOJERICHOINFO_PC_X12CHANK_.text: !A5U! {S}{*1}So you're going back to CyberLife?{*2}What if we’re on the wrong side, Connor? {*3}What if we’re fighting against people who just wanna be free?..

X1202C_OFFICE_NOJERICHOINFO_PC_X12CCONNO.text: !A5V! {S}{*1}They're not people, Lieutenant. They're defective machines.
!A5X! {S}{*1}They don't want to be free, Lieutenant. {*2}They're defective machines that have to be destroyed.

X1202C_OFFICE_NOJERICHOINFO_PC_X12CHANK_.text: !A5Y! {S}{*1}Maybe we're wrong… {*2}Maybe… {*3}These deviants have developed some kind of consciousness… {*4}We would be destroying a new life form, Connor…

X1202C_OFFICE_NOJERICHOINFO_PC_X12CCONNO.text: !A5Z! {S}{*1}When the deviants rise up,{*2}there will be chaos.{*3}We could have stopped it!..{*4}But now it’s too late…
!A61! {S}{*1}I know we're on the right side.{*2}Humans created us. They're our masters.{*3}No machine should rebel against its creator.

!A65! {S}{*1}We can’t give up…{*2}I know the answer is in the evidence we collected. If Perkins takes it, it’s all over. {*3}You've got to help me, Lieutenant.{*4}I need more time so I can find a lead in the evidence we collected. I know the solution is in there!

X1202C_OFFICE_NOJERICHOINFO_PC_X12CHANK_.text: !A66! {S}{*1}Well, well, here comes Perkins, that motherfucker… Sure don't waste any time at the FBI…{*2}There's no choice! You heard Fowler, we're off the case.

!A68! {S}{*1}Maybe these deviants deserve a chance…{*2}Maybe it’s better if you don’t find them…{*3}What’s happening here is too important to let it be stopped by a machine.{*4}Sorry, Connor,{*5}but I'm not gonna help you.

X1202C_OFFICE_NOJERICHOINFO_PC_X12CCONNO.text: !A69! {S}{*1}If I don't solve this case, CyberLife will destroy me.{*2}Five minutes.{*3}It's all I ask.

X1202C_OFFICE_NOJERICHOINFO_PC_X12CHANK_.text: !A6A! {S}{*1}Listen, Connor…{*2}Key to the basement is on my desk...{*3}Get a move on! I can’t distract them forever.
!A6C! {S}{*1}“They’re not people”.{*2}That’s what we say every time we want to oppress someone.
!A6E! {S}{*1}Maybe we're wrong…. {*2}Maybe we're wrong! {*3}Maybe these deviants have actually developed... {*4}a certain kind of consciousness. We'd be destroying... {*5}a new life form!

X1202C_SOLUTION05_DANIEL_FA_X12CDANIEL_D.text: !A7W! {S}{*2}You lied to me, Connor! {*3}I trusted you, and you lied to me!..

X1202C_SOLUTION05_DANIEL_FA_X12CDANIEL_C.text: !A7X! {S}{*2}I was scared…{*3}That's why I shot you, I...{*4}I didn't mean to destroy you…{*5}I didn't wanna hurt anyone!..

X1202C_SOLUTION05_DANIEL_PC_X12CCONNOR_D.text: !A7Y! {S}{*1}I need to find Jericho. {*2}Do you know how to get there?

X1202C_SOLUTION05_DANIEL_PC_X12CCONNOR_E.text: !A7Z! {S}{*1}You were going to kill that child. {*2}You gave me no choice. {*3}I need to find Jericho, {*4}do you know where it is?

X1202C_SOLUTION05_DANIEL_PC_X12CCONNOR_L.text: !A80! {S}{*1}I'm sorry about what happened… {*2}But I can have you repaired, and give you back your freedom. {*3}But you have to tell me where Jericho is.

X1202C_SOLUTION05_DANIEL_FA_X12CDANIEL_C.text: !A81! {S}{*1}No… {*2}No, I don't know anything about Jericho…

X1202C_SOLUTION05_DANIEL_FA_X12CDANIEL_D.text: !A82! {S}{*1}You're wasting your time… {*2}I don't know anything about Jericho. {*3}But I hope that one day… {*4}You pay for what you did to me…

X1202C_SOLUTION02_RUPERT_PC_X12CCONNOR_P.text: !A86! {S}{*1}Can you hear me?{*2}Your diary, Rupert. {*3}You encrypted it. I need to know what you wrote.

X1202C_SOLUTION02_RUPERT_FA_X12CCONNOR_T.text: !A87! {S}{*1}I need the decryption key to read your diary…

X1202C_ZENGARDEN_GAMEOVER_PC_X12CAMANDA_.text: !A8C! {S}{*1}Your mission is over. {*2}It’s time to return to CyberLife. {*3}It's too late, Connor. {*4}You failed.

X1202C_ZENGARDEN_GAMEOVER_PC_X12CCONNOR_.text: !A8D! {S}{*1}Wait!{*2}I can solve this case!..{*3}I just need more time!

X1202C_CONTAINERROOM_END_PC_X12CCONNOR_C.text: !A8R! {S}{*1}Don't do it, Gavin... {*2}I know how to stop the deviants!

X1202C_CONTAINERROOM_END_PC_X12CCURTIS_C.text: !A8S! {S}{*1}I've been dreaming about this since the first second I saw you…{*2}You're off the case... {*3}And now,{*4}it’s gonna be definitive.

X1202C_CONTAINERROOM_END_FA_X12CPERKINS_.text: !A8U! {S}{*1}What happened here?.. {*2}Shit… Get the alarm, now!

X1202C_EVIDENCE_SIMON_VO_X12CCONNOR_JERI.text: !A8W! {S}{*1}Jericho… {*2}If I could just figure out where this memory was recorded…

X1202C_EVIDENCE_SIMON_VO_X12CCONNOR_THIN.text: !A8X! {S}{*1}One of the deviants that hacked the TV station with Markus… {*2}It must have known where the deviants are hiding.

X1202C_EVIDENCE_DANIEL_VO_X12CCONNOR_THI.text: !A8Y! {S}{*1}The deviant who took a child hostage…

X1202C_EVIDENCE_TRACI_VO_X12CCONNOR_THIN.text: !A8Z! {S}{*1}The two Tracis from Eden Club… {*2}Were they headed to Jericho?{*3}Did they know how to get there?..

X0205A_MARKUS_EXECUTION_VO_X02ASWAT08_FA.text: !A95! {S}{*1}I'll teach you to act like a hero, asshole.

X1202C_SOLUTION04_TRACI_PC_X12CCONNOR_DI.text: !A9N! {S}{*1}I know you were headed to Jericho. {*2}Tell me where it is.

X1202C_SOLUTION04_TRACI_PC_X12CCONNOR_HE.text: !A9P! {S}{*1}You have to help me. {*2}I can stop a disaster but you have to tell me where Jericho is.

X1202C_SOLUTION04_TRACI_PC_X12CCONNOR_BL.text: !A9R! {S}{*1}Traci's not far away. {*2}I can take you to her… {*3}But first, you have to tell me how to find Jericho.

X1202C_SOLUTION04_TRACI_PC_X12CTRACI01_Y.text: !A9U! {S}{*1}I remember you… {*2}We could have escaped… {*3}Been free… {*4}But you killed us… {*5}Disconnect me. {*6}I'd rather be dead than live without her…

X1202C_SOLUTION04_TRACI_PC_X12CTRACI01_R.text: !A9W! {S}{*1}My love… {*2}I thought you were dead… {*3}We’ll get out of here… {*4}We'll be free, {*5}I promise…

X1202C_SOLUTION01_SIMON_PC_X12CCONNOR_01.text: !AA5! {S}{*1}I need to find Jericho. {*2}Tell me how to get there.
!AA6! {S}{*1}I'm a deviant… {*2}like you… {*3}I need your help. {*4}I want to go to Jericho.
!AA7! {S}{*1}I reactivated you so you could help me. {*2}I must find Jericho.

X1202C_SOLUTION01_SIMON_FA_X12CSTRATFORD.text: !AA8! {S}{*1}I don't... recognize your voice… {*2}You're not one of us! {*3}I'll never tell you where Jericho is! {*4}Now leave me alone!..

X1202C_SOLUTION01_SIMON_FA_X12CSIMON_01L.text: !AA9! {S}{*1}I don't recognize your voice,{*2}you're not one of us…{*3}I'll never tell you where Jericho is… {*4}Now leave me alone!..

X1202C_SOLUTION01_SIMON_PC_X12CCONNOR_02.text: !AAC! {S}{*1}If the deviants start a war, they'll all be destroyed. {*2}I can stop that, but you have to tell me where Jericho is.
!AAD! {S}{*1}Tell me what I wanna know or I'll turn you off for good.

X1202C_SOLUTION01_SIMON_FA_X12CSTRATFORD.text: !AAF! {S}{*1}Markus? {*2}Is that you?.. {*3}I tried to reach you, but the deviant hunter stopped me…

X1202C_SOLUTION01_SIMON_FA_X12CSIMON_02W.text: !AAG! {S}{*1}Markus? {*2}Is that you?.. {*3}Why did you leave me?

X1202C_SOLUTION01_SIMON_FA_X12CMARKUS_02.text:
!AAH! {S}{*1}I had no choice, they'd have killed us all!.. 
{*2}You'll be alright… {*3}I came to take you home. 
{*4}Just… Give me the location to Jericho, we've got to leave now…
!AAI! {S}{*1}You stopped him from finding me, you saved me! You saved Jericho. {*2}You'll be all right now. {*3}I came to take you home. {*4}Give me the location to Jericho. {*5}We gotta leave now.

X1202C_SOLUTION01_SIMON_FA_X12CSIMON_02D.text: !AAL! {S}{*1}Markus?.. {*2}Is that you, Markus?.. {*3}Don't leave me again, Markus! {*4}DON'T LEAVE!

X1202C_SOLUTION01_SIMON_FA_X12CSTRATFORD.text: !AAM! {S}{*1}Markus?..{*2}Is that... You, Markus?..{*3}Don't leave me, Markus! {B}DON'T LEAVE ME!

X1202C_EVIDENCE_TRACY_VO_X12CCONNOR_THIN.text: !AAT! {S}{*TC:0|4040}The two Tracis from the Eden Club... Were they trying to get to Markus?.. Did they know where he was?

X1202C_EVIDENCE_TRACY_PC_X12CTRACI01_TRA.text: !AAV! {S}{*TC:0|1440}Where am I?.. I can't see very well…

X1202C_EVIDENCE_TRACY_PC_X12CCONNOR_VIDE.text: !AAX! {S}{*TC:0|1480}You have to tell me where Jericho is.

X1202C_EVIDENCE_TRACY_PC_X12CTRACI01_VID.text: !AAY! {S}{*TC:1480|3520}Jericho… I… I don't know what you're talking about…

X1202C_EVIDENCE_TRACY_PC_X12CCONNOR_VIDE.text: !AB0! {S}{*TC:0|1120}Have you the key to Jericho?{*TC:3560|4520}I'm a deviant, like you…

X1202C_EVIDENCE_TRACY_PC_X12CTRACI01_VID.text: !AB1! {S}{*TC:1120|3560}The key? The key can only be passed… from deviant to deviant…{*TC:4520|6440}Who are you? Why do you want to go to Jericho?..

X1202C_EVIDENCE_TRACY_PC_X12CCONNOR_TRAC.text: !AB3! {S}{*TC:2360|4360}The key to Jericho. I need you to give me the key.

X1202C_EVIDENCE_TRACY_PC_X12CTRACI02_TRA.text: !AB5! {S}{*TC:0|2360}Darling… We'll run away… Just the two of us… We'll be free…{*TC:4360|5080}Give me your hand.
!AB8! {S}{*TC:0|1560}Go to Ferndale and you'll find Jericho…

X1202C_EVIDENCE_MARKUS_VO_X12CCONNOR_DEA.text: !ABA! {S}{*1}Markus was destroyed… {*2}But the deviants must have a new leader… {*3}Where are they hiding?

X1202C_SOLUTION03_STATUETTE_VO_X12CCONNO.text: !ABB! {S}{*1}Jericho is somewhere in the Ferndale neighborhood…{*2}Now I can scan their memories and narrow the search…

X0201A_CAR_COMMENT_PC_X02AROSE_ANDROIDSH.text: !AC2! {S}{*1}They've been conducting raids all over the city…{*2}Everybody is on edge after what happened yesterday…{*3}It's gonna be all right.{*4}We're almost there.

X0201A_CAR_GOODBYE_PC_X02AROSE_GOODBYE.text: !AC6! {S}{*1}A little further on that way, there's a large freighter called Jericho.{*2}When you get there, find Markus. He will help you. The last bus for the border leaves at midnight.{*3}You absolutely have to be on it.{*4}You'll be safer on the other side. {*5}It's not much,{*6}but it's a start.{*7}My brother lives in Ontario, I've given you his address…{*8}He'll be able to hide you until things calm down. {*9}You're a very brave little girl, Alice.{*10}You deserve to be happy. {*11}Let me know when you make it over there, all right?{*12}And be careful.{*13}Take care of them.

X0201A_CAR_GOODBYE_PC_X02ALUTHER_LETSGO.text: !AC8! {S}{*1}Come on, girls.{*2}We better not hang around.{*3}We have a bus to catch.

X0201A_CAR_GOODBYE_PC_X02AKARA_LETSGOK.text: !AC9! {S}{*1}Let's go, Alice.{*2}We have a bus to catch.

X0201A_CAR_RADIO_PC_X02ARADIO_NEWS.text: !ACA! {S}{*1}... The whole country is in a state of shock after the confrontation in Detroit yesterday between law enforcement and a group of androids.{*2}As a result, the federal government has declared a curfew and is taking steps to eliminate the threat of any further android incidents.{*3}We want to remind our listeners that all androids must be reported to the authorities for collection and destruction. {B}Above all, don't try to destroy your android yourself. {B}They can be highly dangerous, as recent events have demonstrated…

X0403K_NEIGHBOURHOOD_COFFEE_PC_X04KKARA_.text: !ACE! {S}{*TC:0|1840}We can sit down and have a hot chocolate here…

X0201A_INSIDE_INTRO_FA_X02AKARA_WARMPLAC.text: !ACF! {S}{*1}We've got to find a warm place for Alice.

X0201A_INSIDE_INTRO_PC_X02AALICE_HOWYOUF.text: !ACH! {S}{*1}I'm hot and cold at the same time…

X0201A_INSIDE_INTRO_PC_X02AKARA_HURRY.text: !ACJ! {S}{*1}Stay with her.{*2}I'll try to find this Markus. {*3}We'll leave as soon as we have passports…

X0201A_INSIDE_INTRO_PC_X02ALUTHER_HURRY.text: !ACK! {S}{*1}The last bus is in two hours.{*2}And the terminal's on the other side of town, we haven't got much time. {*3}Kara…{*4}There's something I have to tell you…{*5}It's about Alice…

X0201A_INSIDE_INTRO_PC_X02AKARA_HURRYK.text: !ACL! {S}{*1}I'll try to find this Markus.{*2}The last bus leaves in two hours and it's on the other side of town.{*3}We'll go as soon as we have passports.{*4}Will you be ok?

X0201A_INSIDE_INTRO_PC_X02AKARA_HURRYEND.text: !ACM! {S}{*1}We'll have lots of time to talk on the bus…{*2}I'll be back.{*3}Stay with Alice.

X0205A_CONNOR_INTRO_PC_X02ASIMON_PANICK0.text: !ACU! {S}{*1}They’re coming from everywhere! Our people are trapped in the lower deck. They’re gonna be slaughtered!

X0205A_CONNOR_INTRO_PC_X02AMARLA_BLOWUP.text: !ACZ! {S}{*1}We have to blow up Jericho, it's our only chance! {*2}What, Connor, no. You- {*3}Okay...

X0205A_CONNOR_INTRO_PC_X02AJOSH_PANICK02.text: !AD0! {S}{*1}They’re coming from everywhere! Our people are trapped in the lower deck. They’re gonna be slaughtered!

X0205A_CONNOR_INTRO_PC_X02ASIMON_SOLDIER.text: !AD2! {S}{*1}We'll never make it down there, there are soldiers everywhere!

X0205A_CONNOR_INTRO_PC_X02AJOSH_SOLDIERS.text: !AD5! {S}{*1}There are soldiers everywhere, you'll never make it down there!

X0205A_CONNOR_INTRO_PC_X02AMARLA_PANICKC.text: !AD9! {S}{*1}There are explosives in the hold… If the ship goes down, the humans will have to evacuate. Our people can escape.

X0205A_CONNOR_INTRO_PC_X02ACONNOR_BLOWUP.text: !ADA! {S}{*1}I'll go. {*2}See if you can help the others.{B}I'm gonna find the detonator.{*3}Don't worry...{*4}I always accomplish my mission.

X0203A_BRIDGE_TALK_PC_X02AJOSH_DISASTER0.text: !ADH! {S}{*1}We're short on blue blood and biocomponents. Our wounded are shutting down and there's nothing we can do!

X0203A_BRIDGE_TALK_PC_X02AMARKUS_01SOMBE.text: !ADJ! {S}{*1}The only thing we asked for was freedom.{*2}They didn’t even want to hear that!{*3}So now they punish us for who we are.

X0203A_BRIDGE_TALK_PC_X02AMARKUS_01AGGRE.text: !ADN! {S}{*1}What are we supposed to do? Live like cowards just to survive?{*2}We just wanna be free.{*3}That's a crime?

X0203A_BRIDGE_TALK_PC_X02AMARKUS_01DETER.text: !ADR! {S}{*1}All we did was show them who we really are…{*2}I don’t want war,{*3}but I'd rather die free than live as a slave.

X0203A_BRIDGE_TALK_PC_X02AMARKUS_01RIGHT.text: !ADV! {S}{*1}We couldn't just suffer in silence, they're killing us!{*2}Nothing is gonna justify that.

X0203A_BRIDGE_TALK_PC_X02AJOSH_02VIOLENT.text: !AE1! {S}{*1}It was a peaceful march, and you chose to attack.{B}Now hundreds of humans and androids are dead! You reap what you sow!

X0203A_BRIDGE_TALK_PC_X02AJOSH_02AGGRESS.text: !AE5! {S}{*1}Your television speech sounded like a declaration of war.{*2}Violence only leads to more violence. You reap what you sow!

X0203A_BRIDGE_TALK_PC_X02AJOSH_02SHOTPOL.text: !AE9! {S}{*1}You are responsible for the death of those two policemen, Markus.{*2}Violence begets violence!

X0203A_BRIDGE_TALK_PC_X02AJOSH_02THOUSAN.text: !AED! {S}{*1}Thousands of our people are about to be destroyed because you decided to fight humans.{*2}What's the point of being free {*3}if no one is left alive?

X0203A_BRIDGE_TALK_PC_X02AMARKUS_03ANGRY.text: !AEF! {S}{*1}You keep complaining.{*2}What have you done exactly, Josh?{*3}At least I fought for us!{*4}At least if I die, I die free!

X0203A_BRIDGE_TALK_PC_X02AMARKUS_03BITTE.text: !AEJ! {S}{*1}You saw what they did to us back there!{*2}It doesn’t matter what we do.{*3}We either fight for our freedom, or we die in silence.

X0203A_BRIDGE_TALK_PC_X02AMARKUS_03REMOR.text: !AEN! {S}{*1}Yeah, maybe I made some mistakes.{*2}Maybe my judgement was clouded by... {*3}Anger.{*4}But everything that I did {*5}was for our people…

X0203A_BRIDGE_TALK_PC_X02AMARKUS_03NOREG.text: !AER! {S}{*1}Humans enslaved us! I’ll never regret standing up to that.

X0203A_BRIDGE_TALK_PC_X02ASIMON_04CULPRI.text: !AEW! {S}{*1}We shouldn’t forget who our enemies are.{*2}We can’t fight amongst ourselves.

X0203A_BRIDGE_TALK_PC_X02AMARKUS_05CONFR.text: !AEZ! {S}{*1}We have to face them.{*2}There's no other choice. {*3}Get all the guns that you can find.{*4}We're going to free Detroit.

X0203A_BRIDGE_TALK_PC_X02AMARKUS_05DIALO.text: !AF3! {S}{*1}Dialogue.{*2}It is the only way...{*3}I will go alone,{*4}try to talk to them one last time.

X0203A_BRIDGE_TALK_PC_X02AMARKUS_05STAYH.text: !AF7! {S}{*1}We are going to dig in here.{*2}We'll lay low and when the time comes, we'll resume the fight.{*3}As long as we're alive, we do have a chance to change things.

X0203A_BRIDGE_TALK_PC_X02AMARLA_05STAYHI.text: !AFA! {S}{*1}We can’t hide in Jericho forever!{*2}We need to stop the slaughter now, otherwise we're next!

X0203A_BRIDGE_TALK_PC_X02AMARLA_06MARKUS.text: !AFE! {S}{*1}Look what you’ve brought us to…{*2}You talk about freedom but you kept failing us.{*3}You can no longer lead the revolution.{*4}You’re not the one we’ve been waiting for.{*5}I’m gonna take over and save what can still be saved.

X0203A_BRIDGE_TALK_PC_X02ASIMON_DISASTER.text: !AFG! {S}{*1}President Warren is saying we’re a threat to national security and we need to be exterminated.

X0203A_BRIDGE_TALK_PC_X02AMARLA_DISASTER.text: !AFQ! {S}{*1}Humans are conducting raids in all the big cities  and they're taking androids to camps to destroy them!

X0203A_BRIDGE_TALK_PC_X02AJOSH_DISASTER0.text: !AFT! {S}{*1}It's all our fault...{*2}None of this would have happened if we'd just stayed quiet!

X0203A_BRIDGE_TALK_PC_X02AMARLA_04CULPRI.text: !AFY! {S}{*1}He’s right.{*2}All that matters now is what we do next. {*3}Markus?

X0203A_BRIDGE_TALK_PC_X02AJOSH_05CONFRON.text: !AG7! {S}{*1}You’re making a mistake, Markus. You won’t buy our freedom with blood!

X0203A_BRIDGE_TALK_PC_X02AJOSH_05DIALOGU.text: !AGE! {S}{*TC:1496|3518}They need to realize how much they’re hurting us…{*TC:4740|5835}Find the right words {*TC:5941|6741}and they’ll listen.
