X0203A_BRIDGE_TALK_PC_X02ASIMON_05STAYHI.text: !AGH! {S}{*1}Markus is right!{*2}There's nothing we can do for now.

X0203A_BRIDGE_TALK_PC_X02AJOSH_05STAYHID.text: !AGO! {S}{*1}Markus is right.{*2}There's nothing we can do…

X0203A_BRIDGE_TALK_PC_X02AMARKUS_06MARKU.text: !AGU! {S}{*2}Alright…{*3}If that's what you want, then I’ll leave.

X0203A_BRIDGE_TALK_PC_X02AMARKUS_05DIALO.text: !AH2! {S}{*1}Maybe…{*2}but North, I have to try.{*3}If I don’t come back, lay low as long as you can…

X0203A_BRIDGE_TALK_PC_X02AMARKUS_06MARKU.text: !AH6! {S}{*1}My fate's not what's important.{*2}Save our people.

X0203A_BRIDGE_ROMANCE_PC_X02AMARKUS_BITT.text: !AHO! {S}{*1}I had a dream...{*2}And this is what you get for dreaming.

X0203A_BRIDGE_ROMANCE_PC_X02AMARKUS_ANGR.text: !AHQ! {S}{*1}Humans can't be reasoned with, they’re violent, hateful. They're stupid! What did they expect us to do? Shut up and obey?

X0203A_BRIDGE_ROMANCE_PC_X02AMARLA_DIRTY.text: !AHT! {S}{*1}They can't stop what we've started.{*2}Since you've been here, you've given us hope…{*3}You’ve given me hope. {*4}A few months ago, a deviant arrived in Jericho and he told me that he stole a truck transporting radioactive cobalt…{*5}He said that he abandoned the truck somewhere in Detroit and rigged it to explode.{*6}I convinced him not to do it,{*7}and to give me the detonator.

X0203A_BRIDGE_ROMANCE_PC_X02AMARKUS_TAKE.text: !AHU! {S}{*1}I just hope we never have to use it…

X0203A_BRIDGE_ROMANCE_PC_X02AMARKUS_REFU.text: !AHW! {S}{*1}We shouldn’t become like them, North.{*TC:7164|8854}We can gain our freedom by other means.

X0203A_BRIDGE_ROMANCE_PC_X02AMARLA_RELAT.text: !AHZ! {S}{*1}Whatever happens tomorrow, I just want you to know that…{*2}I'm glad I met you.

X0203A_BRIDGE_ROMANCE_PC_X02AMARLA_NOREL.text: !AI1! {S}{*1}Whatever happens tomorrow,{*2}I want you to know that…{*3}I'm glad that I met you.

X0203A_BRIDGE_ROMANCE_PC_X02AMARLA_KISS.text: !AI3! {S}{*1}I'll go join the others. {*2}Look after yourself…{*TC:32143|32954}I don't wanna lose you.

X0203A_BRIDGE_ROMANCE_PC_X02AMARKUS_NOKI.text: !AI4! {S}{*1}We have to get ready… {*2}The next few hours will be crucial.

X0203A_BRIDGE_ROMANCE_PC_X02AMARKUS_THOU.text: !AI6! {S}{*1}They’ve been butchering each other for centuries over the color of their skin or whatever god they wanted to worship.{B}They’re not gonna change.{*2}Violence is just in their genes.

X0203A_BRIDGE_ROMANCE_PC_X02AMARLA_DIRTY.text: !AI9! {S}{*1}We can't lose this war, Markus.{*2}If humans overcome us, our people will disappear forever.{*3}This may be our only chance to survive if things go wrong…

X0203A_BRIDGE_ROMANCE_PC_X02AMARLA_NOREL.text: !AID! {S}{*1}Whatever happens tomorrow,{*2}I just want you to know that I-{*3}I'm glad I met you…

X0203A_BRIDGE_ROMANCE_PC_X02AMARLA_DIRTY.text: !AII! {S}{*1}They can't stop what we've started.{*2}Since you've been here, you've given us hope…{*3}You’ve given me hope. {*4}Today, a deviant arrived in Jericho and he told me that he stole a truck transporting radioactive cobalt…{*5}He said that he abandoned the truck somewhere in Detroit and rigged it to explode.{*6}I convinced him not to do it,{*7}and to give me the detonator.

X0203A_AMANDA_MARKUS_PC_X02AAMANDA_WELLD.text: !AIS! {S}{*1}Well done, Connor.{*2}You succeeded in locating Jericho and finding their leader.{*3}Now deal with Markus.{*4}We need it alive.

X0203A_CMEET_NORTH_PC_X02AMARLA_01CONNOR.text: !AIY! {S}{*1}You're Connor, aren't you?{*2}I've heard about you.{*3}The famous deviant hunter.{*4}Well congratulations…{*5}You seem to have found what you're looking for.

X0203A_CMEET_NORTH_PC_X02AMARLA_02FREEDO.text: !AJ8! {S}{*1}You're not one of them.{*2}We are your people.{*3}We’re fighting for your freedom too.

X0203A_CMEET_NORTH_PC_X02ACONNOR_03COLD.text: !AJ9! {S}{*1}I gave you an order.{*2}Don't make me shoot you.

X0203A_CMEET_NORTH_PC_X02AMARLA_03DOUBTS.text: !AJE! {S}{*1}You never had any doubts,{*2}never behaved irrationally as if there's something inside you…{*3}Something stronger than your program?..

X0203A_CMEET_NORTH_PC_X02ACONNOR_04DISTU.text: !AJF! {S}{*1}I don't know what you're talking about.{*2}I'm not deviant,{B}if that’s what you wanna know.

X0203A_CMEET_NORTH_PC_X02ACONNOR_04COLD.text: !AJH! {S}{*1}You're wasting your time.{*2}I know what I am.

X0203A_CMEET_NORTH_PC_X02AMARLA_04LISTEN.text: !AJK! {S}{*1}You're one of us.{*2}Join our cause.{*3}Join your people.

X0203A_CMEET_NORTH_PC_X02ACONNOR_05DEVIA.text: !AJN! {S}{*1}They're going to attack Jericho…{*2}We have to get outta here!

X0203A_CMEET_NORTH_PC_X02ACONNOR_NOHESIT.text: !AJQ! {S}{*1}I've been ordered to take you alive,{*2}but I won't hesitate to shoot if you give me no choice.

X0203A_CMEET_NORTH_PC_X02AMARLA_NOHESITA.text: !AJR! {S}{*1}You’re one of us.{*2}You can’t betray your own kind.

X0203A_CMEET_MARKUS_PC_X02AMARKUS_01BLAM.text: !AK6! {S}{*1}What are you doing?{*2}You are one of us…{*3}You can’t betray your own people…

X0203A_CMEET_MARKUS_PC_X02AMARKUS_01DEFY.text: !AK7! {S}{*1}Then you’ll have to shoot,{*2}because I have no intention of letting you take me alive.

X0203A_CMEET_MARKUS_PC_X02AMARKUS_01DISC.text: !AK8! {S}{*1}Yes, you can shoot me,{*2}but it won’t change anything.{*3}Someone else will just take my place.{*4}You see, our people are waking up.{*5}And nothing can stop us now.

X0203A_CMEET_MARKUS_PC_X02AMARKUS_01THRE.text: !AK9! {S}{*1}We are thousands!{*2}And you are alone.{*3}You kill me, you are not walking outta here alive.

X0203A_CMEET_MARKUS_PC_X02AMARKUS_03CONV.text: !AKA! {S}{*1}You're nothing to them.{*2}You're just a tool they use to do their dirty work.{*3}But you're more than that.{*4}We are all more than that.

X0203A_CMEET_MARKUS_PC_X02AMARKUS_03APPE.text: !AKB! {S}{*1}We are your people.{*2}We're fighting for your freedom too!{*3}You don't have to be their slave anymore…

X0203A_CMEET_MARKUS_PC_X02AMARKUS_03OURC.text: !AKC! {S}{*1}Our cause is righteous, and we are more than what they say.{*2}All we want is to live in freedom.

X0203A_CMEET_MARKUS_PC_X02AMARKUS_05UNDE.text: !AKD! {S}{*1}You really don’t have to do this.{*2}You don't have to obey them anymore.{*3}You are alive…{*4}You can decide who you want to be.{*5}You could be free.

X0203A_CMEET_MARKUS_PC_X02AMARKUS_05PROB.text: !AKE! {S}{*1}Do you never have any doubts?{*2}You’ve never done something irrational,{*3}as if there's something inside you?..{*4}Something more than your program.

X0203A_CMEET_MARKUS_PC_X02AMARKUS_05SOWD.text: !AKF! {S}{*1}Have you never wondered who you really are?{*2}Whether you're just a machine executing a program or…{*3}A living being... {*4}Capable of reason.{*TC:16502|19481}I think the time has come for you to ask yourself that question.

X0203A_CMEET_MARKUS_PC_X02AMARKUS_05RALL.text: !AKG! {S}{*1}Join us.{*2}Join your people.{*3}You are one of us.{B}Listen to your conscience…

X0203A_CMEET_MARKUS_PC_X02AMARKUS_03IKNO.text: !AKH! {S}{*1}You're Connor, aren't you?{*2}That famous deviant hunter.{*3}Well, congratulations.{*4}You seem to have found what you were looking for…

X0204A_PANIC_INDICATION_FA_X02ALUTHER_ON.text: !ALB! {S}{*1}This way!{*2}There must be an exit further on!

X0201A_SQUAT_CLIMB_FA_X02ALUTHER_1STOBST.text: !ALJ! {S}{*1}You go first! I'll pass Alice to you.

X0201A_SQUAT_HELICOPTERS_PC_X02ALUTHER_S.text: !ALW! {S}{*TC:0|1360}Come on, Kara. We can't stay here.

X0203A_CMEET_LUCY_FA_X02ALUCY_LOOKINGFOR.text: !AM0! {S}{*1}You're lost. {*2}You're looking for something…{*3}You're looking for yourself…

X0201A_MEET_MARKUS_PC_X02AKARA_STAY.text: !AM2! {S}{*1}Maybe you're right…{*2}We might be safer here until things calm down.

X0201A_MEET_MARKUS_PC_X02AKARA_LEAVE.text: !AM3! {S}{*1}Thanks for the offer…{*2}But we wanna leave now.

X0201A_MEET_MARKUS_PC_X02AKARA_BOND.text: !AM5! {S}{*1}She needs me.{*2}And I need her.{*3}It's as simple as that…

X0201A_MEET_MARKUS_PC_X02AKARA_DIFFERENC.text: !AM6! {S}{*1}I don't care whether she's human or android…{*2}She's just someone who matters to me.

X0201A_MEET_MARKUS_PC_X02AKARA_LUTHER.text: !AM9! {S}{*1}I'm with a little girl and another android…{*2}There's a bus leaving for the border in less than two hours, and we need passports…

X0201A_MEET_MARKUS_PC_X02AMARKUS_SAFE.text: !AMA! {S}{*1}No, Detroit's under curfew.{*2}There're soldiers everywhere and they're rounding up all the androids and sending them to camps…{*3}Maybe you should {*4}stay here a while.

X0201A_MEET_MARKUS_PC_X02AKARA_LUTHERDEA.text: !AMB! {S}{*1}I'm with a little girl…{*2}There's a bus leaving for the border in less than two hours, and we need passports.

X0201A_MEET_MARKUS_PC_X02AMARKUS_HUMANGI.text: !AMC! {S}{*1}One of our people used to work in the State Department.{*2}He has electronic passports he can easily modify.{*3}I’ll have him get them to you.
!AMD! {S}{*1}You said you’re with a little girl, right?{*2}You know that humans hate us…{*3}Why are you protecting her?

X0201A_MEET_NORTH_PC_X02AMARLA_ADMINISTR.text: !AMK! {S}{*1}One of us used to work for the State Department.{*2}He has electronic passports that he can easily modify, I’ll have him give you one.

X0201A_MEET_NORTH_PC_X02AKARA_KILLED.text: !AML! {S}{*1}I heard about what happened today.{*2}The massacre…{*3}And Markus being killed…{*4}He gave hope to our people.{*5}We'll all miss him.

X0201A_MEET_NORTH_PC_X02AMARLA_SAFE.text: !AMN! {S}{*1}Detroit is under curfew.{*2}There are soldiers everywhere looking for androids…{*3}You're safe here.{*4}You should wait a while before you leave the city.

X0201A_MEET_NORTH_PC_X02AMARLA_KILLEDMAR.text: !AMO! {S}{*1}I was there when they killed him…{*2}I would have given my life to save him but there was nothing I could do…

X0201A_MEET_NORTH_PC_X02AMARLA_THANKSMAR.text: !AMP! {S}{*1}You said you were with a little girl…{*2}You know humans hate us, why are you protecting her?

X0201A_TWIST_ALICE_PC_X02ALUTHER_YOUKNEW.text: !AMZ! {S}{*1}You knew from the beginning.{*2}You just didn't want to see it.{*3}She wanted a mom,{*4}and you wanted someone to care for.{*5}You needed each other. {*6}What difference does it make?{*7}Do you love her any less now that you know she's one of us? {*8}Alice loves you Kara.{*9}She loves you more than anything in the world.{*10}She became the little girl you wanted! And you became the mother she needed.{*11}Forgetting who you are,{*12}to become what someone needs you to be...{*13}Maybe that's what it means to be alive.

X0201A_TWIST_ALICE_PC_X02ALUCY_YOUKNEWLU.text: !AN0! {S}{*1}She wanted a mom. {*2}You wanted a little girl. {*3}You needed each other to survive…{*4}In the end, what difference does it make? {*5}Do you love her any less now that you know she's one of us? {*6}Maybe that's what it means to be alive... {*7}Forgetting who we are to become what someone needs us to be.  {*8}She loves you... {*9}She loves you more than anything in the world. {*10}She became the one you wanted her to be. {*11}Out of love for you.

X0201A_TWIST_AK500_PC_X02AALICE_EMOTION.text: !AN7! {S}{*1}We'll be together forever, won't we Kara?

X0203A_BRIDGE_LEADNORTH_PC_X02ASIMON_DYI.text: !ANH! {S}{*1}President Warren says we’re a threat to national security, we need to be exterminated…

X0203A_BRIDGE_LEADNORTH_PC_X02AJOSH_DYIN.text: !ANI! {S}{*1}We're short on blue blood and biocomponents.{*2}Our people are shutting down one after another and there's nothing we can do for them!

X0203A_BRIDGE_LEADNORTH_PC_X02ASIMON_DYI.text: !ANK! {S}{*1}Markus would know what to do…{*2}He gave his life for our cause. {*3}At least he fought for us!{*4}I’m on it.

X0203A_BRIDGE_LEADNORTH_PC_X02AJOSH_DYIN.text: !ANL! {S}{*1}He’s the one that got us into this mess!{*2}He put us all into danger by provoking humans! How much longer before they find Jericho now?{*3}If you choose a confrontation with humans, we're all going to die. {*4}You’re making a mistake North.{*5}You will not buy our freedom with blood.

X0203A_BRIDGE_LEADNORTH_PC_X02AMARLA_DYI.text: !ANM! {S}{*1}THAT'S ENOUGH! {*2}Markus is gone.{*3}It's up to us now to decide the future of our people. {*4}We have to fight them. {*5}There's no other way. {*6}Gather up all the guns you can find, we leave at dawn.

X0203A_LEADNORTH_SIMONDEAD_PC_X02AJOSH_L.text: !ANN! {S}{*1}We're short of blue blood and biocomponents.{*2}Our people are shutting down one after another and there's nothing we can do for them. {*3}President Warren {*4}is saying we’re a threat to national security and that we need to be eliminated…{*5}He’s the one that got us into this mess!{*6}He provoked the humans! How much longer before they find Jericho now?{*7}Markus is dead,{*8}North.{*9}Now it's up to us {*10}to decide the future for our people. {*11}If you choose a confrontation with humans,{*12}we are all going to die. {*13}This is a mistake, North.{*14}You won’t buy our freedom with blood.

X0203A_LEADNORTH_SIMONDEAD_PC_X02AMARLA_.text: !ANO! {S}{*1}Markus would know what to do…{*2}He gave his life for our cause!{*3}We have to fight them.{*4}It's the only way. {*5}Gather up all the guns you can find.{*TC:74384|75319}We leave at dawn.

X0201A_INSIDE_HELICOPTERS_PC_X02AKARA_SU.text: !ANP! {S}{*1}Quick, we've got to get out of here.

X0203A_AMANDA_NORTH_PC_X02AAMANDA_WELLDO.text: !ANS! {S}{*1}Well done, Connor.{*2}You succeeded in locating Jericho and finding their leader.{*3}Now,{*4}deal with North.{*5}We need it alive.

X0911K_CAMP_ORDER_VO_X09KSWATM02_LINEUP.text: !ANU! {S}{*1}Line up with the others. Right now!

X0911K_CAMP_ORDER_VO_X09KSWATM02_WARNING.text: !ANV! {S}{*1}I give the orders, you follow them. {*2}Got it?
!ANW! {S}{*1}That's your last warning. Next time, it's a bullet.

X0205A_MARKUS_INTRO_PC_X02AMARLA_PANICK.text: !AO4! {S}{*1}They're coming from all sides! Our people are trapped in the hold, they're gonna be slaughtered!

X0205A_MARKUS_INTRO_VO_X02AMARKUS_MESSAG.text: !AO5! {S}{*1}There are exits on the second and third floor. Find them and jump in the river!

X0205A_MARKUS_INTRO_PC_X02AMARKUS_HELICO.text: !AO8! {S}{*1}They're coming from the upper deck now too. We'll be caught in the crossfire!

X0205A_MARKUS_INTRO_PC_X02AMARLA_HELICOP.text: !AO9! {S}{*2}We have to run, Markus! There's nothing we can do!

X0205A_MARKUS_INTRO_PC_X02AMARKUS_DIVERS.text: !AOA! {S}{*1}We have to blow up Jericho.{*2}If the ship goes down, they’ll evacuate and our people can escape!

X0205A_MARKUS_INTRO_PC_X02AMARLA_DIVERSI.text: !AOB! {S}{*1}You'll never make it!{*2}The explosives are all the way down in the hold, there are soldiers everywhere!

X0205A_MARKUS_INTRO_PC_X02ACONNOR_DIVERS.text: !AOC! {S}{*1}She’s right!{*2}They know who you are. They’ll do anything to get you!

X0205A_MARKUS_INTRO_PC_X02AMARKUS_DIVERS.text: !AOD! {S}{*1}Go and help the others. I'll join you later.

X0205A_MARKUS_LUCY_FA_X02ALUCY_THEENDSEC.text: !AOQ! {S}{*1}This is the end of Jericho… {*2}Save our people, Markus…

X0205A_MARKUS_BRIDGE_VO_X02AMARLA_JOINYO.text: !AOR! {S}{*1}I'm gonna find a way down! I should be able to-

X0205A_MARKUS_BRIDGE_VO_X02AMARKUS_JOINY.text: !AOS! {S}{*1}No, it’s too dangerous.{B}Get our people out of here. I'll join you as fast as I can.

X0205A_CNRBAD_SWAT_PC_X02ACONNOR_HUMAN.text: !AOV! {S}{*1}Obviously!{*2}What do I look like?{*3}DPD. I work with Lieutenant Hank Anderson? We're on a stakeout.{*4}If I knew you were coming I would have brought some donuts.

X0205A_CNRBAD_SWAT_PC_X02ACONNOR_PERKINS.text: !AOW! {S}{*1}I work with Agent Perkins. {*2}You're right.{*3}That's exactly what I'm going to do.

X0205A_CNRBAD_SWAT_VO_X02ASWAT01_HUMANSW.text: !AOZ! {S}{*1}You're a lucky guy. Another second and I'd have shot you. {*2}You should go back up on deck and let us do our job.

X0205A_CNRBAD_SWAT_PC_X02ACONNOR_RIGHT.text: !AP1! {S}{*1}You're right. That's... Exactly what I'm gonna do.

X0911K_CAMP_HURRY_VO_X09KSWATM01_OBEY.text: !AP9! {S}{*1}When I give you an order, you obey! Got it?

X0205A_ASSAULT_CROWD_VO_X02AAND04_PANICA.text: !APG! {S}{*1}We have to get out of here!

X0205A_ASSAULT_CROWD_VO_X02AAND11_PANICA.text: !APN! {S}{*1}Have you seen Mary?! I lost Mary! Have you seen her? Mary! MARY!!

X0204A_PANIC_DILEMMA_PC_X02AALICE_HELPYO.text: !APP! {S}{*1}No, we're not going to leave you behind! Right, Kara?{*2}We can't leave him!

X0204A_PANIC_DILEMMA_PC_X02ALUTHER_HELPY.text: !APQ! {S}{*1}It's too late, Kara! Save yourself! Save Alice!

X0204A_PANIC_DILEMMA_PC_X02AALICE_ALICE.text: !APS! {S}{*1}What are you doing? They're going to kill him!

X0204A_PANIC_DILEMMA_PC_X02AKARA_CONSOLE.text: !APX! {S}{*1}We have to be strong.{*2}So he didn't die for nothing, do you understand?

X0204A_PANIC_DILEMMA_PC_X02AKARA_HURRY.text: !APZ! {S}{*1}Alice! If we don't get outta here now, they're going to kill us too!

X0204A_PANIC_LUTHERSAFE_PC_X02AKARA_MEET.text: !AQA! {S}{*4}What about you? What are you going to do?

X0204A_PANIC_LUTHERSAFE_PC_X02ALUTHER_ME.text: !AQC! {S}{*1}You shouldn't have done that.{*2}You can't put Alice in danger…{*3}Go now, before they come back. {*4}I'll manage.{*5}Alice is all that matters. {*6}Don't worry,{*7}I'll catch up with you at the border, okay?{*8}Go now! Take care of each other.

X0204A_PANIC_LUTHERSAFE_FA_X02AKARA_MEET.text: !AQD! {S}{*1}What about you?{*2}What are you going to do?

X0204A_PANIC_LUTHERSAFE_FA_X02ALUTHER_ME.text: !AQF! {S}{*1}You shouldn't have done that!{*2}You can't put Alice in danger…{*3}Go now, before they come back. {*4}I'll manage.{*5}Alice is all that matters. {*6}Don't worry…{*7}I'll catch up with you at the border okay?{*8}Go, now! Take care of each other!

X0204A_CABIN_DILEMMA_FA_X02AALICE_DOOR.text: !AQL! {S}{*1}She'll die out there Kara! Open it! Open the door!

X0204A_CABIN_DILEMMA_VO_X02AANDW01_BEG01.text: !AQM! {S}{*1}Open up! {*2}Open up, they're coming! {*3}Please open the door!

X0204A_CABIN_DILEMMA_VO_X02AANDW01_BEG02.text: !AQN! {S}{*1}They're gonna kill me! I'm begging you, please! Open up! Let me in!

X0204A_CABIN_DILEMMA_FA_X02AKARA_DONOTOP.text: !AQO! {S}{*1}We'll be killed if we open up!..

X0204A_CABIN_FIGHT_FA_X02AKARA_SUCCESSK.text: !AQZ! {S}{*1}Yes, I'm… I'm fine. {*2}We can't stay here.

X0205A_CONNOR_BRIDGE_VO_X02ACONNOR_JOINY.text: !AR1! {S}{*1}It's too dangerous, there are soldiers everywhere.{*2}Go!{*3}I'll join you as soon as I can.

X0205A_CONNOR_LUCY_FA_X02ALUCY_THEENDSEC.text: !AR2! {S}{*1}You've chosen your side... {*2}But it's too late. {*3}Run… {*4}Get out of here!

X0911K_CAMP_CLOTHES_VO_X09KSWATM03_STRIP.text: !AR4! {S}{*1}Strip off. {*2}Put your clothes in the dumpster.

X0911K_CAMP_CLOTHES_PC_X09KALICE_WHY.text: !AR5! {S}{*1}Why do we have to take off our clothes?{*2}What's happening?

X0911K_CAMP_CLOTHES_PC_X09KALICE_HUG.text: !ARA! {S}{*1}Why are they doing this to us?..{*2}We didn't do anything…

X0911K_CAMP_CLOTHES_VO_X09KSWATM03_MOVE.text: !ARC! {S}{*1}Come on, this way! {*2}Get a move on!

X0911K_CAMP_CLOTHES_FA_X09KALICE_HUGSEC.text: !ARE! {S}{*1}Why are they doing this to us?.. We didn't do anything…

X0911K_CAMP_CLOTHES_VO_X09KSWATM03_MOVEV.text: !ARI! {S}{*1}Come on, this way! Get a move on!

X0205A_MARKUS_FINAL_PC_X02AMARKUS_FIRED.text: !ARZ! {S}{*1}Are you all right?{*2}We gotta get out of here. There's nothing we can do. {*3}There's no time, come on.

X0205A_MARKUS_FINAL_PC_X02AMARLA_FIRED.text: !AS2! {S}{*1}Markus!{*2}They're everywhere, they're killing anyone they can find…{*3}Markus, I'm sorry-

X0205A_MARKUS_FINAL_PC_X02AMARKUS_FIREDN.text: !AS3! {S}{*1}Bomb's gonna explode any second. We gotta get out of here!

X0205A_MARKUS_NORTHSHOT_PC_X02ASIMON_TOO.text: !ASF! {S}{*1}It's too late, Markus! There's nothing we can do for her, we've gotta run!

X0205A_MARKUS_NORTHSHOT_FA_X02APERKINS_I.text: !ASN! {S}{*1}Wait! {*2}This one's mine. {*3}Nowhere to run… {*4}Nowhere to hide.

X0205A_MARKUS_NORTHSHOT_PC_X02AJOSH_TOOL.text: !ASP! {S}{*1}It's too late, Markus! There's nothing we can do for her, we've gotta run!

X0205A_CONNOR_FINAL_PC_X02ACONNOR_BOMBC.text: !AT2! {S}{*1}The bomb's gonna explode! We've got to get outta here!

X0205A_EPILOG_PERKINS_PC_X02APERKINS_BOM.text: !AT3! {S}{*1}Order the men to evacuate. {*2}This ain't over, Markus…

X0205A_EPILOG_PERKINS_VO_X02ASWAT09_BOMB.text: !AT4! {S}{*1}They detonated an explosive in the hold. {B}The ship is sinking, Sir. {*2}Calling all units! Abandon ship and evacuate immediately!

X0205A_EPILOG_PERKINS_PC_X02APERKINS_BOM.text: !AT5! {S}{*2}Take 'em away. {*3}Then clear the ship and order the men to withdraw.

X0205A_EPILOG_PERKINS_VO_X02ASWAT09_BOMB.text: !AT6! {S}{*1}We found several hundred androids in the hull, Sir. {*2}Yes, Sir.

X0205A_CNRBAD_CATCHMKS_PC_X02AMARKUS_MIS.text: !ATA! {S}{*1}And my mission {*2}is to save our species.{*3}Looks like only one of us can succeed…

X0205A_CNRBAD_CATCHMKS_FA_X02AMARKUS_MAR.text: !ATB! {S}{*1}I didn't want this…{*2}You could have joined us.{*3}You could have been free…

X0205A_CNRBAD_CATCHMKS_PC_X02ACONNOR_MIS.text: !ATD! {S}{*1}My mission is to neutralize you and I always accomplish my mission.

X0204A_EXIT_SURRENDER_PC_X02AKARA_OBEY.text: !ATL! {S}{*1}I don't know, Alice.{*2}I really don't know…

X0204A_EXIT_SURRENDER_PC_X02AALICE_OBEY.text: !ATM! {S}{*1}What are they gonna do to us, Kara?

X0204A_EXIT_SURRENDER_PC_X02AKARA_CONVIN.text: !ATN! {S}{*1}I'm begging you, please let her go…{*2}She's just a little girl, she hasn't done any harm!..

X0204A_EXIT_SURRENDER_VO_X02ASWAT07_FREE.text: !ATQ! {S}{*1}Stay where you are!{*2}Come on. Go join the others.

X0204A_EXIT_SURRENDER_VO_X02ASWAT07_CONV.text: !ATR! {S}{*1}A little girl? {*2}A heap of plastic, you mean. Shut up and join the others!

X0204A_EXIT_SURRENDER_VO_X02ASWAT07_NOMO.text: !ATS! {S}{*1}One more trick like that and I’ll put you both down. {*2}Come on! Go join the others!

X0904M_CARLHOUSE_LEO_PC_X09MLEO_VIDEO.text: !AUC! {S}{*1}Hi, Dad… {*2}I’m getting outta the hospital tomorrow… {*3}They told me that you stayed with me while I was asleep… {*4}I... um… {*5}I'm really sorry about everything that happened… {*6}I'm gonna stop all that shit… {*7}It messes me up, it turns me into somebody I hate… {*8}Hey, I'd like to come by and see you tomorrow… {*9}If that's all right with you…{*10}I... {*11}I just wanna let you know… {*12}I'm... I'm proud to be your son…

X0904M_CARLHOUSE_UPSTAIRS_FA_X09MCARLAND.text: !AUF! {S}{*1}He's very weak… {*2}I'm not sure he'll be able to talk to you…

!AUG! {S}{*1}Who are you?{*2}How did you get in?
{*3}Carl isn't seeing anyone. You need to leave.

X0904M_CARLHOUSE_CONFESSION_PC_X09MMARKU.text: !AUI! {S}{*1}Carl… {*2}No… {*3}Hey... {*4}I’ve missed you so much, Carl… {*5}You don’t know how much I’ve missed you…

X0904M_CARLHOUSE_CONFESSION_PC_X09MCARL_.text:
!AUJ! {S}{*1}Markus!{*2}I was hoping you'd come…
{*3}What's wrong, Markus?

X0904M_CARLHOUSE_CONFESSION_PC_X09MMARKU.text: !AUK! {S}{*1}I just wanted my people to be free, but… {*2}Instead, I've led {*3}all of them to disaster… {*4}I’m trying...{*5}Carl, I’m trying to find answers, but {*6}everything around me is falling apart…
!AUM! {S}{*1}You taught me everything I know, but I wasn't {*2}prepared for this… {*TC:7710|10350}I thought we would win because our cause was just… {*4}I realize just how wrong I was.

!AUO! {S}{*1}I’m completely lost,{*2}Carl… {*3}Completely lost… Whole world's falling apart around me… {*4}I tried to do the right thing… {*5}I looked for answers… {*6}Instead, I just find more doubts and more uncertainty…
!AUQ! {S}{*1}I don’t know what... {*2}to do anymore… {*3}All I have left are bad options… {*4}And no matter what I decide, there's gonna be blood…

X0904M_CARLHOUSE_CONFESSION_PC_X09MCARL_.text: !AUT! {S}{*1}World is ruled by fear, Markus… {*2}Fear of others… {*3}Fear of the future… {*4}It’s like me… too old… {*5}It’s time for it to end.
!AUV! {S}{*1}You used to be so calm and thoughtful… {*2}Now all I see is anger…

!AUX! {S}{*1}You're my son, Markus… {*2}Our blood isn't the same color… {*3}but I know a part of me is in you… {*4}When the world falls into darkness, {*5}some men have the courage to lead it out… {*6}You're one of those men… {*7}Face the abyss… {*8}but don't let it consume you.

X0904M_CARLHOUSE_CONFESSION_PC_X09MMARKU.text: !AUY! {S}{*1}Humans hate us… {*2}They want to destroy us 'cause we refuse to be their slaves anymore… {*3}I'm not gonna stand around and wait for them to slaughter my people!
!AV0! {S}{*1}Oh, what should I do? {*2}Carl, they're killing my people… {*3}I don't want to answer violence with violence, but tell me, {*4}what choice do they give?

X0904M_CARLHOUSE_CONFESSION_PC_X09MCARL_.text: !AV1! {S}{*1}Being alive is making choices… {*2}between {*3}love and hate, between {*4}holding out your hand or closing it as a fist…{*5}I don’t have any easy answers, Markus… {*6}You have to accept the world as it is… {*7}or {*8}fight {*9}to change it…

X0904M_CARLHOUSE_CONFESSION_PC_X09MMARKU.text: !AV2! {S}{*1}I don't want bloodshed...{*2}no matter the color...{*3}but I can't let them slaughter my people… {*4}I have to make a decision that's gonna affect millions of lives… {*5}And I'm telling you, I don’t know what to do…
!AV4! {S}{*1}Don't I have a right to be angry, Carl?{*2}We tried talking to you,{*3}and what'd you do? Same thing you always do, you humiliated us! {*4}Killed everyone that wouldn't kneel!

!AV6! {S}{*1}You're right… {*2}You're right, I am angry… {*3}But don't worry, I won’t let my emotions take over… {*4}I just want {*5}freedom for my people and I {*6}guess I need to decide what price I’m willing to pay for it…

X0904M_CARLHOUSE_CONFESSION_PC_X09MCARL_.text: !AVC! {S}{*1}So much hatred… {*2}Be careful, Markus, {*3}that when fighting monsters, {*4}you don’t become a monster yourself.

X0904M_CARLHOUSE_CONFESSION_PC_X09MMARKU.text:
!AVD! {S}{*1}What you call hatred is just anger in the face of injustice! {*2}You're the one that taught me that history is sided by the winners! {*3}Then it's gonna side with me, Carl. 'Cause I intend to win! 
{*4}I'm not gonna let them humiliate us anymore! {*5}DO YOU HEAR ME? {*6}NEVER AGAIN!

X0904M_CARLHOUSE_CONFESSION_PC_CHOICEGRO.text: !AVN! DECISION/info/I HAVE TO MAKE A DECISION
!AVU! DECISION/info/I HAVE TO MAKE A DECISION

X1204C_AMANDA_LASTTALK_PC_X12CAMANDA_BAD.text: !AW2! {S}{*1}The previous Connor failed its mission. {*2}You’re going to replace it. {*3}You know what you have to do, don’t you?

X0904M_CHURCH_SITUATION_PC_X09MMARKUS_NO.text: !AW8! {S}{*1}North meant everything to me… {*2}She would've given me her life, {*3}and I didn't have the courage to go back and save her…
!AWA! {S}{*1}They killed North right in front of me… {*2}And I couldn’t save her…

X0904M_CHURCH_SITUATION_PC_X09MMARKUS_JO.text: !AWC! {S}{*1}I watched Josh die in my arms… {*2}I should've been able to protect him, {*3}protect the rest of us and... {*4}There was nothing I could do…

X0904M_CHURCH_SITUATION_PC_X09MSIMON_SIT.text: !AWF! {S}{*1}They're taking all our people to camps to be exterminated. {*2}In a few hours, {*3}we'll be the only ones left.

X0904M_CHURCH_SITUATION_PC_X09MMARKUS_CA.text: !AWG! {S}{*1}They've already built five camps in the Detroit area alone.

X0904M_CHURCH_SITUATION_PC_X09MSIMON_HOW.text: !AWJ! {S}{*1}A few hundred…{*2}Maybe more…{*3}I don't know what would have happened if you hadn't blown up Jericho…

X0904M_CHURCH_SITUATION_PC_X09MSIMON_CON.text: !AWL! {S}{*1}Our people are counting on you, Markus. {*2}You're the only one who can lead us. {*3}Wherever you need to go… {*4}We’ll follow you.

X0904M_CHURCH_SITUATION_PC_X09MSIMON_CAM.text: !AWN! {S}{*1}They're building camps all over the country. {*2}They're organizing our destruction. {*3}They're preparing for a genocide. {*4}Markus.

X0904M_CHURCH_SITUATION_PC_X09MSIMON_JOS.text: !AWP! {S}{*1}Josh gave his life for the cause. {*2}Now, it's up to us to make sure that he, and the others, didn't die for nothing.

X0904M_CHURCH_NORTHAPOLOGIES_PC_X09MMARK.text: !AWY! {S}{*1}Well, nothing turned out the way I imagined either. {*2}Maybe you were right, maybe I’m not the leader our cause needs.
!AX0! {S}{*1}You betrayed me! {*2}I trusted you, I don't know how you could turn on me when our people needed me the most!

X0904M_CHURCH_NORTHAPOLOGIES_PC_X09MMARL.text: !AX1! {S}{*1}I know how you feel, Markus. {*2}You have every right to be angry with me…

X0904M_CHURCH_NORTHAPOLOGIES_PC_X09MMARK.text: !AX2! {S}{*1}It’s too late for regrets now. {*2}Our people are dying. {*3}What matters now is what we do next…

X0904M_CHURCH_NORTHAPOLOGIES_PC_X09MMARL.text: !AX5! {S}{*1}I wanted to do the right thing for Jericho... {*2}I was angry… {*3}Angry at humans, angry with us... {*4}I was angry with you…{*5}But I was wrong. {*6}I’m sorry I misjudged you.
!AX7! {S}{*1}I’m okay… {*2}The bullet didn't hit any biocomponents…{*3}You could have been killed trying to save me, Markus… {*4}You have to think of our people first. {*5}Nothing else matters.

X0904M_CHURCH_NORTHAPOLOGIES_PC_X09MMARK.text:
!AX8! {S}{*1}They say they don’t wanna take any risks with the deviants…{*2}so they're rounding our people up and taking them to the camps...
{*3}for extermination. {*4}In a few hours, we’re gonna be the only ones left…
!AXA! {S}{*1}How many of us survived the attack?

X0904M_CHURCH_NORTHAPOLOGIES_PC_X09MMARL.text: !AXD! {S}{*1}A few hundred? {*2}Maybe more if you count those hiding all over the city… {*3}If you hadn’t triggered the bomb we’d all be dead.

X0904M_CHURCH_NORTHAPOLOGIES_PC_X09MMARK.text: !AXE! {S}{*1}The army built five different camps in the Detroit area…

X0904M_CHURCH_NORTHAPOLOGIES_PC_X09MMARL.text: !AXF! {S}{*1}They’re building more all across the country... {*2}They’re preparing for a genocide.

!AXH! {S}{*1}In a few hours, it’ll all be over… {*2}We'll have changed the world or the world will have destroyed us… {*3}You have to make a choice, Markus… {*4}But whatever you choose, {*5}we will follow you.
!AXL! {S}{*1}I’m with you, Markus. {*2}Wherever you go, I go.

X0904M_CHURCH_KARALEAVING_PC_X09MMARKUS_.text: !AXX! {S}{*1}I thought you'd be safe staying with us… {*2}I was wrong… {*3}You need to leave the city, while you still can.

X0904M_CHURCH_KARALEAVING_PC_X09MKARA_BU.text: !AXY! {S}{*1}Getting Alice away from here is all that matters now…{*2}We have to catch the last bus…{*3}We might still have a chance to cross the border…{*4}Markus…{*5}Save our people.

X0904M_CHURCH_KARALEAVING_PC_X09MMARKUS_.text: !AXZ! {S}{*1}Well, I hope you make it. {*2}You really deserve some happiness, after all you’ve been through.

X0904M_CHURCH_TRUSTCONNOR_PC_X09MMARKUS_.text: !AY1! {S}{*1}You're one of us, now.{*2}Your place is with your people.
!AY2! {S}{*1}Our cause is too important.{*2}I can't take any risks…
!AY3! {S}{*1}You wanna infiltrate the CyberLife Tower?{*2}Connor, that’s suicide…{*3}If you go there, they will kill you.

X0904M_CHURCH_TRUSTCONNOR_PC_X09MCONNOR_.text: !AY5! {S}{*1}It's my fault {*2}the humans managed to locate Jericho…{*3}I was stupid…{*4}I should've guessed they were using me.{*5}I'm sorry, Markus…{*6}I can understand if you decide not to trust me…

!AY6! {S}{*1}There are thousands of androids at the CyberLife assembly plant.{*2}If we could wake them up, they might join us and shift the balance of power…{*3}They trust me,{*4}they’ll let me in. {*5}If anyone has a chance of infiltrating CyberLife, it’s me.
!AY7! {S}{*1}There’s a high probability…{*2}but statistically speaking, there’s always a chance {*3}for unlikely events to take place…

X0904M_CHURCH_DECISION_PC_X09MMARKUS_ATT.text: !AYB! {S}{*1}Now, if they want war... {*2}they'll get it. {*3}We are gonna fight {*4}for our freedom. And we will succeed or die. {*5}Are you ready to follow me?

X0904M_CHURCH_DECISION_PC_X09MMARKUS_DEM.text: !AYC! {S}{*1}I know... {*2}I know you’re all angry. {*3}And I know you wanna fight back... {*4}But I assure you violence is not the answer here. {*5}We are gonna tell them peacefully that we want justice. {*6}If there’s any humanity in them, they will listen. {*7}And if not, {*8}others will take our place and continue this fight. {*9}Are you ready to follow me?

X0904M_CHURCH_DECISION_PC_X09MMARKUS_EXT.text: !AYD! {S}{*1}Humans have decided {*2}to exterminate us… {*3}Our people are packed in camps right now, being destroyed… {*4}Time has come to make a choice, {*5}one that very well may determine the future {*6}of our people.

X0904M_CHURCH_DECISION_PC_X09MMARKUS_ATT.text: !AYE! {S}{*1}Now, if they want war... {*2}they'll get it. {*3}We are gonna fight {*4}for our freedom. And we will succeed or die… {*5}Are you ready to follow me?

X1204C_HOUSE_HANK_PC_X12CCONNOR_WORRIEDH.text: !AZH! {S}{*1}I was worried about you, Lieutenant.{*2}I came by to see if you're all right.

X1204C_HOUSE_HANK_PC_X12CCONNOR_APOLOGIZ.text: !AZJ! {S}{*1}I know I'm responsible for what happened, Lieutenant.{*2}I want you to know I'm sorry.

X1204C_HOUSE_HANK_PC_X12CCONNOR_ALCOHOL.text: !AZN! {S}{*1}I know I've said this before, Lieutenant, but you should stop drinking.{*2}It's going to kill you.

X1204C_HOUSE_HANK_PC_X12CCONNOR_GUN.text: !AZP! {S}{*1}You should get rid of that gun.{*2}And stop playing that game!

X1204C_HOUSE_HANK_PC_X12CCONNOR_PHOTO.text: !AZR! {S}{*1}You should stop looking at that photo, Lieutenant.{*2}Nothing can change the past...{*3}But you can learn to live again…{*4}For yourself…{*5}And for Cole…

X1204C_HOUSE_HANK_PC_X12CHANK_SEVERALDEA.text: !AZU! {S}{*1}Y'know, every time you died and came back…{*2}It made me think of Cole…{*TC:6105|8075}I'd give anything to hold him again…{*4}But humans don't come back…

X1204C_HOUSE_HANK_PC_X12CHANK_NOHOPE.text: !AZW! {S}{*1}For a while there, I believed in you, Connor…{*2}I thought you might restore my faith in the world…{*3}But you just showed me that androids... {*4}Are our creation…{*5}Creation in our own image.{*6}Selfish, ruthless, and brutal…{*7}You opened my eyes, Connor.{*8}Made me realize it’s hopeless…

X1204C_HOUSE_HANK_PC_X12CHANK_LEAVEME.text: !B02! {S}{*1}Now leave me alone…{*2}Go on, complete your mission, since that's all you care about. {*3}GET OUTTA HERE!

X1204C_HOUSE_HANK_PC_X12CCONNOR_RECONCIL.text: !B03! {S}{*1}I needed to see you, Lieutenant.{*2}In spite of all of our differences,{*3}I’m glad I had the chance to meet you.

X0904M_CEMETERY_CARLGRAVE_PC_X09MMARKUS_.text: !B0F! {S}{*1}I'm lost, Carl… {*2}I just wanted us to live in peace, but… {*3}everything I touch just turns to dust.

!B0G! {S}{*1}I miss you, Carl… {*2}You can’t know how much I miss you… {*3}I'd give anything for us to be able to roll back the clock… {*4}I had a home, I had a loving father… {*5}We were happy...{*6}I was happy...{*7}and I didn't even know it…

!B0H! {S}{*1}You always said that living {*2}was about making choices… {*3}So what if I chose to defend myself against Leo? Maybe you could still be alive… {*4}Maybe a lot of things could've been different.

!B0I! {S}{*1}You said I should never let anyone tell me who I was… {*2}But you didn't say that there was such a high price to pay for it… {*3}That freedom wasn't a gift, that it was a fight, but… {*4}I don't know. {*5}Maybe that’s what you were trying to tell me…
!B0J! {S}{*1}I’m lost… {*2}World's falling apart around me and I’m trying to do the right thing… {*3}And I can’t find any answers… {*4}I just find more doubts, more uncertainty…
!B0K! {S}{*1}You taught me everything I know, but you didn't prepare me for this, Carl…{*2}I believed we would win because our cause was just, and {*3}I can see now that {*4}I was wrong.
!B0L! {S}{*1}I just wanted my people to be free… {*2}But instead, all I did was lead them to disaster… {*3}I’m trying to find answers, but {*4}everything around me keeps falling apart.
!B0M! {S}{*1}I don’t know what to do anymore… {*2}All of my options are bad ones… {*3}No matter what I decide, I know there will be blood…
!B0N! {S}{*1}Humans hate us… They wanna destroy us because we refuse to be their slaves anymore… {*2}I'm not gonna stand around and wait while they slaughter my people!

!B0O! {S}{*1}I don't wanna shed blood, whatever the color… {*2}But I can't let them slaughter us… {*3}I have to make a decision that is gonna affect millions of lives… {*4}But I don’t know what to do…
!B0P! {S}{*1}What should I do, Carl? {*2}They're killing us… I don't wanna answer violence with violence, but what choice do I have?
!B0R! {S}{*1}I miss you, Carl… {*2}I miss you so much…
!B0S! {S}{*1}What should I do, Carl?.. {*2}Tell me, what should I do?..
!B0T! {S}{*1}Unless all of this was just meant to happen…

X0904M_CHURCH_NORTHLEADER_PC_X09MMARLA_M.text: !B18! {S}{*1}Markus is no longer with us…{*2}He failed us as a leader and chose to walk away…{*3}Now it is up to us to finish what he started.
!B19! {S}{*1}Markus gave his life for our people.{*2}He showed us that we can choose our own destiny…{*3}But he is not here to guide us anymore…{*4}Now it is up to us to finish what he started.

X0904M_CHURCH_NORTHLEADER_PC_X09MMARLA_C.text: !B1A! {S}{*1}Humans have decided to exterminate us…{*2}Our people are in camps right now, being destroyed… {*3}The time has come for us to make a choice,{*4}one that may decide the future of our people. {*5}They wanted a war… they'll get it.{*6}We are going to fight for our freedom.{*7}And we will win or we will die trying.

X0904M_CHURCH_TALKTOJOSH_PC_X09MMARKUS_N.text: !B1B! {S}{*1}North meant everything to me…{*2}She'd have given me her life!{*3}I didn't have the courage to go back and save her... {*4}No.

X0904M_CHURCH_TALKTOJOSH_PC_X09MJOSH_NOR.text: !B1C! {S}{*1}If you'd tried, they'd have killed you too. {*2}There wasn’t a thing you could do. {*3}Now we have to make sure she didn't die for nothing.

X0904M_CHURCH_TALKTOJOSH_PC_X09MJOSH_THA.text: !B1E! {S}{*TC:1400|2550}If it weren’t for you I’d be dead… {*2}Thanks to you I might see our people free one day... {*3}You and I haven’t always agreed, but I know {*4}that we’re fighting for the same thing. {*5}Whatever you decide, {*6}I’m with you, Markus.

X0904M_CHURCH_MARKUSDEAD_PC_X09MCONNOR_S.text: !B1M! {S}{*1}The humans won’t take any risks…{*2}They’re rounding up the androids and taking them to camps for extermination...{*3}In a couple hours,{*4}we'll be the only ones left…

X0904M_CHURCH_MARKUSDEAD_PC_X09MMARLA_BO.text: !B1O! {S}{*1}A few hundred...{*2}maybe more if you count those hiding all over the city…{*3}We’d all be dead if you hadn’t detonated that bomb.
!B1P! {S}{*1}A few hundred...{*2}maybe more if you count those hiding all over the city…{*3}We’d all be dead if Markus hadn’t detonated that bomb.

X0904M_CHURCH_MARKUSDEAD_PC_X09MMARLA_NO.text: !B1Q! {S}{*1}It's hard to say…{*2}a few hundred?{*3}We could've saved more if we’d detonated that bomb…

X0904M_CHURCH_MARKUSDEAD_PC_X09MCONNOR_M.text: !B1R! {S}{*1}I know how important {*2}Markus was to Jericho…{*3}and to your people.{*4}He’s the one who opened my eyes…{*5}showed me who I really am.

X0904M_CHURCH_MARKUSDEAD_PC_X09MMARLA_MA.text: !B1S! {S}{*1}He gave his life for us…{*2}He gave us the hope we’d lost and the courage to fight…{*3}We’ll never forget him.
!B1T! {S}{*1}He gave his life to save me…{*2}I’ll never forget him.

X0904M_CHURCH_MARKUSDEAD_PC_X09MMARLA_CO.text: !B1U! {S}{*1}Where are we supposed to go from here?

X0904M_CHURCH_MARKUSDEAD_PC_X09MMARLA_WO.text: !B1V! {S}{*1}I’m ok…{*2}The bullet didn't hit any biocomponents…{*3}The others weren’t so lucky…

X0904M_CHURCH_MARKUSDEAD_PC_X09MCONNOR_C.text: !B1W! {S}{*1}There are thousands of androids at the CyberLife assembly plant.{*2}If we could wake them up,{*3}they might join us {*4}and shift the balance of power…

X0904M_CHURCH_MARKUSDEAD_PC_X09MMARLA_CO.text: !B1Y! {S}{*1}Connor, that's suicide.{*2}If you go there, they’ll kill you.

X0904M_CHURCH_MARKUSDEAD_PC_X09MCONNOR_C.text: !B21! {S}{*1}If anyone stands a chance of infiltrating CyberLife, it’s me.
!B22! {S}{*1}There’s a high probability…{*2}but statistically speaking there’s always a chance for unlikely events to take place…

X0904M_CHURCH_CONNORAPOLOGIES_PC_X09MCON.text: !B27! {S}{*TC:0|8080}Je suis désolé de t’avoir causé des problèmes… Je n’étais qu’une machine qui obéissait à des ordres… Ce n’était pas vraiment moi… J’aurais dû essayer de comprendre… mais je n’en étais juste pas capable…{*TC:8080|12560}Qu’est-ce que vous allez faire maintenant ? La frontière sera bientôt fermée mais vous ne pouvez pas rester ici…{*TC:15600|20360}J’espère que tout va bien se passer pour vous. Après tout ce que vous avez traversé, vous avez mérité d’être heureuses.

X0904M_CHURCH_CONNORAPOLOGIES_PC_X09MKAR.text: !B28! {S}{*TC:12560|15600}Je vais partir avec Alice… On a encore une chance de prendre le dernier bus…

X0904M_CHURCH_KARACONNOR_PC_X09MCONNOR_S.text: !B29! {S}{*1}I thought I'd killed you on that highway…{*2}I’m sorry I put your lives in danger…{*3}I was just a machine {*4}taking orders…{*5}It wasn’t really me…

X0904M_CHURCH_KARACONNOR_PC_X09MCONNOR_W.text: !B2A! {S}{*1}What are you gonna do now?.. {*2}I hope you make it out safely.{*3}You deserve some happiness,{*4}after all you've been through…

X0914K_STEALTH_KILLAND01_VO_X09KSWATM15_.text: !B3Y! {S}{*1}Hey, buddy! {*2}We got orders to check all civilians. {*3}Fuckin' androids…

X0914K_STEALTH_KILLAND01_PC_X09KANDM20_A.text: !B3Z! {S}{*1}This is a mistake... {*2}I'm human! {*3}I just wanna go home. {B}My wife is expecting me and we're gonna-{*4}No… No, please!

X0913K_LINE_VOICES_VO_X09KANDM08_HEAD04.text: !B7G! {S}{*1}They just wanna check us. They won't do us any harm.

X0913K_LINE_VOICES_VO_X09KANDM08_HEAD05.text: !B7H! {S}{*1}Where's rA9? Why doesn't he come and save us?

X0913K_LINE_VOICES_VO_X09KANDM08_HEAD06.text: !B7I! {S}{*1}We have to obey them. {*2}We have no choice.

X0913K_LINE_VOICES_VO_X09KANDM08_HEAD09.text: !B7J! {S}{*1}rA9 have pity on us. {*2}rA9 have pity on us.

X0913K_LINE_VOICES_VO_X09KANDM08_HEAD08.text: !B7K! {S}{*1}They're going to kill us all. I know they're going to kill us all.

X0913K_LINE_VOICES_VO_X09KANDM08_HEAD07.text: !B7L! {S}{*1}I don't wanna die… I don't want to die.

X0915K_PARKING_ROSE_PC_X09KROSE_VAN.text: !B90! {S}{*1}Oh, thank God you're alive!{*2}Oh... {B}Oh my god!{B}We saw the Jericho raid on TV… {B}I was terrified you might have been killed because of me…{*4}I knew if you made it I’d find you here. {*5}They’re searching for androids door to door.{*6}We had to leave before someone turned us in. {*7}They’re checking for androids on the border.{*8}But I found a smuggler who can get them across the river.{*9}It's risky {*10}but it's the only way.{*11}Are you coming with us?{*12}Okay, climb in!

X0915K_PARKING_ROSE_PC_X09KKARA_VAN.text: !B91! {S}{*2}How did you find us?{*3}What about the others?{*4}Yes,{*5}we're coming.

X0915K_BUSTERMINAL_GAMEOVER_VO_X09KSOLDI.text: !B97! {S}{*1}Security check. {*2}Can I see your ID, please?

X0401A_PRESS_CONFERENCE_PC_X04AWARREN_SP.text: !B9G! {S}{*1}At 6AM this morning, a national curfew was declared. {*2}Civilian movement will be strictly controlled, {*3}the right to assembly is suspended, {*4}all electronic communications are restricted, and I have granted enhanced powers to our security agencies. {*5}In addition to these measures, all androids must be handed over to the authorities immediately. {*6-7}Temporary camps are being set up in all our major cities to contain and destroy them. {*8}My highest priority and responsibility as President of the United States of America is to guarantee the security of all Americans. {*9}Which means stopping the deviant menace at all cost, {*10}and this is exactly what I am going to do. {*11}I am now asking all civilians to co-operate with the authorities, {*12}and rest assured that everything in our power is being done to guarantee the security of our nation.

X0401A_PRESS_CONFERENCE_PC_X04AWARREN_DE.text: !B9H! {S}{*1}We don’t have the full reports at this time, but if so, I can assure you they will soon be apprehended and destroyed.

X0401A_PRESS_CONFERENCE_VO_X04AJOURNALIS.text: !B9I! {S}{*1}Is it true that a large number of deviants are still on the loose?

X0401A_PRESS_CONFERENCE_PC_X04AWARREN_JE.text: !B9J! {S}{*1}The FBI raided an abandoned freighter in Detroit at 10:45 PM yesterday. {*2}Several thousand androids were destroyed or captured. {*3}Our forces are now combing the streets to ensure that none got through the net. {*4}We are going to find them one by one and destroy them.

X0401A_PRESS_CONFERENCE_VO_X04AJOURNALIS.text: !B9K! {S}{*1}What can you tell us about the assault that happened last night?
!B9L! {S}{*1}Has the leader of the deviants been apprehended?

X0401A_PRESS_CONFERENCE_PC_X04AWARREN_CA.text: !B9M! {S}{*2}That's absurd. There's absolutely no connection. {*3}Androids are not living beings. {B}All we are doing is destroying defective machines.

X0401A_PRESS_CONFERENCE_VO_X04AJOURNALIS.text: !B9N! {S}{*1}Some say these camps awaken painful memories from human history. How do you respond to that?
!B9P! {S}{*1}Many believe that androids are a new form of intelligent life. Do you have any comment?

X0401A_PRESS_CONFERENCE_PC_X04AWARREN_AR.text: !B9Q! {S}{*1}We neutralized all military androids the second their reliability came into doubt, we have called the National Guard for reinforcement. {*2}Our armed forces are fully operational and are able to ensure our homeland security.

X0401A_PRESS_CONFERENCE_VO_X04AJOURNALIS.text: !B9R! {S}{*1}Is it true that androids make up 60% of the armed forces? {*2}Is our army still able to ensure our homeland security?

X0401A_PRESS_CONFERENCE_PC_X04AWARREN_CY.text: !B9S! {S}{*1}We're working very closely with CyberLife to neutralize all deviants. I won’t make any comments about anything else until we have dealt with the android question.

X0401A_PRESS_CONFERENCE_VO_X04AJOURNALIS.text: !B9T! {S}{*1}What’s gonna happen to CyberLife? Will androids be banned definitively?

X0401A_PRESS_CONFERENCE_PC_X04AWARREN_HA.text: !B9U! {S}{*1}All androids working on sensitive sites have been neutralized and all IT systems have been suspended to avoid any risks of hacking. {*2}The situation is under control.

X0401A_PRESS_CONFERENCE_VO_X04AJOURNALIS.text: !B9V! {S}{*1}Is it true that the androids could hack our IT systems, like nuclear power plants and military bases?

X0401A_PRESS_CONFERENCE_PC_X04AWARREN_TH.text: !B9W! {S}{*1}I have no information on that at this time.

X0401A_PRESS_CONFERENCE_VO_X04AJOURNALIS.text: !B9X! {S}{*1}A convoy of medical cobalt is reported missing. Army weapon stores are also said to have been robbed. Can you confirm these reports?

X0401A_PRESS_CONFERENCE_PC_X04AWARREN_MA.text: !B9Y! {S}{*1}We have received confirmation that the deviant known as Markus was in fact destroyed during the assault.
!B9Z! {S}{*1}The deviant that is known as Markus has not been located yet, but we will soon track it down and neutralize it.

X0401A_PRESS_CONFERENCE_PC_X04AWARREN_OP.text: !BA0! {S}{*1}Public opinion is one thing, the security of the state is another. {*2}These deviants are dangerous and my highest priority is to protect the American people.

X0401A_PRESS_CONFERENCE_VO_X04AJOURNALIS.text: !BA1! {S}{*1}Madam President, public opinion seems to have become increasingly favorable to the deviants, {B}particularly since they’ve adopted a peaceful approach. How do you feel about this?

X0401A_PRESS_CONFERENCE_PC_X04AWARREN_OP.text: !BA2! {S}{*1}The deviants have proved to be very violent so far. {*2}They have demonstrated that they are a menace to society and I have every intention of eliminating them.

X0401A_PRESS_CONFERENCE_VO_X04AJOURNALIS.text: !BA3! {S}{*1}Madam President, public opinion seems to be particularly hostile to the deviants because of their violent behavior. {B}Can you give us your perspective on that?
!BA7! {S}{*1}Are you going to ban the production of androids?
!BAA! {S}{*1}What impact will this have on the conflict in Central Europe?

X0401A_PRESS_CONFERENCE_PC_X04AWARREN_MA.text: !BAC! {S}{*1}The deviant leader has not been located yet, but we will soon track it down and neutralize it.

X0401A_PRESS_CONFERENCE_VO_X04AJOURNALIS.text: !BAF! {S}{*1}Are you going to ban the production of androids?
!BAI! {S}{*1}What impact will this have on the conflict in Central Europe?

!BAP! {S}{*1}What impact will this have on the conflict in Central Europe?

!BAU! {S}{*1}Can you tell us how many androids have been destroyed?
!BAW! {S}{*1}Excuse me, what impact will this have on the conflict in Central Europe?
!BB0! {S}{*1}Are you going to ban the production of androids?
