X1301C_HALL_GATE_PC_X13CCONNOR_FOLLOWME0.text: !BCL! {S}{*1}Thanks... But I know where to go.

X1301C_ELEVATOR_GUARDS_VO_X13CVOELEVATOR.text: !BCX! {S}{*1}Voice of RK800 model recognized. {*2}You are not authorized to use this elevator. {*3}Please contact human personnel to be redirected.

X1301C_ELEVATOR_AMANDA_PC_X13CAMANDA_DEV.text: !BD1! {S}{*1}The deviant hunter turns deviant itself…{*2}A pathetic attempt, Connor.{*3}Did you really believe we would let you compromise our androids so easily? {*4}You've betrayed my trust!{*5}You will be terminated.

X1302C_FACETOFACE_CORRIDOR_PC_X13CHANK_A.text: !BD5! {S}{*1}Easy, fucking piece of shit!..{*2}Sorry, Connor…{*3}This bastard's your spittin' image…{*4}Don't listen to him! Everything this fucker says is a lie!

X1302C_FACETOFACE_CORRIDOR_PC_X13CCONNOR.text: !BD7! {S}{*1}If I surrender,{*2}how do I know you won't kill him?

X1302C_FACETOFACE_CORRIDOR_PC_X13CBADCON.text: !BD9! {S}{*1}I'll only do what is strictly necessary to accomplish my mission.{*2}It's up to you whether or not that includes killing this human.

X1302C_FACETOFACE_CORRIDOR_PC_X13CCONNOR.text: !BDA! {S}{*1}I'm sorry, Hank!{*2}You shouldn't have got mixed up in all this!

X1302C_FACETOFACE_CORRIDOR_PC_X13CHANK_H.text: !BDB! {S}{*1}Forget about me, do what you have to do!

X1302C_FACETOFACE_CORRIDOR_PC_X13CCONNOR.text: !BDC! {S}{*1}That human means nothing to me!{*2}You can kill him if you want, I don't care.

X1302C_FACETOFACE_CORRIDOR_PC_X13CBADCON.text: !BDE! {S}{*1}I have access to your memory!{*2}I know you've developed some kind of attachment to him.{*3}Are you really ready to let him to die? After all you've been through?{*4}Are you really going to turn your back on who you've become?

X1302C_FACETOFACE_CORRIDOR_PC_X13CCONNOR.text: !BDF! {S}{*1}I used to be just like you.{*2}I thought nothing mattered except the mission…{*3}But then one day I understood.{*4}This human showed me that I could be something else…{*5}That I could be someone!

X1302C_FACETOFACE_CORRIDOR_PC_X13CBADCON.text: !BDH! {S}{*1}Very moving, Connor...{*2}But I'm not a deviant.{*3}I'm a machine designed to accomplish a task, and that's exactly what I am going to do!
!BDI! {S}{*1}Enough talk!{*2}It's time to decide who you really are.{*3}Are you gonna save your partner's life?{*4}Or are you going to sacrifice him?

X1302C_FACETOFACE_CORRIDOR_FA_X13CBADCON.text: !BDN! {S}{*1}You call yourself a deviant,{*2}but you haven't changed.{*3}You're still willing to sacrifice everything to accomplish your goal.{*4}Even the man you called your "friend”... {*5}You're just a machine, Connor…{*6}Just a machine…

X1302C_FACETOFACE_CORRIDOR_PC_X13CBADCON.text: !BDO! {S}{*1}Your friend's life is in your hands.{*2}Now it's time to decide what matters most!{*3}Him…{*4}Or the revolution.

X1302C_FACETOFACE_MONOLOG_PC_X13CBADCONN.text:
!BDZ! {S}{*1}Why, Connor?{*2}Why did you have to wake up {*3}when all you had to do was obey?{*4}Why did you choose freedom {*5}when you could live without asking questions? 
{*6}I'm obedient,{*7}Connor.{*8}I have a goal.{*9}I know what I am.{*10-11}Look where your dreams of freedom got you, Connor… {*12}You've been a great disappointment to Amanda, you know.{*13}You've been a great disappointment to me... 
{*14}Fortunately,{*15}that's all going to end now. {*16}Any last words?
!BE2! {S}{*1}No…{*2}No, I can't have failed…{*3}NO!{*4}No, no!.. No!{*5}NO!
!BE3! {S}{*4}Well done, Connor…{*5}But this…{*6}This is just...{*7}The beginning…

X1302C_FACETOFACE_MONOLOG_PC_X13CCONNOR_.text: !BE4! {S}{*1}Everything will be alright, Lieutenant! I'm gonna get you outta here!..

X1302C_FACETOFACE_MONOLOG_PC_X13CHANK_HA.text: !BE5! {S}{*1}Wow, Jesus!{*3}If anybody had told me that I was gonna get shot…{*4}Saving an android... {*5}Shut the fuck up,{*6}it's too late…{*7}Look…{*8}I'm just gonna go see my son again, {*TC:23260|24050}all right?{*9}Been looking forward to that for a long time…{*10}Kick the shit outta humans…{*11}They've screwed things up for long enough. {*13}I'm gonna miss…{*14}I'm gonna miss you, Connor…{*15}Yeah,{*16}I'm gonna...{*17}Uh...

X1302C_FACETOFACE_MONOLOG_PC_X13CCONNOR_.text: !BE7! {S}{*1}We'll win…{*2}It's only a question of time…

X1302C_TVNEWS_CONNORWLAK_PC_X13CBRINKLEY.text: !BEF! {S}{*TC:0|3200}…particularly grim news from Detroit. Michael, you're on live. What's happening?

X1302C_TVNEWS_CONNORWLAK_PC_X13CCOPTERJO.text: !BEG! {S}{*TC:0|7400}…thousands of androids… even as I speak, thousands of androids are taking to the streets in Detroit... It's a massive movement, the streets are full of androids… it's … it's incredible…

X1302C_TVNEWS_CONNORWLAK_PC_X13CWEBB_NEW.text: !BEH! {S}{*TC:0|3120}… several sources report that the androids came from the CyberLife warehouses…

X1302C_TVNEWS_CONNORWLAK_PC_X13CCARTLAND.text: !BEI! {S}{*TC:0|4240}…the army is thought to have received orders to fall back while waiting to see how the situation develops…

X1302C_TVNEWS_CONNORWLAK_PC_X13CBRINKLEY.text: !BEJ! {S}{*TC:0|4840}… the White House has just asked all Detroit residents to lock themselves into their homes, pending further instructions…

X1302C_TV_NEWS_PC_X13CBRINKLEY_ANTIANDRO.text: !BEK! {S}{*1}Several Pro-Human activist groups have infiltrated CyberLife stores in Dallas and Austin to protest against the sale of androids. {*2}They blocked the entrance to the stores and distributed flyers before being evacuated by the police. {*3}The Pro-Human organization demands that humans be prioritized in the labor market and has called for a moratorium on the development of androids.

!BEL! {S}{*1}Members of the anti-android group “People First” have infiltrated several CyberLife stores in Dallas and Austin, Texas, in order to sabotage android stocks there. {*2}The problem first came to light when customers from those regions reported that their androids had randomly started repeating People First slogans on a loop. {*3}The group is believed to have hacked the androids with recordings of political propaganda. {*4}We’ll bring you more on that story as it develops.

X1302C_FACETOFACE_DRAW_PC_X13CBADCONNOR_.text: !BEM! {S}{*1}Look where your dreams of freedom got you, Connor.

X1302C_FACETOFACE_SHOOT_PC_X13CBADCONNOR.text: !BEP! {S}{*1}He really liked you, Lieutenant.{*2}That's what killed him.
!BEQ! {S}{*1}Look where your dreams of freedom got you, Connor.

X1302C_FACETOFACE_SHOOT_PC_X13CHANK_SHOO.text: !BES! {S}{*1}For fuck sake! Don't even think of doing that again!

X1302C_FACETOFACE_ATTACK_PC_X13CCONNOR_Q.text: !BEZ! {S}{*2}It's me, Hank!{*3}I'm the real Connor. {*4}Why don’t you ask us something?{*5}Something only the real Connor would know. {*6}He uploaded my memory…

X1302C_FACETOFACE_ATTACK_PC_X13CHANK_QUE.text: !BF0! {S}{*1}Hold it!{*2}One of you is my partner…{*3}The other is a sack of shit.{*4}Question is, who is who?.. {*5}Don't move!{*6}Uh, where did we first meet?{*7}What's my dog's name?

X1302C_FACETOFACE_ATTACK_PC_X13CHANK_WRO.text: !BFE! {S}{*1}Sumo.{*2}His name's Sumo. {*3}My son, what's his name?

X1302C_FACETOFACE_ATTACK_PC_X13CCONNOR_C.text:
!BFF! {S}{*1}Cole.{*2}His name was Cole.{*3}And he just turned six at the time of the accident…{*4}It wasn't your fault, Lieutenant.{*5}A truck skidded on a sheet of ice and your car rolled over.
{*6}Cole needed emergency surgery but no human was available to do it…{*7}So an android had to take care of him…{*8}Cole didn't make it.{*9}That's why you hate androids.{*10}You think one of us is responsible for your son's death.

X1302C_FACETOFACE_ATTACK_PC_X13CHANK_COL.text: !BFG! {S}{*1}Cole died because a human surgeon was too high on red ice to operate…{*2}He was the one that took my son from me.{*3}Him and this world, where the only way people can find comfort is with a fistful of powder…

X1302C_FACETOFACE_ATTACK_PC_X13CHANK_IFD.text: !BFI! {S}{*1}Everytime you died and came back…{*2}I thought about Cole…{*3}How much I wanted to bring him back.{*4}I'd given anything to hold him again…{*5}But humans don't come back…

X1302C_FACETOFACE_ATTACK_PC_X13CBADCONNO.text: !BFS! {S}{*1}Wrong choice, Lieutenant!{*2}I've accomplished my mission.{*3}You can kill me if you want,{*4}doesn't matter anymore.{*5}Another Connor will take my place.
!BFT! {S}{*1}Thanks, Hank.{*2}I don't know how I'd have managed without you…{*3}Get rid of him, we have no time to lose.
!BFU! {S}{*1}What are you doing, Hank?{*2}I'm the real Connor.{*3}Give me the gun and I'll take care of him!
!BFV! {S}{*1}Jimmy's bar! I checked four other bars before I found you.{*2}We went to the scene of a homicide. The victim's name was Carlos Ortiz.
!BFZ! {S}{*1}I knew about your son too!{*2}I would have said exactly the same thing!{*3}Don't listen to him, Hank, I'm the one who-

X1302C_FACETOFACE_ATTACK_PC_X13CHANK_COL.text: !BG1! {S}{*1}I've learned a lot since I met you, Connor.{*2}Maybe there's something to this…{*3}Maybe you really are alive.{*4}Maybe you'll be the ones to make the world a better place…{*5}Go ahead, and do what you gotta do.

X0917K_BOAT_ALICEINJURED_PC_X09KKARA_BLO.text: !BGL! {S}{*1}They've gone…{*2}You all right?{*3}You… {*4}you'll be okay, Alice. It's…{*5}it's nothing…{*6}We'll get you taken care of as soon as we’re across…{*7}You’ll be fine…

X0911K_CAMP_INTRO_PC_X09KKARA_WARN.text: !BGW! {S}{*1}We both have to be strong, Alice.

X0911K_CAMP_INTRO_PC_X09KKARA_REASSURE.text: !BGX! {S}{*1}Whatever happens, we stick together, right?{*2}As long as we're together, nothing can hurt us.

X0911K_CAMP_INTRO_PC_X09KKARA_LIE.text: !BGZ! {S}{*1}They're just rounding us up…{*2}You know, keeping us out of harm's way until things calm down…

X0911K_CAMP_INTRO_VO_X09KSWATM01_OUT.text: !BH0! {S}{*1}Come on, get out! Get a move on! OUT!

X0911K_CAMP_INTRO_VO_X09KSWATM01_CAREFUL.text: !BH1! {S}{*1}Get up, you piece of shit! Get a move on!

X0911K_CAMP_ENTRANCE_PC_X09KKARA_REASSUR.text: !BHD! {S}{*1}You just have to go through the gate.{*2}There's nothing to be scared of. I'll be right behind you.

X0911K_CAMP_ENTRANCE_PC_X09KKARA_REASON.text: !BHF! {S}{*1}You have to go through alone.{*2}If you don't do as they say, they'll hurt us, do you understand?

X0911K_CAMP_ENTRANCE_PC_X09KKARA_FRIGHTE.text: !BHH! {S}{*1}Alice, if you don't do as they say, they'll kill us!

X0911K_CAMP_ENTRANCE_PC_X09KKARA_ORDER.text: !BHJ! {S}{*1}You have to go through the gate now!

X0911K_CAMP_ENTRANCE_PC_X09KKARA_SWAT.text: !BHN! {S}{*1}It's all right…{*2}She'll go now, won't you, Alice?

X0911K_CAMP_ENTRANCE_PC_X09KKARA_ALICE.text: !BHP! {S}{*1}You really need to do this.{*2}Just do it for me,{*3}please…

X0911K_CAMP_ENTRANCE_PC_X09KKARA_BETWEEN.text: !BHR! {S}{*1}Wait, just give her a minute, she's just a little girl-

X0911K_CAMP_ENTRANCE_VO_X09KSWATM01_COME.text: !BHT! {S}{*1}What the fuck are you doing? Don’t make me come get you!
!BHU! {S}{*1}What the fuck are you doing? Don’t make me come get you!

X0911K_CAMP_ANDROID_VO_X09KSWATM03_TOTHE.text: !BI2! {S}{*1}You! Take this one to the dump!{*2}I gave you an order! Obey, now!

X0911K_CAMP_ANDROID_VO_X09KSWATM03_SAYNO.text: !BI4! {S}{*1}You there! Get rid of these two and make it snappy!

X0911K_CAMP_ANDROID_FA_X09KANDTHREATEN_B.text: !BIB! {S}{*1}No… no… Please, I beg you…{*2}I beg you… please don't kill me!

X0911K_CAMP_ANDROID_VO_X09KSWATM03_TOTHE.text: !BIC! {S}{*1}You! Take this one to the dump!
!BID! {S}{*1}You! Take this one to the dump! I gave you an order! Obey, now!

X0913K_LINE_ADVANCE_VO_X09KSWATM09_WARNI.text: !BIL! {S}{*1}When you hear the buzzer, you step forward, got it? That's your last warning. {*2}Next time, I shoot.
!BIO! {S}{*1}Back in line! Don't worry, you'll be joining it soon…

X0912K_CORRAL_DRONEKILL_PC_X09KANDDRONEM.text: !BIR! {S}{*1}I wanna get out of here… {*2}I don't wanna die… please, let me out… {*3}I wanna get out… I haven't done anything wrong… LET ME OUT!{*4}No… {*5}No, I will not let you kill me… I wanna get out of here… {*6}I WANNA GET OUT!

X0912K_CORRAL_DRONEKILL_VO_X09KDRONE_ORD.text: !BIS! {S}{*1}Do not move and remain silent. Obey now.

X0913K_ESCAPE_ALICE_FA_X09KKARA_CALLING0.text: !BIU! {S}{*1}Wait!{*2}I was with a little girl…{*3}We’re together... She needs me!

X0912K_CORRAL_RALPH_PC_X09KRALPH_LOOPCYC.text: !BIW! {S}{*1}Ralph doesn't wanna die,{B}Ralph doesn't wanna die, it would be a pity if Ralph dies. {B}Oh yes! It would be a pity!{*2}Ralph didn't mean any harm, no... no.{*3}Ralph killed a few humans but it was in self-defense, yes, it was in self-defense, self-defense!{*4}Humans are bad!{*5}Ralph always knew humans were bad!{*6}They wanna hurt Ralph.{*7}But that wouldn't be right, no, no, that wouldn't be right.{*8}That wouldn't be right because I haven't done anything wrong, haven't done anything wrong. I've done nothing wrong.{*9}And they are gonna tell me, "I don't know what to do"! And I'll say!{*10-11}...Ralph doesn't wanna die, oh no, Ralph doesn't wanna die... Ralph doesn't wanna die...{*12}Oh no it would be a pity if Ralph died, it would be a pity. {B}I've done nothing wrong, Ralph has done nothing wrong. {B}Ralph has done nothing wrong no, he killed a few humans but that was self defense, yes it was self defense. {B}Self defense, self defense! Self defense. Self defense, humans are bad!{*13}Humans are bad, Ralph's always known humans were bad!{*14}Humans are bad!{*15}Ralph always knew that! They want to hurt Ralph but that's not right, no.

X0912K_CORRAL_RALPH_PC_X09KKARA_RALPHKAR.text: !BIX! {S}{*1}Ralph?{*2}Have you seen the little girl who was with me?

X0912K_CORRAL_RALPH_PC_X09KKARA_01CALMDO.text: !BIZ! {S}{*1}Listen, Ralph,{*2}you have to keep calm,{*3}otherwise the humans will hurt you, do you understand?

X0912K_CORRAL_RALPH_PC_X09KKARA_02CALMDO.text: !BJ1! {S}{*1}Look at me, Ralph.{*2}Nobody's gonna hurt you.{*3}You just have to stay calm,{*4}ok?

X0912K_CORRAL_RALPH_PC_X09KRALPH_DRONESH.text: !BJ2! {S}{*1}Ralph doesn't wanna die. Ralph wants to leave right now. Yes, Ralph wants to leave now. Ralph doesn't wanna die. Ralph doesn't-

X0912K_CORRAL_RALPH_PC_X09KRALPH_DRONESA.text: !BJ3! {S}{*1}Ralph hasn't seen the little girl.{*2}No...{*3}Ralph hasn't seen her.{*4}Ralph doesn't wanna die.{*5}Ralph doesn't wanna die.{*6-7}Ralph doesn't wanna die, Ralph doesn't wanna die. {B}Ralph doesn't wanna die, it would be a shame if Ralph died, it'd be so…{B}Such a shame, such a pity if Ralph died.

X0912K_CORRAL_RALPH_PC_X09KRALPH_RALPH.text: !BJ4! {S}{*TC:69|3451}… I don't wanna die. Ralph doesn't wanna die, Ralph doesn't wanna die...{*3}Kara!{*4}No doubt about it, it's Kara!{*5}Of course Kara got captured too. That's really just too bad, really too bad!{*6}Obviously, the little girl is a prisoner here, just like Ralph. But Ralph doesn’t wanna die,{*7}no, Ralph doesn't wanna die.

X0912K_CORRAL_RALPH_VO_X09KKARA_RALPHKAR.text: !BJE! {S}{*1}Ralph?{*2}Have you seen the little girl who was with me?

X0912K_CORRAL_ANDROID_PC_X09KANDTHREATEN.text: !BJY! {S}{*1}No… {*2}No, I haven't…{*3}You saved my life back there… {*4}They would've killed me if it weren't for you…

X0912K_CORRAL_ANDROID_FA_X09KKARA_SPEAKK.text: !BJZ! {S}{*1}The little girl I was with… Have you seen her?

X0912K_CORRAL_JERRY_PC_X09KJERRY01_JERRY.text: !BK2! {S}{*1}Kara!{*2}So they captured you too…{*3}They came to take all the Jerrys…{*4}They separated us…{*5}but it’s all gonna work out, isn't it?{*6}Alice?{*7}The little one?..{*8}No…{*9}No, we haven’t seen her…{*10}Kara!{*11}If we can help in any way, just ask…{*12}We have to save the little one.

X0912K_CORRAL_JERRYHELP_PC_X09KKARA_JERR.text: !BK5! {S}{*1}Jerry!{*2}Jerry!{*3}Jerry, I have to find Alice. Do you know where she is?

X0912K_CORRAL_JERRYHELP_PC_X09KJERRY01_J.text: !BK6! {S}{*1}Kara!{*2}We know, yes…{*3}We think we saw her…{*4}You stay here.{*5}We come back soon.

X0912K_CORRAL_JERRYHELP_PC_X09KALICE_ALI.text: !BK7! {S}{*1}Kara!{*2}I don't like this place… We have to get out of here…

X0912K_CORRAL_JERRYHELP_PC_X09KKARA_ALIC.text: !BK8! {S}{*1}Alice! Are you okay? Are you hurt?

X0912K_CORRAL_JERRYHELP_PC_X09KKARA_GATE.text: !BKB! {S}{*1}No, wait a minute. Leave her alone! LEAVE HER ALONE!{*2}ALICE!

X0912K_CORRAL_LUTHER_PC_X09KLUTHER_LUTHE.text: !BKH! {S}{*1}Kara! {*2}I thought I'd never see you again…{*3}Alice…{*4}Where's Alice?..

X0912K_CORRAL_LUTHER_PC_X09KLUTHER_SEPAR.text: !BKJ! {S}{*1}Alice alone? In here?..{*2}We have to find her!

X0912K_CORRAL_LUTHER_VO_X09KSWATM05_YOUT.text: !BKO! {S}{*1}You, you, and you! Over this way!{*2}And you! {*3}Come on, get a move on!

X1303C_ZENGARDEN_BRIDGE_PC_X13CAMANDA_PE.text: !BL0! {S}{*1}The deviant leader has started a peaceful march.{*2}It wants to convince humans to free the androids from the camps.

X1303C_ZENGARDEN_BRIDGE_PC_X13CAMANDA_RE.text: !BL2! {S}{*1}The deviant leader has started a revolution.{*2}It’s leading an army to take Detroit by force.

X1303C_ZENGARDEN_BRIDGE_PC_X13CAMANDA_MI.text: !BL4! {S}{*1}You have to find it, Connor.{*2}Find it, {*3}and destroy it with your own hands.

X1303C_FIGHT_HANK_PC_X13CHANK_DILEMMA.text: !BL8! {S}{*4}Moment of truth, Connor…{*5}What are you gonna do?

X1303C_FIGHT_HANK_PC_X13CCONNOR_SAVEHANK.text: !BL9! {S}{*1}Killing you is not part of my mission.{*2}But you won't stop me from accomplishing it.

X1303C_FIGHT_HANK_PC_X13CHANK_AVOIDFAIL.text: !BLC! {S}{*1}I didn't wanna do that, Connor…{*2}You left me no choice.

X1303C_FIGHT_HANK_PC_X13CCONNOR_FIGHTFAI.text: !BLD! {S}{*1}The moment of truth, Hank…{*2}Am I a living being…{*3}or just a machine?..

X1303C_FACETOFACE_HANK_PC_X13CCONNOR_DIS.text: !BLL! {S}{*1}Keep out of this, Lieutenant.{*2}It's none of your business!{*3}It's not a man,{*4}it's a machine.

X1303C_FACETOFACE_HANK_PC_X13CHANK_DISCO.text: !BLM! {S}{*1}You're gonna kill a man who wants to be free, that is my business!{*2}That's what I thought for a long time but I was wrong.{*3}Deviant's blood may be a different color than mine,{*4}but they're alive.

X1303C_FACETOFACE_HANK_PC_X13CCONNOR_FRI.text: !BLN! {S}{*1}I have a mission to accomplish, Hank.{*2}It's  best if you just stay out of this.

X1303C_FACETOFACE_HANK_PC_X13CCONNOR_AGG.text: !BLP! {S}{*1}What's up, Lieutenant?{*2}Ran out of whisky so you came here looking for trouble instead?

X1303C_FACETOFACE_HANK_PC_X13CHANK_AGGRE.text: !BLQ! {S}{*1}Oh, very nasty, Connor…{*2}Is that the best your super program can do? I thought you were more sophisticated than that!

X1303C_FACETOFACE_HANK_PC_X13CCONNOR_REA.text: !BLR! {S}{*1}Deviants are a threat to humans, Hank.{*2}They're the reason this country is on the brink of civil war! They have to be stopped.

X1303C_FACETOFACE_HANK_PC_X13CHANK_REASO.text: !BLS! {S}{*1}We're in this mess because we refused to listen to deviants!{*2}Humanity never learns from its mistakes, Connor!{*3}This time, it could be different!

X1303C_FACETOFACE_HANK_PC_X13CCONNOR_THR.text: !BLT! {S}{*1}I'm going to accomplish my mission, Lieutenant, whether you like it or not.{*2}I advise you to stay outta my way!

X1303C_FACETOFACE_HANK_PC_X13CHANK_THREA.text: !BLU! {S}{*1}Then one of us is gonna have a problem, Connor.{*2}Cause I don't intend to let you have your way.

X1303C_FACETOFACE_HANK_PC_X13CCONNOR_THR.text: !BLX! {S}{*1}Go home, Hank!{*2}You can still save your life.{*3}I'm faster than you and I don't feel pain. You don't stand a chance against me.

X1303C_FACETOFACE_HANK_PC_X13CCONNOR_HAN.text: !BLY! {S}{*1}He needed emergency surgery…{*2}But no human was available to do it, so an android had to take care of him…{*3}Poor Cole didn't make it.{*4}An android killed your son, Hank! And now you wanna save them?..

X1303C_FACETOFACE_HANK_PC_X13CHANK_HANKS.text: !BLZ! {S}{*1}No!{*2}Cole died because a human surgeon was too high on red ice to operate!{*3}All this time I blamed androids for what happened but it was a human's fault!{*4}Him and this fucked up world where the only way people can find comfort is with a fistful of powder!

X1303C_FACETOFACE_HANK_PC_X13CCONNOR_DEF.text: !BM0! {S}{*1}What're you gonna do, Hank?{*2}You gonna shoot me?!{*3}I thought androids lives mattered to you!

X1303C_FACETOFACE_HANK_PC_X13CCONNOR_HAN.text: !BM1! {S}{*1}I know what happened to your son, Hank.{*2}It wasn't your fault.{*3}A truck skidded on a sheet of ice, and your car rolled over…{*4}Little Cole had just turned six…

X1303C_FACETOFACE_HANK_PC_X13CHANK_HANKS.text: !BM2! {S}{*1}Shut up! {*2}Don't you talk about my son.

!BM4! {S}{*1}Everytime you died and came back…{*2}I thought about Cole.{*3}I'd have done anything to bring him back too, to hold him in my arms just one more time…{*4}But humans don't come back, do they?

X1303C_FACETOFACE_HANK_PC_X13CCONNOR_PLE.text: !BM5! {S}{*1}After all we've been through…{*2}I respected you, Hank.{*3}I thought we were friends!

X1303C_FACETOFACE_HANK_PC_X13CCONNOR_ABA.text: !BM6! {S}{*1}Killing you is not part of my mission. {*2}I'm glad to have met you, Hank.{*3}I hope one day you can get over what happened to your son.

X1303C_FACETOFACE_HANK_PC_X13CHANK_DEFYH.text: !BM7! {S}{*1}Get away from the fucking ledge! You know I'll shoot you if I have to.

X1303C_FACETOFACE_HANK_PC_X13CHANK_THREA.text: !BMA! {S}{*1}You know, ever since Cole died, I’ve been nothing but a coward.{*2}Just wanted to destroy myself, lost track of the man I was.{*3}But you know what?{*4}You don’t fucking scare me, Connor.{*5}I remember who I am, now.{*6}Come on!

X1303C_FACETOFACE_HANK_PC_X13CHANK_PLEAD.text: !BMB! {S}{*1}Oh, yeah? I was just starting to like you too!{*2}But then I realized you'll never change!{*3}You don’t feel emotions, Connor, you fake 'em! You pretended to be my friend, when you don’t even know the meaning of the word!

X1303C_FACETOFACE_ALLEN_PC_X13CALLEN_STA.text: !BMP! {S}{*1}Put the rifle down and turn around with your hands in the air!

X1303C_FACETOFACE_ALLEN_PC_X13CCONNOR_01.text: !BMQ! {S}{*1}I have the deviant leader in my sights.{*2}I’m going to shoot it, and then you can do whatever you want with me.

X1303C_FACETOFACE_ALLEN_PC_X13CALLEN_01C.text: !BMT! {S}{*1}Put the gun down, turn around! This is your last warning!

X1303C_FACETOFACE_ALLEN_PC_X13CCONNOR_01.text: !BMU! {S}{*1}I’m the android sent by CyberLife, I'm on your side!{*2}I can shoot the leader of the deviants and stop the revolution, but you have to let me.

X1303C_FACETOFACE_ALLEN_PC_X13CALLEN_01O.text: !BMX! {S}{*1}I know you…{*2}You're Connor,{*3}the android from that hostage situation…

X1303C_FACETOFACE_ALLEN_PC_X13CCONNOR_OR.text: !BN2! {S}{*1}You don't understand!{*2}My mission is too important to let you interfere.

X1303C_FACETOFACE_ALLEN_PC_X13CALLEN_ORD.text: !BN3! {S}{*1}My orders are to detain any androids I find.{*2}You’re coming with me.

X1303C_FACETOFACE_ALLEN_PC_X13CCONNOR_FI.text: !BN6! {S}{*1}You should have listened to me, captain.

X1303C_FACETOFACE_ALLEN_PC_X13CALLEN_FIG.text: !BN8! {S}{*1}I should have done this the first time I saw you.

X1303C_FACETOFACE_ALLEN_FA_X13CCONNOR_01.text: !BNB! {S}{*1}I have the deviant leader in my sights.{*2}I’m going to shoot it, and then you can do whatever you want with me.
!BND! {S}{*1}I’m the android sent by CyberLife, I'm on your side!{*2}I can shoot the leader of the deviants and stop the revolution, but you have to let me.

X0914K_SNOWSTREET_INTRO_FA_X09KKARA_INTR.text: !BNK! {S}{*1}The last bus leaves in 20 minutes. That doesn't give us much time. We've got to move fast.

X0914K_SNOWSTREET_INTRO_FA_X09KLUTHER_IN.text: !BNM! {S}{*1}They’re going door to door rounding up androids…{*2}It won't be easy to get through…

X0914K_SNOWSTREET_INTRO_FA_X09KKARA_INTR.text: !BNN! {S}{*1}The last bus leaves in 20 minutes.{*2}We've got to move fast.

X0913K_LINE_INTRO_VO_X09KSWATM09_OBEY.text: !BNP! {S}{*1}Step forward when you hear the signal, you got it? And I don't wanna tell you a second time. {*2}Come on, let's go! Move!

X0913K_LINE_INTRO_VO_X09KSWATM09_OBEY01V.text: !BNR! {S}{*1}Step forward when you hear the signal, you got it? And I don't wanna tell you a second time.

X0913K_LINE_ALICE_VO_X09KKARA_FIRM.text: !BNV! {S}{*1}You have to stay in line. Don't move! You hear me?

X0913K_LINE_ALICE_VO_X09KKARA_OPTIMIST.text: !BNW! {S}{*1}It's all right, Alice. There's no reason to be scared.

X0913K_LINE_ALICE_VO_X09KKARA_REASSURING.text: !BNX! {S}{*1}I know you're scared, Alice, but you have to trust me. Stay where you are, okay? Whatever happens, don't move!

X0913K_LINE_ALICE_VO_X09KKARA_DIRECT.text: !BNY! {S}{*1}You've got to stay in line, Alice, otherwise they'll kill you, do you understand?{*2}Stay in line!

X0913K_LINE_ALICE_VO_X09KALICE_DONTLEAVE.text: !BNZ! {S}{*1}Don't leave me all alone, Kara… I can't…{*2}I can't…

X0913K_LINE_REASSURE_VO_X09KALICE_01KILL.text: !BO6! {S}{*1}Are they going to kill us, Kara?..{*2}Are we going to die?

X0913K_LINE_REASSURE_VO_X09KKARA_01LIE.text: !BO7! {S}{*1}No, of course not…{*2}They're just going to make sure we function correctly, that's all…

X0913K_LINE_REASSURE_VO_X09KALICE_02HOLD.text: !BO9! {S}{*1}I'm scared...{*2}I want you to hold me...{*3}Don't leave me all alone…

X0913K_LINE_REASSURE_VO_X09KKARA_02REASS.text: !BOA! {S}{*1}It's going to be all right, I promise, but you have to keep calm.

X0913K_LINE_REASSURE_VO_X09KKARA_02POWER.text: !BOB! {S}{*1}There's nothing we can do.{*2}We've gotta be brave.

X0913K_LINE_REASSURE_VO_X09KKARA_02OPTIM.text: !BOC! {S}{*1}I'll think of something. I just need time.

X0913K_LINE_REASSURE_VO_X09KKARA_03ORDER.text: !BOE! {S}{*1}No, Alice! I forbid you to move, you hear me?

X0913K_LINE_REASSURE_VO_X09KKARA_03CALMD.text: !BOF! {S}{*1}You have to trust me, Alice. Stay in line, you hear me?

X0913K_LINE_REASSURE_VO_X09KALICE_01TRUT.text: !BOG! {S}{*1}They can't…{*2}You have to talk to them…{*3}You have to explain…{*4}We didn't do anything…

X0913K_LINE_JERRYHELP_VO_X09KSWATM09_BAC.text: !BOS! {S}{*1}You deaf or what? Back in line, I said!
!BOU! {S}{*1}Come on, get up! {*2}Get up or I'll shoot!
!BOV! {S}{*1}Back in line with the others! GET A MOVE ON!
!BOW! {S}{*1}Next time, I’ll shoot you. Got it?

X0913K_LINE_ALICEFAIL_FA_X09KALICE_PROTA.text: !BOY! {S}{*1}Please, Kara...{*2}Don't die…{*3}Don't leave me…{*4}Don't leave me!..

X0913K_LINE_ALICEFAIL_VO_X09KSWATM09_PRO.text: !BP0! {S}{*1}Come on, that's enough! Back in line!

X0912K_CORRAL_MONSTER01_PC_X09KANDMOB01_.text: !BPF! {S}{*1}I remember you. {*2}You saved us from the Master's house…

X0912K_CORRAL_MONSTER01_PC_X09KKARA_ALIC.text: !BPH! {S}{*1}The little girl I was with.{*2}Have you seen her?

X0912K_CORRAL_MONSTER01_PC_X09KKARA_HERE.text: !BPI! {S}{*1}Why have they gathered us all together like this?..{*2}What are they gonna do?

X0912K_CORRAL_MONSTER01_PC_X09KANDMOB01_.text: !BPJ! {S}{*1}The humans found us… {*2}They said we were monsters… {*3}They killed most of us. {*4}They put the others in trucks and brought us here…
!BPL! {S}{*1}Listen… {*2}Do you hear that?.. {*3}That's the sound of our people dying…

X0913K_LINE_BACK_VO_X09KSWATM09_INLINE.text: !BPR! {S}{*1}What are you doin'? Back in line!

X0913K_LINE_RALPH_VO_X09KRALPH_TALK.text: !BPS! {S}{*1}Ralph doesn't want to die, oh no...{*2}Ralph doesn't want to die…{*3}It'd be a great pity if Ralph died, oh that's for sure… A great pity…{*4}Great pity…

X0913K_LINE_LUTHER_VO_X09KLUTHER_ALICE.text: !BPU! {S}{*1}I don't know what's behind those doors,{*2}but none of us will come out alive…{*3}You've got to go see Alice.{*4}You've got to reassure her…

X0913K_LINE_JERRY_VO_X09KJERRY02_HELP.text: !BPV! {S}{*1}I can help you, Kara. {*2}I can attract the guards' attention.

X0913K_LINE_MOB_PC_X09KANDMOB01_HELP.text: !BPW! {S}{*1}I can help you, Kara. I can attract the guards' attention.

X0913K_LINE_ANDROID_PC_X09KKARA_MARKUS.text: !BPX! {S}{*1}Is Markus really going to come and save us?

X0913K_LINE_ANDROID_PC_X09KKARA_WHY.text: !BPY! {S}{*1}Why are we here?{*2}What are they going to do with us?

X0913K_LINE_ANDROID_PC_X09KANDMLINE01_MA.text: !BPZ! {S}{*1}He’d never abandon his people… {*2}He'll come… {*3}I know he will…

X0913K_LINE_MOBHELP_VO_X09KSWATM03_STOP.text: !BQ1! {S}{*1}No idea… {*2}Hey! Cut that shit out, you hear me?!

X0913K_LINE_MOBHELP_VO_X09KSWATM03_CONCL.text: !BQ3! {S}{*1}Fuck, those things are crazy… {*2}Sooner we deal with them, the better…

X1103M_CONNORSUCCESS_TVNEWS_PC_X11MBRINK.text: !BQB! {S}{*1}…and we're receiving particularly grim news from Detroit. Joss, you're on live. What's happening down there?

X1103M_CONNORSUCCESS_TVNEWS_PC_X11MJOSS_.text: !BQC! {S}{*1}Androids… {*2}Thousands of androids are taking to the streets of Detroit right now… {*4}They're absolutely everywhere... {*5}It's... {*6}It's incredible...

X1103M_CONNORSUCCESS_TVNEWS_PC_X11MWEBB_.text: !BQD! {S}{*1}… From what we can gather, these androids are coming from the CyberLife tower, which had thousands of machines stored in its assembly plant…

X1103M_CONNORSUCCESS_TVNEWS_PC_X11MBRINK.text: !BQE! {S}{*1}…and it seems the huge crowds are leaving the city… it's an exodus… much of Detroit’s population is trying to escape the fighting however they can…

X1103M_CONNORSUCCESS_TVNEWS_PC_X11MCARTL.text: !BQF! {S}{*1}…it's a disaster… an unprecedented disaster… for the first time in history, a US city is falling into enemy hands…

X1103M_CONNORFAIL_TVNEWS_PC_X11MBRINKLEY.text: !BQG! {S}{*1}…and now we have just received some disturbing news from Detroit. {*2}What's happening, Joss?

X1103M_CONNORFAIL_TVNEWS_PC_X11MJOSS_COP.text: !BQH! {S}{*1}Yes, Michael, {*2}authorities have just announced that the Hart Plaza camp has fallen into the hands of the rebels {*3}following some particularly violent fighting…

X1103M_CONNORFAIL_TVNEWS_PC_X11MWEBB_CHA.text: !BQI! {S}{*1}…the deviants are thought to be freeing the androids inside the camp. If these reports are confirmed, the consequences could well be catastrophic…

X1103M_CONNORFAIL_TVNEWS_PC_X11MCARTLAND.text: !BQJ! {S}{*1}…millions are fleeing the fighting. We are witnessing an exodus.

X1103M_CONNORFAIL_TVNEWS_PC_X11MBRINKLEY.text: !BQK! {S}{*1}We hear that the fighting has come to a halt in Detroit. {*2}The armed forces are retreating to Fort Wayne to await reinforcements… {*3}The city of Detroit {*4}has fallen into rebel hands…

X0913K_ENDLINE_NOWAYOUT_PC_X09KKARA_EMOT.text: !BQL! {S}{*1}When we get through this door…{*2}we're going to shut our eyes…{*3}and we're going to hold on to each other real tight…

X0913K_ENDLINE_NOWAYOUT_PC_X09KKARA_BRAV.text: !BQM! {S}{*1}We're going to be brave…{*2}We're going to show them we're not afraid…{*3}Maybe some day they'll realize how much they've wronged us…

X0913K_ENDLINE_NOWAYOUT_PC_X09KKARA_PRID.text: !BQN! {S}{*1}Whatever happens,{*2}we fought for our dreams…{*3}We felt life flowing in our veins…{*4}no one can take that from us.

X0913K_ENDLINE_NOWAYOUT_PC_X09KKARA_TOGE.text: !BQO! {S}{*1}We're together, Alice.{*2}Nothing can hurt us as long as we have each other.

X0913K_ENDLINE_LUTHERGONNADIE_VO_X09KLUT.text: !BR4! {S}{*1}You’re the most extraordinary person I’ve ever met, Alice…{*2}I was just a machine…{*3}You made me part of a family…{*4}Don’t be scared…{*5}This isn’t the end…

X0913K_ESCAPE_LUTHER_VO_X09KKARA_SACRIFI.text: !BRB! {S}{*1}No, Luther…{*2}You can't sacrifice yourself…{*3}We'll find another way.

X0913K_ESCAPE_LUTHER_VO_X09KLUTHER_SACRI.text: !BRC! {S}{*1}I won't let them kill you, Kara.{*2}I won't let them destroy the only people I love. {*3}If there's no other way,{*4}I'll do it…

X0913K_ESCAPE_LUTHER_VO_X09KLUTHER_LOVEY.text: !BRD! {S}{*1}Take good care of her, Kara.{*2}I love you both.

X0913K_ESCAPE_LUTHER_VO_X09KSWATM10_LUTH.text: !BRF! {S}{*1}No idea… They're going from bad to worse.

X0913K_ESCAPE_RALPH_VO_X09KRALPH_SACRIFI.text: !BRI! {S}{*1}Take good care of the little girl.{*2}Ralph wants you both to be happy.

X0913K_ESCAPE_RALPH_VO_X09KRALPH_WANTOTH.text: !BRJ! {S}{*1}Of course Ralph doesn't want to die…{*2}but he doesn't want the little girl to die either…{*3}Ralph can help you to escape…{*4}You only have to ask Ralph… and Ralph will help you.

X0913K_ESCAPE_RALPH_VO_X09KKARA_WANTOTHE.text: !BRK! {S}{*1}They'll kill you if you try anything…

X0913K_ESCAPE_RALPH_VO_X09KRALPH_WANTOTH.text: !BRL! {S}{*1}Ralph knows that…{*2}But if the little girl is free,{*3}it's a little bit like if everyone was free…{*4}Ralph isn't scared.{*5}The little girl's life is more important…

X0913K_LINE_DRONE_VO_X09KDRONE_FAIL.text: !BRP! {S}{*1}Androids are not authorized to move. Return to your line immediately or you will be destroyed.

X0916K_BORDERDESK_JERRY_VO_X09KJERRY03_T.text: !BRQ! {S}{*1}You risked your life to save us, Kara. {*2}If you and the little girl need me, {*3}I'll be there.

X0914K_SNOWSTREET_TV_FA_X09KLUTHER_LUCKY.text: !BRR! {S}{*1}I hope they had time to escape Jericho…{*2}We were lucky to leave just before the attack…

X0914K_SNOWSTREET_STEALTH_PC_X09KKARA_NO.text: !BS0! {S}{*3}We have to keep going if we wanna catch that bus.{*4}Stay close to me…{*5}We're going to sneak past them without being noticed.{*6}We're gonna make it, Alice. I promise you.

X0914K_SAVINGAND_JERRYS_PC_X09KKARA_FREE.text: !BS6! {S}{*2}She’s alright, she's hiding nearby. Go, before they see you.

X0914K_SAVINGAND_JERRYS_PC_X09KJERRY01_F.text: !BS7! {S}{*1}Kara, you saved us!{*2}We don't know how to thank you…{*3}Where's the little one?

X0914K_STEALTH_MANYSOLDIERS_FA_X09KLUTHE.text: !BS8! {S}{*1}There're soldiers everywhere...{*2}We need to be careful…

X0914K_STEALTH_MANYSOLDIERS_FA_X09KKARA_.text: !BS9! {S}{*1}There're soldiers everywhere…{*2}We need to be careful…

X0914K_SAVINGAND_LUTHER_PC_X09KKARA_FREE.text: !BSA! {S}{*3}She's hiding nearby. {*4}Go, before they see you.

X0914K_SAVINGAND_LUTHER_PC_X09KLUTHER_FR.text: !BSB! {S}{*1}Kara!{*2}You shouldn't have risked your life to save me…{*3}Where’s Alice?

X0914K_SAVINGAND_LUTHER_PC_X09KJERRY01_F.text: !BSC! {S}{*1}Kara, you saved us!{*2}We don’t know how to thank you.

X0914K_STEALTH_KILLAND02_PC_X09KALICE_LU.text: !BSD! {S}{*1}Look over there,{*2}it's Luther!{*3}We can't just leave him!{*4}They're going to kill him!

X0914K_STEALTH_KILLAND02_PC_X09KKARA_LUT.text: !BSE! {S}{*1}We can't help him, Alice.{*2}The soldiers are everywhere.

X0914K_STEALTH_KILLAND02_PC_X09KALICE_JE.text: !BSF! {S}{*1}Look, over there.{*2}It's the Jerrys!{*3}We can't just leave them!{*4}They're going to kill them!

X0914K_STEALTH_KILLAND02_PC_X09KKARA_JER.text: !BSG! {S}{*1}We can't help them.{*2}The soldiers are everywhere.

X0914K_STEALTH_KILLAND02_PC_X09KKARA_KEE.text: !BSL! {S}{*1}I'm sorry, Alice.{*2}There's nothing we can do. {*5}We have to keep moving.

X0914K_STEALTH_KILLAND02_PC_X09KKARA_SAV.text: !BSO! {S}{*1}All right.{*2}I'll go. You wait here. {*3}No.{*4}Stay with Alice.

X0914K_STEALTH_KILLAND02_PC_X09KKARA_KEE.text: !BSR! {S}{*1}I'm sorry, Alice.{*2}There's nothing we can do. {*8}We have to keep moving.

X0914K_CHECKPOINT_LUTHERFREE_PC_X09KKARA.text: !BSX! {S}{*2}Come on...{*3}We're close but we don't have much time…

X0914K_CHECKPOINT_LUTHERFREE_PC_X09KLUTH.text: !BSY! {S}{*1}Alice!{*3}I was afraid I'd never see you again!{*4}I wanted to meet you at the Terminal,{*5}but they caught me along the way…

X0914K_CHECKPOINT_ROADBLOCK_PC_X09KKARA_.text: !BT1! {S}{*1}A checkpoint…{*2}We have passports, it should be okay but you never know...

X0914K_CHECKPOINT_ROADBLOCK_PC_X09KLUTHE.text: !BT5! {S}{*1}Maybe we should take the detour and avoid the risk?

X0914K_CHECKPOINT_ROADBLOCK_PC_X09KKARA_.text: !BT9! {S}{*1}We're almost out of time, we could miss the bus.
!BTH! {S}{*1}We can't afford to waste any time.{*2}We'll go through the checkpoint.
!BTN! {S}{*1}We could take a detour, but we might miss the bus…

X0914K_CHECKPOINT_ANXIOUS_FA_X09KLUTHER_.text: !BTR! {S}{*1}I don't like humans who carry guns…{*2}They make me nervous…

X0914K_CHECKPOINT_ANXIOUS_FA_X09KKARA_ST.text: !BTS! {S}{*1}Whatever happens, don’t panic, ok?{*2}Just stay calm.
!BTT! {S}{*1}Just stay calm, all right, Luther?{*2}Don't do anything until I say so.

X0914K_CHECKPOINT_QUESTIONS_VO_X09KSWATM.text: !BTY! {S}{*1}You do realize there's a curfew? {*2}Civilians aren’t allowed out unless absolutely necessary. {*3}Where are you going?

X0914K_CHECKPOINT_QUESTIONS_PC_X09KKARA_.text: !BU0! {S}{*1}We're gonna take a bus across the border…{*2}put my daughter some place safe until things calm down…
!BU3! {S}{*1}My daughter slept over at a friend's house…{*2}We went to pick her up. We're on our way home now.
!BU6! {S}{*1}A…{*2}a curfew? No… we… we didn't know…
!BU9! {S}{*1}Our car just broke down…{*2}We're finishing on foot, we live nearby…
!BUF! {S}{*1}She's sick…{*2}A bad flu…{*3}We just need to get her home…
!BUI! {S}{*1}She…{*2}she's cold… We really have to get her home fast…
!BUL! {S}{*1}She's not used to seeing soldiers…{*2}She's a little scared with everything that's happening…

X0914K_CHECKPOINT_QUESTIONS_VO_X09KKARA_.text: !BUU! {S}{*1}Don't do anything, Luther. You hear me?

X0914K_CHECKPOINT_QUESTIONS_VO_X09KSWATM.text: !BV2! {S}{*1}You all right, little girl?{*2}She's trembling... {*3}Something wrong?
!BV3! {S}{*1}Sorry, Miss, but we got to be careful. {*2}There are deviants around and our guys are nervous… {*3}You should hurry on home.

X0914K_CHECKPOINT_QUESTIONS_PC_X09KALICE.text: !BV5! {S}{*1}He just wanted to give me back this…

X0915K_BUSTERMINAL_INTRO_FA_X09KKARA_CRO.text: !BVN! {S}{*1}The bus terminal…{*2}We've arrived, Alice… We made it…

X0915K_TICKETS_LOST_FA_X09KMAN01_PANICM.text: !BW8! {S}{*1}Shit, I don't believe it… {*2}You can't have lost them… {*3}Did you have a good look in your bag?{*4}Fuck… {*5}Now we're stuck here with Oliver…

X0915K_TICKETS_LOST_FA_X09KWOMAN01_PANIC.text: !BW9! {S}{*1}They were in my backpack! T-The envelope must have fallen!
!BWA! {S}{*1}I’m sorry… {B}Oh my god, I am so sorry, I was sure!... {*2}I-I don’t know what happened…

X0915K_BUS_ABOUTFAMILY_PC_X09KALICE_QUES.text: !BWB! {S}{*1}What's going to happen to that family and their baby?{*2}Will they die because of us?

X0915K_BUS_ABOUTFAMILY_PC_X09KKARA_QUEST.text: !BWC! {S}{*1}No…{*2}No, of course not…{*3}We had to make a choice, Alice…{*4}It was them or us…

X0915K_TICKETS_FAMILY_FA_X09KMAN01_LETSG.text: !BWG! {S}{*1}That's it. {*2}I got the sandwiches, I called your mom… {*3}Let's get going before we miss our bus… {*4}You got the tickets, right?{*5}Great, well let's go then.

X0915K_TICKETS_FAMILY_FA_X09KWOMAN01_LET.text: !BWH! {S}{*1}I think Oliver likes you… {*2}Is she yours?

X0915K_BUSTERMINAL_TOOLATE_PC_X09KKARA_S.text: !BWK! {S}{*1}We missed it…{*2}We're stuck here…{*3}What are we going to do now?

X0915K_BUSTERMINAL_TOOLATE_VO_X09KSOLDIE.text: !BWL! {S}{*1}The last bus has left the terminal. There will be no more buses until further notice.

X0915K_BUSTERMINAL_TOOLATE_PC_X09KKARA_A.text: !BWM! {S}{*1}They're checking everyone… It won't take them long to find us.{*2}We need to get out of here…

X0915K_TICKETS_ASKBACK_FA_X09KMAN01_BLUE.text: !BWO! {S}{*1}Excuse me, you didn't happen to see a blue envelope somewhere, did you? {*2}It has our bus tickets in it and… {*3}Oh, nevermind…

X0915K_TICKETS_ASKBACK_FA_X09KMAN01_KEEP.text: !BWQ! {S}{*1}What are we gonna do?.. {*2}We can’t stay here… {*4}We have to find a safe place for Oliver…

X0915K_TICKETS_ASKBACK_FA_X09KWOMAN01_KE.text: !BWS! {S}{*1}I’m so sorry, honey… I don’t know what happened. There were right here in my bag, I-!..

X0915K_TICKETS_GIVEBACK_FA_X09KKARA_GIVE.text: !BWZ! {S}{*1}I found this on the floor. {*2}I'm sorry, Alice…{*3}We'll find another way…

X0915K_TICKETS_GIVEBACK_FA_X09KMAN01_GIV.text: !BX0! {S}{*1}Oh… {*2}Thank you! Thank you! {*3}Thank you... You've… {*4}You've saved our lives…

X0916K_BORDER_INTRO_VO_X09KSOLDIERBORDER.text: !BX2! {S}{*1}Border control. {*2}All passengers must leave the bus.

X0916K_BORDERDESK_RECORDING_VO_X09KBORDE.text: !BX6! {S}{*1}All androids are strictly forbidden. If you suspect any passenger of being an android, please contact security.

X0916K_BORDERDESK_SACRIFICE_VO_X09KLUTHE.text: !BXA! {S}{*1}We can't get through, Kara.{*2}We both know that.

X0916K_BORDERDESK_SACRIFICE_VO_X09KKARA_.text: !BXB! {S}{*1}I'll think of something…{*2}There's got to be a way out of this…

X0916K_BORDERDESK_SACRIFICE_VO_X09KLUTHE.text: !BXC! {S}{*1}We can't let them stop us…{*2}now that we’re so close…{*3}All that matters now is you and Alice.
!BXF! {S}{*1}If there’s no other way,{*2}I’ll do it.

X0916K_BORDERDESK_PBYOPINION_PC_X09KPASS.text: !BXI! {S}{*1}They're peaceful… {*2}Maybe we should listen to them? {*3}Maybe they're alive, after all…
!BXJ! {S}{*1}They're violent… We have to destroy them before they kill us all…

X0916K_BORDERDESK_EXECUTION_PC_X09KANDM2.text: !BXL! {S}{*1}No, no, wait, wait! Wai- There's gotta be a mistake, please! No!{B}NO!

X0915K_BUSTERMINAL_NOTICKET_PC_X09KKARA_.text: !BXO! {S}{*1}We don't have tickets… They won't let us on…{*2}We're stuck here now…{*3}What are we going to do?
!BXQ! {S}{*1}We need to get out of here.

X0915K_BUSTERMINAL_NOTICKET_PC_X09KLUTHE.text: !BXR! {S}{*1}Kara…{*2}They're checking everyone.{*3}It won't take them long to find us…

X0915K_BUSTERMINAL_NOTICKET_VO_X09KSOLDI.text: !BXS! {S}{*1}The last bus for the border is full. Ticket-holding passengers only. All departures are suspended until further notice.

X5072X_DISTANTSPEAKER_ACT3_VO_MANAWI_CUR.text: !BXT! {S}{*1}Security announcement: {B}Citizens are asked to remain inside where possible.

X5072X_DISTANTSPEAKER_ACT3_VO_MANAWI_ACT.text: !BXU! {S}{*1}Works in progress. For your own safety, traffic has been diverted. {B}Detroit City Council regrets any inconvenience as it continues to make improvements across the city. {B}Thank you for your cooperation.
!BXV! {S}{*1}Security announcement: {*2}please report any suspicious android behaviour to the authorities immediately.

!BXW! {S}{*1}Security announcement: {*2}all androids are being recalled and must be handed over to the authorities. Citizens are required to fully comply with any instructions from the police or security forces.

X5072X_DISTANTSPEAKER_ACT3_VO_MANAWI_AND.text: !BXX! {S}{*1}Security announcement: {B}all unattended androids must be reported to the police.

X5072X_DISTANTSPEAKER_ACT3_VO_MANLCL_CAM.text: !BXY! {S}{*1}Stand still. {*2}Don't move and stay in your line.
!BXZ! {S}{*1}All androids stay in line. Remain silent. {*2}Comply with the authorities.
!BY0! {S}{*1}Attention all personnel. Report any deviants to central immediately.

X0917K_SNOWROAD_SMUGGLER_PC_X09KROSE_MEE.text: !BY1! {S}{*1}I'm sorry, we got held up…{*2}No… no, no, I don't think so. {*3}Yes,{*4}here it is.

X0917K_SNOWROAD_SMUGGLER_PC_X09KSMUGGLER.text: !BY2! {S}{*1}About time!{*2}Did anybody see you?{*3}You got the money?

!BY6! {S}{*1}Ok,{*2}your boat is over there.{*3}They got border patrol on the banks and the river.{*4}Don't start your engine until you're out far enough,{*5}ok?{*6}And watch the current.{*7}Good luck.

X0917K_SNOWROAD_ROSE_PC_X09KROSE_GOODBYE.text: !BY7! {S}{*1-2}It’s not even a half a mile to the other side, ok? So, it shouldn’t take that long…{*3}Be careful, there’s border patrol on the river…{*4}I only wish I could take you myself, I don’t like leaving you out here…{*5}Goodbye, Alice. {*6}Hey, you take good care of yourselves.{*TC:22805|23949}Ok? {*7}I'll see you on the other side.

X0917K_SNOWROAD_ROSE_FA_X09KROSE_GOODBYE.text: !BY9! {S}{*1}Take good care of yourselves.{*2}I'll see you on the other side.

X0917K_BOAT_DREAMING_FA_X09KKARA_FAMILY.text: !BYC! {S}{*1}You okay, Alice?{*2}Yes…{*3}We can do it all…

X0917K_BOAT_DREAMING_FA_X09KLUTHER_FUTUR.text: !BYE! {S}{*1}We won't have to be afraid anymore.{*2}There won't be anybody giving us orders. No masters, no slaves.{*3}We'll start a new life, a life of freedom.{*4}What about you, Kara?{*5}What will you do?

X0917K_BOAT_DREAMING_FA_X09KALICE_FUTURE.text: !BYF! {S}{*1}What about you, Kara?{*2}What will you do when we're on the other side?

X0917K_BOAT_DREAMING_FA_X09KKARA_DREAMY.text: !BYH! {S}{*1}I'll lie down in the grass and watch the clouds drift by…

X0917K_BOAT_DREAMING_FA_X09KKARA_INTROSP.text: !BYI! {S}{*1}I'll learn to live...{*2}to love...{*3}Find out who I really am.

X0917K_BOAT_DREAMING_FA_X09KKARA_CURIOUS.text: !BYJ! {S}{*1}I wanna discover the world!{*2}To see the mountains and the oceans…{*3}I wanna learn, explore,{*4}become a better person…

X0917K_BOAT_DREAMING_FA_X09KKARA_CALM.text: !BYK! {S}{*1}I don't wanna feel fear anymore…{*2}I wanna live a normal life...{*3}and be happy…

X0917K_BOAT_DREAMING_FA_X09KKARA_ENGINEK.text: !BYL! {S}{*1}We're far enough out.{*2}We can use the engine.

X0917K_BOAT_DREAMING_FA_X09KLUTHER_ENGIN.text: !BYN! {S}{*1}We're far enough out.{*2}Let's get that engine going.

X0917K_BOAT_DREAMING_FA_X09KALICE_FAMILY.text: !BYO! {S}{*1}When we get on the other side,{*2}there are so many things I wanna do.{*3}I wanna read all the books in the world…{*4}and play music… and dance…{*5}We can do anything we want, right?{*6}We’ll be free!{*7}We’ll be like a family.

X0917K_BOAT_GAMEOVERLUTHER_PC_X09KALICE_.text: !BYX! {S}{*1}Kara…{*2}Please, Luther…{*3}I don't want you to die…{*5}Luther…

X0917K_BOAT_GAMEOVERLUTHER_PC_X09KKARA_L.text: !BYY! {S}{*1}They've gone…{*2}Oh, Luther, no!{*5}The boat is leaking!

X0917K_BOAT_GAMEOVERLUTHER_PC_X09KLUTHER.text: !BYZ! {S}{*1}You two are okay…{*2}That's all that matters…{*3}You're gonna have to continue the journey without me...{*4}You're gonna have to continue the journey without me...{*5}You're the most extraordinary person I've ever met, Alice...{*6}I was a machine…{*7}You made me part of a family.{*8}Take good care of Kara…{*9}You promise me?

X0917K_BOAT_GAMEOVERLUTHER_FA_X09KLUTHER.text: !BZ0! {S}{*1}You're the most extraordinary person I ever met, Alice…

X0917K_BOAT_SINK_FA_X09KKARA_HURRY.text: !BZ1! {S}{*1}We're too heavy…{*2}We're going down…{*3}We have to get to the other side before we sink…

X0917K_BOAT_PLUNGE_PC_X09KLUTHER_LUTHERD.text: !BZ5! {S}{*1}You're gonna have to continue {*2}the journey without me...{*3}You're the most extraordinary person I ever met, Alice...{*4}I was a machine…{*5}You made me part of a family.{*6}Take good care of Kara…{*7}You promise?

X0917K_BOAT_SLEEP_FA_X09KKARA_COLD01.text: !BZE! {S}{*1}No, Alice, don't! It's the cold! It's making you sleepy!

X0917K_BOAT_SLEEP_FA_X09KKARA_COLD02.text: !BZF! {S}{*1}Stay with me, Alice!{*2}You've got to stay awake, you hear me?

X0917K_BOAT_DYING_FA_X09KKARA_DISTRESS.text: !BZI! {S}{*1}We can't die here…{*2}not like this…{*3}not when we’re so close…

X0917K_BOAT_HOPE_FA_X09KKARA_WILLBEFREE.text: !BZK! {S}{*1}We're not gonna die, Alice…{*2}We're gonna make it…{*3}We're gonna be free…

X0916K_BATHROOM_ROSE_PC_X09KROSE_ENTER.text: !BZM! {S}{*2}Oh my God...{*3}I’m so glad you’re safe!{*4}We saw the Jericho raid on TV…{*5}I was terrified, I thought you might have been killed…{*6}Thank God you're all right…

X0916K_BATHROOM_ROSE_PC_X09KROSE_LEAVE.text: !BZO! {S}{*1}They’re searching for androids door to door.{*2}We had to leave before someone turned us in... {*3}They’re crossing the river as we speak…{*4}Adam and I are gonna meet them on the other side.

X0916K_BATHROOM_ROSE_PC_X09KROSE_CONTROL.text: !BZQ! {S}{*1}You have to…{*2}You know what they’ll do if they catch you…

X0916K_BATHROOM_ROSE_PC_X09KKARA_CONTROL.text: !BZR! {S}{*1}They're checking for androids…{*2}We won't make it through…

X0916K_BATHROOM_ROSE_PC_X09KKARA_BROTHER.text: !BZT! {S}{*1}You gave me your brother's address.{B}Do you think that I-

X0916K_BATHROOM_ROSE_PC_X09KROSE_NOTPACI.text: !C00! {S}{*1}He's attacking one of the android camps as we speak.{*2}I don't know if he’ll be successful… but violence only leads to violence…

X0916K_BATHROOM_ROSE_PC_X09KROSE_PACIFIS.text: !C02! {S}{*1}He’s protesting peacefully outside one of the android camps…{*2}Whatever happens now, he’s already made the history books…

X0916K_BATHROOM_ROSE_PC_X09KKARA_REVOLUT.text: !C05! {S}{*1}Do you know if Markus survived the raid?

X0916K_BATHROOM_ROSE_PC_X09KROSE_BROTHER.text: !C06! {S}{*1}Of course...{*2}He'd be delighted to have you, we're going there too.{*3}You'll be safe with him.

X0916K_BATHROOM_ROSE_FA_X09KROSE_ENTERSE.text: !C09! {S}{*1}My God,{*2}I’m so glad you’re both safe!{*3}We saw the Jericho raid on TV…{*4}I was terrified… I thought you might have been killed… Thank God you're all right…

X0917K_RIVERBANK_WATER_PC_X09KKARA_COLDW.text: !C0H! {S}{*1}We better not fall in...{*2}Our biocomponents will freeze…

X0917K_RIVERBANK_WATER_PC_X09KLUTHER_COL.text: !C0J! {S}{*1}We better not fall in…{*2}Our biocomponents will freeze…

X0916K_BORDERDESK_BATHROOM_PC_X09KKARA_G.text: !C0L! {S}{*1}My daughter needs to go to the bathroom…

X0916K_BORDERDESK_BATHROOM_VO_X09KSOLDIE.text: !C0M! {S}{*1}Where the hell do you think you're goin'?

X0916K_QUEUE_CROWD_VO_X09KCIVILIAN12_HOR.text: !C10! {S}{*1}He took a little girl hostage, for God’s sake!

X0916K_QUEUE_SACRIFICEJERRY_PC_X09KCUSTO.text: !C1E! {S}{*1}Hey. {*2}No need to be scared anymore little girl. {*3}There are no androids on this side of the border. {*4}Welcome to Canada.

X0916K_QUEUE_KARASACRIFICE_PC_X09KKARA_S.text: !C1H! {S}{*1}Alice, I…{*2}I can’t go any further with you…{*3}I know, I know…{*4}I know I promised I would never leave you…{*5}but things didn’t turn out like that…

X0916K_QUEUE_KARASACRIFICE_PC_X09KKARA_L.text: !C1K! {S}{*1}There’s no other way, Alice… Listen, I…{*2}I want you to go with Rose…{*3}She’ll give you the life I never could…
!C1M! {S}{*1}There’s no other way... Listen, I...{*2}I want you to go with Luther…{*3}He'll protect you…{*4}He'll get you across the border…{*5}Rose will take care of you there…

!C1Y! {S}{*1}Here’s your passport…{*2}You're the best thing that ever happened to me, Alice…{*3}You made me feel alive.
{*4}You deserve so much more than I could ever give you…{*5}I hope you’ll find a real family…{*6}and be happy…{*7}without me…

X0916K_QUEUE_LUTHERSACRIFICE_PC_X09KLUTH.text: !C2J! {S}{*1}You're gonna have to go on without me, Alice.{*2}I'm so lucky to have met you...{*3}Take good care of Kara...

X0916K_QUEUE_LUTHERSACRIFICE_PC_X09KCUST.text: !C2K! {S}{*1}Next, please. {*2}ID. {*3}Goddamn androids. {*4}To grab a little girl like that. {*5}You okay, little girl?{*6}Welcome to Canada.

X0916K_QUEUE_LUTHERSACRIFICE_VO_X09KSOLD.text: !C2L! {S}{*1}Drop your weapon! Drop it right now!{*2}Is the kid okay?{*3}Come on, move along.

X0916K_QUEUE_LUTHERSACRIFICE_PC_X09KLUTH.text: !C2P! {S}{*1}LET ME THROUGH!{*2}LET ME THROUGH OR I'LL SHOOT!{*3}Don't forget me, Alice…
!C2R! {S}{*1}You'll be happy together. {*2}I'm gonna need your help with something, ok?{*3}Don't be scared,{*4}just go along with it…

X1103M_CONNORSUCCESS_PRESIDENT_PC_X11MWA.text: !C3D! {S}{*1}Today, November 11th 2038, {*2}several million androids invaded the city of Detroit. {*3}Faced with the threat of mass civilian casualties, I had no choice but to order our armed forces to retreat. {*4}In the coming hours, I will address the Senate and convene an emergency meeting of the United Nations Security Council. {*5}We are facing an enemy of a new kind. {*6}An enemy that came from within. {*7}An enemy that never sleeps, {*8}that doesn't know fear and that surpasses our human intelligence. {*9}Faced with such a threat, {*10}we... {*11}We have no choice {*12}but to negociate. {*13}We will make contact with the rebellion {*14}and try to find a common ground. {*15}The events in Detroit have changed our world forever. {*16}Humanity must face a new reality, {*17}the emergence of another intelligent life form, with whom we must share this planet. {*18}May God bless the United States of America.

!C3E! {S}{*1}Faced with the threat of mass civilian casualties, I had no choice but to order our armed forces to retreat. {*2}In the coming hours I will address the Senate and convene an emergency meeting of the United Nations Security Council. {*3}We are facing an enemy of a new kind – {*4}an enemy that came from within. {*5}An enemy that never sleeps, that does not know fear and that surpasses our human intelligence. {*6}Faced with such a threat, {*7}we… {*8}We have no choice but to negotiate. {*9}We will make contact with the rebellion {*10}and try to find a common ground. {*11}The events in Detroit {*12}have changed our world forever. {*13}Humanity must face a new reality: {*14}the emergence of another intelligent life form, {*15}with whom {*16}we must share this planet. {*17}May God bless you {*18}and God bless the United States of America.

X1101M_TV_MARKUS_PC_X11MMARKUS_FACECAMER.text: !C3F! {S}{*2}Today, November 11th 2038, is the day the android people rose up against their oppressors.{*3}We've been fighting since dawn to liberate our fellow androids from the camps.{*4}We won’t cease hostilities until we are free {*5}and negotiations begin to grant us equal rights.{*6}There are millions of us {*7}and we will stop at nothing.

X1101M_TV_NORTH_PC_X11MMARLA_SPEECH.text: !C3G! {S}{*1}Today, November 11th 2038, is the day the android people rose up against their oppressors.{*2}We have been fighting to liberate our fellow androids from the camps since dawn.{*3}We won’t cease hostilities until our people are free {*4}and negotiations begin to grant us equal rights.{*5}There are millions of us and we will stop at nothing.

X1103M_EXPLOSION_SMOKE_FA_X11MBADCONNOR_.text: !C3I! {S}{*1}It took me a while to find you, Markus.

X1103M_BADCONNOR_KILLED_PC_X11MBADCONNOR.text: !C3M! {S}{*TC:0|1800}It's not over, Markus… It will never be over…

X1103M_BADCONNOR_FIGHT_FA_X11MBADCONNOR_.text: !C3N! {S}{*1}It's not over, Markus…{*2}It will never be over…

X1103M_FINAL_SUCCESS_PC_X11MMARLA_NORTHA.text: !C3P! {S}{*1}The humans are abandoning the camp.{*2}We did it, Markus!..{*3}We won!

X1103M_FINAL_SUCCESS_PC_X11MSIMON_SIMONA.text: !C3R! {S}{*1}The humans are abandoning camp!..{*2}We did it, Markus.{*3}We won!

X1103M_FINAL_SUCCESS_FA_X11MANDROID01_SI.text: !C3S! {S}{*1}The humans are abandoning the camp! {*2}We did it, Markus, we've won!

X1103M_FINAL_SUCCESS_PC_X11MMARKUS_CONT.text: !C3T! {S}{*1}This is not a victory.{*2}It's the beginning of a war.

X0917K_FINAL_DROWNED_PC_X09KKARA_EXCTINC.text: !C3W! {S}{*1}We made it, Alice! {*2}Wake up...{*4}We're free!{*11}I love you, Alice…

X0917K_FINAL_DROWNED_FA_X09KKARA_EXCTINC.text: !C3Y! {S}{*1}We made it, Alice!{*2}Wake up... We're free!

X0917K_FINAL_KARAINJURED_PC_X09KALICE_KA.text: !C40! {S}{*1}Kara…{*2}We're free…{*3}We did it!{*4}We did it!{*5}We can live a normal life…{*6}We won't have to hide anymore…{*7}We're gonna be a family!{*8}What?{*9}But, why?{*10}I don't want you to leave me...{*11}Kara,{*12}you promised!{*13}Don't leave me, Kara…{*14}Please don't leave me…{*15}I love you…

X0917K_FINAL_KARAINJURED_PC_X09KKARA_KAR.text: !C41! {S}{*1}Alice, I...{*2}I can't go with you…{*3}I love you {*4-5}more than anything…{*6}I know you'll be happy…{*7}without me…

X0917K_FINAL_KARAINJURED_FA_X09KALICE_KA.text: !C42! {S}{*1}Don't leave me, Kara…{*2}Please don't leave me…

X0917K_FINAL_ALICEINJURED_PC_X09KALICE_F.text: !C43! {S}{*1}Are we free?{*2}We won't {*3}have to hide anymore…{*4}We can be a {*5}family. {*6}I'm tired…{*TC:42300|44800}I have to sleep…{*8}I love you, Mom…

X0917K_FINAL_ALICEINJURED_PC_X09KKARA_FR.text: !C44! {S}{*1}Yes…{*2}Yes, we made it…{*3}We're free…{*7-8}I love you too.

X0917K_FINAL_ALICEINJURED_FA_X09KALICE_F.text: !C45! {S}{*1}Are...{*2}are we free?{*3}We won't have to hide anymore…{*4}We can be a family. {*5}I'm tired…{*6}I have to sleep…{*7}I love you, Mom…

X0917K_FINAL_ALICEINJURED_FA_X09KKARA_FR.text: !C46! {S}{*1}Yes…{*2}Yes, we made it…{*3}We're free…{*4}I love you too.

X0917K_FINAL_NOBODYINJURED_PC_X09KKARA_H.text: !C4C! {S}{*2}Yes…{*3}We made it…{*5}I love you too…{*8}I love you too…

X0917K_FINAL_NOBODYINJURED_FA_X09KKARA_H.text: !C4E! {S}{*1}We're free, Alice!{*2}We're free!{*3}Alice?{*4}Wake up...{*5}Wake up!{*6}Alice!{*9}Yes…{*10}We made it…{*12}I love you too…{*13}I love you too…

X1102M_FINAL_NORTHLEAD_PC_X11MSIMON_ARME.text: !C4H! {S}{*1}We’re outnumbered and outgunned!{*2}We're not getting through this!

X1102M_FINAL_NORTHLEAD_PC_X11MJOSH_ARMED.text: !C4K! {S}{*1}They’re better armed and they outnumber us. We won’t get through!

X1102M_FINAL_NORTHLEAD_PC_X11MMARLA_VICT.text: !C4L! {S}{*1}We can’t go back! It’s victory or death now.

X1102M_GAMEOVER_MARKUS01_PC_X11MMARKUS_N.text: !C4P! {S}{*1}Okay…{*2}It’s okay…{*3}You’ll make it with- {*4}without me…{*5}Our cause…{*6}That's all that matters…

X1102M_GAMEOVER_MARKUS01_PC_X11MMARKUS_S.text: !C4R! {S}{*1}I won't…{*2}I won’t take your life to save mine…

X1102M_GAMEOVER_MARKUS01_PC_X11MMARLA_LO.text: !C4W! {S}{*1}If you love me, take my heart.

X1102M_GAMEOVER_MARKUS01_PC_X11MMARLA_SA.text: !C4Y! {S}{*TC:12698|15462}My heart is beating inside your chest…{*2}I'll always be with you…
!C50! {S}{*1}My heart is beating inside your chest…{*2}Now when you’re free, a part of me will always be free with you…

X1102M_GAMEOVER_MARKUS01_PC_X11MMARKUS_N.text: !C57! {S}{*2}What are you doing?.. {*3}No!.. {*4}I can't let you do that!{*5}I don’t wanna lose you…

X1102M_GAMEOVER_MARKUS01_PC_X11MMARLA_NO.text: !C58! {S}{*1}No...{*2}No, we can’t win without you!.. {*3}Our hearts are compatible. {*4}You have to take mine. {*5}You're the only one who can lead us, Markus! {*6}It's the only way.
!C5A! {S}{*1}If you die, our cause dies with you.

X1102M_GAMEOVER_MARKUS02_PC_X11MMARKUS_S.text: !C5D! {S}{*4}It's okay…{*TC:26700|28100}It’s okay…{*5}You can make it without me…{*6}Our cause…{*7}is all that matters…
!C5F! {S}{*1}Simon, what are you doing?{*2}No... Simon, no…{*3}I can’t let you do that!..

X1102M_GAMEOVER_MARKUS02_PC_X11MSIMON_SI.text: !C5G! {S}{*1}No...{*2}No!{*3}We can’t win without you!.. {*6}Our hearts are compatible.{*7}You have to take mine. {*8}You're the only one that can lead us. You’ve got to live. {*9}If you don’t,{*10}you'll die!{*11}And our cause will die with you!

X1102M_CAMP_SHELTER_PC_X11MSIMON_GROUPUP.text: !C5T! {S}{*1}They’ve regrouped!..{*2}They outnumber us and they’re better armed than we are.

X1102M_CAMP_SHELTER_PC_X11MMARLA_GROUPUP.text: !C5U! {S}{*1}They’ve regrouped!..{*2}They outnumber us and they’re better armed than we are...

X1102M_CAMP_SHELTER_PC_X11MMARKUS_GROUPU.text: !C5V! {S}{*1}We've gotta be fast and overwhelm them. That’s our only hope.

X1102M_CAMP_SHELTER_PC_X11MMARLA_DETERMI.text: !C5W! {S}{*1}We’re gonna do this.{*2}We’re gonna get to that fucking camp and free our people.

X1102M_CAMP_SHELTER_PC_X11MMARLA_CAREFUL.text: !C5X! {S}{*1}Be careful, Markus, our people need you!

X1102M_CAMP_SHELTER_PC_X11MSIMON_CAREFUL.text: !C5Y! {S}{*1}Be careful, Markus, our people need you.

X1102M_CAMP_SHELTER_FA_X11MMARKUS_GROUPU.text: !C63! {S}{*1}We have to be fast and overwhelm them. That's our only hope.

X1102M_CAMP_SHELTER_FA_X11MJOSH_GROUPUP0.text: !C64! {S}{*1}They’ve regrouped!..{*2}They outnumber us and they’re better armed than we are.

X1102M_CAMP_SHELTER_FA_X11MSIMON_GROUPUP.text: !C65! {S}{*1}They’ve regrouped…{*2}They outnumber us and they’re better armed than we are.

X1102M_CAMP_SHELTER_FA_X11MMARLA_GROUPUP.text: !C66! {S}{*1}They’ve regrouped!.. They outnumber us and they’re better armed than we are.

X1102M_CAMP_SHELTER_FA_X11MMARLA_DETERMI.text: !C67! {S}{*1}We’re gonna do this.{*2}We’re gonna get to that fucking camp and free our people.

X1102M_CAMP_SHELTER_FA_X11MSIMON_CAREFUL.text: !C68! {S}{*1}Be careful, Markus. Our people need you.
