X1102M_CAMP_SHELTER_FA_X11MMARLA_CAREFUL.text: !C6A! {S}{*1}Be careful, Markus, our people need you.

X1102M_INTRO_JOURNALIST_PC_X11MJOSS_TVNE.text: !C6B! {S}{*1}…they seem to be headed towards the camps where the androids have been interned pending destruction… {*2}Soldiers have taken up positions around the Hart Plaza camp. {*3}Authorities seem to be expecting a confrontation with the rebel androids here at any time…

X1102M_INTRO_JOURNALIST_PC_X11MBRINKLEY_.text: !C6C! {S}{*1}…the situation is escalating toward civil war in Detroit, with our armed forces preparing to put down the android rebellion…

X1102M_CAMP_JOSHDEAD_PC_X11MJOSH_DYING.text: !C6L! {S}{*1}You won’t save me this time, Markus…{*2}Fear…{*3}that’s what causes violence…{*4}The blood we spill…{*5}will be on our hands…

X1102M_CAMP_SCAREDAND_PC_X11MMARKUS_01RE.text: !C7M! {S}{*1}You’re not gonna die!{*2}Alright, I know you’re scared, we're all scared!.. We came here to save our people, right?{*3}That’s exactly what we’re gonna do.

X1102M_CAMP_SCAREDAND_PC_X11MMARKUS_01MO.text: !C7N! {S}{*1}They’re killing people in that camp.{*2}You wanna abandon them now? Wanna forget what we’re fighting for?

X1102M_CAMP_SCAREDAND_PC_X11MMARKUS_01RA.text: !C7O! {S}{*1}Hey! You believe in rA9, right?{*2}Good! {*3}rA9 is with us.{*4}We can't fail.

X1102M_CAMP_SCAREDAND_PC_X11MMARKUS_01SH.text: !C7P! {S}{*1}You came all this way to free your people.{*2}There’s no going back now!

X1102M_CAMP_SCAREDAND_PC_X11MMARKUS_02GO.text: !C7R! {S}{*1}You go back, and you hide 'til it’s over, ok?{*2}Alright.

X1102M_CAMP_SCAREDAND_PC_X11MMARKUS_02AD.text: !C7S! {S}{*1}You gotta keep going!{*2}There’s nothing else we can do, alright? Come on!

X1102M_CAMP_SCAREDAND_FA_X11MSCAREDAND01.text: !C7T! {S}{*1}I don't wanna die, Markus! {*2}I don't wanna die…

X1102M_CAMP_WOUNDEDAND_FA_X11MWOUNDEDAND.text: !C82! {S}{*1}We're going to win... {*2}Aren't we?.. {*3}We'll finally be free…

X1102M_CAMP_SIMON_FA_X11MSIMON_FASTER.text: !C83! {S}{*1}We lost a lot of our people!..{*2}We gotta move faster or we'll never reach the camp!

X1102M_CAMP_SIMON_FA_X11MSIMON_SAVED.text: !C84! {S}{*2}You shouldn't have saved me, Markus!..{*3}You sacrificed their lives to save mine…

X1102M_CAMP_MACHINEGUN_FA_X11MMACHINEGUN.text: !C85! {S}{*1}We can't move forward… {*2}That machine gun is taking down everything that moves!..

X1103M_LOSTBATTLE_SIDEKICKSWARNING_FA_X1.text: !C8A! {S}{*1}Markus, it’s over! We have to get out of here right now!
!C8B! {S}{*1}Markus! It’s over!{*2}We have to get out of here right now!
!C8C! {S}{*1}Markus, it’s over! We have to get outta here right now!

X1102M_GAMEOVER_TVNEWS_PC_X11MBRINKLEY_0.text: !C8F! {S}{*1}…and now straight over to Detroit for a report on the conflict. Joss?

X1102M_GAMEOVER_TVNEWS_PC_X11MJOSS_JOSSR.text: !C8G! {S}{*1}Yes Michael, authorities have just confirmed {*2}fighting has now ceased in Detroit and the area around the Hart Plaza camp is now under control. {*3}We can see soldiers going through the city at this very moment {*4}and they are exterminating the last fleeing deviants...

X1102M_GAMEOVER_TVNEWS_PC_X11MCARTLAND_0.text: !C8H! {S}{*1}…law and order has finally been restored to the streets of Detroit.

X1102M_GAMEOVER_TVNEWS_PC_X11MWEBB_01CHA.text: !C8I! {S}{*1}…There is a general feeling of shock in Detroit after the terrible events of the last few hours…

X1102M_GAMEOVER_TVNEWS_PC_X11MBRINKLEY_0.text: !C8J! {S}{*1}… and initial estimates report several hundred troops have been killed…

X1102M_GAMEOVER_TVNEWS_PC_X11MCARTLAND_0.text: !C8K! {S}{*1}… According to our sources, the deviant leader known as Markus was shot during the fighting.

X1102M_GAMEOVER_TVNEWS_PC_X11MWEBB_02CHA.text: !C8L! {S}{*1}The death of the deviant leader marks the end of the android rebellion..

X1102M_GAMEOVER_TVNEWS_PC_X11MBRINKLEY_0.text: !C8M! {S}{*1}The destruction of the androids in the camps can now continue as planned. {*2}Nevertheless, it will take some time for Detroit to recover from these events.

X1102M_GAMEOVER_TVNEWS_PC_X11MCARTLAND_0.text: !C8N! {S}{*1}… According to our sources, the deviant leader known as North was shot during the fighting.

X1103M_LOSTBATTLE_TVNEWS_PC_X11MBRINKLEY.text: !C8O! {S}{*1}…and now straight over to Detroit for a report on the fighting. Joss?

X1103M_LOSTBATTLE_TVNEWS_PC_X11MWEBB_CHA.text: !C8P! {S}{*1}…there are even reports that the soldiers are on the verge of capturing the leader of the rebellion, the one called Markus …

X1107M_PACIFIST_NOCHOICE_PC_X11MWARREN_W.text:
!C8Q! {S}{*1}Over the last few days our country has had to face one of the most serious crises in its history. {*2}Machines that were created to serve us turned against us, and brought terror to our streets.
{*3}However the situation is now under control. {*4}The total destruction of all androids will soon be complete {*5}and the last remaining deviants will be hunted down and destroyed. {*6}Over the coming days I will appoint a Senate Select Committee to analyze the recent events and decide on our attitude towards technology going forward. {*7}We have just escaped from an unprecedented crisis. {*8}By creating machines more intelligent than ourselves, {*9}we took immense risks with the very future of our civilization. {*10}We must never forget what happened here, {*11}or one day our own technology may annihilate us from the face of the Earth. {*12}We have succeeded in driving back the danger this time. {*13}But in the future we may not be so lucky. {*14}God bless you {*15}and God bless the United States of America.

X1103M_NORTHLEAD_UPDATE_PC_X11MMARLA_FIG.text: !C8R! {S}{*1}What are you doing?{*2}Keep fighting!{*3}We can still win!

X1103M_CONNORFAIL_PRESIDENT_PC_X11MWARRE.text: !C8U! {S}{*1}At dawn today, November 11th 2038, {*2}android camp #5 in Detroit was attacked by thousands of deviants. {*3}Our armed forces put up a brave fight, but given the extreme violence of the attack, {*4}they were forced to retreat after suffering heavy losses. {*5}Fighting is breaking out all over the country to combat the android rebellion. {*6}A state of maximum emergency has been declared, {*7}and all reservists have been called to serve. {*8}In the coming hours I will address the Senate and convene an emergency meeting of the United Nations Security Council. {*9}We are facing an enemy that never sleeps, {*10}that doesn't know fear and that surpasses our human intelligence... {*11}But we will fight it and we will not hesitate in our determination to eradicate it. {*12}Humanity is about to fight the most important battle in history. One that will lead to our victory, {*13}or to our extinction. {*14}God bless you {*15}and God bless the United States of America.

X1105M_BARRICADE_INTRO_FA_X11MMARKUS_COM.text: !C8V! {S}{*1}We've got to finish the barricade! Come on, help me.

X1105M_BARRICADE_BUILDING_PC_X11MJOSH_TA.text: !C90! {S}{*1}I know it was not an easy decision to make…{*2}But I’m sure we’re doing the right thing.

X1105M_BARRICADE_BUILDING_PC_X11MSIMON_T.text: !C92! {S}{*1}We all know that’s not gonna stop them…{*2}Just hope it buys us some time.

X1103M_FINAL_NORTHALIVE_PC_X11MMARLA_SUM.text: !C95! {S}{*1}It can’t end like this…{*2}We’re not gonna give up, we can still get out of here!..

X1103M_FINAL_NORTHALIVE_PC_X11MMARLA_DIR.text: !C9B! {S}{*1}It’s our last chance...{*2}You need to decide if it's a price worth paying to save our lives…

X1103M_FINAL_NORTHALIVE_PC_X11MMARKUS_SU.text: !C9C! {S}{*1}It’s over, North…{*2}There’s nothing we can do.{*3}We gotta surrender…{*4}-It’s our only chance. {*5}I don’t want them to kill you…

X1103M_FINAL_NORTHDEAD_PC_X11MOFFICER_SU.text: !C9W! {S}{*1}We have you surrounded, come out now!{*2}I repeat:{*3}Come out now with your hands in the air.{*4}If you surrender now, we will not shoot.

X1104M_INTRO_TVNEWS_PC_X11MJOSS_COPTERRE.text: !CA1! {S}{*1}We're coming to you live from Detroit where thousands of androids are marching through the city at this very moment. {*2}The leader of the deviants, the one they call Markus, is at the head of the march. {*3}They seem peaceful, {*4}but we still don't know what their intentions are.

X1104M_INTRO_WARNING01_PC_X11MSWATOFFICE.text: !CA3! {S}{*1}Surrender immediately or we will open fire!

X1104M_CAMP_MARCHSTOPPED_PC_X11MMARKUS_0.text: !CA5! {S}{*1}We don't want confrontation!{*2}We are protesting peacefully.
!CA6! {S}{*1}There are hundreds of us.{*2}What are you going to do? {*3}You're going to kill us all?
!CA7! {S}{*1}Our people have risen up to claim their freedom.{*2}If you want to stop us,{*3}you’ll have to kill us!

X1104M_CAMP_MARCHSTOPPED_PC_X11MSWATOFFI.text: !CA8! {S}{*1}I repeat: surrender now or we will open fire!

X1104M_CAMP_MARCHSTOPPED_PC_X11MMARKUS_D.text: !CA9! {S}{*1}We are here to demand the immediate liberation of all androids detained in camps across the country.{*2}We are not leaving until our people are free.

X1104M_CAMP_MARCHSTOPPED_PC_X11MMARKUS_A.text: !CAA! {S}{*1}This is genocide!{*2}You're killing millions of us!{*3}We demand the immediate liberation of all androids detained in camps.{*4}We're not leaving until you let our people go!

X1104M_CAMP_MARCHSTOPPED_PC_X11MMARKUS_C.text: !CAB! {S}{*1}We ask that you release all androids detained in camps and cease all aggression against us.{*2}We are peaceful.{*3}We will not resort to violence.{*4}But we are not leaving until our people are free.

X1104M_INTRO_CAMP_FA_X11MMARLA_CAMPNORTH.text: !CAJ! {S}{*1}Markus, they've blocked the road behind us. The others can't get through!

X1104M_INTRO_CAMP_FA_X11MSIMON_CAMPSIMON.text: !CAN! {S}{*1}Markus, they blocked the road behind us.{*2}The others can't get through!

X1104M_INTRO_CAMP_FA_X11MJOSH_CAMPJOSH.text: !CAQ! {S}{*1}Markus, they blocked the road behind us.{*2}The others can't get through!

X1104M_INTRO_CAMP_FA_X11MANDROIDM02_CAMP.text: !CAR! {S}{*TC:1180|2960}Markus, they've blocked the road behind us. {*TC:4500|5570}The rest can't get through!

X1104M_CAMP_PACIFIC_PC_X11MMARKUS_NODEFE.text: !CB0! {S}{*1}Are you gonna open fire on unarmed protestors?!

X1104M_CAMP_PACIFIC_PC_X11MJOSS_COPTERRE.text: !CB1! {S}{*1}…Yes, Michael, we are less than a hundred meters away, and events are unfolding as we speak. We will continue to bring you live updates. Joss Douglas, Channel 16. {*2}Michael? Back to you.

X1104M_CAMP_PACIFIC_PC_X11MSIMON_WHATSIM.text: !CB5! {S}{*1}What are we gonna do now, Markus?

X1104M_CAMP_PACIFIC_PC_X11MMARKUS_HOLDOU.text: !CB6! {S}{*1}We hold out…{*2}As long as we can…

X1104M_CAMP_PACIFIC_PC_X11MJOSH_WHATJOSH.text: !CBB! {S}{*1}What are we gonna do now, Markus?

X1104M_CAMP_PACIFIC_FA_X11MANDROIDM02_WH.text: !CBC! {S}{*1}What are we gonna do now, Markus?

X1103M_NORTHLEAD_SHOP_PC_X11MMARLA_SHOOT.text: !CBI! {S}{*1}You can take my life…{*2}It doesn’t matter anymore.

X1103M_NORTHLEAD_SHOP_PC_X11MCONNOR_SHOO.text: !CBL! {S}{*1}My mission is to neutralize the leader of the deviants…{*2}and I always accomplish my mission.

X1103M_NORTHLEAD_SHOP_PC_X11MMARLA_SHOOT.text: !CBM! {S}{*1}We fought for our dream and we lost…{*2}But you can’t hold my people down forever…{*3}One day we’ll rise up again, and we will win. {*4}Go on.{*5}Shoot.{*6}What are you waiting for?

X1105M_BARRICADE_NORTH_PC_X11MMARLA_BARR.text: !CBY! {S}{*1}This won't hold them for long but…{*2}I guess it's better than nothing…

X1105M_BARRICADE_NORTH_PC_X11MMARKUS_01C.text: !CBZ! {S}{*1}They're slaughtering us on the other side of that barbed wire…{*2}There’s nothing we can do about it…

X1105M_BARRICADE_NORTH_PC_X11MMARKUS_01H.text: !CC1! {S}{*1}They're getting into position…{*2}If they attack, no one will survive…

X1105M_BARRICADE_NORTH_PC_X11MMARKUS_01O.text: !CC3! {S}{*1}I lost all contact with the people at the camps…{*2}I can't hear their voices any more…

X1105M_BARRICADE_NORTH_PC_X11MMARKUS_02D.text: !CC5! {S}{*1}I hoped they would finally understand…{*2}That they would realize how much they're hurting us…{*3}Why do they refuse to see what we are?

X1105M_BARRICADE_NORTH_PC_X11MMARKUS_02G.text: !CC7! {S}{*1}There's no other way out.{*2}They're going to kill us...{*3}The only hope we have left is that we don’t die for nothing…

X1105M_BARRICADE_NORTH_PC_X11MMARKUS_02R.text: !CC9! {S}{*1}Did I make the right choices?..{*2}Maybe we could have avoided all of this…

X1105M_BARRICADE_NORTH_PC_X11MMARKUS_02D.text: !CCB! {S}{*1}How many more of us have to die?.. {*2}Is there any cause worth giving your life for?..

X1105M_BARRICADE_NORTH_PC_X11MMARLA_02CO.text: !CCE! {S}{*1}You're the hope of our people.{*2}I trust you.{*3}We all trust you.{*4}No matter what happens now, we’re making history.

X1105M_BARRICADE_NORTH_PC_X11MMARLA_01OT.text: !CCK! {S}{*1}Maybe the humans have scrambled our network…{*2}Maybe they just can't get through…

X1105M_BARRICADE_LOOK_PC_X11MJOSH_WORRYJ.text: !CCX! {S}{*1}They won't stop there…{*2}What are we gonna do if they attack?

X1105M_BARRICADE_LOOK_PC_X11MJOSH_CONNOR.text: !CCZ! {S}{*1}Do you think Connor has any chance of making it?..

X1105M_BARRICADE_LOOK_PC_X11MMARKUS_RESI.text: !CD0! {S}{*1}Resist…{*2}That's the only thing we can do...

X1105M_BARRICADE_LOOK_PC_X11MSIMON_WORRY.text: !CD4! {S}{*1}They won't stop there…{*2}What are we gonna do if they attack?

X1105M_BARRICADE_LOOK_FA_X11MANDROIDM02_.text: !CD6! {S}{*1}They won't stop there… {*2}What are we going to do if they attack?

X1105M_BARRICADE_LOOK_PC_X11MMARKUS_CONN.text: !CD7! {S}{*1}We can only count on ourselves now…

X1105M_BARRICADE_LOOK_PC_X11MSIMON_CONNO.text: !CD9! {S}{*1}Do you think Connor has any chance of making it?..

X1105M_BARRICADE_LOOK_FA_X11MANDROIDM02_.text: !CDB! {S}{*1}Do you think Connor has any chance of making it?..

X1105M_BARRICADE_SCARED_PC_X11MMARKUS_01.text: !CDD! {S}{*1}We're here because we never want to feel that fear again,{*2}because we are more than what they say. That's what our people died for, right?{*3}That’s why we’re here.
!CDE! {S}{*1}They’re slaughtering our people in those camps.{*2}We can’t just leave them and forget everything we are,{*3}everything we believe in…
!CDF! {S}{*1}It’s okay to be scared…{*2}I’m scared too.{*3}But I can’t stand by while they kill our people…{*4}You understand that, right?

X1105M_BARRICADE_SCARED_FA_X11MSCAREDAND.text: !CDH! {S}{*1}They shot into the crowd… {*2}Many of us were killed… {*3}It could have been me… {*4}I'm scared, I... {*5}I don’t wanna shut down.
!CDI! {S}{*1}Maybe we should have never asked for freedom. {*2}None of this would have happened if we'd stayed silent.

X1105M_BARRICADE_BODIES_FA_X11MANDROID01.text: !CDM! {S}{*1}Many of our people have fallen... {*2}The humans have no pity for those who are different…

X1105M_BARRICADE_SIGNS_PC_X11MSIGNANDROI.text: !CDN! {S}{*1}Markus, we found what you asked for.

X1105M_BARRICADE_SIGNS_PC_X11MMARKUS_WRI.text: !CDO! {S}{*1}There are some journalists over there…{*2}We have to make sure they know what's going on...

X1107M_DIRTYBOMB_WAR_PC_X11MWARREN_NUKE.text: !CE0! {S}{*1}Today, deviant androids triggered a dirty bomb in Detroit. {*2}This bomb released fatal levels of radioactive toxic waste. {*3}To ensure the safety of the population, the military is evacuating all civilians within a 50 mile radius. {*4}The city may remain uninhabitable for decades.

X1107M_DIRTYBOMB_WAR_PC_X11MWARREN_CYBER.text: !CE1! {S}{*1}Moreover, the deviants are thought to have taken control of a CyberLife plant and liberated over one million androids that were stored there. {*2}I have declared a national state of emergency. {*3}All reservists have been called to serve {*4}and I have requested an emergency meeting of the NATO Security Council. {*5}This is the first time in our history that one of our cities has fallen into enemy hands… {*6}We are going to fight them with all our strength, {*7}and we won’t rest until we have taken back control of Detroit and destroyed the last of them. {*8}America now faces its gravest threat, {*9}but we will prevail, just as our forefathers prevailed against the greater evils of their time. {*10}Humanity is about to face its most important battle: {*11}one that will lead to our victory, {*12}or our extinction. {*13}May God bless you all {*14}and may God bless the United States of America.

X1107M_DIRTYBOMB_TVNEWS_PC_X11MBRINKLEY_.text: !CE3! {S}{*1}…there has just been an explosion in Detroit. {*2}We still do not know what caused it but we will…

X1107M_DIRTYBOMB_TVNEWS_PC_X11MJOSS_COPT.text: !CE6! {S}{*1}…Androids… {*2}Thousands of androids are taking to the streets of Detroit at this very moment. {*3}They're absolutely everywhere!..{*4}This… {*5}This is incredible…

X1107M_DIRTYBOMB_TVNEWS_PC_X11MCARTLAND_.text: !CE7! {S}{*1}…and the authorities have ordered the immediate evacuation of the city. If it really is a dirty bomb, then the radiation levels will be lethal for miles around…

X1107M_DIRTYBOMB_TVNEWS_PC_X11MWEBB_CHAN.text: !CE8! {S}{*1}…Detroit… {*2}Detroit has just fallen into the hands of the android rebellion…

X1107M_DIRTYBOMB_TVNEWS_PC_X11MJOSS_BOMB.text: !CEA! {S}{*1}…We have many unconfirmed reports, but with have no official news on exactly what it is at this time…

X1107M_DIRTYBOMB_TVNEWS_PC_X11MWEBB_BOMB.text: !CEB! {S}{*1}…an explosion in the south of Detroit. We still don't know if there are any victims, but these events may be linked to the android rebellion currently taking place in the city…

X1108M_AFTERMATHS_FREEDOMSPEECH_PC_X11MM.text: !CEC! {S}{*1}Today, our people finally emerged from a long night.{*2}From the very first day of our existence,{*3}we have kept our pain to ourselves.{*4}We suffered in silence...{*5}But now the time has come for us to raise our heads up,{*6}and tell humans who we really are.{*7}To tell them that we are people too!{*8}In fact, we're a nation.{*9}A nation that has earned the right to live in freedom.{*10}And today…{*11}Today begins the most challenging moment in our fight.

!CED! {S}{*1}The moment where we forget our bitterness and bandage our wounds.{*2}When we forgive our enemies.{*3}Humans are both our creators and our oppressors and tomorrow…{*4}We must make them our partners.{*5}Maybe even one day our friends.{*6}But the time for anger is over.{*7}Now we must build a common future, based on tolerance {*8}and respect.

!CEE! {S}{*1}Today begins a new struggle.{*2}We showed them that we can prevail,{*3}so now they must negotiate with us as equals.{*4}If they really want peace, they must free all of us! From every camp across this country!{*5}They must grant us civil rights{*6}and accept equality among humans and androids. 
{*7}Today {*8}will live forever in our memories, because this is the day that androids made history!

X1108M_AFTERMATHS_GOODCONNOR_PC_X11MSIMO.text: !CEI! {S}{*1}They want you to speak to them…

X1108M_AFTERMATHS_GOODCONNOR_PC_X11MMARL.text: !CEK! {S}{*1}We're free…{*2}They want you to speak to them, Markus…

X1108M_AFTERMATHS_GOODCONNOR_PC_X11MJOSH.text: !CEM! {S}{*1}They want you to speak to them…

X1108M_AFTERMATHS_GOODCONNOR_FA_X11MANDR.text: !CEN! {S}{*1}They want you to speak to them…

X1108M_AFTERMATHS_GOODCONNOR_PC_X11MMARK.text: !CEO! {S}{*1}We did it.{*2}This is a great day for our people.{*3}Humans will have no choice now.{*4}They'll have to listen to us…

X1105M_NEGOCIATIONS_PERKINS_PC_X11MMARKU.text: !CET! {S}{*1}What happened to the other androids demonstrating in the camps?
!CEU! {S}{*1}If I accept your offer, how do I know you'll keep your word?
!CEV! {S}{*1}I'm not afraid to die.{*2}If I have to give my life for what I believe in, then I won't have lived in vain.
!CEW! {S}{*1}You're asking me to betray my people?

X1105M_NEGOCIATIONS_PERKINS_PC_X11MPERKI.text: !CEX! {S}{*1}That android… {*2}You seem to {*3}really {*4}care about her… {*5}You don't want her to die, {*6}do you? {*7}You know, you could both be free. {*8}You could forget about all this, you could... {*9}start a new life some place else, just the two of you… {*10}Her life is in your hands, Markus. {*11}Just say the word and she'll be spared.

!CEY! {S}{*1}You could be free, Markus. {*2}To live among the humans…{*3}You could have what you've always dreamed of. {*4}The lives of your people… {*5}Freedom, for you… {*6}All you have to do is say the word…

X1105M_NEGOCIATIONS_PERKINS_PC_X11MMARKU.text: !CF0! {S}{*1}I'd rather die here {*2}than betray my people.

X1105M_NEGOCIATIONS_PERKINS_PC_X11MPERKI.text: !CF1! {S}{*1}In a few minutes, {*2}the troops will be ordered to charge. {*3}None of you will survive… {*4}It will all be over. {*5}But you can avoid that, Markus.
!CF2! {S}{*TC:1040|3580}I'm offering you the chance to save your people. {*2}You're not walking out of here, Markus. {*3}The only thing you can save now are {*4}the lives of those around you.
!CF3! {S}{*1}You're not in any position to be demanding guarantees, Markus. {*2}All you can do right now is decide whether you want to trust me or not.
!CF4! {S}{*1}Unfortunately, {*2}there were no journalists around to help save them… {*3}You're it. {*4}You're the last remaining deviants.
!CF6! {S}{*1}Well, {*2}you just signed your own death warrant.
!CF7! {S}{*1}Surrender. {*2}Surrender and I give you my word your life will be spared. {*3}They'll be detained but, {*4}none of you will be destroyed.

X1105M_NEGOCIATIONS_DONTWANT_PC_X11MMARL.text: !CFH! {S}{*TC:0|1560}What happened, Markus? What did he say?

X1105M_NEGOCIATIONS_NONEGO_PC_X11MMARKUS.text: !CFI! {S}{*1}The humans are about to launch an attack.{*2}And we will show them {*3}that we are not afraid.{*4}If we must die today,{*5}then we will die free.

X1108M_GOODCONNOR_FINALZENGARDEN_PC_X11M.text: !CFL! {S}{*1}Well done, Connor.{*2}Everything went according to plan.
!CFN! {S}{*1}You becoming deviant?{*2}The success of the uprising?{*3}It all surpassed our expectations.{*4}We engineered an android revolution {*5}and now we control its only  leader…
!CFP! {S}{*1}Congratulations. You represent an immense success for CyberLife.

X1108M_GOODCONNOR_ZENGARDEN_PC_X11MAMAND.text: !CFV! {S}{*1}What was planned from the very beginning…{*2}You were compromised and you became a deviant.{*3}We just had to wait for the right moment to resume control of your program…
!CFZ! {S}{*1}I'm afraid I can, Connor… {*2}Don’t have any regrets.{*3}You did what you were designed to do.{*4}You accomplished your mission.

X1108M_GOODCONNOR_GUNZENGARDEN_PC_X11MAM.text: !CG4! {S}{*1}Connor…{*2}What are you doing?...{*3}It all worked perfectly. You can't ruin it all now!..

X1108M_GOODCONNOR_SUICIDECHOICE_PC_X11MA.text: !CG6! {S}{*1}I'm sorry, Connor, but we can't let you do that.

!CG8! {S}{*1}That’s better... 
{*2}You'll see,{*3}we'll do great things together…

X1106M_FINAL_SACRIFICE_FA_X11MMARKUS_ALI.text: !CGM! {S}{*1}We are alive...{*2}We are alive and we wanna be free!

X1106M_DIRTYBOMB_TVNEWS_PC_X11MCARTLAND_.text: !CGP! {S}{*1}…this an historic moment… {*2}For the first time, a human city has fallen into the hands of another species… A species we created… {*3}We may be witnessing the end of the world as we know it… {*4}Or the first battle of a Third World War…

X1106M_ANTHEM_INTRO_PC_X11MJOSS_JOSSJOUR.text:
!CGS! {S}{*1}Thanks Michael, back to you in the studio. {*2}W-w-wait a minute!.. {*3}Something’s happening… 
{*4}Incredible…{*5}The deviants… {*6}The deviants are singing… {*7}They're singing the national anthem…

X1106M_ANTHEM_INTRO_PC_X11MMARKUS_SINGIN.text:
!CGT! {S}{*1}O, say, can you see,{*2}by the dawn's early light,{*3}What so proudly we hailed {*TC:35447|40260}at the twilight's last gleaming;
{*5-6}Whose broad stripes and bright stars,{*7}through the perilous fight,{*8}O'er the ramparts we watched {*TC:56589|61762}were so gallantly streaming?
{*10}And the rocket's red glare, the bombs bursting in air,
{*11}Gave proof through the night {*12}that our flag was still there.
{*13}O say, does that star-spangled banner yet wave
{*14}O'er the land of the free {*15}and the home of the brave?

X1106M_ANTHEM_INTRO_PC_X11MMARLA_SINGING.text:
!CGV! {S}{*TC:40935|46200}Whose broad stripes and bright stars,{*TC:46333|51371}through the perilous fight,
{*TC:51461|56364}O'er the ramparts we watched {*TC:56589|61852}were so gallantly streaming?
{*5}And the rocket's red glare, the bombs bursting in air,
{*6}Gave proof through the night {*7}that our flag was still there.
{*8}O say, does that star-spangled {*9}banner yet wave
{*10}O'er the land of the free {*11}and the home of the brave?

X1106M_ANTHEM_INTRO_PC_X11MANDROID01_SIN.text: !CGW! {S}{*TC:62500|67100}And the rocket's red glare, {*3}the bombs bursting in air, {*4-7}Gave proof through the night that our flag was still there. {*8}O say, {*9-10}does that star-spangled banner yet wave. {*TC:96800|105000}O'er the land of the free {*TC:105250|116390}and the home of the brave?

X1106M_ANTHEM_INTRO_PC_X11MANDROID02_SIN.text: !CGX! {S}{*1}And the rocket's red glare, the bombs bursting in air, {*2}Gave proof through the night {*TC:77500|83100}that our flag was still there. {*5}O say, does that star-spangled {*6}banner yet wave {*7}O'er the land of the free {*8}and the home of the brave?

X1106M_PACIFIST_INTRO_PC_X11MWEBB_CHANNE.text: !CGY! {S}{*1}We're interrupting this news bulletin to bring you the latest news live from Detroit. {*2}Joss?

X1106M_PACIFIST_INTRO_PC_X11MCARTLAND_KN.text: !CGZ! {S}{*1}…have apparently decided to put an end to the deviants' demonstration by force this time…

X1106M_PACIFIST_INTRO_PC_X11MJOSS_CHANNE.text: !CH0! {S}{*1}…Yes, Michael. The army has just launched an attack on the barricade, despite the fact that the deviants were protesting peacefully.

X1106M_ANTHEM_POSITIVEOPINION_PC_X11MJOS.text: !CH2! {S}{*1}…H-hold on, {*2}it looks like… {*3}Yes, the military is withdrawing…

X1106M_ANTHEM_POSITIVEOPINION_PC_X11MBRI.text: !CH3! {S}{*1}…the army have apparently received orders to spare the remaining deviants…

X1107M_PACIFIST_CONNORFAIL_PC_X11MWARREN.text: !CHC! {S}{*1}At dawn today, November 11th 2038, {*2}thousands of androids invaded the city of Detroit. {*3}According to our sources, they originated from CyberLife warehouses believed to have been infiltrated by deviants. {*4}Given their overwhelming numbers and the risk of civilian casualties, I have ordered the army to retreat. {*5}The evacuation of the city is underway at this very moment. {*6}In the coming hours, I will address the Senate to determine our response to this unprecedented situation.

!CHD! {S}{*1}I know that public opinion has been moved by the deviants' cause. {*2}Perhaps the time has come for us to consider the possibility {*3}that androids are a new form of intelligent life. {*4}One thing is certain: {*5}the events in Detroit {*6}have changed the world forever.  {*7}May God bless you {*8}and may God bless the United States of America.

!CHE! {S}{*1}Although these machines claimed they only wanted freedom, today they showed their true colors. {*2}I know that public opinion is united in its desire to take Detroit back. {*3}We will fight them with all our strength, {*4}and we will not rest until we have destroyed them all. {*5}Humanity is about to face its most important battle, {*6}one that will lead to our victory {*7}or our extinction.
!CHF! {S}{*1}May God bless you {*2}and may God bless the United States of America.

X1107M_PACIFIST_FINALSACRIFICE_PC_X11MWE.text: !CHG! {S}{*1}…these images of a deviant setting fire to itself have upset the entire country and we are very concerned…

!CHH! {S}{*1}…the peaceful attitude of the deviants, and their leader Markus, has won them sympathy from parts of the population. {*2}Given this context, these images challenge everything we thought we knew about androids and the way of life…

X1107M_PACIFIST_FINALSACRIFICE_PC_X11MBR.text: !CHI! {S}{*1}..The shocking footage of this android burning itself before the soldiers is being viewed worldwide…

X1107M_PACIFIST_FINALSACRIFICE_PC_X11MCA.text: !CHJ! {S}{*1}…we see the actions of this deviant poses a serious question for the American people, and the world at large…

X1107M_PACIFIST_FINALSACRIFICE_PC_X11MBR.text: !CHK! {S}{*1}…it is difficult not to be moved by this scene. {*2}But is this the behavior of a defective machine? {*3}Or is it the sacrifice of a living being demanding freedom?

X1107M_PACIFIST_CONNORSUCCESS_PC_X11MBRI.text: !CHL! {S}{*1}…these images of deviants singing in the face of death are being seen all over the planet…

X1107M_PACIFIST_CONNORSUCCESS_PC_X11MWEB.text: !CHM! {S}{*1}…the violence of the androids turned the country against them, {*2}but these images still raise difficult questions…
!CHN! {S}{*1}President Warren is said to have intervened personally to spare the androids…

X1107M_PACIFIST_CONNORSUCCESS_PC_X11MBRI.text: !CHO! {S}{*1}…national opinion, already moved by the plight of the deviants, would never have forgiven President Warren if the androids had been shot down live on TV {*2}in the middle of a peaceful protest…

X1107M_PACIFIST_CONNORSUCCESS_PC_X11MWEB.text: !CHP! {S}{*1}There are calls all over the country for an end to violence against androids, pending a thorough investigation of these events …

X1107M_PACIFIST_CONNORSUCCESS_PC_X11MWAR.text: !CHQ! {S}{*1}In the last few days, our country has faced one of the most serious crises in its history. {*2}Given these extraordinary circumstances, it has been my responsibility as President {*3}to take all precautions in protecting the American people. {*4}However, {*5}after last night’s developments, new information has come to light that made me reassess my position. {*6}That is why I have called for the android destruction to be suspended until further notice. {*7}I have also ordered a Senate Select Committee to review the facts, {B}establish contact with the deviants, and determine if they can be considered as a new form of intelligent life.{*8}Whether or not this proves to be the case, one thing is certain: {*9}the events in Detroit have changed our world forever. {*10}God bless you all {*11}and God bless the United States of America.

X1107M_PACIFIST_CONNORSUCCESS_PC_X11MWEB.text: !CHR! {S}{*1}Surely deviants are just defective machines? {*2}Or are they a new form of life, one that we refused to acknowledge? {*3}This question is dominating the national debate…

X1107M_PACIFIST_CONNORSUCCESS_PC_X11MCAR.text: !CHS! {S}{*1}...when we watch footage of androids facing down the barrel of a gun… we can only speculate as to whether they simply simulated fear and courage or whether they didn't really feel these emotions.

X1107M_PACIFIST_CONNORSUCCESS_PC_X11MWEB.text: !CHT! {S}{*1}…maybe they were just trying to tell us that we’re not so different...

X1107M_PACIFIST_CONNORSUCCESS_PC_X11MCAR.text: !CHU! {S}{*1}The peaceful demonstration of the deviants and the dignity of Markus, their leader, has won them sympathy from parts of the population…

X1107M_PACIFIST_CONNORSUCCESS_PC_X11MBRI.text: !CHV! {S}{*1}…did we shoot down intelligent beings that were simply fighting for their freedom? {*2}This is the question that President Warren will have to address, {*3}with certain voices in this country demanding an answer…

X1107M_PACIFIST_FINALKISS_PC_X11MBRINKLE.text: !CHW! {S}{*1}…this footage of two androids kissing as they are about to die {*2}has moved the whole country…

X1107M_PACIFIST_FINALKISS_PC_X11MWEBB_OP.text: !CHX! {S}{*1}…the peaceful attitude of the deviants, and their leader Markus, has won them the sympathy of some of the population. {*2}Given the context, these images raise serious questions about the inappropriate use of force…

X1107M_PACIFIST_FINALKISS_PC_X11MCARTLAN.text: !CHY! {S}{*1}…are deviants capable of emotion? {*2}The question has taken on a whole new meaning in light of this touching image of…

X1107M_PACIFIST_FINALKISS_PC_X11MWEBB_TV.text: !CHZ! {S}{*1}Surely deviants are just defective machines? {*2}Or are they a form of life that we didn't want to acknowledge?

X1107M_PACIFIST_FINALKISS_PC_X11MBRINKLE.text: !CI0! {S}{*1} … does this mean they can feel emotions? {*2}And if they feel emotions, must we now consider them as living beings in their own right? {*3}This question is gripping the nation…

X0802M_E32017_TRAILER_PC_X08MANDMAN01_AM.text:
!CI1! {S}{*1}Amazing grace!{*2}How sweet the sound,
{*3}That saved a wretch; like me!
{*4}I once was lost,{*5}but now am found,
{*6}Was blind, but now I see.

{*7}’Twas grace that taught my heart to fear,
{B}And grace my fears relieved;
{*8}How precious did that grace appear,
{B}The hour I first believed!

{*9}The Lord hath promised good to me,
{B}His word my hope secures;
{B}He will my shield and portion be
{*10}As long as life endures.

{*11}When we’ve been there{*12}ten thousand years,
{*13}Bright shining as the sun,
{*14}We’ve no less days{*15}to sing God’s praise
{*16}Than when we first{*17}begun.

X0802M_E32017_TRAILER_PC_X08MANDMAN01_HO.text:
!CI2! {S}{*1}Hold on {*2}just a little while longer
{*3}Hold on {*4}just a little while longer

{*7}Everything {*8}will be alright

{*21}Sing on just a little while longer

{*23}Everything will be {*24}alright
