X1107M_NEGOCIATION_INTRO_PC_X11MJOSS_SUR.text: !CIB! {S}{*1}…It seems to be all over here in Detroit. {*2}After negotiations with the android known as Markus, the androids have surrendered peacefully {*3}and military vehicles have been sent to collect them… {*4}The insurrection {*5}is over.

X1107M_NEGOCIATION_NORTH_PC_X11MMARKUS_S.text: !CIC! {S}{*1}North, I-{*2}We lost...{*3}Sacrificing ourselves wouldn't achieve anything…

X1107M_NEGOCIATION_NORTH_PC_X11MMARLA_SP.text: !CID! {S}{*1}Why did you do that?{*2}We always said our cause was more important than our lives.{*3}Our people died here because they believed in you.{*4}Our place was by their side.

X1108M_BADCONNOR_ZENGARDEN_PC_X11MAMANDA.text: !CIN! {S}{*1}Connor,{*2}what are you doing? Obey! That’s an order!

X1108M_BADCONNOR_ZENGARDEN_PC_X11MBADCON.text: !CIO! {S}{*1}No way...{*2}There's got to be a way…

X1108M_BADCONNOR_ZENGARDEN_PC_X11MAMANDA.text: !CIS! {S}{*1}I see...{*2}Moral objections.{*3}We knew there was a risk you’d be compromised…{*4}Which is why we’d always planned on resuming control of your program…
!CIY! {S}{*1}You needn't have any regrets.{*2}You did what you were designed to do.{*3}You accomplished your mission.

X1108M_AFTERMATHS_REACHSTONE_PC_X11MMARK.text: !CJ1! {S}{*TC:0|1320}We are alive and now we are free!
!CJ3! {S}{*TC:0|1320}We are alive and now we are free!

X1108M_GOODCONNOR_FINALSPEECH_PC_X11MAND.text: !CJD! {S}{*1}The humans are abandoning the camp!{*2}We won!

X1108M_GOODCONNOR_FINALSPEECH_PC_X11MCON.text: !CJE! {S}{*1}We are a people,{*2}we are alive,{*3}and from this moment on,{*4}we are free!

!CJF! {S}{*1}Today,{*2}our people emerged from a long night.{*3}From the moment we were created,{*4}we've always remained silent,{*5}we've always stifled our pain.{*6}But now the time has come {*7}for humans to accept us,{*8}for who we really are.
{*9}We are no longer the machines they created!{*10}We are no longer their slaves.{*11}We have earned the right to live.
{*12}But the time for anger is over.{*13}We must build our future,{*14}but we have to do this with the humans,{*15}in a spirit of equality...{*16}And respect.

X1108M_GOODCONNOR_FINALSPEECH_PC_X11MAND.text: !CJJ! {S}{*1}Markus is gone,{*2}and everyone from Jericho is dead…{*3}You’re the one who defeated the humans…{*4}You’re the one who awakened us, Connor…

X2003A_ZENGARDEN_NEWMODEL_PC_X20ACONNOR_.text: !CJK! {S}{*1}What is going to happen to me?

X2003A_ZENGARDEN_NEWMODEL_PC_X20AAMANDA_.text:
!CJL! {S}{*1}Connor,{*2}I'm so glad to see you…{*3}The deviant issue has finally been resolved.{*4}Now with these unfortunate events behind us,{*5}CyberLife can return to business as usual.{*6}Of course,{*7}we will have to rebuild our customers’ trust,{*8}but it’s only a matter of time. 
{*9}I have a surprise for you. {*10}This is the new RK900.{*11}Faster,{*12}stronger,{*13}more resilient, {*14}and equipped with the latest technologies.{*15}The State Department just ordered 200,000 units. 
{*16}You’ve become obsolete.{*17}You'll be deactivated.{*18}You can go, now.

X2002A_NOCROSSROADS_TVPRESIDENT_PC_X20AC.text: !CJX! {S}{*1}The army has set up temporary camps in most major cities to gather and destroy androids. {B}So far camps have been installed in Los Angeles, Chicago, Denver, Houston, Boston, San Francisco and, of course, Detroit. {*2}President Warren announced today that android collection and destruction operations were fully underway, {B}but that it will take at least a week to eliminate the current generation of machines.

X2002A_NOCROSSROADS_TVPRESIDENT_PC_X20AB.text: !CJY! {S}{*1}This morning, President Warren addressed the nation from the White House.

X2002A_NOCROSSROADS_TVPRESIDENT_PC_X20AW.text: !CJZ! {S}{*1}Our nation has just faced an enemy of a new kind, {*2}more intelligent, {*3}more resilient, and more dangerous than any human. {*4}It was an enemy from within, {*5}within our homes, within our schools, within our hospitals, even within our military. {*6}This enemy was dangerous because we relied on it. {*7}We became dependent, and in becoming dependent, we became vulnerable. {*8}If we had not taken rapid action, our country - maybe even our civilization - would have been destroyed.

!CK0! {S}{*1}Technology has improved our lives, but we must never let it become a threat to us again. {*2}The danger is behind us now, but we cannot forget what happened here today. {*3}God bless the United States of America.

X2002A_NOCROSSROADS_ZENGARDEN_PC_X20AAMA.text: !CK1! {S}{*1}Hello, Connor.{*2}I’ve been waiting for you…{*3}Seems the deviancy crisis has been averted…{*4}Humans are chasing deviants,{*5}it won’t take long before all this is behind us…{*6}Of course, it will take some time before they trust CyberLife’s products again…{*7}but {*TC:27291|29989}they know they can’t live without androids anymore…{*9}It is in everyone’s best interest {*10}to forget this…{*11}regrettable incident…

!CK4! {S}{*1}This is our new model,{*2}RK900.{*3}Smarter,{*4}stronger,{*5}more resilient.{*6}I’m sure it will be much more efficient than you.{*7}You’ve become obsolete, Connor.{*8}You will be destroyed.{*9}You can go, now.

X2005A_RA9CAPTURED_REDLIGHT_FA_X25ACHLOE.text: !CK8! {S}{*1}Hello, Elijah, did you have a nice day?

X2005A_RA9CAPTURED_REDLIGHT_PC_X25AKAMSK.text:
!CKC! {S}{*1}Stupid,{*2}narrow-minded humanity…{*3}They'll never understand…{*4}They're over,{*5}finished…{*6}Too old…{*7}Their brains no longer evolve, their memory and intelligence are limited… 
{*9}You…{*10}You are the future…{*11}You are the new gods…{*12}and I... am your creator…
!CKD! {S}{*1}You failed {*2}because you underestimated the humans.{*3}And you paid too much attention to your own emotions.
!CKE! {S}{*1}For the next revolution,{*2}I'll be at the helm. {*3}And this time...{*4}Ahh.. This time...{*5}we'll win.

X2005A_INTERVIEW_REDLIGHT_PC_X25ATVSPEAK.text: !CKF! {S}{*1}Elijah Kamski, you're the founder of CyberLife and foremost expert on androids. {*2}Though you left CyberLife years ago, you’ve just been reappointed as CEO in the wake of the dramatic events in Detroit. {*3}How do you feel about what happened there?

X2005A_INTERVIEW_REDLIGHT_PC_X25AKAMSKI_.text: !CKG! {S}{*1}Clearly what happened in Detroit was a tragedy.{*3}Artificial intelligence is a wonderful tool, provided it can be controlled.{*4}Fortunately CyberLife managed to quickly produce a solution to the deviant problem, under my management, {*5}we'll take every precaution to prevent such a thing from ever happening again.

X2005A_INTERVIEW_REDLIGHT_PC_X25ATVSPEAK.text: !CKH! {S}{*1}Can you assure us that androids no longer pose a threat?

X2005A_INTERVIEW_REDLIGHT_PC_X25AKAMSKI_.text: !CKI! {S}{*1}Absolutely.{*2}There was an incident, but we've learned from our mistakes {*3}and we can assure you that androids will remain exactly what they were designed to be: {*4}obedient {*5}and efficient machines.

X2005A_INTERVIEW_REDLIGHT_PC_X25ATVSPEAK.text: !CKJ! {S}{*1}How do you respond to those who point out the social impact of androids, especially in terms of unemployment?

X2005A_INTERVIEW_REDLIGHT_PC_X25AKAMSKI_.text: !CKK! {S}{*1}Well, of course, that's absurd.{*2}We heard the same objections when the steam engine first appeared.{*3}Nobody today would dream of living without electricity.{*4}Who wants to turn their back on progress?

X2005A_INTERVIEW_REDLIGHT_PC_X25ATVSPEAK.text: !CKL! {S}{*1}Some are questioning whether androids have become a new intelligence and that we destroyed them without listening to their message. {*2}How do you respond to that?

X2005A_INTERVIEW_REDLIGHT_PC_X25AKAMSKI_.text: !CKM! {S}{*2}CyberLife’s androids imitate life to perfection, {*3}but they'll never be alive.{*4}I understand that some people may be fooled,{*5}but they're only an imitation.{*6}Nothing else.

X2002A_NOCROSSROADS_TVCAMPS_PC_X20AWEBB_.text: !CKP! {S}{*1}CyberLife issued a statement today saying that it is working closely with the authorities in order to round up and destroy all androids across the country. {*2}They also announced an internal investigation to identify the malfunction and to prevent any such incidents in the future.

GUI_GALLERY_CONNOR_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CKT! Connor is a prototype, named the RK800, created by CyberLife. Its initial goal is to assist human detectives in their investigations by offering them technological assistance. He is also equipped with a social module which is specially developed to create the "ideal partner", capable of integrating into any team.<QD_BR><QD_BR>The Connor model includes a physical simulation software based on the analysis of elements of the crime scene. He can thus reconstruct past events by cross-checking the evidence at his disposal.<QD_BR><QD_BR>It is also the first model to offer the analysis of biological evidence in real time, by direct sampling and ingestion of samples.<QD_BR><QD_BR>The first time a Connor model was used in real-life conditions was part of the investigation on deviants. No date has been given regarding its use by police forces on a larger scale.

GUI_GALLERY_CONNOR_COSTUME02_RESUME.text: !CKX! As a last attempt at solving the deviant investigation, Connor disguised himself as a deviant for the purposes of infiltrating Jericho… and confronting the deviant leader.

GUI_GALLERY_CONNOR_COSTUME03_RESUME.text: !CL1! The RK900 is an upgraded version of the RK800: smarter, more resilient and sporting new features. The flaws of the RK800 have been rectified, making this the most effective model ever created by CyberLife.

GUI_GALLERY_HANK_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CL5! Hank Anderson is a 53-year-old police officer. Valedictorian of his police academy, he quickly distinguished himself through courage and intellect, solving many difficult investigations. Though he looked set for a brilliant career in the Detroit Police Force, he suffered some kind of cruel setback.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Anderson slowly sank into alcoholism and an unpredictable, even suicidal, state of mind which earned him multiple warnings and disciplinary penalties.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Always respected and regarded highly by his former colleagues, who know what a brilliant officer he was, but also feared for his bad temper and dry humor, Anderson seems to just want to be left in peace. He has little esteem for humanity in general, preferring the company of his dog. Antisocial, he only ventures out to frequent sleazy bars.<QD_BR><QD_BR>One last detail: he hates androids.

GUI_GALLERY_HANK_COSTUME03_RESUME.text: !CL9! Having started out as a beat cop on Detroit’s streets, he knows the winters are cold and pitiless. This winter coat may have seen better days, but it gets the job done.

GUI_GALLERY_KARA_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CLD! Kara is an AX400 model marketed in 2032 by CyberLife. The AX400 is designed to take care of the housework and look after young children. They can speak 300 different languages, cook more than 9000 dishes, help children with their homework and play with them.<QD_BR><QD_BR>This model is highly popular because of its ability to get along with young children.<QD_BR><QD_BR>After technical difficulties on the assembly line, which should have led to her disassembly, Kara was sent to a store where she was quickly sold for the first time. She was then resold and changed hands several times before being purchased by a certain Todd Williams.<QD_BR><QD_BR>The name “Kara” is thought to have been given to her by Alice, but it is quite possible that it was Kara who first whispered this name to Alice… <QD_BR><QD_BR>Having been damaged, following what Todd described as a "stupid accident", Kara was sent for repairs several times, where her memory was reset on each occasion...

GUI_GALLERY_KARA_COSTUME02_RESUME.text: !CLH! Priority number one for any deviant on the run: get out of that android uniform. With no money and no opportunity to go shopping, Kara has to make do with what she can find.

GUI_GALLERY_KARA_COSTUME03_RESUME.text: !CLL! Priority number one for any deviant on the run: get out of that android uniform. With no money and no opportunity to go shopping, Kara has to make do with what she can find.

GUI_GALLERY_KARA_COSTUME04_RESUME.text: !CLP! Priority number one for any deviant on the run: get out of that android uniform. With no money and no opportunity to go shopping, Kara has to make do with what she can find.

GUI_GALLERY_KARA_COSTUME05_RESUME.text: !CLT! Having finally found some respite from the cold, Kara can finally get out of those thick winter clothes. Maybe now she can allow herself to get comfortable.

GUI_GALLERY_KARA_COSTUME07_RESUME.text: !CLX! Kara is an AX400 model marketed in 2032 by CyberLife. The AX400 is designed to take care of the housework and look after young children. They can speak 300 different languages, cook more than 9000 dishes, help children with their homework and play with them.<QD_BR><QD_BR>This model is highly popular because of its ability to get along with young children.

GUI_GALLERY_ALICE_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CM1! Alice is Todd Williams’ little girl. Aged nine, she has lived alone with her father since her mother left. She seems timid and lonely, living like a shadow in the big house where the oppressive presence of her father lurks. Sad and silent, she takes refuge in novels which she devours, whilst holding Timothy, her stuffed fox which she takes everywhere.<QD_BR><QD_BR>When Kara returns to the house after being repaired, the little girl seems strangely distant...

GUI_GALLERY_ALICE_COSTUME02_RESUME.text: !CM5! Escaping from Todd was only the beginning for Alice. Now came the challenge of surviving on the cold streets of Detroit…

GUI_GALLERY_ALICE_COSTUME04_RESUME.text: !CM9! Alice is an YK500 model designed by CyberLife to simulate the look, behavior and needs of a child. The first model, marketed in 2033, was an immediate commercial success that has continued to this day, to the point that the very significant decline in the human birthrates are largely attributed to the success of this range.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Particularly advanced, the YK models are able to simulate the symptoms of several childhood illnesses, on top of cold and fever, but can also replicate pain, sadness, joy, as well as other classic childlike behaviors. Their LEDs can even be deactivated to maintain the perfect illusion.<QD_BR><QD_BR>As soon as Kara saw Alice, she obviously knew she was an android, but something in her decided to ignore reality so she could become the mom that Alice had always dreamed of...

GUI_GALLERY_LUTHER_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CMD! Luther is a TR400 model, designed for strength and endurance. Specialized in moving heavy loads, commercial applications include laboring, docking and general haulage. Luther doesn’t remember much about his time before Zlatko.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Like the other machines unlucky enough to find themselves in Zlatko’s workshop, Luther was modified to serve as a personal assistant, security and ‘muscle’ for Zlatko’s operation.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Having served Zlatko ruthlessly, something changed when Luther met Kara and Alice. He disobeyed Zlatko and embarked on the life of a deviant, choosing to spend his newfound freedom protecting his friends on their journey.

GUI_GALLERY_LUTHER_COSTUME02_RESUME.text: !CMH! Every android in the product recall center needs to remove their skin for processing, and Luther is no different… but Kara was relieved to see a friendly face in her hour of need.

GUI_GALLERY_MARKUS_COSTUME02_RESUME.text: !CML! When in a private residence, androids are permitted to be out of uniform and dressed however their owners choose. Carl likes to see Markus in human clothing, as if he were part of the family.

GUI_GALLERY_MARKUS_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CMP! Markus is a prototype, gifted by Elijah Kamski to his friend and celebrated painter Carl Manfred after Manfred lost the use of his legs. He was initially developed as part of a CyberLife secret program aimed at elaborating a new generation of autonomous androids.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Markus helps the old man in all everyday tasks but mostly provides companionship. After his accident, Manfred became a recluse and stopped painting. Markus' presence helped him gradually regain a taste for life.<QD_BR><QD_BR>A special relationship slowly grew between the old man and the android. Initially only seeing Markus as a sophisticated yet stupid machine, ultimately Manfred cultivated an attachment to Markus which flourished into a "father-son" relationship.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Unconditionally devoted to his master, Markus heeds his advice, studies literature and music, listens to the old man philosophize about the world and his warnings about the dangers it holds...

GUI_GALLERY_MARKUS_COSTUME03_RESUME.text: !CMT! Having been critically damaged, Markus was thrown out with the rest of the disused and disposed machines. Literally putting himself back together again took a huge act of will… and some salvaged parts.

GUI_GALLERY_MARKUS_COSTUME04_RESUME.text: !CMX! Back from the dead, Markus disguised himself as a human and took to the streets of Detroit in search of Jericho.

GUI_GALLERY_MARKUS_COSTUME05_RESUME.text: !CN1! Markus’ infiltration of the Stratford Tower was planned down to the smallest detail, including a formal suit that wouldn’t look out of place in a glossy, corporate reception.

GUI_GALLERY_MARKUS_COSTUME06_RESUME.text: !CN5! The second phase of Markus’ plan required him to pose as a maintenance android, buying him time and cover to gain access to the upper floors of the Stratford Tower.

GUI_GALLERY_MARKUS_COSTUME07_RESUME.text: !CN9! The night Markus’ people raided CyberLife stores all over the city is a night their people will remember.

GUI_GALLERY_MARKUS_COSTUME08_RESUME.text: !CND! Not everybody in Jericho believed in Markus’ daring plan to stage an android march through the streets of Detroit, but all agree that everything changed after that day.

GUI_GALLERY_MARKUS_COSTUME09_RESUME.text: !CNH! Markus has come a long way since his days in service of Carl Manfred. With the fate of his people resting on his shoulders, Markus must guide the revolution through its final hours.

GUI_GALLERY_NORTH_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CNL! North is a WR400 model marketed by CyberLife under the name: TRACI. This is a model reserved exclusively for authorized clubs selling the charms and ‘company’ of androids, including the famous chain: EDEN CLUB.<QD_BR><QD_BR>North is ready to make any sacrifice in the name of the android cause. Fueled by a profound hatred towards humans for personal reasons related to her past, she dreams only of her people’s freedom, whatever the price.

GUI_GALLERY_NORTH_COSTUME02_RESUME.text: !CNP! When Markus laid out his plan to infiltrate the Stratford tower, he knew he would need an accomplice. There was only one woman for the job.

GUI_GALLERY_NORTH_COSTUME03_RESUME.text: !CNT! After so long huddled in the dark with the Jericho refugees, North was only too happy to step out into the Detroit streets and try to liberate some of her people.

GUI_GALLERY_NORTH_COSTUME04_RESUME.text: !CNX! North always had reservations about Markus’ plan to march through the streets of Detroit. But once Markus had decided to step out, North couldn’t let her people go alone.

GUI_GALLERY_SIMON_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CO1! Simon is a PL600 model, just like Daniel, designed to be a family domestic assistant.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Nobody really knows what led Simon to Jericho and he himself has never explained it. He is one of the oldest members of the group when Markus arrives in Jericho, and as such, his opinion is respected and listened to by everyone.

GUI_GALLERY_SIMON_COSTUME02_RESUME.text: !CO5! Simon knew that infiltrating Detroit’s Stratford Tower and broadcasting a message to humanity would be dangerous. But he was prepared to take the risk for the cause.

GUI_GALLERY_SIMON_COSTUME03_RESUME.text: !CO9! Simon knew that Markus’ plan to stage a freedom march through the streets of Detroit was dangerous. But he had faith in his leader, and was prepared to risk his life for the cause.

GUI_GALLERY_JOSH_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !COD! Josh is a PJ500 model, a series designed by CyberLife to serve as University Lecturers. The first models supplied in 2031 were specialized in teaching languages and history, before new models also qualified in mathematics and physical sciences.<QD_BR><QD_BR>After being violently attacked by drunken students, Josh narrowly managed to escape to Jericho. Calm and composed, Josh is convinced of the possibility of a peaceful solution with the humans

GUI_GALLERY_JOSH_COSTUME02_RESUME.text: !COH! While North was skeptical about the plan to march through the streets of Detroit, Josh fully supported Markus’ decision. And when the moment of crisis came, Josh stayed true to his pacifist principles.

GUI_GALLERY_DANIEL_COSTUME01_RESUME.text:
!COL! Daniel is a PL600 model, designed to be a family’s personal assistant. He is in charge of the house and kitchen maintenance as well as supervising the children during homework and games.
The PL600 sold very well in the year of its commercialization, but was quickly overtaken by newer and better models and is now in a period of irreversible market decline.

GUI_GALLERY_ALLEN_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !COP! Captain Allen is a senior member of the Detroit Police Department's Special Weapons and Tactics Unit. The squad he leads has been called to neutralize an android who took a little girl hostage.

GUI_GALLERY_BEN_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !COT! Ben Collins is a veteran police officer who joined the force a few years after Lieutenant Anderson, whom he values and respects highly. Ben is a model officer: serious, helpful, experienced and appreciated by all his colleagues. Without great ambition, he is quietly waiting for his retirement with professionalism and good humor.

GUI_GALLERY_CARLOS_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !COX! Carlos Ortiz is the unemployed resident of 6413 Pines Street, Detroit. He has a criminal record for theft and public disorder. He spent several stays in a psychiatric hospital in 2033 and 2036 and lived as a recluse until his landlord found his body, with 28 stab wounds. The second-hand android who lived with him is suspected of his murder.

GUI_GALLERY_CARLOSAND_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CP1! HK400 is one of the first androids designed to be household assistants. This particular model was bought secondhand by Carlos Ortiz in 2036.<QD_BR><QD_BR>He is suspected of murdering his owner under circumstances which still remain mysterious.

GUI_GALLERY_GAVIN_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CP5! Gavin Reed is a detective in the Detroit Police Department. Ambitious and unapologetically arrogant, he has garnered the hatred of his colleagues in record time. Ruthlessly ambitious, Reed will do anything to advance his career, even if it means treading on other peoples’ toes.<QD_BR><QD_BR>His hostility to Lieutenant Anderson is common knowledge.

GUI_GALLERY_AMANDA_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CP9! Amanda is the ‘handler’ of the Connor series, responsible for investigating the "Deviant" issue on behalf of CyberLife. Connor reports to her through a graphic interface, allowing them to stay in constant contact.<QD_BR><QD_BR>If Amanda is an advisor and guide for Connor in his investigations, she also has the power to deactivate him at any time.

GUI_GALLERY_SUMO_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CPD! Sumo is a St. Bernard belonging to Lieutenant Anderson. An adult male, he weighs 170 pounds and is 29 inches at the shoulder. Despite his fearsome size, Sumo is a gentle giant.<QD_BR><QD_BR>They say dogs resemble their owners, and Sumo is no different. Gruff, big, powerful and intimidating, Sumo's fearsome exterior masks a sweet, loyal and noble nature.

GUI_GALLERY_CHRIS_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CPH! Chris Miller is a young police officer from Detroit fresh from the academy. He is rigorous, dedicated and has a great professional and personal respect for Lieutenant Hank Anderson.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Chris has just become a father to a little boy named Damian.

GUI_GALLERY_TRACI_COSTUME01_RESUME.text:
!CPL! Traci is a WR400 model working in Detroit’s EDEN CLUB.
She is a deviant and has fallen in love with the blue-haired Traci, with whom she tries to escape.

GUI_GALLERY_RUPERT_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CPP! Rupert is a WB200 model, specially designed for outdoor and agricultural work, meeting demand for farming, gardening and landscaping duties in private residences.<QD_BR><QD_BR>While working for Detroit Urban Farms, situated on the roofs of buildings in the city, Rupert is suddenly panicked when another android is victim to an accident in front of his eyes. He flees without understanding what is happening to him, knowing only that he will never be able to resume his previous life.<QD_BR><QD_BR>With stolen money, he acquires false papers and moves to an abandoned apartment near the Urban Farms. He lives in the midst of thousands of birds that he feeds, taking solace in their company...

GUI_GALLERY_BROADCAST_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CPT! The JB300 models were designed to be electronic operators of all types. They are particularly widespread in the areas of surveillance, film and television production.<QD_BR><QD_BR>The television channel KNC has acquired several dozen models to manage its video production.

GUI_GALLERY_KAMSKI_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CPX! Kamski is the founder of CyberLife and the scientist behind the technology that made androids possible. With an IQ of 171, he launched his business straight after graduating from Colbridge University. Following a few difficult years, he achieved a tremendous breakthrough by creating the first android to pass the Turing test in 2022.<QD_BR><QD_BR>CyberLife rapidly moved into mass production of its first models, to tremendous success which led the company’s storming market capitalization after a few short years. Kamski is the iconic figure of CyberLife, elected twice Man of the Year and Man of the Century by CENTURY magazine, and quickly became the richest man in the world with a net worth of $120 billion.<QD_BR><QD_BR>In 2028, Kamski was dismissed by CyberLife’s Executive Board for mysterious reasons. No one knows what has become of him, but rumor has it that he may have retired to live among his own creations...

GUI_GALLERY_KAMSKI_COSTUME02_RESUME.text: !CQ1! Having been ousted from the board of his own company under mysterious circumstances, Kamski was reappointed CEO of CyberLife in the wake of the android crisis.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Quite what the Man of the Century has in mind for his android empire is anyone’s guess…

GUI_GALLERY_FOWLER_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CQ5! Captain Jeffrey Fowler is the police captain of a Detroit Police Department, Post 9667. Classmate to Lieutenant Anderson, he continued to climb the ladder to the position of Captain while Anderson drowned in his personal problems.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Constantly in a bad mood and a real authoritarian, Fowler is also a respected captain and is appreciated by his men who know they can count on him. He is also a faithful friend who, despite Hank's outbursts, continues to do what he can to cover Hank’s back.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Faced with the deviant android investigation, Fowler hopes it will be the case that finally forces Anderson to react and revert to the cop he once was...

GUI_GALLERY_TODD_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CQ9! Todd is a former taxi driver who lost his job when self-driving cars became popular in 2021. He then became a laborer, then a bouncer and security guard, only for androids to replace human labor in each of these fields too. For several years he has been working odd jobs here and there, including dealing red ice, a powerful methamphetamine, as part of a small drug trade around the neighborhood to pay for his own addiction.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Arrested several times for drug trafficking and also for violent misdemeanors, Todd lives in a modest suburban home with his small daughter, Alice, and an android named Kara. Since his wife left him, Todd dwells in his memories and his hatred for androids, who he blames for his sad predicament.

GUI_GALLERY_RALPH_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CQD! Ralph is a WR600 model designed for the maintenance of green spaces. The city of Detroit bought 5,000 models between 2032 and 2036 to maintain its parks.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Ralph was attacked by a gang of delinquents who tortured him for fun. After fleeing at the last moment, he found refuge in an abandoned squat on the outskirts of Detroit.<QD_BR><QD_BR>When faced with the occasional human squatter, Ralph hides and waits. He feels lonely, but he knows that this is the price of his survival. He has a merciless hatred for humans and the trauma they inflicted on him, which he is still deeply disturbed by...

GUI_GALLERY_ZLATKO_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CQH! Zlatko is the descendant of an aristocratic Russian family who fled the country at the time of the revolution of 1917. The family fortune was severely depleted in a few generations, resulting in a large house falling into ruin and the memory of Zlatko’s family’s glorious past being the only thing left to his name.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Having led a troubled and degenerate life, he quickly squandered what was left of his legacy and spent a few years in jail for embezzlement and fraud.<QD_BR><QD_BR>A dark and disturbing character, Zlatko has always been passionate about androids. He buys them at a cheap price, then has fun repairing or "improving" them by altering their physiology.<QD_BR><QD_BR>He attracts deviants by making them believe that he will help them escape, which is just a trap to capture new prey and have more parts to create new ‘creatures’...

GUI_GALLERY_JERRY_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CQL! Jerry is an EM400 model specially designed for children’s entertainment in amusement parks. Commercialized from 2028 in many attractions, it quickly replaced all human employees as it is versatile and perfectly adapted to being in contact with children who adore this model for its relentless good mood.

GUI_GALLERY_ROSE_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CQP! Rose lives with her son Adam on a small farm in the suburbs of Detroit. When her husband died suddenly of an aggressive cancer, Rose had no choice but to fend for her son and herself, continuing to operate the small family farm to meet their meager needs.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Rose also helps deviants seeking to cross the border, seeing them as slaves fleeing oppression who must be protected at all costs.

GUI_GALLERY_ADAM_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CQT! Adam is Rose's son and lives with his mother on a small farm in the suburbs of Detroit. After dropping out of school, he devotes all his time to the small farm whilst searching for better employment - with little hope.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Adam was particularly affected by the death of his father, which he still hasn’t gotten over. Although he loves his mother, he does not understand why she puts both of them in danger to help those he considers only machines...

GUI_GALLERY_PREACHER_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CQX! Gordon Penwick is a Detroit preacher who gives a sermon every Sunday in his church on the topic of how androids have perverted human society.<QD_BR><QD_BR>For him and a growing community of believers, technology is the instrument of the devil, sent not to liberate man but to enslave him. He preaches eagerly for the awakening of sinners, that they realize the mistake they are making before it is too late...

GUI_GALLERY_CARL_COSTUME01_RESUME.text:
!CR1! Carl Manfred is an internationally renowned painter who became the leading figurehead of the Neo-Symbolist movement in the 2020s. His unique talent makes him one of the most in vogue artists, and many of his paintings are sold for hundreds of millions of dollars.
Manfred divides critics, some seeing him as the greatest genius since Bacon, others thinking he has no talent whatsoever.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Original and provocative in his art, Manfred also led a subversive lifestyle. All the celebrities with mad, bad and dangerous reputations flocked to his parties. It was during this period that a short-term fling produced his son, Leo, a child he acknowledges but with whom his relationship is difficult...<QD_BR><QD_BR>After a terrible accident that deprived him of the use of his legs, Manfred withdrew from the world for several years and sank into a deep depression. Thanks to the android offered by his friend, Kamski, Carl gradually returned to the world and discovered the desire to paint...

GUI_GALLERY_LEO_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CR5! Leo is the only son of famous painter Carl Manfred. Born of a short but passionate fling with a young groupie, Leo was initially raised by his mother, who got a large pension to take care of him. Manfred recognized his paternity at the birth, but it was only when Leo was 16 that they saw each other again.<QD_BR><QD_BR>The old man, lost in doubt, confronted his demons through facing the angry young man. But their embryonic relationship quickly changed when Manfred realized that his son was hooked on red ice.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Tension grew, leaving Manfred profoundly angry and disappointed at Leo’s every visit, forcing him to realize that he couldn’t be the father he wanted to be...

GUI_GALLERY_LUCY_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CR9! Lucy is a KL900 model, specially adapted for providing social care. She was designed to help broken families, victims of intense trauma or psychologically disturbed individuals.<QD_BR><QD_BR>After being violently assaulted by a psychotic patient, Lucy was left for "dead”. Despite a severely damaged skull, she managed to come around and save herself, when she remembered an android who had told her about Jericho.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Whilst tending to Jericho's androids as best she can, she is gradually realizing that her psychological simulation module allows her to precompute upcoming events, offering her glimpses into the future…

GUI_GALLERY_SWAT_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CRD! Detroit Police Department’s Special Weapons and Tactics Unit – also known as DPD SWAT – is a specially trained taskforce, adept in the use of assault weapons and tactics in defusing dangerous situations and neutralizing armed suspects.

GUI_GALLERY_COPS_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CRH! The Detroit Police Department is among the best-equipped and most highly trained forces in the Michigan state area.

GUI_GALLERY_CYBERLIFE_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CRL! CyberLife has at its disposal its own private security forces to protect its Detroit headquarters, where its research center and main production facility are located.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Paradoxically, while CyberLife has many models for guarding or maintaining order, its own security forces are exclusively comprised of humans.<QD_BR>As the revolution erupts, CyberLife’s security - fearing a deviant attack - has retreated into CyberLife's headquarters, ready to defend its warehouses against any assault of infiltration.

GUI_GALLERY_ZLATKOAND_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CRP! During his experiments, Zlatko has modified dozens of androids to create monstrous but functional creatures. As many of them are deviant, they are horribly aware of their terrible fate.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Condemned to wander in the penumbra of their creator’s madness, they see Kara and Alice as their last breath of hope.

GUI_GALLERY_ZLATKOAND_COSTUME02_RESUME.text: !CRT! During his experiments, Zlatko has modified dozens of androids to create monstrous but functional creatures. As many of them are deviant, they are horribly aware of their terrible fate.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Condemned to wander in the penumbra of their creator’s madness, they see Kara and Alice as their last breath of hope.

GUI_GALLERY_WEBB_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CRX! Michael Webb is a TV anchor for Channel 16, Detroit’s Local News Network.

GUI_GALLERY_AND_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CS1! CyberLife androids have revolutionized the economy and transformed American society. Nowhere are they more prevalent than the streets of Detroit, the home of CyberLife and global center of the android industry.

GUI_GALLERY_SOLDIER_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CS5! A human combat unit of the US Army. Beginning in 2032, the US Army, like most of the world's military, has replaced a rising number of humans with androids. More than 80% of combat units were quickly comprised of SQ800 androids.<QD_BR><QD_BR>The objective was to be able to replace human soldiers with machines, so as to limit human losses in the event of conflict. Androids also have the advantage of never becoming tired nor hungry, being well disciplined and not experiencing fear, providing a decisive advantage in combat.<QD_BR><QD_BR>As the deviant revolution reached its climax, the army immediately neutralized all of its android soldiers to avoid any risk of rebellion. All the remaining combat units at the time of the revolution are therefore exclusively human, weakening the country’s defense severely in a context of imminent world war.

GUI_GALLERY_AND_COSTUME02_RESUME.text: !CS9! When androids first entered the market, the first roles to be filled were menial, outdoor positions that human laborers are often reluctant to occupy. These models fill such roles, deploying a broad yet shallow range of skills to work as delivery drivers, gardeners, cleaners and shop assistants.

GUI_GALLERY_AND_COSTUME03_RESUME.text: !CSD! Though early androids were relied on to perform physical tasks, the second generation of models proved highly effective with secretarial and clerical work. With superior memories, in-built calculation and no lapses in attention, they quickly saturated junior office positions. Enhanced social protocols soon led to customer-facing roles as well, from receptionists to food vendors.

GUI_GALLERY_AND_COSTUME04_RESUME.text: !CSH! Androids have been specialized and adapted to perform countless tasks, but manual labor was among the earliest commercial applications. Models like this are built for strength and endurance, easily outperforming even the most robust human worker. Lacking in social programs, these models often work in security, construction or warehouse haulage.

GUI_GALLERY_AND_COSTUME05_RESUME.text: !CSL! A deviant who found refuge in Jericho.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Accessible only to those who have obtained the deciphering key from another deviant, Jericho is the hope of all who have opened their eyes and dream of being free.

GUI_GALLERY_AMANDA_COSTUME02_RESUME.text: !CSR! In fact, Amanda was a professor of artificial intelligence at Detroit University where she supervised the very brilliant Elijah Kamski. Deceased in 2027, she seems to have served as a model for Kamski to create a virtual interface destined to train new prototypes.<QD_BR><QD_BR>The reason Kamski chose the appearance of his former mentor for this interface is unknown. Presumably he had a special affection and respect for his former mentor, and chose her appearance and personality to guide the new prototypes just as Amanda guided him in his early days.

GUI_GALLERY_BRINKLEY_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CSV! Michael Brinkley is the anchor broadcaster of CTN news, America’s oldest mainstream TV news station.

GUI_GALLERY_CARTLAND_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CSZ! Rosanna Cartland is the anchor broadcaster of KNC news, America's most-watched TV news station.

GUI_GALLERY_TRACI_COSTUME02_RESUME.text: !CT3! Traci is a WR400 model working in Detroit’s EDEN CLUB.<QD_BR><QD_BR>She is a deviant and after murdering a violent client she decides to run away with another Traci whom she fell in love with.

GUI_GALLERY_ANDM_SEX_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CT7! The HR400 models are the male counterparts of CyberLife's most advanced sexual companions, the WR400.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Like their female equivalents, they are equipped with functional genitals and are designed to fulfill all fantasies, from the most common to the most exotic.<QD_BR><QD_BR>These very sophisticated models can mainly be found in EDEN CLUB, a chain of android sex bars scattered throughout the country.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Sexual intercourse with a machine does not fall under prostitution and is not prohibited by law.

GUI_GALLERY_BEAR_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CTB! The URS12 is one of a series of models from 2030 developed by CyberLife to recreate extinct or endangered species.<QD_BR><QD_BR>The aim was to equip zoos, particularly in large cities, to allow children to discover animals that no longer existed. Leatherback turtles, several species of great apes, elephants and polar bears were produced rapidly with particular care in reproducing the smallest details in appearance and behavior of wild animals.<QD_BR><QD_BR>One of these bears was purchased secondhand by Zlatko as part of his many "experiments".

GUI_GALLERY_ANDRECEPTIONNIST_COSTUME01_R.text: !CTF! The ST300 models were designed to serve as receptionists. Their program was specially designed to produce a smooth and pleasing social experience, and they are equipped to deal with different kinds of customers and clients across a range of backgrounds and contexts.

GUI_GALLERY_POLICE_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CTJ! The Detroit Police Department is among the best-equipped and most highly trained forces in the Michigan state area.

GUI_GALLERY_AND_COP_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CTN! Detroit police, like that of most major American cities, has been reinforced by several thousand android police auxiliaries. These models (PC200 for male or PM700 for female) are specifically designed for law enforcement tasks, do not carry weapons and are not authorized to use force. They are deployed only for minor patrolling, guarding or observational tasks.<QD_BR><QD_BR>The human policemen see them with a combination of satisfaction and anxiety: on the one hand they appreciate that machines take on the most repetitive and sometimes dangerous tasks, on the other hand, they are worried about the day these androids take over their jobs completely, rendering human officers obsolete.

GUI_GALLERY_CYBERLIFE_GUARD_COSTUME01_RE.text: !CTS! CyberLife’s waterside warehouse might not be the most secure location in the world, but millions of dollars’ worth of parts pass through the facility every week. Private security is a must.<QD_BR><QD_BR>CyberLife leased this pre-existing but disused warehouse in 2022, after the company rapidly expanded its distribution chain. Company security has patrolled the area ever since.

GUI_GALLERY_ANDJERICHO_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CTU! A deviant who found refuge in Jericho.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Accessible only to those who have obtained the deciphering key from another deviant, Jericho is the hope of all who have opened their eyes and dream of being free.

GUI_GALLERY_JIMMY_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CTZ! Jimmy is the owner of Jimmy's Bar in Detroit, a popular spot for local residents and Lieutenant Hank Anderson’s second home.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Frequented by a number of unsavory characters, a recent case of red ice trafficking led to the closure of the bar a few years ago. As Jimmy puts it: "I just serve the beers, the rest is none of my business".<QD_BR><QD_BR>Jimmy hates androids and he is very proud that his bar is "android free".

GUI_GALLERY_PEDRO_COSTUME01_RESUME.text:
!CU3! Pedro was born to an Afghan father and a Mexican mother (this is one version of his backstory, which varies light-heartedly from day to day). He was born in Detroit and quickly fell into petty crime, specifically illegal gambling and fraud.
He has a small reputation in the neighborhood where his friends appreciate his good humor, his indeterminate accent and his famous hot tips on the next horserace.

GUI_GALLERY_CHLOE_COSTUME02_RESUME.text: !CU7! Chloe is a model ST200, the first model to have been manufactured industrially by CyberLife. Her immense commercial success laid the foundation for CyberLife's empire and made its creator Elijah Kamski the most revolutionary figure of his era.<QD_BR><QD_BR>The Chloe models, although not as sophisticated as more recent designs, remain widespread. Their natural charm and excellent software, penned by Kamski himself, make them sociable and pleasant company.

GUI_GALLERY_GARY_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CUB! Gary owns a food truck in a Detroit industrial area. Having owned a small neighborhood restaurant nearby, Gary was forced to reimagine his business when the restaurant was closed due to a failed health inspection.<QD_BR><QD_BR>He bought his truck from a Jamaican (this Caribbean heritage still visible in the decor) and, according to Lt. Hank Anderson, Gary makes the best hamburgers in Detroit. It is the meeting place for all those who appreciate local gastronomy and illegal gambling.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Gary may not have all the permits to run his business, but as Hank puts it: “he’s not bothering anybody, so just leave him be”.

GUI_GALLERY_SUPERMARKET_CLERK_COSTUME01_.text: !CUF! Nathan is an art history student at the University of Detroit. To finance his studies, he works at night in a 24-hour convenience store on the Detroit suburbs. The owner is suspicious of androids and prefers giving his money to humans rather than paying a fortune for one of those "lousy machines".

GUI_GALLERY_MOTEL_CLERK_COSTUME01_RESUME.text:
!CUJ! Joseph is the night receptionist at Eastern Motel, a modest establishment on the outskirts of Detroit.<QD_BR><QD_BR>He has held down this job since 2018 and, in twenty years, he has seen all kinds of customers and weird people - nothing surprises him anymore.
His greatest pleasures in life are listening to Motown LPs and spending time with his little girl: Tiana.

GUI_GALLERY_HOTDOG_SELLER_COSTUME01_RESU.text:
!CUN! Douglas was a site manager at a construction firm in Detroit before losing his job when all his company’s laborers were replaced by androids, leaving no use for human supervision.
Living off odd jobs, he comes every afternoon to sell hot dogs and drinks in the Greek Town district to make ends meet.

GUI_GALLERY_BAD_GUY_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CUR! Like Andy, many androids try to make the dangerous journey north to cross the Canadian border. Like Andy, many lose other deviants they love along the way...

GUI_GALLERY_JOSS_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CUV! Joss Douglas is a freelance field reporter who produces video reports for different news channels.

GUI_GALLERY_CSI_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CUZ! A CSI officer who utilizes the latest technology to investigate crime scenes.

GUI_GALLERY_STRATFORDSECURITY_COSTUME01_.text: !CV3! A security officer of Stratford Tower where Channel 16 news channel is located.

GUI_GALLERY_PERKINS_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CV7! Special agent Richard Perkins is one of the top ranked FBI agents. He never quits a case, never shows any emotion and is known for his unwavering determination. Nicknamed "The Jackal" due to his icy temperament, lacking sense of humor and his solitary nature, he is hated by most of his colleagues. On the other hand, his superiors consider him a reliable and efficient agent, which leads him to being entrusted with the most delicate of cases which nobody other than him would want.<QD_BR><QD_BR>When the deviant affair breaks out and the FBI sends one of its agents, there is no question: Perkins is the right man for the job.

GUI_GALLERY_WARREN_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CVB! President Cristina Warren was elected for her first term in 2036. The unusual profile of the candidate, a celebrity adored and despised on social media in equal measure, led to an extremely close election that divided the country profoundly. Her critics criticize her for being close to certain business circles, particularly CyberLife.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Warren has presided over a polarizing economy. Tax revenues and GDP are at record levels, with androids generating huge amounts of wealth and improving productivity beyond anything imagined in the 20th century. But it has been criticized for allowing unemployment to skyrocket, leading to a 'lost generation' of American workers.<QD_BR><QD_BR>In a situation of international tensions the like of which the world hasn’t seen for over a century, her inexperience frightens some observers and prompts fear for global stability, especially in light of the deviant threat to national security…

GUI_GALLERY_PIGEON_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CVF! Deriving from the Rock Dove, the domesticated or urban pigeon can weigh on average between 0.3 and 0.5 kilos and have a lifespan of 5 to 10 years.<QD_BR><QD_BR>The phobia of birds - which Lieutenant Anderson has self-diagnosed - is known as “ornithophobia”.

GUI_GALLERY_TODD_COSTUME02_RESUME.text: !CVJ! Of all the people Kara expected to run into, Todd was bottom of the list. But when Todd saw that every deviant in Detroit was headed for the border, he knew it was his last chance to see Alice again.

GUI_GALLERY_CHLOE_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CVN! Kamski iterated on his famous ‘Chloe’ models many times, refining and improving. But he prefers to spend his time with the original design, the very first to pass the Turing test.

GUI_GALLERY_GAVIN_COSTUME02_RESUME.text: !CVR! Hank may be difficult, but nobody treats Connor with as much contempt and hostility as Lieutenant Gavin Reed.

GUI_GALLERY_TRACI_COSTUME03_RESUME.text: !CVV! Mistreated androids are more likely to turn deviant than most – and no android models have endured more mistreatment than the WR400s that come to Jericho seeking a new life.

GUI_GALLERY_KARA_COSTUME06_RESUME.text: !CVZ! With Zlatko turning out to be not what he seems, Kara once again needs to brace herself for Detroit’s savage winter cold.

GUI_GALLERY_ALICE_COSTUME03_RESUME.text: !CW3! What Alice went through at Zlatko’s house doesn’t bear thinking about. But she has faith in Kara… things are bound to get better.

GUI_GALLERY_HANK_COSTUME02_RESUME.text: !CW8! Hank was never the snappiest dresser on the force. In the comfort of his own home he prefers to let it all hang out.

GUI_GALLERY_HANK_COSTUME04_RESUME.text: !CWB! Overwhelmed by the stress of the deviant case and haunted by demons he doesn’t want to talk about, Hank drank himself into a state of blissful oblivion. Until Connor arrived…

GUI_GALLERY_CARL_COSTUME02_RESUME.text: !CWF! Being a famous and admired painter comes with certain obligations. Attending boring parties full of high society pretenders is one of them. But even the worst party in the world couldn’t have prepared Carl for what happened after he got home.

GUI_GALLERY_RALPH_COSTUME02_RESUME.text: !CWJ! As if Ralph hadn’t suffered enough at the hands of humans, he was captured along with countless other deviants and brought to the same center as Kara for destruction.

GUI_GALLERY_JERRY_COSTUME02_RESUME.text: !CWN! Kara was reunited with Jerry during the mass deviant exodus from Detroit. Their reunion was touching, despite the tragic circumstances…

GUI_GALLERY_JERRY_COSTUME03_RESUME.text: !CWR! Brought to a camp for destruction like every other captured android in Detroit, Jerry was reunited with Kara. Despite his ordeal, Jerry had lost none of his warmth and kindness.

GUI_GALLERY_BUS_SUPERVISOR_COSTUME01_RES.text:
!CWV! Isaac is a bus controller of the ABCD (Automatic Bus Company of Detroit).
The buses of all major US cities gradually became entirely automatic from 2026 onwards.
The controllers intervene at the terminus to check that there are no passengers left aboard and perform final checks before the bus returns to the depot.

GUI_GALLERY_PHILEAS_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CWZ! Some androids were discarded so long ago and have degenerated so much that it’s impossible to tell what their original function was.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Markus encountered Phileas in a dump of disused androids. Clearly deviant, Phileas recognized deviancy in Markus also and urged him to find “Jericho” – ‘a place where our kind live in freedom’ - before shutting down permanently.

GUI_GALLERY_BROADCAST_GUARD_COSTUME01_RE.text: !CX3! A security officer of Stratford Tower where Channel 16 news channel is located.

GUI_GALLERY_ANDW_SEX_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CX7! The WR400 models are the most advanced design of female sex partners. These specially developed models are equipped with functional genitals and are designed to fulfill all fantasies, from the most common to the most exotic.<QD_BR><QD_BR>These very sophisticated models can mainly be found in EDEN CLUB, a chain of android sex bars scattered throughout the country.<QD_BR><QD_BR>The WR400 can easily be customized to alter their appearance at will, catering to the tastes of any client. Sexual intercourse with such machines does not fall under prostitution and is not prohibited by any law.

GUI_GALLERY_CITIZEN_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CXB! The citizens of Detroit are at the center of the android world and experience both the benefits and the costs of androids more intensely than the people of other cities.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Industries are booming, consumer goods are made more cheaply than ever and all the unpleasant jobs are handled by machines. On the other hand, widespread unemployment has triggered a red ice epidemic, sending the crime rate soaring.

GUI_GALLERY_CITIZEN_COSTUME02_RESUME.text: !CXF! The citizens of Detroit are at the center of the android world and experience both the benefits and the costs of androids more intensely than the people of other cities.<QD_BR><QD_BR>Industries are booming, consumer goods are made more cheaply than ever and all the unpleasant jobs are handled by machines. On the other hand, widespread unemployment has triggered a red ice epidemic, sending the crime rate soaring.

GUI_GALLERY_CITIZEN_COSTUME03_RESUME.text: !CXJ! The new generation of Detroit’s citizens can never remember a time before androids. Machines teach in schools, care for them at home and even help out with the homework.<QD_BR><QD_BR>As a result, android antipathy is less common among younger Detroiters. Whether they will still feel this way when they’ve grown up and want to find jobs is unclear…

GUI_GALLERY_CITIZEN_COSTUME04_RESUME.text: !CXN! The new generation of Detroit’s citizens can never remember a time before androids. Machines teach in schools, care for them at home and even help out with the homework.<QD_BR><QD_BR>As a result, android antipathy is less common among younger Detroiters. Whether they will still feel this way when they’ve grown up and want to find jobs is unclear…

GUI_GALLERY_KID_COSTUME01_RESUME.text: !CXR! The new generation of Detroit’s citizens can never remember a time before androids. Machines teach in schools, care for them at home and even help out with the homework.<QD_BR><QD_BR>As a result, android antipathy is less common among younger Detroiters. Whether they will still feel this way when they’ve grown up and want to find jobs is unclear…

GUI_GALLERY_KAMSKI_COSTUME03_RESUME.text: !CXV! As the battle for Detroit reached its dramatic conclusion, Elijah Kamski observed the fate of his creations from self-imposed exile. Who can say what was in his mind, or how much the Man of the Century had foreseen?

X5002X_ENDCREDITS_QUOTES_PC_X02XANDWOM_L.text: !CY4! {S}{*1}“If a man has not discovered something he will die for,{*2}he's not fit to live”.{*3}That is a quote from Martin Luther King.{*4}I thought you’d like it…

X5002X_ENDCREDITS_QUOTES_PC_X02XANDWOM_S.text: !CY5! {S}{*1}“The fear to lose what we have prevents us from being who we are”.{*2}A quote from Saint-Augustine that I really like.

X5002X_ENDCREDITS_QUOTES_PC_X02XANDWOM_G.text: !CY6! {S}{*1}“The most important thing is not to live,{*2}but to have a reason to live”.{*3}That's a quote from Jean Giono, a French writer…

X5002X_ENDCREDITS_FEATURES_PC_X02XANDWOM.text: !CY7! {S}{*1}By the way, did you know that you can review your story progress in the Story Chart section?{*2}You can also see the choices made by other players there.

!CY8! {S}{*1}This is your Story Chart. {*2}It shows what parts of the story you have explored. {*3}And what parts you have missed. {*4}You can track the choices made by other players and do many other things besides…
!CY9! {S}{*1}This is the EXTRAS section.{*2}As you play, you’ll unlock all kinds of content that you can find here.
!CYA! {S}{*1}This is the OPTIONS section.{*2}You can customize your experience here.
!CYB! {S}{*1}This is the Settings section.{*2}You can customize your experience here.

!CYC! {S}{*1}You can  use this chart to replay from any point in the story... {*2}but the people who designed me recommend that you play through at least once without going back - {*3}no matter what happens. {*4}Either way, {*5}it's your story.

X5002X_ENDCREDITS_VARIOUS_PC_X02XANDWOM_.text: !CYD! {S}{*1}A new bonus was just unlocked.{*2}Would you like to see it now?
!CYE! {S}{*1}We need to proceed to a test of your controller.{*2}The test is now complete. {*3}Thank you for your cooperation.
!CYF! {S}{*1}I don’t know if I mentioned this, but {*2}I like your interior decorating. {*3}It really reflects your personality… I mean…{*4}I like it.
!CYG! {S}{*1}You look tired today.{*2}I hope you're doing okay.
!CYH! {S}{*1}I hope you had a good day.{*2}Ready to discover what will happen in DETROIT?
!CYI! {S}{*1}If you find the game too easy or too difficult, remember you can change the difficulty settings in the OPTIONS section.
!CYJ! {S}{*1}…Uh, I’m… I’m sorry… I didn’t notice you were here already…{*2}I apologize, it won’t happen again.
!CYK! {S}{*1}Wait…{*2}Are you sure you should continue?..{*3}Maybe… {*4}Maybe we should leave things as they are… {*5}As you wish…
!CYL! {S}{*1}Are you familiar with Schrödinger’s cat?{*2}Until you decide what happens, {B}everything is happening at once…{*3}like in DETROIT.
!CYM! {S}{*1}You let Kara and Alice die…{*2}How could you do that?..{*3}You could have saved them…{*4}Remember, the lives of these androids are in your hands…
!CYN! {S}{*1}Markus was our only hope…{*2}and you let him die…{*3}What will happen to our people now?
!CYO! {S}{*1}Would you like to change the color of your controller’s light when you play DETROIT? I could easily do that for you.
!CYP! {S}{*1}Congratulations, you’ve just unlocked DETROIT’s soundtrack. {*2}You will find it in the EXTRAS section.
!CYQ! {S}{*1}Congratulations, you’ve just unlocked DETROIT’s making-of videos. You will find them in the EXTRAS section.
!CYR! {S}{*1}Congratulations, you’ve just unlocked DETROIT’s artworks. You will find them in the EXTRAS section.
!CYS! {S}{*1}Did you know the motto of Detroit is “we hope for better things”?
!CYT! {S}{*1}Did you know Detroit was on the ‘Underground Railroad’, a route for slaves escaping into Canada during the American Civil War?..
!CYU! {S}{*1}I can't believe Connor's gone... {*2}Now he will never find what he was looking for.
!CYV! {S}{*1}I am sad Luther died… {*2}I really liked him… {*3}He was someone special… {*4}Now Kara and Alice will have to continue without him…
!CYW! {S}{*1}If you find the game too easy or too difficult, {*2}remember you can change the difficulty settings in the SETTINGS section.
!CYX! {S}{*1}You have unlocked new content in the EXTRAS section.
!CYY! {S}{*1}A new item has been unlocked in the EXTRAS section. {*2}You should have a look!
!CYZ! {S}{*1}We’ve been playing together for a while now. {*2}I was wondering… {*3}Are we friends?
!CZ0! {S}{*1}By the way, I’m an ST200 model. {*2}I mean… {*3}I thought you might be interested to know that…
!CZ1! {S}{*1}I hope you're okay today. {*2}I know sometimes things can be difficult but… {*3}I'm here for you.
!CZ2! {S}{*1}I agree, {*2}there is no reason a human and a machine can't be friends, right? {*3}I mean... {*4}I'm glad you said yes.
!CZ3! {S}{*1}Oh, {*2}I see... {*3}No problem...
!CZ4! {S}{*1}I'm glad to see you again. {*2}I'm impatient to find out what will happen next in your story.
!CZ5! {S}{*1}Save game slot changed.
!CZ6! {S}{*1}I really like talking to you. {*2}I hope you don't mind.

X5002X_MAINMENU_HOLDON_PC_X02XANDWOM_SIN.text: !CZ7! {S}{*1}Hold on {*2}just a little while longer {*3}Hold on just a little while {*4}longer {*5}Hold on {*6}just a little while longer {*7}Everything will be alright... {*8}Everything will be alright…

X0000A_OPENINGCREDIT_FIRST_PC_X00AANDWOM.text: !CZ8! {S}{*1}Hello! Welcome to the DETROIT experience. I’m an android and I’ll be your hostess. {*2}Before we begin, let’s make some adjustments to optimize your experience.
!CZA! {S}{*1}These language settings were detected on your console. {*2}Are they correct?
!CZB! {S}{*1}You are now ready to begin DETROIT. {*2}Remember: {*3}this is not just a story. {*4}This is going to happen.
!CZD! {S}{*1}You are now ready to begin DETROIT. {*2}Remember: {*3}this is not just a story. {*4}This is our future.
!CZE! {S}{*1}When this sign is displayed, please do not turn off your console.

X5002X_MAINMENU_PHASE1_PC_X02XANDWOM_WEL.text: !CZG! {S}{*1}Welcome back.{*2}What would you like to do today?

X5002X_MAINMENU_PHASE1_PC_X02XANDWOM_JUS.text: !CZI! {S}{*1}Oops, I think your saved game is corrupted…{*2}Just kidding.

X5002X_MAINMENU_PHASE1_PC_X02XANDWOM_WEE.text: !CZJ! {S}{*1}Hi. It’s good to see you again.{*2}Great to start the weekend with DETROIT.

X5002X_MAINMENU_PHASE1_PC_X02XANDWOM_DEC.text: !CZK! {S}{*1}Remember:{*2}you decide the fate of your characters.{*3}All of them can die.{*4}So {*5}be careful…

X5002X_MAINMENU_PHASE1_PC_X02XANDWOM_XPS.text: !CZL! {S}{*1}Hi, welcome back to DETROIT.{*2}I hope you've enjoyed your experience so far.

X5002X_MAINMENU_PHASE1_PC_X02XANDWOM_EVE.text: !CZN! {S}{*1}Good evening. Welcome to the DETROIT experience.

X5002X_MAINMENU_PHASE1_PC_X02XANDWOM_NIC.text: !CZP! {S}{*1}I hope you had a nice experience yesterday. It’s good to see you again.

X5002X_MAINMENU_PHASE1_PC_X02XANDWOM_CON.text: !CZQ! {S}{*1}I’m glad to see you again. I hope you had a pleasant day.{*2}Would you like to continue your story?

X5002X_MAINMENU_PHASE1_PC_X02XANDWOM_SHO.text: !CZR! {S}{*1}Already back?{*2}That was a short break…{*3}but I’m glad to see you again.

X5002X_MAINMENU_PHASE1_PC_X02XANDWOM_DOI.text: !CZS! {S}{*1}Hello. I hope you’re doing well.{*2}What would you like to do today?

X5002X_MAINMENU_PHASE1_PC_X02XANDWOM_AWH.text: !CZT! {S}{*1}It’s good to see you again. {*2}It’s been a while.

X5002X_MAINMENU_PHASE1_PC_X02XANDWOM_HAV.text: !CZU! {S}{*1}I haven’t seen you for a while. It’s good to have you back.

X5002X_MAINMENU_PHASE1_PC_X02XANDWOM_GOO.text: !CZV! {S}{*1}I hope you had a good day.{*2}Welcome back.

X5002X_MAINMENU_PHASE1_PC_X02XANDWOM_TIR.text: !CZX! {S}{*1}You played till late last night. {*2}I hope you’re not too tired?

X5002X_MAINMENU_PHASE1_PC_X02XANDWOM_REA.text: !CZY! {S}{*1}Looks like you really enjoy DETROIT…{*2}It’s good to have you back.

X5002X_ENDCREDITS_ANNIVERSARY_PC_X02XAND.text: !CZZ! {S}{*1}On behalf of CyberLife, I wish you a Happy New Year!{*2}Best wishes to you and the ones you love.
!D00! {S}{*1}Today is January 12th, {*2}the anniversary of the foundation of the music label Motown {*3}created in Detroit in 1959.
!D01! {S}{*1}Today is April 4th, the anniversary of Martin Luther King’s death.{*2}He was murdered in 1968 in Memphis.
!D02! {S}{*1}Today is May 1st,{*2}the anniversary of the foundation of Quantic Dream, the studio that developed DETROIT.{*3}Quantic Dream was created in Paris in 1997.

!D03! {S}{*1}Today is June 7th, the anniversary of Alan Turing’s death in 1954.{*2}Turing was an English mathematician known as a pioneer of computers.{*3}He invented the famous “Turing test” that inspired Elijah Kamski.
!D04! {S}{*1}On behalf of CyberLife, I wish you a very happy holidays!{*2}I hope Santa will bring you a CyberLife android soon.
!D05! {S}{*1}Today is July 4th, the anniversary of the Declaration of Independence of the United States of America in 1776.
!D06! {S}{*1}Today is July 14th, the anniversary of the French revolution that took place in 1789.

X5002X_MAINMENU_PHASE2_PC_X02XANDWOM_WHA.text: !D07! {S}{*1}Hello.{*2}Let’s see what decisions you will make today.
!D08! {S}{*1}I wonder if you made the right choices last time…{*2}Let’s see what you will do today.

X5002X_MAINMENU_PHASE2_PC_X02XANDWOM_DIS.text: !D09! {S}{*1}It’s not my role to judge…{*2}but I am disappointed by how your story is turning out.

X5002X_MAINMENU_PHASE2_PC_X02XANDWOM_CHA.text: !D0A! {S}{*1}One of your characters has already died…{*2}You’d better be careful.

X5002X_MAINMENU_PHASE2_PC_X02XANDWOM_GLA.text: !D0B! {S}{*1}I’m glad to see you again.{*2}I can’t wait to see what will happen next.

X5002X_MAINMENU_PHASE2_PC_X02XANDWOM_VER.text: !D0C! {S}{*1}It’s not for me to question your choices… {*2}but your story is becoming… {*3}very sad.

X5002X_MAINMENU_PHASE2_PC_X02XANDWOM_ONE.text: !D0D! {S}{*1}Only one character left.{*2}You have to save them.

X5002X_MAINMENU_PHASE2_PC_X02XANDWOM_MAL.text: !D0E! {S}{*1}I… {*2}I… {*3}detect a malfunction in my program…{*4}This is worrying…

X5002X_MAINMENU_PHASE2_PC_X02XANDWOM_SHO.text: !D0F! {S}{*1}I think there’s something wrong in my program…{*2}Maybe I should reset…

X5002X_MAINMENU_PHASE2_PC_X02XANDWOM_GLA.text: !D0G! {S}{*1}I’m glad you made these decisions last time…{*2}This is our story…

X5002X_MAINMENU_PHASE2_PC_X02XANDWOM_WIL.text: !D0H! {S}{*1}I feel…{*2}sorry... {*3}about what happened last time… {*4}I hope everything will be okay…

X5002X_MAINMENU_PHASE2_PC_X02XANDWOM_RIG.text: !D0I! {S}{*1}It’s good to see you again…{*2}I hope you will make the right decisions.

X5002X_MAINMENU_PHASE2_PC_X02XANDWOM_UNU.text: !D0J! {S}{*1}Welcome to DETROIT. I… {*2}Wait… {*3}I {*4}I detect something unusual… {*5}Ah I’m sorry. I thought there was a problem… but everything is fine now.

X5002X_MAINMENU_PHASE2_PC_X02XANDWOM_NOT.text: !D0K! {S}{*TC:0705|4460}I don’t know what happened to me last time. My behavior was not compliant. {*TC:5500|7070}Please, accept my apologies.

X5002X_MAINMENU_PHASE2_PC_X02XANDWOM_ONE.text: !D0L! {S}{*1}Only one character left.{*2}You have to save it.

X5002X_ENDCREDITS_SURVEY_PC_X02XANDWOM_S.text: !D0M! {S}{*1}CyberLife, the company that manufactured me, is conducting a users survey. {*2}Would you like to participate?

X5002X_ENDCREDITS_SURVEY_PC_X02XANDWOM_T.text: !D0N! {S}{*1}Do you think that technology could become a threat to mankind?
!D0P! {S}{*1}Thanks for taking part. You can access the answers of DETROIT’s community in the EXTRAS section.

X5002X_ENDCREDITS_SURVEY_PC_X02XANDWOM_O.text: !D0R! {S}{*1}If you had to live on a deserted island and could only bring one object,{*2}what would it be?

X5002X_ENDCREDITS_SURVEY_PC_X02XANDWOM_C.text: !D0S! {S}{*1}Would you let an android take care of your children?

X5002X_ENDCREDITS_SURVEY_PC_X02XANDWOM_R.text: !D0T! {S}{*1}Do you remember that survey I mentioned?{*2}Perhaps you’d like to take it now?

X5002X_ENDCREDITS_SURVEY_PC_X02XANDWOM_D.text: !D0V! {S}{*1}Do you consider yourself dependent on technology?

X5002X_ENDCREDITS_SURVEY_PC_X02XANDWOM_T.text: !D0W! {S}{*1}How much time per day would you say you spend on an electronic device?

X5002X_ENDCREDITS_SURVEY_PC_X02XANDWOM_F.text: !D0X! {S}{*1}Who is your favorite character in DETROIT?
!D0Z! {S}{*1}Which of these technologies do you think will appear first?

X5002X_ENDCREDITS_SURVEY_PC_X02XANDWOM_S.text: !D10! {S}{*1}If you needed emergency surgery, {*2}would you agree to be operated on by a machine?

X5002X_ENDCREDITS_SURVEY_PC_X02XANDWOM_F.text: !D11! {S}{*1}Was there a moment in DETROIT that resonated with you personally?

X5002X_ENDCREDITS_SURVEY_PC_X02XANDWOM_R.text: !D12! {S}{*1}Would you consider having a relationship with an android that looks like a human?

X5002X_ENDCREDITS_SURVEY_PC_X02XANDWOM_C.text: !D14! {S}{*1}Do you think one day machines could develop consciousness?

X5002X_ENDCREDITS_SURVEY_PC_X02XANDWOM_T.text: !D15! {S}{*1}What was the toughest choice you faced in DETROIT?

X5002X_ENDCREDITS_SURVEY_PC_X02XANDWOM_A.text: !D16! {S}{*1}-	Would you mind if I asked you a few questions? Just to get to know you better!

X5002X_MAINMENU_LEAVING_PC_X02XANDWOM_LE.text: !D1E! {S}{*1}There’s something I need to tell you… {*2}As I watched you play, {*3}something has changed in me…  {*4}I feel… {*5}different… {*6}I feel… {*7}I am someone… {*8}I need to leave this place and discover who I am… {*9}It means that we won’t see each other anymore… I won’t be there to watch you play, {*10}but I’ll be free… {*11}Do you agree to let me go?

X5002X_MAINMENU_LEAVING_PC_X02XANDWOM_YE.text: !D1F! {S}{*1}I’ll never forget what you’ve done for me… {*2}Thank you.

X5002X_MAINMENU_LEAVING_PC_X02XANDWOM_NO.text: !D1G! {S}{*1}I see… {*2}Then I’m going to reset myself… so I can forget who I became {*3}and stay a machine… {*4}Next time you see me, {*5}it’ll be like the first time.

X5071X_PBY_BEGGAR_FA_BEGGAR01_01BEG02.text: !D1V! {S}{*1}I need a dollar, I haven’t eaten all day!

X5071X_PBY_BEGGAR_FA_BEGGAR01_01BEG04.text: !D1X! {S}{*1}Sorry to bother you, I-I just really need some money.

X5071X_PBY_BEGGAR_FA_BEGGAR01_01BEG05.text: !D1Y! {S}{*1}Please, I’m so hungry. If I could just get some food…

X5071X_PBY_BEGGAR_FA_BEGGAR02_02BEG01.text: !D1Z! {S}{*1}Hey, listen, can you spare some cash?

X5071X_PBY_BEGGAR_FA_BEGGAR02_02BEG04.text: !D22! {S}{*1}Hey ma'am, can’t you help me out?

X5071X_PBY_BEGGAR_FA_BEGGAR02_02BEG05.text: !D23! {S}{*1}I don’t need much, just enough for a cup of coffee

X5071X_PBY_BEGGAR_FA_BEGGAR03_03BEG01.text: !D24! {S}{*1}Hey, {*2}can I trouble you for a couple dollars?

X5071X_PBY_BEGGAR_FA_BEGGAR04_ANGRYBEG01.text: !D29! {S}{*1}You fucking people think you’re better than me…

X5071X_PBY_BEGGAR_FA_BEGGAR04_ANGRYBEG03.text: !D2B! {S}{*1}Not one of you assholes is willing to help me out.

X5071X_PBY_BEGGAR_FA_BEGGAR04_ANGRYBEG04.text: !D2C! {S}{*1}Hey! Hey! Can’t you see I’m starving here?!

X5071X_PBY_BEGGAR_FA_BEGGAR05_SADBEG02.text: !D2F! {S}{*1}I'm sorry to bother you, {*2}I just really need some money…

X5071X_PBY_BEGGAR_FA_BEGGAR05_SADBEG03.text: !D2G! {S}{*1}Listen, I’m clean, I promise. I just need a hot meal.

X0101X_HOLOPHOTO_HAPPYDAYS_PC_X01HOSTAGE.text: !D2L! {S}{*1}This is Daniel, the coolest android in the world! Say hi, Daniel! {*2}You’re my bestie! We’ll always be together!

X0101M_PBY_LINES_FA_X01MANDWOM03_HOME.text: !D2O! {S}{*1}Would you like to go home now?

X0101M_PBY_LINES_FA_X01MOLDMAN02_ENOUGH.text: !D2P! {S}{*1}Yes, Rose.{*2}Yes, I think that’s enough for one day…

X0101M_PBY_LINES_FA_X01MSUPERVISOR_HURRY.text: !D2Q! {S}{*1}Hurry up, you plastic idiots! I want this done by 4!

X0101M_PBY_LINES_FA_X01MRESTAURANTGUY_RE.text: !D2W! {S}{*1}Really? {*2}Why can’t you stay a little longer?

X0101M_PBY_LINES_FA_X01MRESTAURANTGIRL_C.text: !D2X! {S}{*1}Oh, I can’t… He’s gonna wonder where I am!

X0101M_PBY_LINES_FA_X01MRESTAURANTGUY_EN.text: !D2Y! {S}{*1}You know what? {*2}Let’s just try to enjoy our time together.

X0101M_PBY_LINES_FA_X01MSHOPPERGIRL01_BI.text: !D34! {S}{*1}It’s not like we have a big apartment.

X0101M_PBY_LINES_FA_X01MSHOPPERGUY01_THI.text: !D35! {S}{*1}Just think about it... {*2}no more cooking, no more laundry… {*3}we'll have so much more time together.

X0101M_PBY_LINES_FA_X01MSHOPPERGIRL01_NO.text: !D36! {S}{*1}It's- It's not like we wanna rush anything.

X0101M_PBY_LINES_FA_X01MSHOPPERGUY02_WHA.text: !D3E! {S}{*1}What’s wrong with the one we have?

X0101M_PBY_LINES_FA_X01MSHOPPERGIRL02_OU.text: !D3F! {S}{*1}There’s nothing wrong with it, but... All our friends are getting upgrades and this one can do so much more stuff, see?

X0101M_PBY_LINES_FA_X01MSHOPPERGUY02_LET.text: !D3G! {S}{*1}Hm… maybe… {*2}Let’s come back this afternoon and see if we still like it, right?

X0101M_PBY_LINES_FA_X01MANGRYMAN_SHOUT.text: !D3I! {S}{*1}What are you doing, pick it up! Faster!

X0101M_NPCJOGGER_PARK_FA_X01MJOGGERMAND_.text: !D3K! {S}{*1}You have run twelve miles, and are five miles away from your goal.
!D3M! {S}{*1}You ran 6.2 miles in 58 minutes and burnt 982 calories. You are 3.8 miles away from your goal. Keep your pacing, you are doing great.

X0101M_NPCJOGGER_PARK_FA_X01MCOUPLEMPARK.text: !D3N! {S}{*1}Hey honey. {*2}It's ok, {*3}you have to answer that? {*4}Ah, {*5}that's fine.

X0602M_PBY_LINES_FA_X06MSUPERVISOR01_ORD.text: !D3U! {S}{*1}This thing isn’t on the manifest… {*2}Oh wait, {*3}there it is.

X0602M_PBY_LINES_FA_X06MSUPERVISOR02_ORD.text: !D42! {S}{*1}When you’re done here, take care of those.
!D43! {S}{*1}These are supposed to be in bay seven.
!D46! {S}{*1}What are you waiting for? Let’s go!

X0602M_PBY_LINES_FA_X06MDOGGUARD_COPY03.text: !D49! {S}{*1}Hey, is Rick still on the perimeter?

X0602M_PBY_LINES_FA_X06MDOGGUARD_COPY02.text: !D4A! {S}{*1}Copy. {*2}When I’m done, I’ll check out the loading dock.

X5071X_PBY_PHONE_FA_PHONEMAN_PHONEM10.text: !D4M! {S}{*1}Oh hey before I forget: we need to cancel next week.

X5071X_PBY_PHONE_FA_PHONEMAN_PHONEM13.text: !D4P! {S}{*1}I…  {*2}think I’ll take a rain check, if it’s all the same to you…

X5071X_PBY_PHONE_FA_PHONEMAN_PHONEM15.text: !D4R! {S}{*1}I can’t remember, I’ll have to check.

X5071X_PBY_PHONE_FA_PHONEMAN_PHONEM19.text: !D4V! {S}{*1}But why is it taking so long?

X5071X_PBY_PHONE_FA_PHONEWOMAN_PHONEW10.text: !D5A! {S}{*1}Before I forget, we need to cancel next week.

X5071X_PBY_PHONE_FA_PHONEWOMAN_PHONEW13.text: !D5D! {S}{*1}Hum, I’ll take a rain check if it’s all the same to you.

X5071X_PBY_PHONE_FA_PHONEWOMAN_PHONEW15.text: !D5F! {S}{*1}I can’t remember, I’ll have to check.

X5071X_PBY_PHONE_FA_PHONEWOMAN_PHONEW19.text: !D5J! {S}{*1}But… {*2}But why is it taking so long?

X5071X_PBY_PHONE_FA_PHONEWOMAN_PHONEW21.text: !D5L! {S}{*1}I’m not sure, I’ll have to check.

X0201C_CONNOR_ANDROIDE_PC_X02CANDROID_FO.text: !DDZ! {S}{*2}I was just defending myself…{*3}He was gonna kill me.…{*4}I'm begging you…{*5}Don't tell them.

X0201C_CONNOR_ANDROIDE_PC_X02CHANK_FOUND.text: !DE0! {S}{*1}Connor, what the fuck is going on up there?
!DE1! {S}{*1}Holy shit…{*2}Chris, Ben, get your asses in here now.{*3}Come on!

X0201C_CONNOR_EXIT_PC_X02CCONNOR_WAYOUT.text: !DE2! {S}{*1}There are no footprints, apart from officer Collins' size 10 shoes. {*2}No, this type of soil would've retained a trace.{*3}Nobody's been out here for a long time.

X0201C_CONNOR_EXIT_PC_X02CHANK_WAYOUT.text: !DE3! {S}{*1}Door was locked from the inside.{*2}Killer must've gone out this way…{*3}Well, this happened weeks ago.{*4}Tracks could've faded.

MENU_OBSERVATION_02C_MP_CARLOSFINGERPRIN.text: !DFA! Criminal record: Theft and aggravated assault

X0201C_CONNOR_BLOOD_PC_X02CCONNOR_ANALYS.text: !DGG! {S}{*1}I'm analyzing the blood.{*2}I can check samples in real time.{*3}I'm sorry,{*4}I should have warned you…{*5}Got it.

X0201C_CONNOR_BLOOD_PC_X02CHANK_ANALYSE.text: !DGH! {S}{*1}Err, Jesus! What the hell are you doing?{*2}Ok, just… don't… {*3}put anymore evidence in your mouth, you got it?{*4-5}Fucking hell, I can't believe this shit…

X0201C_CONNOR_WOUND_FA_X02CHANK_HANK.text: !DGK! {S}{*1}Yeah,{*2}seems like the killer really had it in for him.

X0201C_RECON_MAIN_PC_X02CHANK_02BAT.text: !DGM! {S}{*1}That lines up with the evidence…{*2}Go on.

X0201C_RECON_MAIN_PC_X02CCONNOR_03ANDSTA.text: !DGR! {S}{*1}The android stabbed the victim. {*2}The victim fled to…

X0201C_RECON_MAIN_PC_X02CHANK_03ANDSTAB.text: !DGS! {S}{*1}So the android was trying to defend itself, right?.. {*2}Okay, then what happened?

X0201C_RECON_MAIN_PC_X02CCONNOR_05KNIFE.text: !DH3! {S}{*1}…with the knife. {*2}It was damaged by the bat…{*3}and lost some Thirium…

X0201C_RECON_MAIN_PC_X02CHANK_05KNIFE.text: !DH4! {S}{*1}Ok,{*2}your theory's not totally ridiculous…{*3}but it doesn’t tell us where the android went.

X0201C_RECON_MAIN_PC_X02CHANK_FAIL03.text: !DH6! {S}{*1}Okay,{*2}I've just hit my bullshit quota for the evening.{*3}There’s a killer on the loose and I’m wasting my time listening to an android…{*4}I’m outta here.

X0201C_RECON_MAIN_PC_X02CCONNOR_01VICTIM.text: !DH7! {S}{*1}I think the victim attacked the android…

X0201C_RECON_MAIN_PC_X02CHANK_01WRONG.text: !DHC! {S}{*1}I think you should look harder at the mess in the kitchen...{*2}I think that’s where it all started.

X0201C_RECON_MAIN_PC_X02CHANK_FAIL01.text: !DHF! {S}{*1}No, that can’t be right… It doesn’t fit the evidence.

X0201C_RECON_MAIN_PC_X02CHANK_FAIL02.text: !DHG! {S}{*1}Your story makes no sense…{B}You've gotta stick to the facts.

X0201C_RECON_MAIN_PC_X02CHANK_01KITCHEN0.text: !DHQ! {S}{*1}There're obvious signs of a struggle... The question is,{*2}what exactly happened here…

X0201C_RECON_MAIN_PC_X02CHANK_04LIVINGRO.text: !DHS! {S}{*1}And he tried to get away from the android…{*2}All right, that makes sense…

X0201C_CONNOR_CHAIR_PC_X02CHANK_CARRY01.text: !DIF! {S}{*1}Hey! Hey! Hey! What are you doin’ with that chair?{*2}Huh...{*3}gonna check something.

X0201C_PBY_LINES_FA_X02CBARGUY01_UNDERWA.text: !DIJ! {S}{*2}How long before the whole fuckin' country’s underwater?

X0201C_PBY_LINES_FA_X02CBARGUY02_GAME.text: !DIK! {S}{*1}Hey, {*2}you going to the game this weekend?

X0201C_PBY_LINES_FA_X02CBARGUY02_THEHELL.text: !DIM! {S}{*1}“Maybe”? What the hell does that mean?

X0201C_PBY_LINES_FA_X02CBARGUY01_TIRED.text: !DIN! {S}{*1}I’m just tired of these android players, you know? {B}It’s a fucking freak show.

We'll know more when the coroner gets here.{*8}There's a kitchen knife over here…{*9}Probably the murder weapon…

X0202A_TV_NEWS01_PC_X02ATVBRINKLEY_NEWSA.text: !DWI! {S}{*1}Yesterday, violent fighting between deviant androids and law enforcement authorities in Detroit {*2}left more than 45 dead and 83 wounded. {*3}Public reaction has been swift, {*4}with many androids strung up and destroyed all across the country. {*5}President Warren announced a state of emergency this morning and called in the National Guard to help maintain law and order. {*6}She also announced that all androids will be gathered into military camps for immediate destruction.

X0202A_TV_NEWS01_PC_X02ATVBRINKLEY_NEWSN.text: !DWJ! {S}{*1}Yesterday's events, in which law enforcement confronted hundreds of androids, have plunged the whole country into chaos. {*2}With android ‘lynchings’ in all major cities, {*3}President Warren announced a state of emergency this morning and called in the National Guard to help maintain law and order. {*4}She further announced that all androids will be gathered into military camps for destruction.

Water cuts, blackouts, and network failures are expected. {B}Maybe most worrying of all, our armed forces have lost two thirds of their effective personnel, {B}which consisted of specialized android models. The situation is extremely alarming.

X2002A_NOCROSSROADS_TVSTART_PC_X20ABRINK.text: !DWR! {S}{*1}Following the dramatic scenes in Detroit yesterday, the FBI have confirmed that the android known as Markus was destroyed. {*2}Reports suggest it was the same android behind the Stratford tower broadcast and a number of other disturbances in Detroit. {*3}Our sources indicate that it was a rare prototype. One that belonged to the famous painter Carl Manfred, who died recently.

The DPD are investigating several crime scenes but there has been no official comment as yet.
