X1001M_TV_NEWS_PC_X10MCARTLAND_VIOLENCE0.text: !E2H! {S}{*1}There was a veritable groundswell of violence in Detroit this morning.{B}Several hundred androids took to the streets, destroying everything in their path and threatening the lives of any humans they encountered.
!E2I! {S}{*1}A new stage has been reached, demonstrating beyond all doubt that these defective machines have become a real danger for American society.

X1001M_TV_NEWS_PC_X10MBRINKLEY_POLICEINT.text: !E2J! {S}{*1}The police intervened quickly to quell the rioting{B}but they met with the extreme violence of the machines which seemed to be determined to massacre humans.

X1001M_TV_NEWS_PC_X10MBRINKLEY_DESTROYMA.text: !E2K! {S}{*1}The time has come for us to destroy our machines…{B}before they destroy us.

X1001M_TV_NEWS_PC_X10MCARTLAND_SPACEMAN.text: !E2L! {S}{*1}Deep Space 5, the NASA shuttle, is about to reach the planet Mars after traveling for more than three years.{B}The crew consists of five androids whose mission is to build the first human base on another planet and conduct multiple scientific experiments.{*2}According to John Hamilton, director of NASA, androids will significantly accelerate the conquest of space.{B}With no need for oxygen, food or a return to Earth, missions lasting several years can now be envisaged.{B}In fact, a new mission to Jupiter is scheduled to be launched before the end of this year.

X1001M_TV_NEWS_PC_X10MWEBB_STATECHAOS.text: !E2M! {S}{*1}Without the courage and the determination of the police, the machines would have reduced Detroit to a state of chaos…

X1001M_TV_NEWS_PC_X10MWEBB_PITILESS.text: !E2N! {S}{*1}There can be no doubt that the authorities will be pitiless in their response to this wave of violence.

X1001M_TV_NEWS_PC_X10MWEBB_NEWHORIZON.text: !E2O! {S}{*1}New Horizon is a company that now offers parents the possibility of defining the genetic characteristics of their children before they're born.{*2}Confronted with a dramatic reduction in the birth rate, the government has decided to dismiss accusations of eugenics and to authorize genetic selection.{*3}For the first time in history, human beings can decide the evolution of their species.{*4}Although many scientists are alarmed at the long-term consequences of such practices, can anything really stand in the way of progress?{*5}We’ll be debating that issue right after the break, so stay with us here on Channel 16.

X0202A_TV_NEWS_PC_X02ATVBRINKLEY_RUSSIAN.text:
!E2P! {S}{*1}Following the android crisis and the neutralization of all military androids, American forces in the Arctic have been forced to withdraw, leaving the way clear for the Russian army.{*2}But according to some sources, the Russian forces also seem mysteriously to have withdrawn.{*3}The Kremlin has made no comment for the moment but it is quite possible that the Russian army has been confronted with a similar crisis among its own androids.
{*4}The Chairman of the United Nations, Douglas Cornwell, has called for the organization of an international conference on the status of the Arctic.{*5}In any case, the danger of a third world war seems to have been ruled out... for the moment.

X0202A_SKITCONNOR_RUMORS_PC_X02ASKIT13AN.text: !E2Q! {S}{*1}Who's that? {*2}Never seen this model before…{*3}Wonder where he came from.

X0205A_PBY_LINES_VO_X02ACROWDAND04_ENOUG.text: !E2W! {S}{*1}Enough talking! We need to fight the humans!

X0205A_PBY_LINES_VO_X02ACROWDAND05_VIOLE.text: !E2X! {S}{*1}He’s right! {*2}They’ll never give us freedom, we have to take it!

X0205A_PBY_LINES_VO_X02ACROWDAND05_PACIF.text: !E2Y! {S}{*1}You’re wrong, we have to do things the peaceful way! {*2}Markus’ way!

X1001M_PBY_LINES_FA_X10MSPORTGUY_IDLOVE.text: !E31! {S}{*1}Oh man, I’d love one of those.

X1001M_PBY_LINES_FA_X10MSPORTGUY_EXPENSI.text: !E33! {S}{*1}It’s too expensive. {*2}Besides, I don’t want it nagging me while I am running, you know…

X1001M_PBY_LINES_FA_X10MSPORTGIRL_MOTIVA.text: !E34! {S}{*1}Well that’s the whole idea! It motivates you.

X1001M_PBY_LINES_FA_X10MSPORTGUY_COMEON.text:
!E35! {S}{*1}Yeah yeah alright, I’ll think about it… 
{*2}Come on.

X1001M_PBY_LINES_FA_X10MMAN02_01CHITCHAT.text: !E36! {S}{*1}Still can’t believe that fucking video they made…

X1001M_PBY_LINES_FA_X10MMAN01_01CHITCHAT.text: !E37! {S}{*1}Seeing one of them talk like that, like a person? {*2}Fucking weird.

X1001M_PBY_LINES_FA_X10MMAN03_02CHITCHAT.text: !E38! {S}{*1}You know I bet President Warren is in bed with CyberLife.

X1001M_PBY_LINES_FA_X10MMAN01_02CHITCHAT.text: !E39! {S}{*1}A company that size? They do whatever they want.

X1001M_PBY_LINES_FA_X10MMAN03_02CHITCHAT.text: !E3A! {S}{*1}Maybe that’s why she hasn’t shut them down, {*2}hmm?

X1001M_PBY_LINES_FA_X10MMAN02_03CHITCHAT.text: !E3C! {S}{*1}You ever think maybe these androids have a point? {*2}Like, if they’re human enough to want rights, maybe they’re human enough to deserve them?

X1001M_PBY_LINES_FA_X10MCOUPLEMAN03_BABE.text: !E3F! {S}{*1}Hey, baby, why don’t we go back to your place?

X1001M_PBY_LINES_FA_X10MCOUPLEWOM03_BABE.text: !E3G! {S}{*1}Why? So you can stare at my fucking android all night?

X1001M_PBY_LINES_FA_X10MCOUPLEMAN03_YOUP.text: !E3I! {S}{*1}I’m telling you, you got the wrong idea!

X1001M_PBY_LINES_FA_X10MCOUPLEWOM03_YOUP.text: !E3J! {S}{*1}So what? You slipped and both hands landed on her tits?

X1001M_PBY_LINES_FA_X10MSHOPPINGMAN01_BO.text: !E3M! {S}{*1}I heard that android boyband is going to win some music prize.

X1001M_PBY_LINES_FA_X10MSHOPPINGWOM01_CR.text: !E3N! {S}{*1}You mean Here4u? God, they are so creepy.

X1001M_PBY_LINES_FA_X10MSHOPPINGMAN01_MY.text: !E3O! {S}{*1}My kids don’t listen to anything else.

X1001M_PBY_LINES_FA_X10MDEVICEGIRL_MARKU.text: !E3P! {S}{*1}Jesus, I can’t believe that’s an android…
!E3R! {S}{*1}The question is… {*2}What’s it gonna do next?

X1001M_PBY_LINES_FA_X10MPHONEGUY_COMPLAI.text: !E3S! {S}{*1}Ha finally! {*2}I’ve been on hold for ten minutes!
!E3U! {S}{*1}It’s like I told the last guy! {*2}My android won’t take instructions.
!E3V! {S}{*1}Sure, last night, I told it to do some cleaning, it told me “I would prefer not to.”
!E3W! {S}{*1}No, no, don’t you put me on hold!
!E3X! {S}{*1}Listen to me. {*2}I want this android destroyed, and I want a replacement.

X1001M_PBY_LINES_FA_X10MPHONEWOMAN_PARAN.text: !E3Z! {S}{*1}Think about it, I mean. Androids are everywhere, and they listen to everything! {*2}Maybe that's the point! CyberLife is recording all that! {*3}I mean... They could be spying on us right now! {*4}Yeah, {*5}and I bet President Warren is in on it too. {*6}Hello? {*7}Nicky? {*8}Are you there?

X0201C_BAR_INTRO_PC_X02CCONNOR_HELLOC.text: !E40! {S}{*1}Lieutenant Anderson,{*2}my name is Connor. I’m the android sent by CyberLife.

X0201C_BAR_INTRO_PC_X02CCONNOR_INSIST.text: !E41! {S}{*1}I'm sorry, Lieutenant, but I must insist.{*2}My instructions stipulate that I have to accompany you. {*3}No...{*4}where?

X0201C_BAR_INTRO_PC_X02CHANK_INSIST.text: !E42! {S}{*1}You know where you can stick your instructions?{*2}Never mind.

X0201C_BAR_INTRO_PC_X02CCONNOR_REASON.text: !E43! {S}{*1}I understand that some people are not comfortable in the presence of androids but I am-

X0201C_BAR_INTRO_PC_X02CHANK_REASON.text: !E44! {S}{*1}I am perfectly comfortable…{*2}Now back off, before I crush you like an empty beer can!

X0201C_BAR_INTRO_PC_X02CCONNOR_THREATEN.text: !E45! {S}{*1}Lieutenant Anderson, I must inform you that I intend to file a report on your behavior.

X0201C_BAR_INTRO_PC_X02CCONNOR_UNDERSTAN.text: !E47! {S}{*1}Listen,{*2}I think you should stop drinking and come with me.{*3}It'll make life easier for both of us.

X0201C_BAR_INTRO_PC_X02CCONNOR_WAIT.text: !E49! {S}{*1}I apologize, Lieutenant.{*2}I didn't mean to bother you. {*3}I'll wait for you outside.{*4}Take your time.

X0201C_BAR_INTRO_PC_X02CCONNOR_FORCE.text: !E4B! {S}{*1}I think we can go now. {*2}Your sense of duty, Lieutenant.{*3}And the cost of repairs if you damage me.{*4}For your information, I'm worth a small fortune.

X0201C_BAR_INTRO_PC_X02CHANK_FORCE.text: !E4C! {S}{*1}You little prick! I don't know what's stopping me from knocking you out…{*2}Wonders of technology…{*3}They can even program assholes these days…{*4}Gotta go!{*5}Duty calls…

X0201C_BAR_INTRO_PC_X02CCONNOR_DIPLOMACY.text: !E4D! {S}{*1}You know what?{*2}I'll buy you one for the road.{*3}What do you say?{*4}Bartender, the same again, please!{*5}After you.

X0201C_BAR_INTRO_PC_X02CHANK_DIPLOMACY.text: !E4E! {S}{*1}See that, Jim? Wonders of technology… Make it a double. {*4}Did you say homicide?{*5}After you…{*6}Whatever.

X0201C_BAR_INTRO_PC_X02CBARMAN_HELLOB.text: !E4F! {S}{*1}Hey, tin can!{*2}Can’t you read?{*3}No androids allowed in here!{B}Now, get out, before I kick your ass out.

X0201C_BAR_INTRO_FA_X02CHANK_FORCESEC.text: !E4H! {S}{*1}You little prick!{*2}I don't know what's keeping me from knocking you out…

X0201C_BAR_INTRO_PC_X02CCONNOR_HELLOC01.text: !E4I! {S}{*1}I looked for you at the station but nobody knew where you were.{*2}They said you were probably having a drink nearby.{*3}I was lucky to find you at the fifth bar.

X0201C_BAR_INTRO_PC_X02CCONNOR_HELLOC02.text: !E4J! {S}{*1}You were assigned a case early this evening.{*2}A homicide,{*3}involving a CyberLife android.{*4}In accordance with procedure, the company has allocated a specialized model to assist investigators.

X0201C_BAR_INTRO_PC_X02CHANK_HELLOH02.text: !E4L! {S}{*1}Well, I don’t need any assistance.{*2}Specially not from a plastic asshole like you.{B}So just be a good lil' robot and get the fuck outta here.

X0101X_ALLEN_TOPO_PC_X01CONNOR_BEHAVIORC.text: !E4V! {S}{*1}Do you know if it’s been behaving strangely before this?

X0101X_ALLEN_TOPO_PC_X01CONNOR_EMOTIONAL.text: !E4W! {S}{*1}Has it experienced an emotional shock recently?

X0101X_ALLEN_TOPO_PC_X01CONNOR_SITUATION.text: !E4X! {S}{*1}Captain Allen? {*2}My name is Connor. {*3}I’m the android sent by CyberLife.

X0101X_ALLEN_TOPO_PC_X01CONNOR_FIRSTQUES.text: !E4Z! {S}{*1}I need information to determine the best approach.

X0101X_ALLEN_TOPO_PC_X01SWATCAPTAIN_NEGO.text: !E51! {S}{*1}Why are we wasting time sending an android to negotiate?! {B}That piece of crap could jump from the rooftop any second. {*2}I DON’T GIVE A SHIT! My men are ready to step in... just give the order!{*3}Fuck!{*TC:24000|25680}I don’t believe this…

X0101X_ALLEN_TOPO_PC_X01SWATCAPTAIN_SITU.text: !E52! {S}{*1}It’s firing at everything that moves, {*2}it already shot down two of my men... {*3}We could easily get it, but they’re on the edge of the balcony. {*4}If it falls, {*5}she falls.

X0101X_ALLEN_TOPO_PC_X01SWATCAPTAIN_FIRS.text: !E53! {S}{*1}I haven’t got a clue. Does it matter?

X0101X_ALLEN_TOPO_PC_X01SWATCAPTAIN_DEAC.text: !E54! {S}{*1}It's the first thing we tried. {*2}Didn’t do anything…

X0101X_ALLEN_TOPO_PC_X01SWATCAPTAIN_SECO.text: !E55! {S}{*1}Listen, {*2}saving that kid is all that matters. {*3}So either you deal with this fucking android now, {*4}or I’ll take care of it.

X0101X_ALLEN_TOPO_PC_X01SWATCAPTAIN_UTUR.text: !E56! {S}{*1}Hey, what do you think you're doing?!

X0201C_BAR_CUSTOMER5_PC_X02CCUSTOM05_REA.text: !E5C! {S}{*1}Shit, I thought androids weren’t allowed in here!
!E5D! {S}{*1}Shit, I thought androids weren’t allowed in here!

X0201C_BAR_CUSTOMER6_PC_X02CCUSTOM06_REA.text: !E5E! {S}{*1}What's your problem? {*2}You wanna buy me a drink? {*3}That's what I thought…

X0201C_BAR_CUSTOMER7_FA_X02CCUSTOM07_BAR.text: !E5F! {S}{*TC:0|2160}The fuck you doin’ here? You got some balls, tin can!

X0501M_PBY_LINES_FA_X05MGIRL_GETRID.text: !E5L! {S}{*1}Are we really going to get rid of Mandy?

X0501M_PBY_LINES_FA_X05MMOM_SWEETIE.text: !E5M! {S}{*1}Grandma says it leaves her with nothing to do, sweetie.

X0501M_PBY_LINES_FA_X05MFLORIST_FLOWERS.text: !E5R! {S}{*1}Don’t forget these!{*2}And when you’re done, you can go up and uh, finish, out back.

X0501M_PBY_LINES_FA_X05MBUSMAN_CARL.text: !E5S! {S}{*1}You hear about that artist, Carl Manfred?

X0501M_PBY_LINES_FA_X05MMOM_SWEETIEV2.text: !E60! {S}{*1}Grandma says it leaves her with nothing to do, sweetie.

X0201C_BAR_CUSTOMER34_PC_X02CCUSTOM03_SA.text: !E62! {S}{*TC:0|520}You see that?{*TC:2600|5080}Yeah… shame it was an android who took her in the first place.

X0201C_BAR_CUSTOMER34_PC_X02CCUSTOM04_SA.text: !E63! {S}{*TC:520|2600}Android killed itself to save the girl… damn heroic.

X0201C_BAR_CUSTOMER34_PC_X02CCUSTOM03_EM.text: !E64! {S}{*TC:0|1280}The android took a kid hostage? {*TC:2200|3640}Wasn’t it an android who saved her?

X0201C_BAR_CUSTOMER34_PC_X02CCUSTOM04_EM.text: !E65! {S}{*TC:1280|2200}We should burn ‘em all…{*TC:3640|4480}Doesn’t make it okay.

X0201C_BAR_CUSTOMER34_VO_X02CTVPRESENTER.text: !E66! {S}{*TC:0|4640}Ultimately the story had a happy ending, with one android undoing the evil of another. But questions remain as to –
!E67! {S}{*TC:0|6320}A little girl, killed by her own android, as another stands powerless to stop it. The incident raises a serious question: can America trust these machines? -

X0201C_BAR_CUSTOMER34_PC_X02CCUSTOM03_EM.text: !E68! {S}{*TC:0|2520}That little girl… killed by a machine… it’s a fuckin’ tragedy. {*TC:4560|6440}Why would it? Probably protecting its own kind.

X0201C_BAR_CUSTOMER34_PC_X02CCUSTOM04_EM.text: !E69! {S}{*TC:2520|4560}You see the android cop? Piece of shit did nothing.
